story:
Life's Greatest Accessory: Time

The truth is that life revolves around time and unlike other accessories, time can't be renewed or bought. So when it matters time is the last thing we should waste even more so during an emergency.
At any given time anyone of us could fall victim to an accident and when this does happen our lives could hang on the branch of the tree of time similar to the last fall leaf among harsh winter winds. When this unfortunate event occurs, wouldn't you want every precious second utilized to it's max potential in efforts toward helping you overcome such a disaster.
We all would and that's why we developed our newly patented device "The Dynamic Touch" and its corresponding systems. 
Think about it, when most tragedies occur, an emergency response team has to be contacted by a phone. In such a delicate event, time is wasted as observers watch and then determine if they need to call in the emergency. More time is wasted obtaining their tucked away devices, dialing, connecting and informing the dispatch team of such an accident. Then more time is lost due to the informing and instructing of available response units which rely on the cooperation of aware and unaware commuters to create a non-stop path to your rescue. 
With Your Helpful Donation We Can Eliminate The Waste Of Such Valuable Time With "The Dynamic Touch"!



The Facts We Live With

The first fact is located below from an article composed due to an experiment conducted.
Abstract:

Emergency medical services (EMS) administrators seek methods to enhance system performance. One component scrutinized is the response time (RT) interval between call receipt and arrival on scene. While reducing RTs may improve survival, this remains speculative and unreported.

Objective:

To determine the effect of current RTs on survival in an urban EMS system.

Method:

The study was conducted in a metropolitan county (population 620,000). The EMS system is a single-tier, paramedic service and provides all service requests. The 90% fractile RT specifications required for county compliance include 10:59 minutes for emergency life-threatening calls (priority I) and 12:59 minutes for emergency non-life-threatening calls (priority II). All emergency responses resulting in a priority I or priority II transport to a Level 1 trauma center emergency department over a six-month period were evaluated to determine the relation between specified and arbitrarily assigned RTs and survival.

Results:

Five thousand, four hundred twenty-four transports were reviewed. Of these, 71 patients did not survive (1.31%; 95% CI = 1.04% to 1.67%). No significant difference in median RTs between survivors (6.4 min) and nonsurvivors (6.8 min) was noted (p = 0.10). Further, there was no significant difference between observed and expected deaths (p = 0.14). However, mortality risk was 1.58% for patients whose RT exceeded 5 minutes, and 0.51% for those whose RT was under 5 minutes (p = 0.002). The mortality risk curve was generally flat over RT intervals exceeding 5 minutes.

Conclusion:

In this observational study, emergency calls where RTs were less than 5 minutes were associated with improved survival when compared with calls where RTs exceeded 5 minutes. While variables other than time may be associated with this improved survival, there is little evidence in these data to suggest that changing this system's response time specifications to times less than current, but greater than 5 minutes, would have any beneficial effect on survival.

Below is an informational fact from a news article.

"Help came too late for Julia Rusinek. The 21-year-old Yale sociology student, an accomplished runner, collapsed on a busy street corner in the nation's capital on a summer evening in 1999 after working out at a nearby gym.

Rusinek had more than a fighting chance to live: She was healthy except for a hidden condition that caused a sudden electrical short circuit in her heart. Her heart needed a zap — within six minutes — from a common medical device known as a defibrillator. Bystanders saw her fall, rushed to help and immediately called 911.

But Rusinek's life ticked away on the corner where she fell. Twelve minutes passed before an ambulance crew connected a defibrillator to her chest. Like thousands of others every year in cities across the country, Rusinek lost any chance she had to survive because of an emergency medical system that consistently fails to save as many lives as it should. 

A survey and data analysis show that, of the 250,000 Americans who die outside of hospitals from cardiac arrest each year, between 58,000 and 76,000 suffer from a treatable short circuit in the heart and therefore are highly "saveable." Yet nationwide, emergency medical systems save only a small fraction of saveable victims, and rates vary widely from city to city.

The analysis shows:

  • The chance of surviving a dire medical emergency in the USA is a matter of geography. If you collapse from cardiac arrest in Seattle, a 911 call likely will bring instant advice and fast-moving firefighters and paramedics. Collapse in Washington, D.C., and — as one EMS official suggests — someone better call a cab for you. Seattle saves 45% of saveable victims like Rusinek; Washington, D.C., has no idea how many victims like Rusinek it saves. The city estimates it saves 4% of cardiac arrests, but inconsistent record-keeping makes it impossible for Washington to account accurately for its most saveable victims.
  • In the nation's 50 largest cities, about 9,000 people collapse each year from cardiac arrest caused by a short circuit in the heart. Only an estimated 6% to 10%, or as few as 540, are rescued. If every major city increased its save rate to 20%, as a number of cities have done, a total of 1,800 lives could be saved every year."
Below is a diagram off how the EMS system currently works.

View how current EMS state systems stack up with a click of the link below.
State EMS Stack Up Comparison


Our Devices:

How Dynamic Is "The Dynamic Touch"

Currently the Dynamic Touch response system and devices included The Emergency Vehicle's Dynamic Touch Mobile Device, The Commuter Vehicles's Dynamic Touch Mobile Device, and The Personal Emergency Dynamic Touch Armband.  

The Emergency Vehicle's Dynamic Touch Mobile Device:



With the Emergency Vehicle's Dynamic Touch device, the emergency response team can receive emergency alerts and respond to them with or without the need for a dispatcher. With the acceptance of responding to an emergency, along with their activated flashing lights and sirens, an emergency alerting signal will be sent out from their Dynamic Touch device (shown in step 2) to Commuter Vehicles Dynamic Touch devices (shown in step 3 and step 4) anywhere within a 3-mile radius to inform those drivers ahead of time of the arrival of the emergency vehicle with real data time concerning time of arrival, location and in which direction to move over. 


 The Commuter Vehicles's Dynamic Touch Mobile Device:


With the Commuter Vehicle's Dynamic Touch Mobile Device, the commuter can receive all and any emergency alerts in a 3-mile radius with updates of the responding emergency vehicle's time of arrival, location and which direction to move over. Along with this function, commuters can press the built-in emergency button sending a emergency signal or in-case of a collision accident, sensors connected to the Dynamic Touch located in the vehicle will also send emergency signals to an Emergency Response Team and Communication Response Team with the needed information to contribute to a quick and life saving rescue.


The Personal Emergency Dynamic Touch Armband:

With the Personal Emergency Dynamic Touch Armband, the user can send emergency signals alerting an Emergency and Communication Response Team of an emergency. 

Our Dynamic Touch devices and system overall will help EMS Teams world wide greatly improve their response time and ensure the options of living for more accidental victims. 

Your Impact With Our Goal

Your Donation means more than you know! With Your help we can move forward toward providing a true life saving service world wide that we will all come to know and love!! With the Dynamic Touch in full effect we can all feel a lot more safe when it comes to receiving emergency assistance for ourselves,  family and others. Just think if anything goes wrong you have immediate emergency assistance on the way whether you're in your vehicle or alone anywhere else without the hassle of dialing and connecting with a Dispatcher for help. With Dynamic Touch all ages can enjoy security. Our goal is to spread this new found innovation across the world moving towards a safe and brighter future for years to come. 



Spread The Word To The World!

Its as simple as a touch, A Dynamic Touch. Spreading the word is just as good as donating! Let's change this world together. A percentage of our earnings will be donated to St. Jude!!



Due Credit:

Without these companies below our devices or statistical research wouldn't have been possible. 
Zero Gravidy

story:
The Band-It Case is an all-in-one, water-resistant, 2-piece snap-together iPhone case. Each case comes with an interchangeable band in the color of your choice to mix and match your style.

                                                                  CASE- FEATURES

   

                                          

FACT: Everyone's phone needs protection......Did you know that every 2 seconds someone accidentally breaks their phone? You’re 10x more likely to break your phone than lose it or have it stolen.

Yes, there's thousands of other phone cases out there, so what makes The Band-It Case by Bodacious Cases different?

Bodacious Cases allows you to ditch your bulky purse or wallet for a protective, durable, sleek, thin, stylish, customizable case that you can carry an I.D., two credit cards and or business cards in, and at a competitive price. Don’t forget that it’s Made in America. Proudly NOT made in China! :)

                                 

We want to raise $30,000 to begin the expansion of our product line to the iPhone 6 and Samsung Galaxy s5. Our goal is to reach $200,000 to fully expand our product line to include the new Samsung Galaxy s6, plus I (Arianna) as the CEO will go audition for Shark Tank! :)

FACT: One of our goals is to create 100 local jobs in the community and surrounding areas by December 3, 2016. We can’t do it without your help.

        

We don’t just manufacture our products here. We try to buy everything from our     t-shirts, packaging, business cards, stickers, the bubble shipping envelope that protects your case while being shipped to your door. We try to support local and American made businesses EVERY chance we get!

We offer up to 10 case colors and 12 easily interchangeable band colors so you can customize your case to match your different outfits, sports team, business or charity. 6 case colors for the iPhone 4/4s and 10 colors for all other cases.

            

CamBo Product Description: In January 2014 we launched our line of camouflage cases called “CamBo”. The three front and back case designs are real photos taken at Bodacious Cases Headquarters located on a Missouri Century Farm; which was homesteaded in 1824 by the CEO’s great-great-grandparents.

All other competitor’s camouflage cases are digitized photos and are only on the back of the case, where ours are real photos, on the front and back.

With the Band-It Case you can build your own Bo case. Our cases allow you to have a case that is all one solid color, or a case that is up to 3 different colors. Choose your own front, back and band color.

Our cases are reg. $35-59.95. ONLY in this crowdfunding campaign will you see prices so low, it'll make your jaw drop! 

Save up to 50% off now ONLY on our crowdfunding campaign.

                           

With the Band-It Case you can match your style by purchasing extra interchangeable bands.

                    

                       

Thousands of you have asked us to expand our product line, therefore we need your help to launch the new and improved Bo Case (2.0) With changes to the security lever, a softer home button and on/of button, stronger ports and an added layer of protection on the inside. We are currently raising funds to expand to the iPhone 6, Samsung Galaxy s5 & 6.

(Please note that the iPhone 4/4s, 5 & 5s will NOT be the new and improved Bo case 2.0 and will NOT include the extra layer of protection or any other changes, but will still offer you ultimate protection, when you drop your phone.)

                      


                               

Bo was born on the 4th of July, but what are we celebrating when we depend on other countries to make all of our products? Together we can make a difference, and it all starts here, with a Bo case. 

THE STORY OF OUR CEO: Hi. I’m Arianna, the inventor, owner and CEO of Bodacious Cases. My idea all started with a ziplock baggie.

                                                     

 I was in a hot tub on the 4th of July at a family get together when I thought I lost my phone, meaning I lost my calendar, business contacts, pictures, everything. My family and I used to use ziploc baggies to protect our phones around water. I thought there has to be better way to protect my phone so the next day I started looking for a case that was water-resistant, durable; something that wasn’t bulky and could slide easily in and out of my pocket. I wanted a case that would hold an I.D. and credit cards. Something that would match my outfits and that was American made. Nope, couldn’t find what I wanted in just one case, so I told my mom I was going to invent one.

I used to Skype at night with manufacturers overseas and search by day for an American manufacturer. I was looking for that one company that believed in me and what I was doing.

SO many people told me what I wanted to do wasn’t doable and if it was all the big companies would have already done it. They said that if I wanted to stay Made in America I would NOT succeed. They said in order for me to succeed I’d have to manufacture my products overseas. I followed my dreams, didn’t give up, and kept my products American made.

Want to know more about how the Band-It Case came about? Why American made means so much to Bodacious Cases and why we love our Veterans. Watch this video to learn more.

       


Add a logo on the back of your case: Businesses, High Schools, Universities, Non-Profits, Charities, Sports Teams, etc..

Add $10 for a CamBo design or $15 during checkout to add a custom picture to the back of your credit card slot.

NOTE: Once the campaign is funded we will contact you via email to request your jpg high res. photo or logo for your case. 

  

We have LOTS of BODACIOUS perks. If we don’t have a case to fit your phone, that’s okay, we’ve got you covered! You can still donate and help support us. We have other perks besides phone cases and yes, they’re ALL American Made! For backing us and being apart of the Bo Family you can get a Tumblr, Calendar, Deck of Cards, T-Shirt, Bo Pillow, Bo Decal Sticker or a case to protect your iPhone or Samsung.

BODACIOUS PERK LEVELS:


LIFETIME GUARANTEE ON ALL BO TUMBLERS - If the tumbler has a manufacturer defect Clarissa’s Tumbler will replace it.

Note: We will contact you once the campaign is over to find out which option you would like.

                                 

To get everything the Band-It case offers you would have needed to purchase several different cases costing around $150. We all know you can’t have multiple cases on your phone at once and now you won’t need to, because you will have it all with the all-in-one Band-It Case, by Bodacious Cases.

                     

                                

We need $30,000 to begin the expansion of our product line to the iPhone 6 and Samsung Galaxy s5. Our goal is to reach $200,000 to fully expand our product line to include the new Samsung Galaxy s6. Plus I (Arianna) as the CEO will go audition for Shark Tank! :)

USE OF FUNDS: Funds will be used for the tooling and production of the Samsung Galaxy S5 and the iPhone 6 cell phone cases.  Production of these two new models will broaden our product line and enhance our customer reach beyond just iPhone users.  We will also use the funds to increase our inventory of the other cell phone model cases as we strive to increase and meet demand. In addition we plan to hire six new staff members, creating local, full time jobs. 

Once we reach $200,000 ALL perks of $30 or more will receive a 50% off coupon code on all orders of $50. This coupon will be good for 1 year to share with friends, family and co-workers. You will be able to use an unlimited number of times. You can buy gift certificates, share with your friends and save money. You could get all of this as a thank you for being part of our campaign. Not valid on sales, or discounted products. Help an American made company expand and save on your next purchase with us!

Upgrade Regular Warranty with Bo-surance: Add $6.99 at checkout to get the Bo-surance, then just pay a shipping fee of $6.99 each time you need a part replaced. Good for 1 year after delivery on case. (Yes, it’s that easy)                     BOOM BOOM BODACIOUS DEAL!

NOTE: This allows you to get a replacement part, without buying an entirely new case. This will cover anything not covered under the manufacturer's defect. If your dog chews on your phone case or breaks it, then just send us a picture of the issue and we’ll send you a new part, or new case. No questions asked, you just pay $6.99 for shipping.
Our products have shipped all over the US. to over 3,300 homes. This is a map of the locations we've shipped to.

                      

Over 257 people, in 10 different states, are involved in the making of our products.

                         

Have you ever wondered what goes into manufacturing a product? You can learn more about the process we use, which is an injection molding process in this video.  

       


Why is Made in America so important to me as the CEO?

American made is important to me for many reasons. While serving in Vietnam my father was wounded and came really close to dying and lost several of his fellow comrades. I feel I owe it to them to keep my products made here, because without their sacrifice I wouldn’t have the freedom to choose where my products are being made. Being the daughter of a double purple heart Vietnam Veteran means a lot to me.

    

Made in America is also important to me because I have nieces and nephews and if we keep taking manufacturing jobs overseas, when they grow up, they won’t have as many jobs options. We need to keep manufacturing in the US so to protect jobs for future generations.

Meet my niece Adelyn who is less than a year old. Look at her face. How could I produce my products anywhere else, when I could help her future?  I would rather make less money and create more American jobs. We can't change the country overnight, but we can change it one Bo case at a time.

                                 

We believe in protecting American Jobs, honoring those that make this country great and giving back. Thats why for every 12 cases we sell we give 1 away to a hero, whether its a Firefighter, Police Officer, Troop or community hero anywhere in the USA.

                                  

Being American made is extremely difficult and the cost is more than double, but well worth it.

One of our goals is to create 100 local jobs in the community and surrounding areas by Dec. 3, 2016. We can’t do it without your help.

Lets wrap your China made phone with an All-American made case. Together we can make a difference one Bo case at a time.

Help us reach our goal of $30,000 so we can expand to the iPhone 6 and Samsung Galaxy s5.  When we reach $200,000, we will begin manufacturing the Samsung Galaxy s6.

Don’t forget to share this campaign on your social media pages and also email it to your friends, family and co-workers. Without your help we can’t expand our product line! So please MOVE THAT MOUSE NOW go to the campaign and back us by donating. Every penny helps!

Thank you for your help! Have a bodacious day!

**All images are mock-ups and may not be exact, but close to the actual design.  Size & design may slightly vary.                                                                                                   All trademarks and logos mentioned herein belong to their respective owners.

I thought there has to be better way to protect my phone so the next day I started looking for a case that was water-resistant, durable; something that wasn’t bulky and could slide easily in and out of my pocket. I wanted a case that would hold an I.D. and credit cards. Something that would match my outfits and that was American made. Nope, couldn’t find what I wanted in just one case, so I told my mom I was going to invent one.
I used to Skype at night with manufacturers overseas and search by day for an American manufacturer. I was looking for that one company that believed in me and what I was doing.
SO many people told me what I wanted to do wasn’t doable and if it was all the big companies would have already done it. They said that if I wanted to stay Made in America I would NOT succeed. They said in order for me to succeed I’d have to manufacture my products overseas. I followed my dreams, didn’t give up, and kept my products American made.

Want to know more about how the Band-It Case came about? Why American made means so much to Bodacious Cases and why we love our Veterans. Watch this video to learn more.       



Add a logo on the back of your case: Businesses, High Schools, Universities, Non-Profits, Charities, Sports Teams, etc..
Add $10 for a CamBo design or $15 during checkout to add a custom picture to the back of your credit card slot.NOTE: Once the campaign is funded we will contact you via email to request your jpg high res. photo or logo for your case. 


  

We have LOTS of BODACIOUS perks. If we don’t have a case to fit your phone, that’s okay, we’ve got you covered! You can still donate and help support us. We have other perks besides phone cases and yes, they’re ALL American Made! For backing us and being apart of the Bo Family you can get a Tumblr, Calendar, Deck of Cards, T-Shirt, Bo Pillow, Bo Decal Sticker or a case to protect your iPhone or Samsung.


BODACIOUS PERK LEVELS:



LIFETIME GUARANTEE ON ALL BO TUMBLERS - If the tumbler has a manufacturer defect Clarissa’s Tumbler will replace it.
Note: We will contact you once the campaign is over to find out which option you would like.
                                 
To get everything the Band-It case offers you would have needed to purchase several different cases costing around $150. We all know you can’t have multiple cases on your phone at once and now you won’t need to, because you will have it all with the all-in-one Band-It Case, by Bodacious Cases.


                     
                                




We need $30,000 to begin the expansion of our product line to the iPhone 6 and Samsung Galaxy s5. Our goal is to reach $200,000 to fully expand our product line to include the new Samsung Galaxy s6. Plus I (Arianna) as the CEO will go audition for Shark Tank! :)
USE OF FUNDS: Funds will be used for the tooling and production of the Samsung Galaxy S5 and the iPhone 6 cell phone cases.  Production of these two new models will broaden our product line and enhance our customer reach beyond just iPhone users.  We will also use the funds to increase our inventory of the other cell phone model cases as we strive to increase and meet demand. In addition we plan to hire six new staff members, creating local, full time jobs. 
Once we reach $200,000 ALL perks of $30 or more will receive a 50% off coupon code on all orders of $50. This coupon will be good for 1 year to share with friends, family and co-workers. You will be able to use an unlimited number of times. You can buy gift certificates, share with your friends and save money. You could get all of this as a thank you for being part of our campaign. Not valid on sales, or discounted products. Help an American made company expand and save on your next purchase with us!



Upgrade Regular Warranty with Bo-surance: Add $6.99 at checkout to get the Bo-surance, then just pay a shipping fee of $6.99 each time you need a part replaced. Good for 1 year after delivery on case. (Yes, it’s that easy)                     BOOM BOOM BODACIOUS DEAL!NOTE: This allows you to get a replacement part, without buying an entirely new case. This will cover anything not covered under the manufacturer's defect. If your dog chews on your phone case or breaks it, then just send us a picture of the issue and we’ll send you a new part, or new case. No questions asked, you just pay $6.99 for shipping. 


Our products have shipped all over the US. to over 3,300 homes. This is a map of the locations we've shipped to.



                      
Over 257 people, in 10 different states, are involved in the making of our products.

                         
Have you ever wondered what goes into manufacturing a product? You can learn more about the process we use, which is an injection molding process in this video.  
       




Why is Made in America so important to me as the CEO?
American made is important to me for many reasons. While serving in Vietnam my father was wounded and came really close to dying and lost several of his fellow comrades. I feel I owe it to them to keep my products made here, because without their sacrifice I wouldn’t have the freedom to choose where my products are being made. Being the daughter of a double purple heart Vietnam Veteran means a lot to me.




    

Made in America is also important to me because I have nieces and nephews and if we keep taking manufacturing jobs overseas, when they grow up, they won’t have as many jobs options. We need to keep manufacturing in the US so to protect jobs for future generations.Meet my niece Adelyn who is less than a year old. Look at her face. How could I produce my products anywhere else, when I could help her future?  I would rather make less money and create more American jobs. We can't change the country overnight, but we can change it one Bo case at a time.



                                 
We believe in protecting American Jobs, honoring those that make this country great and giving back. Thats why for every 12 cases we sell we give 1 away to a hero, whether its a Firefighter, Police Officer, Troop or community hero anywhere in the USA.

                                  

Being American made is extremely difficult and the cost is more than double, but well worth it.
One of our goals is to create 100 local jobs in the community and surrounding areas by Dec. 3, 2016. We can’t do it without your help.
Lets wrap your China made phone with an All-American made case. Together we can make a difference one Bo case at a time.
Help us reach our goal of $30,000 so we can expand to the iPhone 6 and Samsung Galaxy s5.  When we reach $200,000, we will begin manufacturing the Samsung Galaxy s6.
Don’t forget to share this campaign on your social media pages and also email it to your friends, family and co-workers. Without your help we can’t expand our product line! So please MOVE THAT MOUSE NOW go to the campaign and back us by donating. Every penny helps!
Thank you for your help! Have a bodacious day!
**All images are mock-ups and may not be exact, but close to the actual design.  Size & design may slightly vary.                                                                                                   All trademarks and logos mentioned herein belong to their respective owners.

story:
See our latest TrackR campaign at: http://igg.me/at/TrackRbravo/ 

Missed the Campaign?  

Don't Worry! You can still be one of the first to own a StickR TrackR!

Visit: http://www.stickrtrackr.com/ 

 

App will be localized to English, Japanese, German, and French!

アップは日本で使えます！日本語モードもあります！


What is StickR TrackR?

StickR TrackR is a small tracking device – about the size of a quarter – that you can


place virtually anywhere. When combined with the free, easy-to-use TrackR app, it helps make your life easier by keeping track of important items, and even people or pets.

StickR TrackR functions using low-power Bluetooth capabilities with a range of about 100 feet. The app conveniently tracks up to 10 StickR TrackRs at once, so all your items can be taken care of. 

StickR TrackR works with your iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5S, iPhone 5C, new iPad, iPad mini, new iPod Touch, and Android 4.4 devices.

 

Features: 

 

Crowd Source Tracking

Other people using StickR TrackR can help locate your lost items after you've lost them.  If another user comes nearby your lost item, our server will send you a push notification containing the updated GPS coordinates. This all happens automatically and anonymously. 


Forget-me-not Reminder

You can choose to be alerted by your phone if you’re about to leave a designated area without your important item.

 

 

 


2 Way Ringer

TrackR technology works both ways! Not only can you make your StickR TrackR beep from your phone, the StickR TrackR also has its own button that allows you to make your phone ring, even if it's on silent! 



 

Distance Indicator

The app contains a hot/cold distance indicator that shows you if you are getting closer to your StickR TrackR’s location.

 

 

 

GPS Map

The app remembers the time and location you separated from your StickR TrackR and shows this location on a Google map. 

 

 

 

What can I track?

How does StickR TrackR Attach?

Stick it

StickR TrackR comes with double sided tape to attach to items

 

Attach it

StickR TrackR has an attachment point for keys, bags, and more




TrackR App

   

The app is already available to download! Use the TrackR app today to keep track of your important belongings. Compatible with iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPad 3, iPad 4, iPad Mini, and Android 4.4 devices.  

Download for iOS Today!

Download for Android Today!

The app has an iPhone and iPad Interface. It can keep track of 10 items simultaneously. In fact, the iPad allows you to interact with all your items on a single screen. 

From the app, you can set a custom icon, ring the selected device, and see on a map where you last left your item (or where you parked your car if that is what you are tracking). You can also choose to be alerted with a custom ring tone.  

The separation alarm enables you to be reminded that you are leaving your item (or phone) behind with a brief chime.  

The app also has an Anti Theft Mode which will cause the Button TrackR to continuously ring if your item gets stolen. It's like a modern day car alarm. You can silence the alarm with a single touch within the app.

 

TrackR runs in your phone's background, so it continues to function even after you have navigated away from the app screen. 

Crowd Source Tracking

If another user of the TrackR app comes into contact with your lost StickR TrackR device that was lost, you will receive a push notification with an updated GPS coordinate of where your item is. This allows you to receive live updates of where your items may be without the need for a GPS subscription.

With the app design, we tried to simplify the entire user interface by enabling users to access core functions as quickly as possible. If you have any feature requests or feedback, we would love to hear them. support@phonehalo.com or chris@phonehalo.com

 

Device Specs

Diameter: 25mm

Thickness: 4mm

Battery Life: 1 year

Battery Type: CR2016 Coin Cell Battery

Connectivity: Bluetooth 4.0 (Bluetooth Low Energy)

Device Compatibility: iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPad 3, iPad 4, iPad Mini, New iPod Touch, Samsung Galaxy S3, Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy Note 2.

About Us

We would like to take a moment to introduce the minds behind StickR TrackR.

StickR TrackR was developed by Phone Halo, a Santa Barbara, CA based start up company. The company was founded by Chris Herbert and Christian Smith, two UC Santa Barbara graduates who met during their college years.

The idea for StickR TrackR began when Chris and Christian noticed how frequently they misplaced their TV remote and keys. They realized they weren't the only ones with this problem. After much brainstorming, their goal was to design a simple and seamless solution to prevent the problem of misplacing important items. StickR TrackR was created to be the smallest and most innovative solution to date. 

StickR TrackR is not Phone Halo's first attempt at item finding technology. Wallet TrackR, Cobra Tag, and inSite are enjoyed by thousands. Phone Halo has consistently delivered products promptly to customers with the highest quality possible. StickR TrackR technology & Crowd Source Tracking technology was created during the Launch 2013 Hackathon Event.

Schedule

This is our 6th item tracking product and we already have trusted & very capable manufacturing partners.  Below is our Timeline.

May - IndieGoGo Campaign

June - Finalized Circuit Design

July- FCC & CE Approval

August - Production and Delivery to Customers

 

Questions? Comments? Suggestions?

Email Chris: chris@phonehalo.com 

Email Christian: christian@phonehalo.com

Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/buttontrackr

Tweet us: @phonehalo

 

Press

http://phonehalo.com/button-trackr-press/

 

FAQ

How does StickR TrackR work?

StickR TrackR devices can be stuck to valuables you would like to keep track of. Combined with the TrackR app, you can find lost items, and even be alerted before you're about to leave an important item behind.

How big is StickR TrackR?

We designed StickR TrackR to be so small that it can be stuck discretely to virtually anything. It’s only 25mm wide and 4mm thick – slightly larger than a quarter.

How many StickR TrackR devices can a smartphone find?

Using the TrackR app, a smartphone can manage up to 10 StickR TrackR devices at once.

What kind of battery does StickR TrackR use?

StickR TrackR uses an easily replaceable CR2016 coin cell battery. 

How long will the battery in my StickR TrackR last?

Because we are using new Bluetooth Low Energy technology, the battery will last approximately one (1) year. 

How do I replace the battery in my StickR TrackR?

The back of the StickR TrackR twists off without the use of any tools, making changing the battery quick and easy.

What is the range of the StickR TrackR?

The StickR TrackR range is 100 feet (30 meters).

What application does StickR TrackR work with?

StickR TrackR works with the free TrackR app available on both the iOS App Store (http://bit.ly/11BRgnX) and Google Play (http://bit.ly/18MUPoX). 

What phones and tablets are compatible with StickR TrackR?

StickR TrackR and TrackR work with your iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPad 3, iPad 4, iPad Mini, New iPod Touch, and Android 4.4 devices with Bluetooth 4.0

How does StickR TrackR attach to items?

The back of StickR TrackR can be stuck to almost any surface. The device also has a convenient loop that can attach to keychains.

What if I can't find my smartphone?

If you lose your smartphone, you can press a button on your StickR TrackR to cause your phone to ring… even if it’s on silent. StickR TrackR offers bidirectional protection. 

How does StickR TrackR help me locate my lost items?

StickR TrackR helps you find your lost items in 3 ways:

1) You can ring the lost item from the app

2) StickR TrackR automatically records where you left your item last 

3) The new and exciting Crowd Source Tracking technology will notify you when someone comes into range of your lost item and you will receive a live GPS update of its location

Can the TrackR app tell me how far away I am from my StickR TrackR?

Yes. To make searching for your items even easier, the app contains a hot/cold distance indicator that shows you when you are getting closer to your StickR TrackR as well as a Google map of where you left it.

How is StickR TrackR different from other finder products?

1) Bidirectional Protection: Find your item using your phone or find your phone using your StickR TrackR Device

2) Smart Separation Alarm: Notifies you when leaving an item behind as well as where you left the item on a GPS map

3) Crowd Source Tracking: Technology that allows users to locate their items after they have been lost

Can I use your product with other BLE Tracking devices?

Absolutely! Our Item TrackR app can work with StickNFind Devices, inRange Devices, Bluetooth Cars, headsets, and more!

Is the device water resistant?

The device will last through rain but isn't waterproof, so don't go swimming with your StickR TrackR devices.

I forgot to add shipping! What should I do?

Please contribute the shipping amount and select no perk. We will match up your contributions.

(Version française disponible plus basse)





                         
                             Hello, my name is Eric Boucher the president-founder of                                   EB Développement    
                                            
 I am 48 years old and I work in the automotive industry since 1987.
       I live in a little town located an hour north of Montréal Québec Canada.



Soutiens au projet:

 Votre don me permettra d'avancer plus efficacement à l'achèvement du projet. En incluant la fabrication d'un prototype"step one" (ou plus précisément d'un produit fini du type "démonstrateur") j'estime à environ $8 000 les couts du travail à accomplir.


Cout total du projet:

 En incluant les moules de production de grande série ainsi qu'un premier inventaire d'environ 1500 unités, j'évalue à environ $180 000 le cout total du projet et ceci constitue un défi à relever.

 Avec votre participation nous à coup sûr la conviction que pourront faire de ce projet un grand succès.


Remerciement:


 De toutes l'équipe de "EB Développement",

nous vous remercions pour vos conseils et votre soutien.

story:
Stay gANGA!

Ladies and Gentleman, Mothers and Fathers, boys and girls, sons and daughters…ITS gANGA TIME!

Our project goal is to complete gANGA. Ganga is a hybrid between toy,  interaction design, internet of things, smartphone/tablet app game and social network.Aimed at a wide target audience, at the heart of gANGA is the parent-child relationship which is developed through the little bear and its virtual world.

The project employs a mix of advanced technology, linking the virtual with the physical and encouraging communication through both the physical and emotional. 

Ganga is a teddy bear, connected to an app which communicated to tablets and smartphones. Children can take care of their Ganga teddy bear and also follow their little bear's growth, together with the parent, who can guide the little bears future with their children, through the app on their mobile. 

Follow your gANGA's progress, help them grow, write a diary with pictures of their experiences and share it with others! 

Ganga also enables parents to have an overview of how their child is caring for their gANGA teddy bear. Sensors, installed within the little teddy bear itself, communicate with the app of the parent's smart phone or tablet, so parents can open the app and see when their child is craddling ganga or when they are playing with him.  

How is this possible? An array of sensors (accelerometer, vibration, tilt) are fitted internally within the gANGA soft toy. These enable the app to receive positional data from the toy itself to their smart phone or tablet. Via the gANGA app the little bear on the screen in front of them will be moving as the child moves their soft toy.

About

GANGA is a mix of old and new technologies created for children completly designed and made in Italy.

The brains behind the little bear is Paolo, a loving father with over 25 years working within the IT industry. The creative mind is Marco who together with Paolo has literally brought to life the project that began as a programme.

Through modern day technology, a medium well known to children now-a-days, Paolo and Marco have created a toy that is not just about having fun, but also about parenting. It is about raising and loving for a little animal.

The interactive tools on IgANGA.iT and Smatphone/Tablet App enable children to personalize their gANGA, making it truly theirs. Through successfully completing daily tasks such as eating, washing, sleeping and learning the children can watch as their GANGA grows slowly becoming bigger and more capable, offering them more opportunities to interact with them.

GANGA does not just offer a separate isolated way to learn but also, through an online community, GANGA also enabled children to socialise together via their little bear.

Paolo (co-founder)      Marco (co-founder)

                

 

A true story...

 

GANGA is a toy for families. Created by a father who wanted to answer his child’s question when she asked him what he did: How could he describe his work as a programmer to a child? What is a Programme? So Paolo built a small app on his new smartphone, a little bear who needed to be cared for, to demonstrate what he did and GANGA was born. As time went on GANGA brought Paolo and his daughter closer. He was able, via this little bear, to not just shine a little more clarity for his daughter into his working life, but to also into his life as a parent.

In learning how to care for her little GANGA, Paolo’s daughter started to understand why her father asked her to brush her teeth at night, because if her GANGA didn’t do it, his happiness levels decreased. Likewise for bedtime, when she put her GANGA to bed in time she saw his happiness levels increase and he began to grow up. When one night Paolo asked his daughter if GANGA might need to go to bed now, she looked up and replied, yes. I think I should to. I want to have full happiness levels tomorrow! Gradually Paolo realised that just maybe, what had been a toy to help bring him and his daughter close, may be something that might help other parents like him.

 

Interacting Game - Take care yOur gANGA

This is the free app dedicated to play with gANGA. It permits, by Smartphone and Tablet, but also by the web (with no interaction capabilities), to take care of your gANGA interacting with it in the right way to support the basic actions of life: eating, cleaning, sleeping and learning by real life experiences!

 

DRAWorld Place

This is the place, on the web and by app, where parents and children can enjoy theirselves while painting child's gANGA Storyboard. In this way every parent & child, with a easly painting interface, can create their special virrtual ganga in action!

 
Painting tools with dedicated kids special effects such as stickers, frames and so on... permit to spend some happy moments!
 

In this easly way any kid can paint his/her gANGA so its possible going straight on to the

Context place! Try it NOW!!

 

UNIQUE PERKS IMAGE DESCRIPTION

iPhone Custom Cover

gANGA StoryBoard

You'll get our gANGA Album HI-RES Pics to print and color for kids (PDF). Realized by our Creative team! We decide to deliver this perk in the middle of campaign (March 2013)!

gANGA Stylist Designer

You'll get our gANGA Stylist Designer - 1:1 HI-RES Pics on how to build your own gANGA handmade (PDF). Realized in collaboration with ours Stylist and Creative team!

Couple gANGA T-Shirt

You'll get 1 gANGA T-Shirt for Adult and 1 for Kid (cotton)

gANGA HandMade Peluche

You'll get gANGA unique handmade peluche. Realized by our Stylist ,Creative and IT Team! Designed & Made in Italy!

gANGA HandMade Peluche with our BRAIN gANGA prototype!

...and finally you'll get 1 gANGA unique handmade peluche prototype with brain and free app to interact with little bear. Realized by our Stylist ,Creative and IT Team! Designed & Made in Italy.

gANGA SPONSOR STICK

You'll get a little sponsor stick on 10 gANGA delivered.

gANGA MAIN SPONSOR PARTNER

You'll get a big logo on 50 gANGA delivered.

Please please please check out the updated FAQ at the bottom for shipping information, timelines, and other details we were asked over email.  We update it constantly.  If you have any questions, comments, concerns  please email us at indiegogo@iganga.it

 

What We Need 

 

We HAVE BEEN hard working SINCE July 2012 AND NOW JUST NEED A LITTLE BOOST TO GET OUR PROJECT OFF THE GRUOND! WITH 30K WE WILL BE ABLE TO GET UP AND RUNNING AND MAKING OUR DREAM YOUR REALITY.

REALISING THIS DREAM IS HUGE FOR US AND WE WILL BE WORKING HARD BEHIND THE SENES TO CONTINUE THE WORK, so while campaign IS live, we will continue THE DEVELOPMENT ON ORDER FOR US TO   send YOU all perks AS promised!

45 days AND COUNTING BEFORE ITS gANGA TIME!

IF WE ARE ABLE TO RAISE THE 30K THI WILL BE AMAZING, BUT ANY MORE SUPPORT WIL BE GREATLY APPRECIATED. WE REALLY BELIEVE IN WHAT WE ARE DOING AND THINK YOU WILL TOO!

In any case, if we dont reach entire goal we will be able to delivery all perks in time! Promised!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean You can’t help if you like this project:

  • We will aprreciate if you word out and make some noise about your campaign.

  • Use our Indiegogo share tools!

Stay gANGA!
story_txt:
Stay gANGA!
Ladies and Gentleman, Mothers and Fathers, boys and girls, sons and daughters…ITS gANGA TIME!
Our project goal is to complete gANGA. Ganga is a hybrid between toy,  interaction design, internet of things, smartphone/tablet app game and social network.Aimed at a wide target audience, at the heart of gANGA is the parent-child relationship which is developed through the little bear and its virtual world.

The project employs a mix of advanced technology, linking the virtual with the physical and encouraging communication through both the physical and emotional. 


Ganga is a teddy bear, connected to an app which communicated to tablets and smartphones. Children can take care of their Ganga teddy bear and also follow their little bear's growth, together with the parent, who can guide the little bears future with their children, through the app on their mobile. 

Follow your gANGA's progress, help them grow, write a diary with pictures of their experiences and share it with others! 

Ganga also enables parents to have an overview of how their child is caring for their gANGA teddy bear. Sensors, installed within the little teddy bear itself, communicate with the app of the parent's smart phone or tablet, so parents can open the app and see when their child is craddling ganga or when they are playing with him.  

How is this possible? An array of sensors (accelerometer, vibration, tilt) are fitted internally within the gANGA soft toy. These enable the app to receive positional data from the toy itself to their smart phone or tablet. Via the gANGA app the little bear on the screen in front of them will be moving as the child moves their soft toy.

As time went on GANGA brought Paolo and his daughter closer. In learning how to care for her little GANGA, Paolo’s daughter started to understand why her father asked her to brush her teeth at night, because if her GANGA didn’t do it, his happiness levels decreased. story:
Available for iPhone 6/6s and Samsung Galaxy S6


BUILT-IN STICK: Strong, sturdy and extends up to 11 inches. Quickly and easily retracts back into place for convenient storage when not in use. 

 

SHUTTER BUTTON: Features Bluetooth technology which controls your device's camera to capture both photo and video. 

 

ROTATING HEAD: Position your mobile device vertically or horizontally to get the best angle in either Portrait Mode or Landscape Mode. 

 

DEVICE CONTROL SLOTS: Controls, ports, microphone and speaker remain easily accessible, allowing you to keep your SNAPSTYK case on your device at all times. 

 

DUAL CAMERA ACCESS: Capture photos and videos using your device's front-facing or rear-facing camera.

 

SLIM, DURABLE, STURDY: Manufactured with high-end materials to provide quality protection for your device, as well as a strong, stable hold when fully extended. The slim, discreet design makes it easy to store away in your pocket or bag. 

 

             

SNAPSTYK™ originated from the desire to have the benefit of added stability, better angles and a wider shot when taking selfies with family and friends, but without the extra mounts and sticks. We searched for a cool, discreet cell phone case with selfie stick built in, but couldn't find anything. So we set out to design our own!

After nearly two years of research and development, and several designs later, we have created a product that meets our high standards of strength, durability, style and convenience. 

We've teamed up with tremendous and reputable engineers and manufacturers to help bring SNAPSTYK to life. The molds have been created, a utility patent is pending, and we're ready to bring SNAPSTYK to market. 

 

To pre-order your very own SNAPSTYK case, support our project by selecting a perk that is $40 or higher. Each of these perks offer at least one (1) SNAPSTYK case. Perks $75 or higher offer additional cases if you'd like multiple cases in different colors, or if you would like to buy more for friends. 

We will collect your shipping information when this campaign is complete. It's that easy!

(See below for a detailed list of all perk options)

VOTE FOR YOUR FAVORITE COLOR. If we make it to this point, we owe you a huge thank you! To show our appreciation for all of your support, we'll let you choose the next SNAPSTYK case color(s). For every $10,000 over our initial goal, we will add another color to production. You can vote for your favorite color(s) on each social network. Click the buttons below to vote! 

 

                                                                                          

In addition to our SNAPSTYK cases, we're offering a high quality SNAPSTYK T-Shirt for $20. 

To get a shirt for only $10 (1/2 off), simply select a perk on the right that includes a SNAPSTYK case and T-Shirt. The price is automatically set to only $10 more than the SNAPSTYK-only perks with the same amount of cases. 


T-shirts available in sizes XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL

 

      

Available for iPhone 6/6s and Samsung Galaxy S6

  

 

You can choose black, silver or gold at the end of the campaign. More color options will be available for every $10,000 over our initial goal. See the STRETCH GOALS section above to vote for your favorite color!  

 

 

Manufactured using Polycarbonate (PC), a strong, tough, impact-resistant material. Power supplied by 3V CR2032 battery. *Battery Included

Manufactured using Polycarbonate (PC), a strong, tough, impact-resistant material. Power supplied by 3V CR2032 battery. *Battery Included

 

Risks and challenges

We are working hard to minimize any risks or delays. All product testing has been completed and we've entered our first full production order. Delays may occur during the shipping stages. We expect to receive our first production order at the end of July and will then begin shipping your orders immediately. Our commitment is to keep our supporters updated on our progress and be transparent about any problems that may arise.

story:
What is the SUPERBUMPER and Why is it so SUPER?

 

What is the SUPERBUMPER?:  The SUPERBUMPER is a type of case, or bumper to be exact, that fits around the edges of your iDevice to add a dash of style, protection, and a whole new super feature that cases and bumpers haven't seen before.  The SUPERBUMPER consists of a soft, silicone rubber interior lining that acts as a shock absorption medium, molded together with a hard plastic outer shell for greater protection, strength, and support. 

Why is it SUPER?: The SUPERBUMPER is super because, well, it was designed to be.  With it's patent pending functionality, no other bumper on the market can, or will be able to, do what it can do.  The SUPERBUMPER's new feature, dubbed the "cord management slit," holds your charger and other Apple Dock Connector cables to the device, eliminating the possibility of them becoming accidentally disconnected.  This means: 

  • No more damaged and loose connections because the cable gets ripped out.  
  • No more having your 'tunes' cut out when driving because the am/fm tuner cable popped out.  
  • No more dirt, dust, and debris getting into the device's 30-pin dock connector and messing with the connection.  
  • No more waking to find your device's battery not charged because your pets bumped it in the middle of the night, or if you're like me, you rolled over on it while sleeping and disconnected the cord.  
  • And no more panicking because your device became disconnected during an updating or restoring session.

NO MORE CHARGING ISSUES!

In addition to the "cord management slit" and the superior protection received from the rubber lining and the hard outer shell, the SUPERBUMPER was designed with a slight lip to keep the front and back glass from touching the surfaces when resting.  This reduces the risk of scratches and cracks, helping keep it unblemished even longer.

iPad SUPERBUMPER

When was this invented... and how?

When & How: I came up with the initial concept for the SUPERBUMPER at the end February of 2012.  For the year and a half prior to coming up with this idea, I was traveling a lot between Syracuse, NY, Boston, MA, and Olean/Portville, NY.  During those many miles in my vehicle, I always used my AM/FM TuneBase to listen to my music in the car.  After continually grabbing and moving my iPhone to change the song and it sliding around because of the turns and me having to replug it back in, the AM/FM turner cable started to have a bad connection with my iPhone.  It became too loose.  My music started to cut in and out, and would turn off whenever I hit a bump.  I then realized that if I held the cable into the iPhone tightly, the issue was fixed.  So I did what any normal person would do... I bent the cable and would put anything heavy I had in the car on top of it to keep it in position and not get disconnected.  Fast forward about a year to Feb. 2012 and it hit me... I could make my own case that actually solved this problem and a few others.  I realized this isn't the only situation where having a case that holds your Apple Dock Connector snugly to the phone would be beneficial. 

So at the end of February, with only an idea and a dream, I got to work.  First, I started doing research on whether or not there were any products like this on the market (one that held the dock connector cable to the device) and whether or not it was a patentable.  Second, I started drawing some very basic sketches and concept visualizations.  

Proof-of-Concept Prototypes

When I became satisfied with the uniqueness of product and realized it was patentable, I got to work building rough, basic prototypes made from cloth, plastic, rubber, and anything I could find that would do the job.  

After that, I started meeting with lawyers, design firms, investors, manufacturing/packaging companies, and doing market research.  I had the provisional patent filed, hired a design team to develop the final models, started pricing final unit costs, and worked on other essential, and boring, business things that needed to be taken care of.  

And that's where we are now.

What color combinations will you have?

The SUPERBUMPER prototypes will be produced in black/dark grey, black/ lime green, and white/grey (two of which are shown, one above and below).

SUPERBUMPER Family

 

What's next & Why do you need my help?

We need your help because in order to get the SUPERBUMPER into full production and to the market, we're going to need top off our buget with an additional $5k to get the production run going.  Your money goes directly towards the cost of the tooling/manufacturing and nothing else.  Needless to say, I can't thank you enough for your support!  You rock!

Once the campaign has ended, I will contact you with what color combination and what iPhone SUPERBUMPER you want, 4/4S or 5.

 

Additionally, we're proud to say that with designing, prototyping, and future manufacturing & packaging all being done within NYS, this product is ...

*100% MADE IN AMERICA*

story:
Update 12.03...

Dear App Code Community,
 
The much anticipated App Code 2.0 is almost here!  We wanted to give you a quick update with a new timeline.  
- We have finished re-branding the new membership site.
- The first of the brand New videos are being plugged in this week.
- The new app builder is on our server.  It's been tested and it's working amazingly!
- We still need to complete final customization of the app builder, and then create new app builder training videos so you can get the most out of it! 
- Live event update:  We are close to locking down a venue in San Diego for March 1st and 2nd! Stay tuned.
- New Community Group is set up and will be unlocked as part of the new membership site.
 
We plan on releasing to you the new membership site, the new community, the new app builder and the final live event dates on December 17th!
 
Thank you for your patience.
 
Cheers to your greatness,
 
- Amish Shah & James Sol Radina
And the entire App Code Team

 

Update 11.06...

We just added a new perk at $401 that includes the $900 perk!  Check it out!  This is for the next 20 people only!

Update 10.29...

Thank you everyone for your support thus far!  We are getting a lot of the same questions so here are some FAQ's:

Delivery of Items - It is going to take us some time to put the final touches on the new App Builder.  We are pushing hard to deliver the new app builder AND the new 2.0 training by the 2nd half of November.  In the meantime, we have planned some special videos to release, that will include training, ahead of your special access.  This way you can hit the ground running.

Many of you have been asking when you will receive your Perks. Please see the estimated delivery dates below, based on amount:

$15 – Your Name on our Website

November 15, 2012

$25 – 3 Month Subscription to the App Builder

November 30, 2012

$50 – 9 Month Subscription to the App Builder

November 30, 2012

$100 – We Build YOU an App!

December 22, 2012

$200 – App Code Seminar Videos

November 16, 2012

$250 – Live Seminar

February 28. 2013

$400 – Lifetime Access to The App Code

November 30, 2012

$900 – We Will Support You

November 30, 2012

$2500 – Mastermind Program Webinars

November 30, 2012

$5000 – Sponsorship & Endorsement

December 15, 2012

$10,000 – Meet with Us in San Diego

January 19th, 2012

 

Marketing & Cross Promotion-  Yes we have a "CoLab App Wall" software that allows users to cross promote with others in the network.  You will have access to marketing right out of the gates.  This IS going to be included in the $400 App Code 2.0 Level.  The App Ad Network we are creating for our members is going to give them a leg up on 99% of the market.

Ongoing Fee For App Builder- It works like this.  If you purchase at the $400 level, we are including 9 months of our App Builder Software (that is also a previous reward at the $50 level).  We are not sure what the monthly fee for the app builder will be AFTER this 9 months.  It might be free or we might need to place a small monthly fee on the program to cover our server cost and API calls.  Right now, if we were to give an estimate, $30 a month would allow you to make unlimitted apps with out app builder.  

Lifetime Access to App Code Training - YES!  That is correct.  You will have lifetime access to our training platform.  We will be constantly upgrading the videos to stay current.  And IF we ever launch a 3.0 or newer version, you will have access at no additional charge.  (Please note that the App Builder Software is separate.  The training and the app builder go hand in hand, but are different.  See below.  Our training goes beyond the app builder and therefore, at some point, we may charge a monthly fee to continue to use the app builder.)

Types of Apps You Can Make With Our Training - Our training program has you look at the entire market.  So you will learn to build simple apps with our app builder software (we even give you training on how to use OTHER app builder softwares).  These apps are your information based apps, local business apps, special event apps, tutorials, basic GPS apps, audio/ video apps, and so much more... accross android & apple with a push of a button.  And Yes, we teach how to set up your apps with push notifications, advertising, social sharing and everything in between.  

SECOND, we teach you how to go to the next level with our templates.  We will hand you the keys to proven templates that you can quickly change into your own unique app.  

And THIRD, we teach you how to go beyond all this and hire an outside team to build what we call Super Apps.  These are the ones that would require expert coding and designs, therefore, outsourcing is the way to go.  

Who Owns The Apps - YOU do.  You can download the source code.  These are your apps!

Special for App Code 1.0 Users - If you were a member of The App Code 1.0,  just make a $15 donation to the campaign and share this page on Facebook, and we'll hook you up with App Code 2.0! Thank you for supporting us!

story:
BEAM-Messenger®
(Best Encrypted App for Messaging)

Deine Vorteile als Förderer

Ab 3,- € bekommst du und 2 Freunde von dir LEBENSLANG das Recht, unseren Messenger kostenlos zu nutzen! 

Wir werden dich informieren, sobald unsere App über die App-Stores erhältlich ist. Du bekommst automatisch den VIP-Status, was bedeutet, dass für dich die jährlichen Verlängerungsgebühren entfallen!

Unser Projekt steht und fällt mit der Verbreitung, Mund-zu-Mund-Propaganda und Nutzung. Daher ist der erste Schritt, diese Seite zu "Sharen", der Zweite, uns zu fördern und der Dritte, unseren Service zu nutzen, sobald er verfügbar ist.

Bitte habe Verständnis dafür, dass wir an dieser Stelle nicht mehr verraten können, da wir in Investorengesprächen sind.

Help us to spread the world about miKey! Click the link button above and share your custom link on Facebook, Reddit, Stumble Upon, BuzzFeed, blogs, etc.. and get $10 discount for each successful referral. Everything counts; get your miKey absolutely free! There is no limit! 

What is new in Mikey V2?

Mikey V-2 has a stylish protective case for the multitool part. It is now available in four stylish colors (Black, Blue, Pink & Wine-Red)

MiKey - A product created to be part of your daily life which is convenient and helpful in your daily chores.

miKey is the key to your stress free life. MiKey can do a lot than you can imagine in your wildest dreams.It’s your smart assistant as well as your daily house tool.

Now about what your smart assistant can do....?

Imagine how many times you had wished you had a little bit extra battery charge on your phone or when you had wished you had carried your flash drive with you, the time you had wasted in locating your keys or your phone during your morning hectic schedule. This product will assist you in solving all these problems by automatically being a part of your daily life like your smartphone and keys. It will help you in these critical times.

miKey's Smart features:

SMART Locator : It can be used to locate your Smart Phone/miKey

or can be used to locate your bag (Bluetooth 4.0 LE Locator & App - iOS &  Android)

Smart Phone charger (Micro USB / Lightning )-Windows, Android & iPhone

Can use both connectors simultaneously to charge your iPhone 5 or above, Android Phone or Windows Phone. Inbuilt powerful battery can provide 3 hours of backup, when in need  

USB Connector Laptop/Cable

Charge your miKey from your laptop and the use it us your smartphone battery backup. 

Charger Cable: Can be used to charge your phone

Battery Backup: miKey's inbuilt & powerful battery (570 mAh) can charge your phone when in need (up to 3 hours when tested)- Micro USB or Lightning Charger cable. Can use both connectors simultaneously to charge your iPhone, Android Phone or Windows Phone.

Securely Store & Transfer your data

* Travel Safe/Touch safe

It can be also used as a SMART Multi-Tool... let be anything, it has a solution.

Just imagine how many times you had wished for the right tool in your car, in times of your picnic, your daily commuting, while sitting in front of TV watching your favorite show or at your office desk. This is the product that will help you in those times. You can carry this as part of your house key or car keys.

miKey's Multi-tool Features:

Tiny Screwdriver

Two medium size - regular use spanners

Bottle opener

Box Opener

Staple Remover


Wire Stripper

Some of the basic features:

Here is the list:

MiKeys’ Smart features:

1. Smart Phone charger (Micro USB - Android & Windows) / (Lightning - iPhone 5 or above).

2. USB Connector cable

3. Secure Data Storage: Inbuilt 16 GB/32 GB Flash Drive to store your photos, music and personal data or just anything in digital form

4. It can be used to locate your Smart Phone/MiKey

5. Can be used to charge your phone, when in need (upto 3 hours)

6. Can be used to locate your bag

7. Travel Safe/Touch safe

Multi-tool Features:

8.Tiny Screwdriver

9. Medium size screwdriver

10. Medium size regular use Spanners

11. Bottle opener

12. Box opener

13. Tag popper

14. Coupon Clipper

15. Staple Remover

16. Foil Breaker

17. Rope Saw

18. Wire Stripper

19. Wire Bender

20. Pill Splitter

21. Scratcher

22. Clamshell Buster

23. Letter Opener

24. Paper Cutter

All in just a Key - miKey!  ISN'T IT INCREDIBLE?

Be a part of the revolutionary concept; help us to make your life simpler and relaxing.

ENJOY AND BE A PROUD OWNER by ordering from our initial batch of MiKey’S

Remember to make it as part of your car key and house keys so order for a pair and avail discount.

Technical Specifications:

USB 3.0 - Faster Data Transfer

Bluetooth Version : BLE 4.0

Micro USB - For Android / Windows Phone Charger

Lightning Charger - For iPhone 5 or above

* Can use both connectors simultaneously to charge smartphones

Inbuilt battery: 570 mAh Custom made Li-polymer Rechargeable Battery (upto 3 hours battery backup)

Flash Drive - Basic Version 16 GB and Premium Version 32 GB

* Security : Password Protected

App for Tracking device - Android and iOS

Steel used for multi-tool : 304 Stainless Steel (polished)

story:
The tests are over and it was possible to create a bigger print volume. The printe volume in the final produced version are   160 x 180 x 150 !!!

The next update :

In every printer are installed a heated bed with controller. The heated bed is now standard in every printer !!!


New Cloudio2go Iceman3D Desktop 3dPrinter

Aluminium Case, WiFi - controlled

The new member of the Cloudio2go Family, a new Desktop 3dPrinter, high and quality, light weight aluminium case, long life components, new movement system

Why the Iceman3D ?

The goal was a printer for everyone, ready to print and with a fast printing speed. For this speed we needed a new mechanical movement concept. This needed the best material, long life parts and strong stepper-motors. We have a axis position accuray of 0.01 mm with high speed printing. The next, after the components, was the design. The most 3D desktop printers still look like something from a garage sale, have wooden cases (which are prone to humidity) and are no real eyecatchers.

The facts :

The facts ...

Model Accuracy in mm : +/- 0.15/100

Axis Position Accuracy : 0.01mm

Printer structure Aluminium

Build volume in mm : 160/180/150

Printing layer in mm : 0.1 -0.3

Printing speed : 120 mm per second

Nozzlesize : 0,3 - 0,4

Printing temperature : 230 C (max 320C )

Filament : PLA, ABS, Laywood, Laybrick, Nylon, NinjaFlex, Bendlay, more

Machine size in mm : 350 x 300 x 350

File format : STL, Gcode

System : WIN, LIN, OS X

Warranty : 2 Years

Connection : USB, SDCard and WiFi

LCD Panel Color and Touch

incl. Iceman software

The timeline ...


The case

The Iceman3D is aluminium cased, available in three different beatiful colors:

orange, white and black

The development process of the case 

   


Pictures from developing & testing components



Low noise

Due to the massive case the printing process is dampened and the noise emission relatively low. Also the design has a new Spool Holder which is less prone to entanglement.

Filament Materials :

All standard 1.75 mm filaments are usable in the Iceman3D

Control :

The printer is connected either with USB, WiFi and Bluetooth

You can also print directly from SD Card

Iceman3D is also controllable with your mobile Device (iOS & Android). Direct printing from over WiFi is possible and you can adjust all parameters with your Smartphone or tablet. Software is available for Android, iOS and Windows Phones.

Software :

The software package includes 3D Software for handling 3D models, controlling the printer and calibrating it.  English tutorial and applications for mobile are available too.


The first items available in : orange glossy, white glossy and black matte.


The shipping :

All perks from the IndieGoGo campaign are free of shipping charges.

Please be aware that additional custom cost may apply. Inform yourself on the topic of custom charges at your nearest customs office.

The Contributions / PERKS :

PERK 1

The $5 Perk : We collect this money to support students and childrens, for learning and experience the 3D print technology.

After the campaign we´ll lend some of our printers to schools to foster education & evangelize 3dModeling and 3d Printing to help understand mathematics/geometry/physics.

Thank you very much for supporting us! And you´ll be on our Wall of Fame of course

PERK 2

The supporters PERK $25 : The awesome Three Dimensional Printing Society T-Shirt 

PERK 3

Get your Desktop 3dPrinter Icemand3D for only $649

What is in this package ?

  • 1  x  Iceman Desktop 3d Printer
  • 1  x  Cableset
  • 1  x  Softwarepackage engl. / Tutorials engl.
  • 2  x  spools filament ABS or PLA approx 2.2 lbs ( please send us what type of filament you want )
  • 1  x  T.D.P.S. Supprters Shirt
  • no shipping costs
