story:
What does the Octopus tail stand for?

The design concept of the Octopus Tail has been inspired by the octopus and its arms' absorptive power. The strong point of this product is the double sided construction of the sucker cups that allows the user to attach it to various objects such as mobile phones, tablets, memo pads etc. and then remove them without difficulty. The users can easily cut it into smaller pieces with scissors and then use it according to their needs. It's an innovative product that presents the animal that cannot be omitted when talking about Korea.

Design Background

We are surrounded by countless products. The digitization is progressing, the number of smartphone users increasing. As the market is expanding there are more and more new accessories being developed. However, most of these products can only be used in one way, whereas our goal was to create an accessory that could be easily and comfortably used in various everyday life situations. 

Design Goal

- The functionality should be included even in the smallest part of the future product

- It has to take into consideration the user’s environment

- The designed product should be fun

- The future product has to be free from deformation

- The product has to be easily adaptable to the changing environment


Purpose of use

Our Octopus Tail consists of 5 double sided sucker cups and can be easily cut into pieces and adjusted according to the size and shape of the object you want to use it with. DIY (Do It Yourself) option allows the product to successfully deal with place and space restraints and use it variously maximizing its usability.


Various usage of the Octopus Tail

The Octopus Tail can be easily adjusted to the size and shape of the object you want to use it with. The users can decide on how to attach it to their mobile phones or other objects and create different interesting shapes just like the ones in the pictures. It’s very easy to cut it into smaller pieces and use according to your needs. DIY (Do It Yourself) option allows the product to successfully deal with place and space restraints and use it variously maximizing its usability.

What’s the power of our Octopus Tail?

Our Octopus Tail  can withstand the weight of a 3~4kg dumbbell.

User Environment

Octopus Tail can be used in a car, on train, on bus, on plane, in the office, study room, make up room, library, kitchen, toilet/bathroom, nail shop, gym, yoga center, cafe, school, etc. and many other places. It can be very useful especially in some narrow, limited spaces.

While driving

  The Octopus Tail can serve as a stand in your car. Attach the product to your phone and then to the windshield. Turn on navigation. Attach the phone horizontally.

The Octopus Tail can serve as a stand in your car. Attach the product to your phone and then to the windshield. Turn on navigation. Attach the phone vertically.

The Octopus Tail attached to the windshield

Together with Octopus Head used as a holder

The Octopus Head serves as a great Octopus Tail holder and guarantees good angle, vision and convenient use of navigation when driving. It does not only secures your phone but is helpful when you need to charge it. 

In a car when watching movies

When driving together with your family or friends, it’s easy for your passengers to attach the phone to the dashboard and watch a movie or listen to music.

When traveling with your family or friends you can easily use the tail as a holder for your phone and listen to your favorite music conveniently on the back seat. 

As earphone winder

Octopus Tail can turn out to be very useful during flight. Simply attach it to the window pane next to you or use it as a stand.

Try out the Octopus Tail on train, where the space is usually limited. Attach it to the window pane or use as a stand for your phone.

It can be helpful during a conference when used with memo boards.

When working as a part timer in a cafe, set alarm and put your phone in a visible place not to miss the end of your shift.

Use it as memo board holder and leave a message to your kid in a kitchen or study room.

Use it freely at home while cooking. Simply attach it to the fridge, window pane or a cupboard and continue cooking while listening to music, watching your favorite drama or news or use it as a stand to check out the online cookbook.

In a bathroom

it can also be used as a toothbrush holder.

Listen to some meditation or relaxation music or watch a movie while taking a hot bath or shower.

While exercising

It can be useful when you use your smartphone while enjoying different sports:

- To use as a stand when listening to music

- To serve as a storage space for your phone

- As a stand or holder for your smartphone to take a selfie when practicing golf

Very useful in a fitness center. It will take a good care of your mobile phone while you are busy exercising.


as a stand

Very easy to use it as a stand and put on your desk when watching movies


DESIGN POINTS OF SUCKER CUPS

1. ANY PLACE: as it uses negative fluid pressure of air, the double sided Octopus Tail does not require any glue or tape to be attached and therefore, doesn't leave any stains.

2. EASY TO USE: possibility to change the actual shape and size of the product in order to use it variously.

3. VARIOUS USAGE: you can easily cut the product into pieces with scissors and use it according to your needs as a stand, holder, earphone winder, etc.

4. INTERESTING: the easiness of carrying it around and using in various places makes the usage comfortable and fun. As the shape clearly refers to an octopus arm, the main point and function of this product are easily understandable.

5. UNIQUE: just like in the three musketeers famous motto, the Octopus Tail consisting of 5 independent sucker cups owes its adhesion strength to their mutual cooperation.

MATERIAL?

TPU (thermoplastic polyurethane) exposed to high temperature, it is melted first during the production process. Even though the material is soft, it's very durable and can last for long time.




In order to fully enjoy the product please refer to the below principles:

1. When used as a stand/holder for navigation and put close to the heater it may        fall  off if used for a long time. Please press the sucker cup from time to time     when in use.

2. The product should be used with smartphone that is used into a protective case.

3. The Octopus Tail works well with the poly type materials.

4. Before using the product please check if it's well attached and confirm the
adhesion.

5. DIY (Do It Yourself) option - it's easy to cut the Octopus Tail to pieces and use 
according to your needs.

TELEWIDE shall not take responsibility for ant damage or injury caused by user's inappropriate or careless use of this product.


ABOUT TELEWIDE & TEAM

TELEWIDE is a DESIGN-DRIVEN company. We are a professional design group that continuously researches on user-centered design of products, services and environments. Also, we maintain keen connection with out customers, creating designs while providing a chance to become more competitive in the market. We provide various products in depth from customer-oriented market research, design to engineering. Designers who have various experience as their foundation are participating in design sectors such as human element research, industrial design and interaction design. Furthermore, we are working on various areas such as communication, medical devices, industrial equipment, toys, transportation, food and beverage, sports equipment and a lot more. Last year we have successfully launched our Any Shock Air smartphones protective, shock absorbing cases line and received good feedback from customers.

This time we've decided to introduce to the world our multipurpose Octopus Tail. We'd like this product to become the first in the whole series of our future customer-oriented fresh and innovative designs. In order to succeed with this project we will use knowledge and experience of our CEO, which he gained while working as an industrial designer for Samsung Electronics, our mechanical designs specialist and marketers with the market knowledge, aware of customers' needs and current trends.

Design philosophy                                                                                             

Anyone can come up with a beautiful design that will please other people's eyes. We want to create something more than just designs soon to be forgotten, designs that will most likely vaporize after some short time. We'd like to be responsible for creating products that not only please one's eyes, but also bring back good memories, stay deep in one's heart and despite the passing time bring smile to one's face.

How will we use crown funding?

The funds that we will hopefully receive from all those interested in our project will help us to improve the quality of our product, cover some of the production costs and guarantee that all the octopus tails you purchase will be able to reach you safely. The funds will also be an undeniable help and serve as a great encouragement in creating our new designs and bringing to life our new ideas and visions.

SCHEDULE


^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_           
         

DELIVERY



^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_

 Please read this section before making contribution. Thank you!

1. Color choice:
Please send us message (sales@telewide.co.kr) with your Indiegogo ID, name and selected colors within 48h after your contribution.
2. International shipping (tracking number issuing)
- Worldwide shipping
- To ship your products we will use Korea Post (international small size packages service)
- The perks prices do not include shipping fee
3. Please contact us (sales@telewide.co.kr) if you wish to order bigger amount
4. Possible change of the hardness and shape of the Octopus Tail.
When the Octopus Tail is exposed to low temperatures the hardness will increase making it more difficult to attach the product. In that case all you need is a cup with hot water. You put the tail into the cup and the product is back to its original shape and hardness in no time. Please refer to the below video.

5. Adhesive Octopus Head tape:
The tape allows you to attach the Octopus Head to various surfaces such as concrete, wood, paper and use it together with the Octopus Tail.
Put the tape on the back of the octopus Head and then attach the head to the selected surface. At this point you can easily use it with the Octopus Tail.
6. Adhesive Octopus Head tape glue:
If the head adhesion seems not good enough, try to wash the back of the tape which is covered with semi-permanent glue, and use it again.

^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_^_

www. telewide.co.kr

www.pinpointdesign.co.kr

The design concept of

as mobile phones, tablets, memo pads etc. and then remove them without

cut it into smaller pieces with scissors and then use it according to their

Korea.
Design Background
We are surrounded by countless products. The digitization is progressing, the number of smartphone users increasing. As the market is expanding there are more and more new

create an accessory that could be easily and comfortably used in various everyday life
situations.

story:
Background  - author, idea, accessible world and traveling around.

My name is Stipe Splivalo (37) and I live in Zagreb, Croatia. I work as a web designer and have been in interactive design and media industry for 15 years. I use wheelchair and I often have problems entering buildings like cinema, coffee shops, restaurants and many other places that should be available for everyone.

Two years ago I was on my trip to Amsterdam and it was virtually impossible to plan my sightseeing. I had no accessibility info and all available data was from people who does not understand my condition so lots of “accessible places” like Madame Tussaud’s weren't really accessible for me. Museum was very crowded and I had problems entering and moving around with my wheelchair. I didn't see anything and I could hardly wait to get out. It would be great if I could read a review by someone with similar condition that has been on that spot and reviewed it as place that should be visited on less crowded day.

I called 2 of my friends and said "Let's make it".  Soon after we started a project "travabled.com" - world without barriers, which is most important project I've been working in my career and I would really like to see it spread worldwide, to serve and help the global community of disabled travelers.

 

The project

Travabled.com is an online and mobile phone service that would offer trusted advice from real travelers with disabilities that have been on the spot and have gathered so needed accessibility information.

 

Every individual can search for accessible places, book a hotel or a restaurant table, add comments, photos, grades - and thereby evaluate level of accessibility or gather information and media for desired destination. Also, users can mark places where they have been with their wheelchair and participate in making our community of barrier free places across the globe.

Why we need your help?

The concept of the project is fully done (design, architecture, rules) what we need to do now is to develop  fully functional online and mobile phone platform. If we manage to achieve more than 100% of funding we will transfer it to another part of our goal: to gather as much as possible existing content about disabled places from around the world.

The financial goal of the project is the sum of all these activities based on cost inputs we gathered:

  • Online platform (the central website)  – 12% of funds
  • Mobile apps for iOS and Android – 8% of funds

If we reach more than 100% funding:

  • Database development and other tech costs (integration and similar) – 35% of funds
  • Content generation – 65% of funds:
    • Hire 5 content administrators (all with disability so we support employment of people with a physical handicap but able to work via PC and internet )  - input of existing and available accessible places, with focus on hotel and restaurants in first phase – 2 for 2 year period and 3 for one year
    • Hire 2 content and user comments administrators and quality assurance managers – in order to ensure all information is valuable and honest

These funds would enable us to build the platform and to create unified worldwide database of all accessible places - free for all disabled travelers around the globe, fully accessible via Internet.

 

Will this project make a difference?

We are sure about it – our passion and web experience tell us so. We sincerely hope that you share the same feeling and will contribute with any small amount you can or just share this to your friends – this is also very important, besides investment, we've chosen Indigogo as concept of funding so as many people would hear about this initiative – our potential users, hotel and restaurant owners, global community of people with disability. It is also a matter of getting people to think about the importance of accessibility in travel industry.

Commitment of Travabled project goes further – we've decided to always hire a person with a disability as project employee or outsourced resource (exception would be made only if there would be no qualified candidate).

 

The Impact

Database with all accessible places around the Globe, free to all to access – you will be able to plan your trip, help others with your review, use it on the go on your mobile phone, reward with promotion owners  that made their assets accessible and motivate others to do so in the future. This sounds great to us, we hope you share the same enthusiasm!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this to all the people you know!  Tnx!

story:
At People Power, we're a company of dreamers, and doers – designers, engineers, visionaries and practicalists. We dare to imagine. On a daily basis, we consider the emerging capabilities of our award-winning app, Presence, and how to bring help and relief to real people in real-world situations. One idea that takes form from that thinking can soon be in your home or office. We're delighted to announce the Indiegogo introduction our newest smart home product – Presence 360 – the world’s First iOS and Android enabled smartphone security robot.

With the free Presence app and a smartphone, Presence 360 uses the built-in video camera of a spare smartphone you leave at home to intelligently sense motion and automatically record a video of activity. If motion is detected, you receive video notification – a Presence Video Alert – of that activity sent to your smartphone wherever you might be. Presence 360 works with both Apple iOS and Android-based smartphones. A testament to success, more than 80 million Presence Video Alerts have been sent worldwide.

With Presence 360, you can set up to three vantage points covering views of your front door, your back door, and your kitchen window for instance. You can decide how long your smartphone’s camera should remain at each vantage point. Presence 360 can cycle through those vantage points automatically, searching for intruders or activity – recording video the instant motion is detected. If motion is detected, you will receive a video alert mere seconds after the activity is recorded. You can assign names for your custom vantage points too, and recall them manually while watching Presence live from a remote location. With full pan-and-tilt rotation, adjust your settings to perfectly customize the Presence 360 experience to help protect the people and things you love the most. It’s super easy. Purchase your Presence 360 today, and get even more sophisticated monitoring and security capabilities in the near future given the amazing skills of our programmers and engineers.

Presence enables a highly integrated home security ecosystem with our software intelligence and peripheral devices working in concert to provide a comprehensive security solution. 

Price: $99 (Regularly $139.99 MSRP)
Shipping into the US: Free
Shipping into Mexico and Canada: $99 
Shipping into EU countries: $99

International customers: Because of device compliance requirements, Presence 360 is available for delivery in the North America (US, Canada and Mexico) and the European Union countries at this time. For deliveries of Presence 360 outside the US, it is the responsibility of our customers to pay for any duty or customs expenses. EU Countries are Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Republic of Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and the UK.

Scheduled delivery date:
December 2016

Compatibility:
With the free download of the Presence app on your smartphone, you will be able to enjoy to Presence 360. Simple as that. Presence is available for iOS and Android, and available at the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store. Download Presence today if you haven’t’ already, even while you’re considering purchasing a Presence 360.

Colors:
Presence 360 is available in two colors – Snowflake White and Charcoal Black. Think about it – one may be perfect for the kitchen, and one for the garage.

What's in the box:
In addition to Presence 360, you’ll get an AC power source with 3 short length charging cables: Micro USB, iPhone 4 cable (30-pin to USB), and iPhone 5/6 cable (Lightning USB 2.0).


Here's the Presence Security Decal.
Color 3-by 3-inch adhesive vinyl.
Available here 4 for $12.
Order today.

What is Presence?
Users around the world are thrilled to put their spare smartphones back to work. The award-winning app Presence delivers FREE smart home intelligence with enhanced video security and home energy control. Download Presence and get 50MB of free encrypted cloud video storage for motion detection recordings. Upgrade to Presence Pro Video for advanced motion detection features and 5GB of storage. Add Presence Security to connect your home with Presence-ready sensors, and experience the best of home security.

Monitor with Presence: 
Get increased security and peace of mind. Presence makes a great webcam, baby monitor, pet cam, nanny cam, surveillance cam, or do-it-yourself security system. At home, in the kitchen, the garage, the nursery, in your office, or wherever – Presence will let you know what’s happening when you’re away. Get motion detection video alerts, and even view what’s happening in real time. See something you want to save? Presence even lets you record video and take pictures while watching live.

Alert with Presence: 
Enable Presence Motion Detection to receive free Presence Video Alerts – see and hear what happened just seconds ago if motion is detected by Presence. Get notified when an intruder is detected, when the kids arrive home safely, when the delivery company has dropped off a package, or whatever makes you feel more informed and secure.

Control with Presence: 
Add a Presence Security Pack ($299 US) featuring door and window entry sensors, motion detectors, water sensors, temperature sensors, humidity sensors, touch sensors to keep you connected to things at home that really matter. Presence also controls energy management systems, connected smart plugs and thermostats, and even robotic devices.

Neighborhood Watch with Presence: 
Invite your trusted circle of family, friends, and neighbors to receive your alerts and help protect your home when you can't be there. This is how home security should be. Presence supports simultaneous viewers connecting to a single camera, so you and anyone you designate can watch the dog or the kids at the same time from two different devices and locations. Presence also transforms your smartphones into automatic Twitter cameras.

Talk back with Presence: 
Presence features 2-way video calls on most devices, so you can communicate on demand from anywhere in the world with the pets and loved ones behind your Presence camera. They don't even need to answer the phone!

Connect with us:
YouTube: http://youtube.com/PeoplePowerCo
Facebook: http://facebook.com/PeoplePowerCo
Twitter: @PeoplePowerCo #PresenceApp
http://twitter.com/PeoplePowerCo

About People Power:
Founded in 2009, People Power Company is an award-winning software company with a successful legacy in mobile and cloud technology. The People Power IoT Suite enables rapid connection, engagement, delivery and management of IoT products and services for services providers, manufacturers and consumers searching for connected lifestyle enhancements. Its ready-made cloud and mobile software stacks connect people with networked devices to humanize the Internet of Things. Services from concept through commercial release enabled by People Power are available as white-labeled solutions for customers around the world. For more information, visit www.peoplepowerco.com.

*Remote viewing, control and motion video alerts are capable when a cellular or Wi-Fi signal is available to both the Presence 360's smartphone and a mobile user with a Presence-paired device.
story_txt: At People Power, we're a company of dreamers, and doers – designers, engineers, visionaries and practicalists. We dare to imagine. On a daily basis, we consider the emerging capabilities of our award-winning app, Presence, and how to bring help and relief to real people in real-world situations. One idea that takes form from that thinking can soon be in your home or office. We're delighted to announce the Indiegogo introduction our newest smart home product – Presence 360 – the world’s First iOS and Android enabled smartphone security robot.With the free Presence app and a smartphone, Presence 360 uses the built-in video camera of a spare smartphone you leave at home to intelligently sense motion and automatically record a video of activity. If motion is detected, you receive video notification – a Presence Video Alert – of that activity sent to your smartphone wherever you might be. Presence 360 works with both Apple iOS and Android-based smartphones. A testament to success, more than 80 million Presence Video Alerts have been sent worldwide.With Presence 360, you can set up to three vantage points covering views of your front door, your back door, and your kitchen window for instance. You can decide how long your smartphone’s camera should remain at each vantage point. Presence 360 can cycle through those vantage points automatically, searching for intruders or activity – recording video the instant motion is detected. If motion is detected, you will receive a video alert mere seconds after the activity is recorded. You can assign names for your custom vantage points too, and recall them manually while watching Presence live from a remote location. With full pan-and-tilt rotation, adjust your settings to perfectly customize the Presence 360 experience to help protect the people and things you love the most. It’s super easy. Purchase your Presence 360 today, and get even more sophisticated monitoring and security capabilities in the near future given the amazing skills of our programmers and engineers.Presence enables a highly integrated home security ecosystem with our software intelligence and peripheral devices working in concert to provide a comprehensive security solution. Price: $99 (Regularly $139.99 MSRP)Shipping into the US: FreeShipping into Mexico and Canada: $99 Shipping into EU countries: $99International customers: Because of device compliance requirements, Presence 360 is available for delivery in the North America (US, Canada and Mexico) and the European Union countries at this time. For deliveries of Presence 360 outside the US, it is the responsibility of our customers to pay for any duty or customs expenses. EU Countries are Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Republic of Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and the UK.Scheduled delivery date:December 2016Compatibility:With the free download of the Presence app on your smartphone, you will be able to enjoy to Presence 360. Simple as that. Presence is available for iOS and Android, and available at the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store. Download Presence today if you haven’t’ already, even while you’re considering purchasing a Presence 360.Colors:Presence 360 is available in two colors – Snowflake White and Charcoal Black. Think about it – one may be perfect for the kitchen, and one for the garage.What's in the box:In addition to Presence 360, you’ll get an AC power source with 3 short length charging cables: Micro USB, iPhone 4 cable (30-pin to USB), and iPhone 5/6 cable (Lightning USB 2.0).Here's the Presence Security Decal.Color 3-by 3-inch adhesive vinyl.Available here 4 for $12.Order today.What is Presence?Users around the world are thrilled to put their spare smartphones back to work. The award-winning app Presence delivers FREE smart home intelligence with enhanced video security and home energy control. Download Presence and get 50MB of free encrypted cloud video storage for motion detection recordings. Upgrade to Presence Pro Video for advanced motion detection features and 5GB of storage. Add Presence Security to connect your home with Presence-ready sensors, and experience the best of home security.Monitor with Presence: Get increased security and peace of mind. Presence makes a great webcam, baby monitor, pet cam, nanny cam, surveillance cam, or do-it-yourself security system. At home, in the kitchen, the garage, the nursery, in your office, or wherever – Presence will let you know what’s happening when you’re away. Get motion detection video alerts, and even view what’s happening in real time. See something you want to save? Presence even lets you record video and take pictures while watching live.Alert with Presence: Enable Presence Motion Detection to receive free Presence Video Alerts – see and hear what happened just seconds ago if motion is detected by Presence. Get notified when an intruder is detected, when the kids arrive home safely, when the delivery company has dropped off a package, or whatever makes you feel more informed and secure.Control with Presence: Add a Presence Security Pack ($299 US) featuring door and window entry sensors, motion detectors, water sensors, temperature sensors, humidity sensors, touch sensors to keep you connected to things at home that really matter. Presence also controls energy management systems, connected smart plugs and thermostats, and even robotic devices.Neighborhood Watch with Presence: Invite your trusted circle of family, friends, and neighbors to receive your alerts and help protect your home when you can't be there. This is how home security should be. Presence supports simultaneous viewers connecting to a single camera, so you and anyone you designate can watch the dog or the kids at the same time from two different devices and locations. Presence also transforms your smartphones into automatic Twitter cameras.Talk back with Presence: Presence features 2-way video calls on most devices, so you can communicate on demand from anywhere in the world with the pets and loved ones behind your Presence camera. story:
Welcome to our campaign to raise the capital required to further develop, test, secure, market and launch Spend.

What is Spend?

Spend is an App to replace loyalty cards and paper receipts. Participating retailers send your receipt, rewards and offers direct to the Spend app organising them in one place, with just one password, making your life simpler! 

Spend uses location data (if you opt in) to enable retailers to send relevant offers direct to your mobile or tablet while you are in store or on the move. Timed offers are also possible for example a discount on lunch if you are in the shop around lunch time!

You no longer need a million reward cards packed in your handbag, purse or wallet or masses of receipts that are easy to lose plus you'll get discounts, tailored to you from the retailers where you shop, eat, drink or play.

Spend helps you manage your outgoings giving you a breakdown of what you spend and where you spend it helping you to adjust your spending if needs be. 

Spend:

No more paper receipts, but plenty of offers & rewards in one secure app!

To get Spend up and running we have plenty to do, as Spend will be a massive benefit to consumers worldwide we are turning to you to help get the ball rolling. The Spend app and service will be free to consumers so please do your bit by making a contribution!

Contributions of £15 or more can choose from our two free gifts or entry into our iPad Mini prize draw!

** IMPORTANT Prize Draw Update - Please see the rules at the bottom of the page as they details in the 'Perks' are slightly incorrect!

Find out more below, or contribute and share above.

Thanks, the Spend Team!

Spend in 15 seconds...

Spend bridges the gap between retailers and consumers, providing consumers with a single interface to view loyalty rewards, receipts and more by taking transaction data from retailers and loyalty scheme providers, centralising securing and organising this data for access through the Spend mobile app and the powerful Spend web interface. 

The goals of spend are to help both consumers and retailers benefit from the data that is created by every transaction. In turn this will provide the customer with better more focussed rewards, a centralised e-receipt service along with powerful expense analysis and reporting functions, retailers will benefit from more accurate insights into the behaviour of more of their customers.

Retailers benefit from improved intelligence, integration with existing rewards schemes or, where no rewards scheme is in place, Spend delivers a tailored solution enabling retailers of all sizes to offer a rewards scheme. 

Spend will have a strong focus on security and privacy - customer data will be protected using the very best technology while users will be able to control the offers and marketing material that they receive. Spend will automatically enable retailers to comply with forthcoming Data Protection regulations which will require explicit consent to send marketing material to customers.

Going further than just rewards and receipts, users can analyse their spending habits simplifying household budgeting, expense claims and tax returns. Spend will begin life in the UK followed by rapid international deployment. With our one login, one password, one location ethos Spend will change retail interaction worldwide!

For the serious shopper, we have Spend Plus, a subscription service which will deliver specially negotiated discounts and offers from leading retailers, restaurants, cinemas, theatres and more. 

By supporting the Spend Indiegogo Campaign not only will you ensure that we secure the funds required to further develop, test, integrate, secure and market Spend, but you will also send a powerful message to retailers that consumers want a single, simple solution to rewards and receipts.

Contributions start from just £1 and there are a number of Perks available to contributors. Don't forget to share Spend with your friends and colleagues and there is much more information below. We'll also be adding video updates from the founder answering FAQ's as they come through...

Free Gifts!!

When you pledge £15 or more you are able to select entry to the iPad Mini competition or one of the following cool free gifts:

Spend iPad Visualisation...

Visual impression of Spend environment. Not designed to suggest endorsement by featured brands.

Spend Instant Rewards makes for happy customers and happy retailers.


Spend Web Interface Visualisation...

Visual impression of Spend environment. Not designed to suggest endorsement by featured brands.

Powerful Reporting, Budgeting & Expense Management.


Facts & Figures...

Recent research* demonstrates that 65% of British shoppers like the idea of receiving targeted offers direct to their smartphone, shoppers and retailers are also keen to move to paperless receipt solutions.

While some retailers are attempting to make these things happen, there are problems with the solutions tried so far. The Achilles heel of current offerings is that they are disjointed and independent of one another. Consumer take up will be significantly enhanced due to Spend's universal solution.

With a single login to the Spend app and web interface consumers are provided with a single view of all offers, rewards, vouchers and receipts, along with the delivery of real time offers direct to the smartphone or tablet. Spend further provides advanced features such as expense management and user led control over the marketing that they receive.

The same research* reveals that trust is an issue. Grocery stores are the most trusted 68%, then loyalty card providers 58%, brands are only trusted by 32% and 24% wouldn't trust any of the above. Spend will give the consumer control over their account allowing us to increase the level of trust benefiting both the consumer and retailer alike.

Contributing to spend is much more than just handing over cash - by contributing to the Spend Campaign you will of course help us raise the required £150,000 but you also send a powerful message to the retailer that you, the consumers, are ready to spend with Spend by your side. Spend will be free to end users and contributors can choose Perks giving them access to Spend Plus at reduced rates.

So please get contributing or read on for much more detail on Spend and how we aim to change the world of loyalty offers and receipts. Don't forget to share the campaign with friends and colleagues to take advantage of our referral cash back offer - if your referrals raise £500+ we'll refund your contribution up to a maximum of £50!

The Spend Approach...

So how does Spend approach this for the benefit of both the customer and the retailer? Quite simply, it puts everything in one place giving the following top level benefits:

Spend for the Customer

  • Simple - all receipts and rewards in one easy to use Spend account. 
  • Keep - track of spending, receipts, expenses and rewards.
  • Instant - rewards, receive time and location specific offers and rewards tailored to your buying habits. 

Spend for the Retailer

  • Open - a dialogue with the customer via their Spend account
  • See - a single view of customers, understand their habits and expectations.
  • Drive - repeat business through powerful insights and tailored offers.

Spend for the Environment

  • Save -  Trees, Spend helps reduce the amount paper used for receipts.
  • Clean - the streets. No more litter, everything is safe and secure online.

Hasn't this been done before?

No - not taking the approach Spend takes. Some retailers have removed paper receipts from the point of sale, for example Apple. However, overall the take up has been poor for the following reasons.

  1. Existing solutions deliver receipts to customers via the retailers existing web and or mobile platforms. This results in customers having to visit multiple sites/apps to view receipts rather than a unified interface.
  2. As an alternative to the above, some retailers have elected to email receipts to their customers. Email was designed for communication, not as a digital filing system which makes it harder to manage receipts adding little value to the retailer or the customer.
  3. Lack of inertia, the above adds little value to the customer, reducing demand.

Our approach is different, Spend delivers everything for the retailer and customer in one central, easy to use, hosted solution.



Who's behind Spend?

Spend was founded by Freddie Alston who's background is firmly routed in data management services. Freddie has an excellent understanding of the power of information, the challenges that businesses face in managing this information and integrating solutions to manage processes and information. 

Freddie's general hatred for receipts led him to think about why e-receipts have not yet managed to go mainstream. The answer is clear - going it alone only really solves the retailers issues, yet it adds a burden to the customer who has to manage multiple means of receiving electronic receipts.

The Spend team is made up by a group of highly motivated people with varied backgrounds, including Development, Security, IT Project Management, Infrastructure, Marketing, Design, Finance and Data Protection.


Please contact us by email at freddie@my-spend.com.


Why Indiegogo?

We've turned to Indiegogo because, quite frankly, we can't fund this entirely on our own. Spend is new. Spend is special. It's been pulled together by a team who would like to keep control of Spend rather than giving the majority away to people that we don't know and will be more interested in their own needs, rather than the needs of Spend. We are massively excited by Spend and what it has to offer and this is unlikely to be matched by external stakeholders.

Crowd-funding will allow us to develop Spend ourselves, rather than outsourcing development. This active oversight on our behalf will allow us to make sure that Spend lives up to our vision and our high standards.


What We Need & What You Get...

To make an impact and gather momentum, Spend really needs to capture the imagination of both consumers and retailers alike. Spend needs to be built before it can catch on, so please dig deep and make a contribution that will change the way we shop. You can give as much or a little (from £1) as you like and if you want something other than Spend in return, chose a perk.  

After securing the funding, we've a lot to do. From building the team, developing systems and software, integration with existing point of sale solutions, getting retailers on board plus the less exciting legal matters and so forth. 

The £150K goal of this project will get things started nicely, enabling us to build a platform that is fundamentally operational and ready to implement in retailers. The major costs come from development, testing, integration and security, after all, it has to be done perfectly. It will also enable us to get marketing under way within the retail industry and to sign up early adopters to be part of the development process. 

If we stretch the goal, the extra funding will enable us to bring in additional experts in to accelerate the development and deployment of Spend. 

Importantly, the better the campaign does, the stronger message the contributors send to the retailers, underpinning the desire for such a solution and demonstrating that customers are ready for the benefits that Spend brings, remember, you contribution can be as much as you want to give starting from just £1!

Take a look at the rewards available to backers of Spend, from a simple acknowledgement, being involved with the development (retailers and customers) to discounts on the Spend Plus account subscriptions!

The project timeline is hard to predict as the level of funding will have a big impact on speed of development. If we reach our funding goal, we anticipate a 10 month development program to have Spend functioning ready for integration with retailers. If we exceed our funding goal, within 6 months we aim to have a feature packed Spend platform built ready for roll out.

The more we raise, the faster we build and deliver Spend.

Already Running a Loyalty Scheme?

Excellent - you already recognise the insights that the customer data provides along with the loyalty gained from targeted offers. Now it's time to put this in the hands of your customers - Spend is modular enabling the retailer to integrate existing receipt and rewards data direct to their customers Spend account. Working with Spend will also help you mop up the customers who don't participate in your existing scheme!

Down to the nitty gritty

Below is a little more detail about Spend and how it actually comes together. 

High Level Data Flow:

Who is Spend suitable for?

Spend is suitable for any consumer who wishes to receive better, more relevant offers, do away with paper receipts, manage expenditure and claim expenses.

Spend is suitable for retailers of every description, bricks and mortar, e-commerce, retail, food, grocery, leisure, restaurants etc. The beauty of spend is that it can be configured for retailers regardless of sizes and can incorporate existing reward programs. 

Know and be Known

Spend retailers can offer free Wi-Fi from Spend to their customers. Customers connect to the in store Spend Wi-Fi hotspots using their Spend account details.

As Spend and the retailer will know which customers are in store, Spend can deliver tailored, real-time offers can be delivered to customers who wish to receive them providing instant benefits to both the customer and the retailer.

Purchases at the Checkout

Spend works efficiently at the checkout. Retailers can chose to install RF-ID proximity sensors or utilise existing RF-ID or bar code readers to identify the customer and issue the e-receipt to their account. If a Spend user is identified the receipt is taken care of digitally, if the customer is not a Spend user a paper receipt is issued.

Associated Transaction Processes

Spend enables all other transaction processes to be completed and verified:

  • Returns (Exchange & Refund);
  • Evidence of Purchase for Warranty purposes;
  • Gift Receipts

Expense Management & Analysis

Spend provides excellent functionality for users to drag and drop receipt items into their expense account to ensure expense claims are processed effectively. Future releases will include export functionality for direct import to major Accounts Packages simplifying the expense process for the employee and the employer.

Spend allows users to view and analyse their spending habits across multiple retailers and multiple product types to visualise how they spend and to enable better budgeting and cash management. Detailed reports can be created and exported and data can be exported to spreadsheets  / accounts packages.


Loyalty Rewards & Offers

Retailers deliver loyalty rewards and offers directly via the Spend interface. Rewards and offers can be redeemed at the checkout simply by using the RF-ID or Bar Code identification automatically enabling the customer to maximise their savings.

However, unlike the fast moving consumer goods that retailers are shifting, the rewards are often slow to be delivered (via traditional post) or end up being deleted along with all the other marketing email that we all receive. Spend enables the rewards to be instant, working in real time from the moment that you enter the store with additional offers immediately following your transaction. 

Useless at collecting reward points? Spend solves this by allowing reward accounts to be linked to multiple Spend accounts ensuring that all points and rewards are collected automatically.

e-Commerce Transactions

Spend will integrate with your off-the-shelf or custom online store checkout process. Your customers simply enter their Spend ID at the checkout to receive the receipt in the same way as in store. 

Exclusive Offers

If you are looking for something, simply search Spend to find a retailer offering a discount or other benefit on that product, offers that are exclusive to Spend users. The customer benefits by making a saving while the retailer benefits from accumulating new customers.

Search

Spend allows users to search their receipts either by retailer or across all receipts in their accounts. Never lose a receipt again!

Insurance Claims

When the unthinkable happens making a claim for your loss can be time consuming and stressful. With your spend account, collating all relevant receipts to support your claim is a breeze, speeding up the claims process and reducing the risk of disputes.

Gather Insights

Most large retailers already have a program in place, usually a loyalty program to gather data and insights into customer behaviour. This data is used to target specific offers to individuals rather than blanket bombing all customers with the same message.

Spend allows all retailers to gather this valuable data. Our powerful tools enable analysis of data and direct marketing of tailored offers to those who opt in to receive offers.

Spend users will be encouraged to receive these offers and those who don't will get a monthly summary from Spend of what they have missed out on to encourage them to opt in. 

Your data is your data - we will not sell or share data that refers to individuals across different retailers.

Compliance

With new data protection regulations likely to come into effect across Europe, it will be necessary to have obtained 'explicit consent' to send marketing information to those on your mailing list. Implied consent will not cut it and Spend will help you update your consents automatically to ensure that you are in line with regulations. 

Cost Reductions

By transitioning to Spend, retailers will not only benefit from the reduced cost of electronic receipts, but with fewer receipts to print, there will be fewer equipment failures and therefore fewer delays at the checkout.

The Technology

Spend has a mission to keep the technology simple yet secure. It is critical that implementation by retailers (including linking reward schemes, offers, targeting marketing) is as straightforward as possible. Retailers can elect for the customer identification solution that best suits their existing systems. The use of Spend at the point of sale will not slow the transaction and we are confident that in most situations it will actually speed the process up.

Behind the scenes

Spend is based on the 'Software as a Service' model built around a number of relational databases delivering the functionality mentioned above. All services and data will be hosted in UK based Data Centres with redundancy and scalability by design.

Intuitive Design

The Spend Website, User Portal and mobile Apps will be designed to be as uncluttered and intuitive as possible, primarily delivering the functionality that users desire with relevant marketing messages they want. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We need more than hard cash to get Spend off the ground. If you don't wish to put money behind spend the next best thing is to spread the word. Follow us on Twitter and Facebook, like our posts, retweet our tweets, help build momentum by spreading the word.

If you are involved in retail business we would love to hear from you with suggestions for product features or to discuss how you can become an early adopter of the Spend solution. As an early adopter, you will be involved in the development and get to trial Spend with your customers.

This opportunity is ideal for retailers both small and large as Spend brings benefits to all.

Are you involved in the media industry? We would love some exposure, please contact one of the team for more information.

Or perhaps you think the campaign page needs some refinement? Let us know as all constructive criticism warmly received :-). 

Thanks for visiting contributing and spreading the word. 

The Spend Team!

*Savvy Marketing 2014 research. While this research focuses on British consumers it is likely to be a good reflection of most cultures around the world. 

** Prize Draw Rules - to ensure that we are operating in line with the law, our Prize Draws cannot operate as a random draw as this is deemed to be a lottery and as such a license would be required. Therefore, to ensure compliance with the law, every entrant met click Prize Draw Entry to finalise their entry, this must be done after entering and before the draw. All participants must be over the age of 18 but can't, regardless of age be resident where gambling is illegal.

Existing solutions deliver receipts to customers via the retailers existing web and or mobile platforms. This results in customers having to visit multiple sites/apps to view receipts rather than a unified interface.
As an alternative to the above, some retailers have elected to email receipts to their customers. Email was designed for communication, not as a digital filing system which makes it harder to manage receipts adding little value to the retailer or the customer.
Lack of inertia, the above adds little value to the customer, reducing demand.
Our approach is different, Spend delivers everything for the retailer and customer in one central, easy to use, hosted solution.Who's behind Spend?Spend was founded by Freddie Alston who's background is firmly routed in data management services. Freddie has an excellent understanding of the power of information, the challenges that businesses face in managing this information and integrating solutions to manage processes and information. Freddie's general hatred for receipts led him to think about why e-receipts have not yet managed to go mainstream. The answer is clear - going it alone only really solves the retailers issues, yet it adds a burden to the customer who has to manage multiple means of receiving electronic receipts.The Spend team is made up by a group of highly motivated people with varied backgrounds, including Development, Security, IT Project Management, Infrastructure, Marketing, Design, Finance and Data Protection.Please contact us by email at 
freddie@my-spend.com.Why Indiegogo?
We've turned to Indiegogo because, quite frankly, we can't fund this entirely on our own. Spend is new. Spend is special. It's been pulled together by a team who would like to keep control of Spend rather than giving the majority away to people that we don't know and will be more interested in their own needs, rather than the needs of Spend. We are massively excited by Spend and what it has to offer and this is unlikely to be matched by external stakeholders.
Crowd-funding will allow us to develop Spend ourselves, rather than outsourcing development. This active oversight on our behalf will allow us to make sure that Spend lives up to our vision and our high standards.What We Need & What You Get...To make an impact and gather momentum, Spend really needs to capture the imagination of both consumers and retailers alike. Spend needs to be built before it can catch on, so please dig deep and make a contribution that will change the way we shop. You can give as much or a little (from £1) as you like and if you want something other than Spend in return, chose a perk.  After securing the funding, we've a lot to do. From building the team, developing systems and software, integration with existing point of sale solutions, getting retailers on board plus the less exciting legal matters and so forth. The £150K goal of this project will get things started nicely, enabling us to build a platform that is fundamentally operational and ready to implement in retailers. The major costs come from development, testing, integration and security, after all, it has to be done perfectly. It will also enable us to get marketing under way within the retail industry and to sign up early adopters to be part of the development process. If we stretch the goal, the extra funding will enable us to bring in additional experts in to accelerate the development and deployment of Spend. Importantly, the better the campaign does, the stronger message the contributors send to the retailers, underpinning the desire for such a solution and demonstrating that customers are ready for the benefits that Spend brings, remember, you contribution can be as much as you want to give starting from just £1!Take a look at the rewards available to backers of Spend, from a simple acknowledgement, being involved with the development (retailers and customers) to discounts on the Spend Plus account subscriptions!The project timeline is hard to predict as the level of funding will have a big impact on speed of development. If we reach our funding goal, we anticipate a 10 month development program to have Spend functioning ready for integration with retailers. If we exceed our funding goal, within 6 months we aim to have a feature packed Spend platform built ready for roll out.The more we raise, the faster we build and deliver Spend.Already Running a Loyalty Scheme?Excellent - you already recognise the insights that the customer data provides along with the loyalty gained from targeted offers. Now it's time to put this in the hands of your customers - Spend is modular enabling the retailer to integrate existing receipt and rewards data direct to their customers Spend account. Working with Spend will also help you mop up the customers who don't participate in your existing scheme!
Down to the nitty gritty
Below is a little more detail about Spend and how it actually comes together. High Level Data Flow:Who is Spend suitable for?Spend is suitable for any consumer who wishes to receive better, more relevant offers, do away with paper receipts, manage expenditure and claim expenses.Spend is suitable for retailers of every description, bricks and mortar, e-commerce, retail, food, grocery, leisure, restaurants etc. The beauty of spend is that it can be configured for retailers regardless of sizes and can incorporate existing reward programs. Know and be KnownSpend retailers can offer free Wi-Fi from Spend to their customers. Customers connect to the in store Spend Wi-Fi hotspots using their Spend account details.As Spend and the retailer will know which customers are in store, Spend can deliver tailored, real-time offers can be delivered to customers who wish to receive them providing instant benefits to both the customer and the retailer.Purchases at the CheckoutSpend works efficiently at the checkout. Retailers can chose to install RF-ID proximity sensors or utilise existing RF-ID or bar code readers to identify the customer and issue the e-receipt to their account. If a Spend user is identified the receipt is taken care of digitally, if the customer is not a Spend user a paper receipt is issued.Associated Transaction ProcessesSpend enables all other transaction processes to be completed and verified:
Returns (Exchange & Refund);
Evidence of Purchase for Warranty purposes;
Gift Receipts
Expense Management & AnalysisSpend provides excellent functionality for users to drag and drop receipt items into their expense account to ensure expense claims are processed effectively. Future releases will include export functionality for direct import to major Accounts Packages simplifying the expense process for the employee and the employer.Spend allows users to view and analyse their spending habits across multiple retailers and multiple product types to visualise how they spend and to enable better budgeting and cash management. Detailed reports can be created and exported and data can be exported to spreadsheets  / accounts packages.Loyalty Rewards & OffersRetailers deliver loyalty rewards and offers directly via the Spend interface. Rewards and offers can be redeemed at the checkout simply by using the RF-ID or Bar Code identification automatically enabling the customer to maximise their savings.However, unlike the fast moving consumer goods that retailers are shifting, the rewards are often slow to be delivered (via traditional post) or end up being deleted along with all the other marketing email that we all receive. Spend enables the rewards to be instant, working in real time from the moment that you enter the store with additional offers immediately following your transaction. Useless at collecting reward points? Spend solves this by allowing reward accounts to be linked to multiple Spend accounts ensuring that all points and rewards are collected automatically.e-Commerce TransactionsSpend will integrate with your off-the-shelf or custom online store checkout process. Your customers simply enter their Spend ID at the checkout to receive the receipt in the same way as in store. Exclusive OffersIf you are looking for something, simply search Spend to find a retailer offering a discount or other benefit on that product, offers that are exclusive to Spend users. The customer benefits by making a saving while the retailer benefits from accumulating new customers.SearchSpend allows users to search their receipts either by retailer or across all receipts in their accounts. Never lose a receipt again!Insurance ClaimsWhen the unthinkable happens making a claim for your loss can be time consuming and stressful. With your spend account, collating all relevant receipts to support your claim is a breeze, speeding up the claims process and reducing the risk of disputes.Gather InsightsMost large retailers already have a program in place, usually a loyalty program to gather data and insights into customer behaviour. This data is used to target specific offers to individuals rather than blanket bombing all customers with the same message.Spend allows all retailers to gather this valuable data. Our powerful tools enable analysis of data and direct marketing of tailored offers to those who opt in to receive offers.Spend users will be encouraged to receive these offers and those who don't will get a monthly summary from Spend of what they have missed out on to encourage them to opt in. Your data is your data - we will not sell or share data that refers to individuals across different retailers.ComplianceWith new data protection regulations likely to come into effect across Europe, it will be necessary to have obtained 'explicit consent' to send marketing information to those on your mailing list. Implied consent will not cut it and Spend will help you update your consents automatically to ensure that you are in line with regulations. Cost ReductionsBy transitioning to Spend, retailers will not only benefit from the reduced cost of electronic receipts, but with fewer receipts to print, there will be fewer equipment failures and therefore fewer delays at the checkout.The TechnologySpend has a mission to keep the technology simple yet secure. It is critical that implementation by retailers (including linking reward schemes, offers, targeting marketing) is as straightforward as possible. Retailers can elect for the customer identification solution that best suits their existing systems. The use of Spend at the point of sale will not slow the transaction and we are confident that in most situations it will actually speed the process up.Behind the scenesSpend is based on the 'Software as a Service' model built around a number of relational databases delivering the functionality mentioned above. All services and data will be hosted in UK based Data Centres with redundancy and scalability by design.Intuitive DesignThe Spend Website, User Portal and mobile Apps will be designed to be as uncluttered and intuitive as possible, primarily delivering the functionality that users desire with relevant marketing messages they want. Other Ways You Can HelpWe need more than hard cash to get Spend off the ground. If you don't wish to put money behind spend the next best thing is to spread the word. Follow us on Twitter and Facebook, like our posts, retweet our tweets, help build momentum by spreading the word.If you are involved in retail business we would love to hear from you with suggestions for product features or to discuss how you can become an early adopter of the Spend solution. As an early adopter, you will be involved in the development and get to trial Spend with your customers.This opportunity is ideal for retailers both small and large as Spend brings benefits to all.Are you involved in the media industry? We would love some exposure, please contact one of the team for more information.Or perhaps you think the campaign page needs some refinement? Let us know as all constructive criticism warmly received :-). 
Thanks for visiting contributing and spreading the word. The Spend Team!*Savvy Marketing 2014 research. While this research focuses on British consumers it is likely to be a good reflection of most cultures around the world. ** Prize Draw Rules - to ensure that we are operating in line with the law, our Prize Draws cannot operate as a random draw as this is deemed to be a lottery and as such a license would be required. Therefore, to ensure compliance with the law, every entrant met click Prize Draw Entry to finalise their entry, this must be done after entering and before the draw. All participants must be over the age of 18 but can't, regardless of age be resident where gambling is illegal.

story:
NOTE:

The images above are only provided as preliminary sketches and are NOT necessarily representative of the final product.

What you get

An Android app and cross-platform library (for building additional applications) which utilizes the comprehensive nutrition data provided by NutritionIX(1) and possibly other sources. With the Android app you will be able to:

  • Search "over 500 national restaurant chains"(2) and view nutrition information for their menu items.
  • Look up nutrition information for a variety of food items (e.g. from the USDA).
  • View the following nutrition information for the looked-up item:
    • Calories
    • Fats
    • Carbohydrates
    • Sodium
    • Cholesterol
    • Protein

(If you need an iPhone, iPad or Windows Phone app please see the Looking ahead section below.)

But not just you - the whole world gets to benefit from this project:
  • Everything will be made available under open source and/or creative commons licenses.
  • If fully funded, the Android app will be a free download in the Google Play Store (provided it is approved by Google).

(1) Please note that I do not work for or represent NutritionIX and have no official connection to them. NutritionIX provides a very useful website, but it does not work well on mobile browsers and they do not provide a mobile app. Nor have I have been able to find an Android app that displays general nutrition information using their data. (The one app I've found, Chow Checker, uses the NutritionIX database to identify potential allergy risks.)

(2) From the NutritionIX website.

What your contribution provides

In a nutshell, you get my focus on this project for approximately one month.

I estimate that it will take me about a month to create the Android app and the underlying library that will interface with the NutritionIX API. As I was recently downsized, I now have the time to work on this - as long as I don't have to worry about feeding my family, paying bills, etc. Knowing that I'm covered for the equivalent of one month's salary (including taxes, healthcare, etc.) will allow me to focus on this work instead of polishing my resume, attending interviews and hunting for clients.

Even if you can't donate there are other ways you can help. Spreading the word is the most critical thing you can do for this project - tell your friends, co-workers, even your doctor. Use the buttons on this site to share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, etc. For ways to generally support my work, please see my Support Shawn's work page.

About me

I have been designing and developing software for over 20 years - from pharmacy systems to children's games to resources for students. My passion is creating tools that improve and enrich our lives. While I've not yet had the opportunity to ship a mobile app I have spent the last 10 years working with C# (the primary language for the cross-platform Xamarin framework) and web technologies. Most recently, I was the architect and primary developer of an open source common library for community and technical colleges in the State of Washington and created a web API for the online class schedule built on top of that library.

  • My About.me profile
  • My Github profile
In recent years I have been diagnosed with type 2 diabetes, hypertension and high-blood pressure. Managing my nutritional intake has become very important for my health. Sodium and carbohydrates are the big culprits for me, but many people need to watch a variety of nutritional statistics in their diet.

Web sites like NutritionIX have been very helpful in this regard, but their site doesn't work so well on small screens. Other nutrition apps exist, but have a variety of problems: Some rely on users entering nutritional data and thus can suffer from inaccuracies. Few include restaurant menus. And even fewer are completely free to use, adapt and include in other apps.

My goal is to improve access to nutritional information. The foundation library I will create as part of this project can be used by any other app, on any platform, to look up nutritional information. The Android app will pave the way for other mobile apps on other devices.

Why don't I do this for free?

Yes, this project will be open sourced and freely available for all, so why don't I just do it for free?

Good software takes time. Considerations like usability, security and robustness don't just happen. Yes, I could - and probably would - work on this in my spare time, but that would greatly increase the amount of time it would take to become a useful product. Who knows when I'd be able to finish it, if ever- or worse, I might be forced to cut corners in order to get it done.

By funding this project, you help me dedicate my time and attention to getting it done. Specifically, getting it done right. If I don't have to worry about getting my bills paid and finding more clients or a new job I can focus that time and energy on this effort.

What you can expect

I've chosen the flexible funding model for this project because even if we do not reach our funding goal I will still be able to provide something of value:

  • When contributions reach $1,000 I will start working on the project full time and will continue until the campaign has ended.
  • If fully funded I plan to submit the completed app as a free download to the Google Play store by early June.
  • If not fully funded all the work I've done will remain available. I will likely continue to work towards producing an app, but cannot guarantee any timeframe or schedule. Depending on how much funding I get, I may also need to charge a small amount for the app when it is released to the Play Store - no more than 99 cents.

Availability

  • The foundation library will be made available under an open source license and be available to all. My goal is to improve the availability of nutritional tools. If somebody else wants to use it to build another app that's fine with me.
  • The source code for the Android app will also be made available under an open source license - both as a reference implementation for using the foundation library and as a functional mobile app.
  • If the project is fully funded, the Android app will be made available in the Google Play Store (assuming Google approves it) for free. (If the project is not fully funded, I may need to charge a small fee for the app - this decision will be made when the app is submitted to the Play Store.)

Transparency

  • The project files will be hosted on Github, where anyone can track my progress via source code updates, issue tracking and wiki documentation.
  • I will also be posting regular updates in the style of SCRUM Stand-ups. (I'll start with weekly updates on my blog and adjust as needed going forward.)
  • The results of voting on features and/or bugs (see below) will also be published where they are publicly available.

Community involvement

Github provides the ability for anyone to copy (i.e. fork) the project, submit issues and otherwise interact with development. In order to stay focused on the project I cannot guarantee that I will respond to any such contributions until the the deliverables promised above are met, but some contribution levels provide the opportunity for more direct involvement:

  • Those who contribute $15 or more will have access to an online community where they may provide feedback on the foundation library and Android app's design and features.
  • Those who contribute $100 or more will have access to a means of casting a vote on the priority of specified features and/or bugs.

Looking ahead

Building good software is an on-going process. It is my hope that this project is just the first step. Once these foundational pieces are in place (the library and Android app), I'd like to also look at creating iOS (i.e. iPhone and iPad) and Windows Phone apps as well as exploring other improvements.

If this project is funded early, I'm offering a stretch goal of $22,000 to cover one more month and additional equipment I will need for the development of the iOS app (e.g. a Macintosh, access to one or more iOS devices and to cover other incidental costs.)

The technical bits

For others who are in the software industry and may be interested, this section discusses the platform, frameworks, etc. that I plan to utilize:

Both the library and the Android app will be built using Xamarin frameworks and the Portable Class Library (PCL). The foundation library itself will be a PCL. As part of this effort, I will also be evaluating, and possibly contributing to, the existing NutritionIX Client Library for .NET.
