story:
Smart phone application to help drivers become safer by limiting and monitoring distractions while driving.

GREAT APP FOR:

  • Parents who want to monitor their teenage drivers.
  • Businesses who want to monitor their drivers and assets.
  • Anyone who wants to become a safer driver and reduce phone use while driving.

Why Contribute? 

Your contributions will be used to find solutions to unexpected issues identified by beta testers. We have self funded this project to date. The cost to host our servers is extremely expensive. The cost for server hardware is adding up. We have built an app that is very hardware intensive. All of the heavy lifting is done on these servers. The application uses very few resources to capture the data on the phone itself. We are also looking to add additional features, such as viewing the phone's history "behind the wheel" in a graphical view.  In addition, we want to integrate features such as "Cloud to Smart Device" (C2SD) communications. This feature will send event notifications to the parent or account holder's phone via push notifications. Delivery will be faster and more efficient, eliminating the need for email or text message notifications. If we can gain enough support to get the C2SD working, it will allow us to offer this product at a lower price.

Vehawk Distinguished Decal - Show everyone that YOU are a safe driver

The Vehawk Distinguished Decal (design close up)

The Vehawk Superior Shirt

The Vehawk Hulking Hoodie!

Product Features

• Record real-time driving habits
• Acceleration/Deceleration
• Texting
• Phone calls
• Trip distance
• Scoring system to improve driving
• Parental control
• Parents can observe teen driving habits
• Visual trip and location of violations through Vehawk inSIGHT™
• Customizable driving settings
• User violations can be sent to Account Holder via e-mail or text
• App automatically senses movement and records set parameters
• Automatic upload of data to the website

Vehawk [vee-hawk], fusion of the words Vehicle and Hawk, has set out to help improve the safety of our roads and loved ones by limiting drivers distractions. We can capture driving habits by collecting the following data:

Trip distance
Hard stops
Fast accelerations
Reading or responding to text messages
Answering or making phone calls 

The above events can be configured to notify the Account Holder via smart phone, through real-time SMS. This data is available and viewable through your smart phone or through the online web portal using Vehawk inSIGHT™.

Vehawk inSIGHT™ can be used to help show that you are a safe driver. This allows you to become a more conscientious driver, and therefore improve safety on the road.

We hope to facilitate and encourage users of Vehawk to keep their hands off the phone or other mobile devices while driving.

Trip view:

·  Provides visual routing of trips.

·  Visualize account setting violations.

Immediate feedback to account holder through:

·  Text messaging

·  Email

Visualize trip data:

·  Vehawk app provides immediate feedback. Vehawk's rating system helps the user know how they are driving each trip.

·  Vehawk provides real-time data, which will help the user make immediate changes.

Android OS:

Available on all Android powered smart phones with version 2.1 and up.

Apple iOS:

We put a lot of  time and effort trying to get this application to work on the iPhone. Unfortunately Apple limits what can run in the background. We have identified a way to capture and report the same information on the iPhone but it is taking time to polish and finalize what is necessary to make it work. Stay tuned!  If you have an iPhone and are still interested in a community effort to "Taking Safety Mobile" by limiting distracted driving please feel free to contribute.  Your contribution will help us get the App to the point where it is available on the iPhone. We will keep you posted on the progress we make on iPhone platform.

Thanks again for looking at our Indiegogo project!


Chad and Kip

story:
Featured on

Meet BoardPass

Organized and Powerful — BoardPass is an expert organizer made for all kinds of Apple products.

iPhone, iPad, Macbook and all the other accessories and devices…Nowadays, we have an array of Apple devices to connect every aspect of our daily lives.

However, what comes along, the inevitable tangling cables, cluttered cords and messy devices, can be really stressful and irritating.

It shouldn’t be this way.

We can do better. Be organized. Keep things in the sleek, Apple style.

Keeping all the cables neatly and secured, BoardPass is the perfect match for all kinds of Apple products.

We have exclusive compartments for each Apple device, from Macbook, iPad, iPad Mini to accessories like adapters, earphones, power banks...etc.

You don't need to be irritated by all the tangling cables and messy devices.

Apple may have made your life easier, let BoardPass make your Apple life smoother. 

 

Swift Board and Pass

Frequent travelers can understand the anxiety during security checks, when repeatedly asked to fish out laptops, tablets, electronic devices, and then put everything back in again. 

With BoardPass, things can be much easier.

Saving half of the time and effort, BoardPass keeps all your devices in one organizer panel, and secures each device in their own designated pockets. 

You can simply pull out the panel, send the panel (along with your devices) through the X-ray, you can pass the security check quickly without any mess or lost.

 

Sleek, Mobile and Powerful

Organize your devices, organize your life.We help you pack better.Whoever you are, wherever you are, whatever you're bringing, we make sure everything remains neat and sleek.

Designer Special, Unleash Creativity

Let creativity roam free, and find inspiration everywhere.

Pack in iPad and Apple Pencil, and take out your tablet to sketch and doodle, whenever, wherever you like.

Mobile Office on the Go

More memory, more data storage and extension channels -- you can have it all 'in' the bag. Make the best use of a bag's potential. Connect laptop to embedded docking hub (extra 3 USB and 1 SD card reader, connected with MicroUSB cable), and transform your briefcase into portable work station.

Light, Compact, Mighty 

Pack in all the content entertainment, eReader, video and games in the sleeve.

Slide iPad Mini into your bag, bring along earphones and continuous power to enjoy diverse entertainment with the most hands-free experience!

The function just like Apple smartcover gives the best angel while reading and typing.

Organized for Productivity

Declutter the mess around your workspace.

Your desk is a territory creativity and productivity. A neat, clean table can help clearing the mind and improves work quality. Start afresh and put everything in their place. 

Best Travel Companion

Keep in style, even on the road. 

Luggage slide over secures your briefcase to the suitcase. Special compartment for your mobile phone and passport -- no frenzy fishing things in the bag. 

 

Simple Solution to Big Issues

Overwhelmed by too many gadgets, tangling cables, and different accessories? 

BoardPass brings you the ultimate solution: Customized Briefcase.

We tailor the bag compartments to your needs with 3 different organizer panels, each with exclusive organizer pockets for various kinds of devices and accessories. 

Choose what you need, and fit them into their designated organizer. We’ve prepared a place for everything, and accommodates everything in its place. 

Switching to different work mode? Need different tools? 

No problem. 

Bring what you need. Choose different devices and accessories for different occasions.

Simply swap the panels and change the matching accessories, and you’re good to go.

MacBook Accessory Board (air and pro 13- 15”)

12.9" iPad Pro Designer Insert (or other 11-13 tablet)

7"~9.7" iPad Designer Insert (air, mini, or other 7-10” tablet)

 

Features

 

Size and specification

  • BoardPass laptop bag (33 cm x 38 cm x 2.5 cm) is designed for 13-inch MacBook. Other compatible laptops includes: 

－　New MacBook Pro 13", MacBook Pro 13", MacBook Air 13", MacBook Air 11", MacBook 12" , MacBook Pro 15" 2016

－　ASUS ZenBook 3, HP Elite Book, Dell XPS 13.

  • iPad Pro Sleeve Insert is also compatible with Surface Pro 3 &4 tablet.
  • Laptop Compartment 36.5cm (H) x 27.5 cm (L) x 2.7 cm (W), suitable for most laptops from 10"~14", and new MacBook Pro 15".

 

Reward

Pledge USD $15 : 1 Organizer Panel

Choose either one panel from

  • Macbook Accessory Board
  • 12.9" iPad Pro Designer Insert
  • 7"~9.7" iPad Designer Insert

 

Pledge USD $30 : 2 Organizer Panels

Choose 2 panels from

  • Macbook Accessory Board
  • 12.9" iPad Pro Designer Insert
  • 7"~9.7" iPad Designer Insert

 

Pledge USD $45 : 3 Organizer Panels

Full set of all 3 panels: Macbook Accessory Board, 12.9" iPad Pro Designer Insert and 7"~9.7" iPad Designer Insert.

 

Pledge USD $49 : Early Bird 35% off retail!

  • 1 BoardPass Bag 
  • 1 Organizer Panel

 

Pledge USD $55 : Indiegogo Special 30% off retail!

  • 1 BoardPass Bag 
  • 1 Organizer Panel

 

Pledge USD $98 : Duo-Set for 2 BoardPass & Panels35% off retail!

  • 2 BoardPass Bag 
  • 2 Organizer Panel

 

Pledge USD $245 : Group Price 5 Sets35% off retail!

Enjoy Early Bird promo and delivery fee discount in 5-set-pack!

  • 5 BoardPass Bag 
  • 5 Organizer Panel

 

Timeline

2015

June > Indiegogo Shipping

  • Gigabyte Great-design Competition - Merit Award (Detection)

  • Hansgrohe Preis 2014 Special award - Pre-selection (iWash)

2013

  • Gold Award (Corner Breaker)
  • Uneec Applied Design Award - Bronze Award (Life Traingle)
  • Uneec Applied Design Award - People Choose Award (Corner Breaker)

  • Good Deisgn of the Year (Add Up)

2012

  • Reddot Concept Design Award - Best of the Best (Add Up)
  • Reddot Concept Design Award - Luminary Nomination (Add Up)
  • Liteon award - Merit Award (Add Up)
  • National Sporting Goods Design Competition - Merit Award (Dream Rider)

2011

  • Taipei Media Design Award - Special Award (MEET)
  • Taipei Industrial Area Design Award - Bronze Award (Light Wu-Gu)

Team

We create, and we invent. We pursuit dreams, and we make it happen. 

In Arky, we don’t just ‘manufacture’ products. We brainstorm for for ideas, examine every design details with scrutiny, invite industry professionals and experts to evaluate the feasibility, and partner with great studios to make sure each and every item is made solid and workable. Through on Kickstarter, we'd like to engage directly with greater market audience, and to invite you to join us, join Arky community. Together, let’s make BoardPass come true!

Risks and challenges

PATENT AND CERTIFICATION 
Arky Design owns patent for its briefcase-embedded extension hub design.

PRODUCTION AND SHIPPING 
Arky design has solid production partnership with factories and material suppliers. We are confident that our production will be on schedule to meet the delivery date. We also promise to keep our backers updated on the latest production news, and will inform you in the case of any adjustments.

FAQ

  • How do I choose the organizer panel I want?

We will issue a survey at the end of the campaign, where you can fill in which panel (for MacBook, iPad Pro or iPad mini) you'd like to have.

 

  • What's the size of BoardPass bag?

BoardPass is designed to fit 13-inch MacBook. 

The size of the bag is: 33cm x 38cm x 6.5cm (maximum)

 

  • Will my laptop fit into BoardPass?

The size of laptop compartment in BoardPass bag is 36.5cm (H) x 27.5 cm (L) x 2.7 cm (W). 
It can accommodate most laptops from 10"~14", and the new MacBook Pro 15" will also be a great fit. Other suitable laptops includes: 
- Most laptop from 10” ~ 13” 
- MacBook Pro & Air 13", New MacBook 12", New MacBook Pro 13" & 15" 
- ASUS : 13” ZenBook, 14” U4000 series 
- Acer : S3, 13” and 14” 
- Dell : XPS 13” ~ 15” 
- HP : Pavilion 14”, Envy Spectre 14”, EliteBook 14” series 
- Lenovo : YOGA 14”, Air 13” 
- ThinkPad : ThinkPad 14”, ThinkPad S3 14”, ThinkPad X1 14” 
- Samsung : 500R 14”, 900X5M 15” 
- Windows : SurfaceBook 13” 
- Xiaomi : Air 13”


While there are too many different brands and sizes of laptops on the market, we have listed just a few of them. Just bear in mind, any laptop within the compartment size will be able to fit into BoardPass.

 

  • Which tablet will fit into the iPad insert?

The iPad Pro insert size is 34.5 cm x 24.5 cm. 

That is, it can accommodate iPad Pro, Surface pro 3 & 4.
story_txt:
Featured on

Meet BoardPass
Organized and Powerful — BoardPass is an expert organizer made for all kinds of Apple products.
iPhone, iPad, Macbook and all the other accessories and devices…Nowadays, we have an array of Apple devices to connect every aspect of our daily lives.
However, what comes along, the inevitable tangling cables, cluttered cords and messy devices, can be really stressful and irritating.
It shouldn’t be this way.
We can do better. Be organized. Keep things in the sleek, Apple style.
Keeping all the cables neatly and secured, BoardPass is the perfect match for all kinds of Apple products.We have exclusive compartments for each Apple device, from Macbook, iPad, iPad Mini to accessories like adapters, earphones, power banks...etc.You don't need to be irritated by all the tangling cables and messy devices.Apple may have made your life easier, let BoardPass make your Apple life smoother.  Swift Board and PassFrequent travelers can understand the anxiety during security checks, when repeatedly asked to fish out laptops, tablets, electronic devices, and then put everything back in again. With BoardPass, things can be much easier.Saving half of the time and effort, BoardPass keeps all your devices in one organizer panel, and secures each device in their own designated pockets. You can simply pull out the panel, send the panel (along with your devices) through the X-ray, you can pass the security check quickly without any mess or lost. Sleek, Mobile and PowerfulOrganize your devices, organize your life.We help you pack better.Whoever you are, wherever you are, whatever you're bringing, we make sure everything remains neat and sleek.Designer Special, Unleash CreativityLet creativity roam free, and find inspiration everywhere.Pack in iPad and Apple Pencil, and take out your tablet to sketch and doodle, whenever, wherever you like.Mobile Office on the GoMore memory, more data storage and extension channels -- you can have it all 'in' the bag. Make the best use of a bag's potential. Connect laptop to embedded docking hub (extra 3 USB and 1 SD card reader, connected with MicroUSB cable), and transform your briefcase into portable work station.Light, Compact, Mighty Pack in all the content entertainment, eReader, video and games in the sleeve.Slide iPad Mini into your bag, bring along earphones and continuous power to enjoy diverse entertainment with the most hands-free experience!The function just like Apple smartcover gives the best angel while reading and typing.Organized for ProductivityDeclutter the mess around your workspace.Your desk is a territory creativity and productivity. A neat, clean table can help clearing the mind and improves work quality. Start afresh and put everything in their place. Best Travel CompanionKeep in style, even on the road. Luggage slide over secures your briefcase to the suitcase. Special compartment for your mobile phone and passport -- no frenzy fishing things in the bag.  Simple Solution to Big IssuesOverwhelmed by too many gadgets, tangling cables, and different accessories? BoardPass brings you the ultimate solution: Customized Briefcase.We tailor the bag compartments to your needs with 3 different organizer panels, each with exclusive organizer pockets for various kinds of devices and accessories. Choose what you need, and fit them into their designated organizer. We’ve prepared a place for everything, and accommodates everything in its place. Switching to different work mode? Need different tools? No problem. Bring what you need. Choose different devices and accessories for different occasions.Simply swap the panels and change the matching accessories, and you’re good to go.MacBook Accessory Board (air and pro 13- 15”)12.9" iPad Pro Designer Insert (or other 11-13 tablet)7"~9.7" iPad Designer Insert (air, mini, or other 7-10” tablet) Features Size and specificationBoardPass laptop bag (33 cm x 38 cm x 2.5 cm) is designed for 13-inch MacBook. Other compatible laptops includes: －　New MacBook Pro 13", MacBook Pro 13", MacBook Air 13", MacBook Air 11", MacBook 12" , MacBook Pro 15" 2016－　ASUS ZenBook 3, HP Elite Book, Dell XPS 13.
iPad Pro Sleeve Insert is also compatible with Surface Pro 3 &4 tablet.
Laptop Compartment 36.5cm (H) x 27.5 cm (L) x 2.7 cm (W), suitable for most laptops from 10"~14", and new MacBook Pro 15".

story:
Short Summary

MAIL1CLICK is a private company under the name of "Kryptotel" that specializes in building secure telecommunication services and infrastructures. As one of the founders and evangelists I strongly believe that the world we live in needs a safer FREE mail service.

In today's day and age everything is done through the internet, we must  be able to protect our identity and privacy at all times. Companies are hired not only to watch what users do online but to infiltrate information and use that for their own purpose and goals. All emails stored on our behalf by Google, Yahoo, Facebook, and other similar companies are a clear and easy target for those companies and governments that want to invade our privacy. The saying "possession is nine tenths of the Law" couldn't be more accurate..... we need to take it on our selves to protect our rights, Privacy and Encryption needs to be in our hands to guarantee our safety!

MAIL1CLICK is a free mail service that can be run on any computer, tablet or smart phone. Our company servers are located in 54 data centers in 21 different countries. Our entire infrastructure is 100% protected against any kind of disastrous event, earthquakes, tsunami, tornado's and physical tampering. All our servers are connected to each other through encrypted VPNs (virtual private networks), the server's disks are fully encrypted avoiding any local physical threat resulting in an additional layer of encryption to your encrypted email service.

We need your help to keep moving forward.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal here is to give every email user out there a REAL ALTERNATIVE, something that will PROTECT their emails from any kind of threat. 

We are in the need to develop a MAIL1CLICK version for IOS / MAC OS/X and Windows Mobile. MAIL1CLICK is available already via Web, Windows and Android .... this is just an additional certification that our team has been committed to this project for a while and the living proof is in the fact that MAIL1CLICK is live and running!!!!

Effectively 5 people will be actively working on MAIL1CLICK. The money we are trying to raise is to cover the living expenses of 4 out 5 individuals that will be working on this for the time necessary to develop the IOS / MAC OS/X and Windows Mobile version. I am the 5th person and as an evangelist I will personally not receive any funds from this project but I have committed my time, energy and personal resources to making this happen. We want to release the versions as soon as physically possible.

When you think of 100K divided by 4 people it comes down to 25K each. When you take out taxes and expenses.... there isn't much left. We all have families and are taking this risk to support something we truly believe in, EMAIL PRIVACY.

With the money we get this is what you will get:

- MAIL1CLICK for IOS / MAC OS/X and WINDOWS MOBILE.

- A simple user friendly mail service that runs on any computer, tablet or smart phone.

- Emails with automatic Encryption and Signature. (NO ENCRYPTION KNOWLEDGE REQUIRED)

- Encrypted Emails that can be sent to ANY standard email (gmail, yahoo...etc).

- Receive Encrypted emails from any MAIL1CLICK user.

- Send and Receive emails with Fully Encrypted Attachments/Files.

- FREE SERVICE up to 1GB of space. 

- An OPEN API to allow Software Developers to do business on it.

Once the initial version is released we will spend as much time necessary to fix any bugs, additional features and work on different languages. 

If we are not fully funded we will still work on MAIL1CLICK but it may take more time as we will have to take on other deals to support the ongoing costs of business, ourselves and our families. 

Make a difference....

It will give every single individual the CHOICE of protecting their Privacy. Most individuals are passive to Privacy breaches. We tend to believe that the choice of Privacy is commanded and executed at the very top, Government, Secret Services, Presidents and CEO's of BLN $ companies. We believe that we just need to deal with the consequences and can't do anything about it. Well this is not the case anymore. MAIL1CLICK is changing that, we are making the World a better place to live in by providing the tools to protecting our human rights.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute we understand that.... but help us spread the word. Word of mouth is the most effective communication method known to humans....Talk about us to your friends, post links of our website and project on your personal blogs, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram...it ALL helps.

.... it can't happen without you... THANK YOU.

Have any questions... just email us indiegogo@kryptotel.net

story:
LiveNow!TV app has been on Google Play and Amazon Market for ten months with a total of 650,000 downloads. The app has a 3.8 rating on Google Play with over 4000 reviews. The app is currently in the top 150 entertainment apps on Google Play in the USA and top 10 in the UK.
LiveNow!TV allows users to watch and record from over 500 live and On Demand channels and 45,000 on demand programs, (including movies, sports, interactive and docs).


Revenue is generated from advertising and in app subscriptions. Subscriptions can be purchased for dvr storage and hd. There is programming that is also pay to view.



We are currently looking to develop the app for iphone and ipad.

story:
Short Summary

I am Beri, a citizen of planet earth. I am a physics PhD, specialized in nanotechnology and an additional background in nanomaterial chemistry. I have a passion for music, dance, architecture, travel and foreign cuisine. I am the founder and CEO of a startup company called NanoArC Limited - NanoArchitecture & Consulting (www.nanoarc.org). We change the atomic arrangement (architecture) within nanomaterials, to give them previously unexpected properties so as to be able to develop innovative technologies.

 Why am I doing this project? I believe that technological advancement can proceed without the depreciation of our environment or natural resources. That toxicity is a primary concern for technology today and this should be fundamentally addressed as a prime responsibility for every technology developer. Nature serves us with its resources, the least we can do is preserve its integrity as we improve our lives technologically. Hence, technology can serve as a symbiotic asset for both nature and mankind as a whole. My vision is to foster the development of cost-effective, sustainable technologies for humankind. To live in and leave behind a world that understands that technological advancement should be a solution, not a threat to the preservation of the integrity of humanity and this planet as a whole.  To understand that tech intelligence can serve to improve life quality and should be eco-sustainable, not rendering existent lifeforms artificial or extinct. You do not need to be a scientist to understand this value, all it takes is compassion to sustain that which is priceless - LIFE.

The sun shines everywhere and yet despite all our technological advancement, energy is often only available at stationary locations. Energy needs are on the rise and somehow, energy supply is becoming more expensive and less reliable. There are people in many third world countries who own mobile phones but have no electricity connected to their homes. The abundant and intense sun is mainly being used to dry food grain rather than generate power. As for developed nations, snow storms, hurricanes and tropical storms rip through northern parts of America and Southeast Asia every year, causing power outages and damages that scale in the hundreds of millions of dollars. It is time we pick up the hints from nature and upgrade to sustainable living.


The Challenge: 

Effective and timely communication is a mesh that holds society together. Hence, in this campaign, we start with portable technologies. Smart mobile systems such as phones, iPads, tablets and certain medical devices are reliant on batteries for off-grid operation. Batteries are toxic, heavy & have a limited energy lifespan. Also, power sockets aren't always readily available to assure energy longevity when on the go. 


The Solution:

 A transparent solar port will change that for many users of portable devices and give you a personalized energy platform - be you at home or on the go. With a transparent solar cell port (TS-Port) for portable smart devices, which has the dual function of a display & recharges the battery from a rich source on the go - the sun: A battery complement with less toxicity, enabling lower device weight & energy longevity. If you forget to recharge your phone, iPad or medical (dialysis or ventricular assist) device and your battery is low, the sun is a wireless energy port, everywhere you are: On the mountains, camping, hiking, skiing, sailing away at sea or simply at home. 

This is solar technology being made scalable to the needs of the user, adjustable to your budget: Be the need as small as a phone or a large as the windows of a building or electric car.  Nature is abundant, versatile and so generous, the sun doesn't need a special installation centre in the sky. Just plug in and let it do the rest. 

Funds: The requested funds will be used to cover for staff, purchase equipment and buy material to develop the technology to a mature state for the market.


What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding will serve the purpose of buying material (~ 15%), equipment (~ 45%) and covering for a team of highly skilled scientists & engineers (~38%) to get the technology into the market (~ 2%). The TS-Port is being designed with a new kind of nanomaterial recently developed. It is nontoxic, light, air stable and quite intriguing in its properties. Whatever amount is achieved from this process will be invested to keep the sustainable energy growth in motion.
  • You get affordable advanced solar technology scaled to your budget to meet your point of need.
  • You become part of a global movement for sustainable energy and the preservation of our world heritage.

The Impact

Solar technology is mainly applied to large-scale platforms (e.g. rooftops, solar farms) with substantial installation costs that most people can not afford. With the transparent solar port (TS-Port) technology, many users will have access to an elegant gadget (the image is just a small component of the device) which is portable and provides energy to their phones, iPads or tablets be they at home or on the go. The sun shines for all and all should benefit from it however small, through a miniature-scale system like the TS-Port.

Even if your country is not always sunny, daylight does come and even if you can't invest in a large solar panel, this is your chance to still benefit from solar technology at your own personal level.

Your contribution will set a global trend of sustainable living in unprecedented magnitude. Energy will be available to you more readily than a wifi connection - the sun does not require a code, neither does it send a bill. Your onetime cost for this gadget will be in its purchase. From then on, nature covers the rest.


Risks & Challenges

  • The challenges of the project  may arise from collaborator mishaps and is to unforseen device performance hurdles or costs. 
  •  The material performance and device architecture are sensitive issues, key determinant to the success of this technology. I am a nanotechnologist and my core skill lies in considerably altering material performance to make it perform beyond its expected capacity. Together with  the team, this fundamental asset can be improved independent of external collaborators. 
  • To circumvent setbacks incurred from delays, deadlines will be set well before milestone dates in order to evaluate our progress internally and meet expected timelines.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You can pick a perk or make a donation of any amount that will go a long way to make a huge difference for this planet.
In the event of not being positioned to contribute to this endeavour, you can also help as follows:
  • Get the word out and make some noise about the TS-Port awareness campaign.
  • Or use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Short Summary 
I am Beri, a citizen of planet earth. I am a physics PhD, specialized in nanotechnology and an additional background in nanomaterial chemistry. I have a passion for music, dance, architecture, travel and foreign cuisine. I am the founder and CEO of a startup company called NanoArC Limited - NanoArchitecture & Consulting (www.nanoarc.org). We change the atomic arrangement (architecture) within nanomaterials, to give them previously unexpected properties so as to be able to develop innovative technologies.
 Why am I doing this project? I believe that technological advancement can proceed without the depreciation of our environment or natural resources. That toxicity is a primary concern for technology today and this should be fundamentally addressed as a prime responsibility for every technology developer. Nature serves us with its resources, the least we can do is preserve its integrity as we improve our lives technologically. Hence, technology can serve as a symbiotic asset for both nature and mankind as a whole. My vision is to foster the development of cost-effective, sustainable technologies for humankind. To live in and leave behind a world that understands that technological advancement should be a solution, not a threat to the preservation of the integrity of humanity and this planet as a whole.  To understand that tech intelligence can serve to improve life quality and should be eco-sustainable, not rendering existent lifeforms artificial or extinct. You do not need to be a scientist to understand this value, all it takes is compassion to sustain that which is priceless - LIFE.
The sun shines everywhere and yet despite all our technological advancement, energy is often only available at stationary locations. Energy needs are on the rise and somehow, energy supply is becoming more expensive and less reliable. There are people in many third world countries who own mobile phones but have no electricity connected to their homes. The abundant and intense sun is mainly being used to dry food grain rather than generate power. As for developed nations, snow storms, hurricanes and tropical storms rip through northern parts of America and Southeast Asia every year, causing power outages and damages that scale in the hundreds of millions of dollars. It is time we pick up the hints from nature and upgrade to sustainable living.


The Challenge: 
Effective and timely communication is a mesh that holds society together. Hence, in this campaign, we start with portable technologies. Smart mobile systems such as phones, iPads, tablets and certain medical devices are reliant on batteries for off-grid operation. Batteries are toxic, heavy & have a limited energy lifespan. Also, power sockets aren't always readily available to assure energy longevity when on the go. 

The Solution:
 A transparent solar port will change that for many users of portable devices and give you a personalized energy platform - be you at home or on the go. With a transparent solar cell port (TS-Port) for portable smart devices, which has the dual function of a display & recharges the battery from a rich source on the go - the sun: A battery complement with less toxicity, enabling lower device weight & energy longevity. If you forget to recharge your phone, iPad or medical (dialysis or ventricular assist) device and your battery is low, the sun is a wireless energy port, everywhere you are: On the mountains, camping, hiking, skiing, sailing away at sea or simply at home. 
This is solar technology being made scalable to the needs of the user, adjustable to your budget: Be the need as small as a phone or a large as the windows of a building or electric car.  Nature is abundant, versatile and so generous, the sun doesn't need a special installation centre in the sky. Just plug in and let it do the rest. 
Funds: The requested funds will be used to cover for staff, purchase equipment and buy material to develop the technology to a mature state for the market.
   What We Need & What You Get  The funding will serve the purpose of buying material (~ 15%), equipment (~ 45%) and covering for a team of highly skilled scientists & engineers (~38%) to get the technology into the market (~ 2%). The TS-Port is being designed with a new kind of nanomaterial recently developed. It is nontoxic, light, air stable and quite intriguing in its properties. Whatever amount is achieved from this process will be invested to keep the sustainable energy growth in motion.


You get affordable advanced solar technology scaled to your budget to meet your point of need.
You become part of a global movement for sustainable energy and the preservation of our world heritage.

   The Impact

Solar technology is mainly applied to large-scale platforms (e.g. rooftops, solar farms) with substantial installation costs that most people can not afford. With the transparent solar port (TS-Port) technology, many users will have access to an elegant gadget (the image is just a small component of the device) which is portable and provides energy to their phones, iPads or tablets be they at home or on the go. The sun shines for all and all should benefit from it however small, through a miniature-scale system like the TS-Port.
Even if your country is not always sunny, daylight does come and even if you can't invest in a large solar panel, this is your chance to still benefit from solar technology at your own personal level.
Your contribution will set a global trend of sustainable living in unprecedented magnitude. Energy will be available to you more readily than a wifi connection - the sun does not require a code, neither does it send a bill. Your onetime cost for this gadget will be in its purchase. From then on, nature covers the rest.
   Risks & Challenges  The challenges of the project  may arise from collaborator mishaps and is to unforseen device performance hurdles or costs. 

 The material performance and device architecture are sensitive issues, key determinant to the success of this technology. I am a nanotechnologist and my core skill lies in considerably altering material performance to make it perform beyond its expected capacity. Together with  the team, this fundamental asset can be improved independent of external collaborators. 
 To circumvent setbacks incurred from delays, deadlines will be set well before milestone dates in order to evaluate our progress internally and meet expected timelines. 
   Other Ways You Can Help 
You can pick a perk or make a donation of any amount that will go a long way to make a huge difference for this planet.In the event of not being positioned to contribute to this endeavour, you can also help as follows:  Get the word out and make some noise about the TS-Port awareness campaign. Or use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Share love, share the CZUR campaign.

The most special stretch goal ever!

Thanksgiving Feedback

 

It is Thanksgiving week now. We should thank all of your great support! In return, we will start a thanksgiving customer feedback event. Everyone can get a gift from us.

 

From Nov. 23 to Nov. 30, you can directly get another free button,(besides the one attached with czur scanner that you bought)  once you share our indiegogo on your facebook, twitter or google+. There is one click share button on the left of campaign video. The button is a useful accessory for CZUR scanner, which normally can click 200,000 times.

 

 

In addition, a blogger told us CZUR scanner can even help kids with dyslexia or dysgraphia. You can read more about it at:

http://www.toysaretools.com/2015/10/crowdfunding-alert-czur-how-one-super.html

We have adjusted our stretch goals.

We will set two stretch goals:

1, if we can reach a $800,000 USD stretch goal, we will send 30 free CZUR scanners to schools.

2, if we can reach a $1,500,000 USD stretch goal, we will send 80 free CZUR scanners to schools.

Please share this love with your friends and family. You do not need to back us with money - one click/ share (left icons of the video) may help some dyslexia kids!

You can also comment us or send email to us to nominate the school you think we should send the free scanners to.

 

We believe scanners should be faster, smarter, and easier to use.
We believe that scanners can scan not only pages, but also books.
We believe that technology should be accessible for everyone.  
Therefore, we spent nearly 3 years redesigning the scanner and have been able to make this dream come true. 

 

CZUR is the world’s first true smart scanner. CZUR is also the fastest scanner in the world. It can scan books easily, connect to WiFi, and serve as a video projector. CZUR can be used in your home and office.

CZUR Scanner In The Media

 
                               

                 

 

    

                         

 

                     

                  

                 

                                                   

                   

 

 

Library

 

Equipped with 16 million pixels and creative algorithms, CZUR can make scanning books as easy as turning pages. The most difficult problems of including the flattening curve, erasing fingerprints, and smart edge-cutting have been solved. CZUR is the highest cost-performance book scanner in the world.

 

 

Office

 

Through powerful image processing and computing abilities, we have increased the scanning speed about 20 times faster when compared to the traditional scanner. Using CZUR, you can scan everything in the office, including files, contracts, vouchers, etc.

 

 

Designer

CZUR can help build your private digital library easily and quickly. There is no need to install drivers or software when using CZUR cloud. Your sketches, paintings, and notes can be scanned and stored in the CZUR cloud, allowing you to directly access files on your laptop, iPad, or smart phone.

Meeting Room

CZUR is also a video presenter. By connecting to the screen through HDMI, materials can be presented with 1080P. CZUR greatly lowers the cost and increases the efficiency of meetings.
 

 

 

We are a startup company with a strong technical background. We have three core technical persons in charge of hardware, software, and architecture – they all have more than 14 years of experience. Our algorithm engineer has been focusing on image algorithm for 13 years; he has provided technical support to numerous well-known companies. All of our team members have a deep understanding of both hardware and software.

When we planned to develop a fast and easy-operating smart scanner,we tried many ways; not only solving the problem of book scanning, but also making the common document scanning easier. We know that Google has done some hard work on book scanning, but we think it might not be the best way, we want to make the device easier to use, and affordable. This way, more people can enjoy the new way of scanning and build their own private library.

We spend a lot of time redesigning the structure of the scanner - to adapt to documents, books, and so on.

To make it a perfect fit for curved paged documents, such as books, we adapted the algorithm and have tested it over a hundreds times.

To make scanning fast, we use the CMOS imaging principle, and choose SONY's 16M pixels sensor chip.

To solve the slow speed processing problem caused by large amounts of computation, we chose the high speed DSP coordinate with the 1G DDR and 1G flash.

 

 

                Legal Disclaimer

 

       "Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

 

FAQ

 

1.Q: What formats can be saved on the PC by CZUR scanner software?

  A: JPEG, PDF, TIFF.

2.Q: What is the size per one-page scanned and saved in PDF format?

  A: The processed original image is 2M. The compression ratio can be preselected;          if the compression ratio is 80%, the single processed image will be 500K.

3.Q: If using fingers to press the books when scanning, will the fingerprint be left in            the scanned image?

  A: CZUR scanner software will automatically identify and remove the fingerprint in          the background.

4.Q: Does CZUR scanner software support OCR function to output editable                            documents?

  A: Yes, CZUR scanner software supports OCR function using Abbyy technology.

5.Q: Can the slant be corrected by software? Can the shadow in the binding gap be            erased?

  A: Yes, CZUR scanner software will erase the shadow in the binding gap and correct the slant.

story:
**Congratulations to our referral contest winners, FabianS, JohnP, and ChrisO!


Meet Cove, a thoughtfully-designed station to charge and store every phone and tablet in the house.

Cove in Light Birch

Cove in Dark Ebony

Cove in Medium Walnut


 





Cove works. Finally, your tech feels at home in your home.


Cove organizes. No more lost cables and misplaced devices.


Cove coordinates. Contemporary design and beautiful colors complement any decor.




  • 16.8" wide x 12.8" deep x 7" tall (current prototype)
  • 6' (1.8 meter) main power cord included
  • UK, EU plug adapters included
  • Power Output: 5 USB ports at 12 watts each (60 watts total)
  • Power Input: 110-240 Volts AC
  • UL-certified, Griffin-exclusive ChargeSensor circuit
  • Non-scratch, non-skid lined shelves




As smartphones and tablets have taken over the world, we've seen a lot of charging stations. But we had a hunch that something was missing.

So we talked with people who were looking for a better way to make their tech live harmoniously in the living spaces they'd worked so hard to create.








See full perk details at the top of the page.


  1. Why is Griffin using Indiegogo?
    We think crowdfunding is the shortest, straightest line between your need for a well-thought-out, design-sensitive charging hub, and our idea for Cove.

  2. Will this charge any USB device?
    Yes, Cove will charge any device that charges via normal USB, from your iPhone to your GoPro. 5 USB ports deliver up to 12 watts each to attached devices (60 W total output).

  3. What’s Cove made of?
    The Cove enclosure will be made of high-impact, scratch-resistant polycarbonate for durability. Cove can be wiped down with mild soap and water. Other materials and finishes are still being explored.

  4. What’s the warranty??
    We’re offering a 2-year warranty on Cove, beginning from the time it ships.

  5. When will it ship??
    We hope to begin shipping units in late 2015, and will be shipping Indiegogo orders first!

  6. What are the dimensions and weight of Cove??
    Our current prototype is: 16.8” wide X 12.8” deep X 7” tall. Follow our campaign to receive updates as we make our way through the product’s development.

  7. Will Cove be available in retail stores??
    No, Cove will not be available in retail stores.

  8. Is the power supply built into the product or does it have a hideous power brick??
    The UL-certified power supply is built-in, out of sight.

  9. Does Cove support USB 3.0??
    Yes, Cove will charge USB 3.0 devices.

  10. Can Cove be used outside the United States??
    Yes, we plan to offer international versions of Cove with power cords for different geographic regions.

  11. How long is the power cord?
    4’ (1.2 meter) power cord included.

  12. How many devices can I charge at once?
    5.

  13. What is the input rating for Cove?
    100-240 VAC

  14. What colors are available??
    Based on our research, we gave our prototype a light woodgrain finish, but we want to hear from you! Tell us if we should change the color, offer more options, etc.

  15. Will Cove accommodate my device in a Griffin Technology case? Will it work with other manufacturers' cases??
    Yes, Cove can accommodate devices in cases as large as an iPad in a Griffin Survivor, which is pretty heavy-duty.

  16. Will Cove charge my laptop??
    Cove doesn’t currently support laptop charging, but you are able to store your laptop on the top!

  17. Can I use my personal USB cables with Cove?
    Yes! Cove works with all standard USB cables.

  18. Does Cove support charging via Qualcomm Quick Charge?
    No, Cove does not support Qualcomm Quick Charge.

  19. Is Cove's wood finish real wood?
    Due to demand, we will be producing Cove in three color options that mimic the look of Birch, Walnut, and Ebony. This material allows Cove to be wiped clean while looking great in your home.

story:
Who says you can’t have power and fidelity in a car audio amplifier?

Rare Audio amplifiers are the result of collaboration between mObridge (www.mobridge.us) and Indice (www.indicetech.com) to develop a completely new class of digital amplifiers built from the ground up. We haven’t heard anything quite like it – and that’s why we’ve called it the Rare Audio Amplifier.

Did you know you can hear the Rare Audio Amplifier for yourself?

Rare Audio is exhibiting at CES along with mObridge and Indice from the  7 – 10 January 2014 in Las Vegas. Visit us at Booth 80000 in the Gold Pavilion LVCC to experience the power and precision of this amplifier.

Review on the technology behind Rare Audio's amplifiers:

http://www.caraudio.com.au/content/world-first-amplifier-technology-from-mobridge-indice/


Download the product brochure now!


Who is behind Rare Audio?

Rare Audio was founded by the team behind mObridge (www.mobridge.us) who have extensive experience developing high quality automotive products. mObridge developed the digital signal processing technology inside the Rare Amplifier that provides seamless integration into MOST enabled vehicles and smartphone connectivity. Powering the Rare amplifier is Indice (www.indicetech.com), a leader in innovative power control solutions. Indice’s amplifier and power supply technology provides high fidelity audio with uncompromising performance, ultra low harmonic and intermod distortion and regenerative power supplies that return excess speaker energy back to the vehicle’s battery.

We are very passionate about our technology and Rare Audio’s mission is to reset the benchmark of high fidelity and performance car audio with its range of new amplifiers. Key performance includes:

· Incredibly low Total Harmonic Distortion (THD) of <0.06%;

· Incredibly low Signal to Noise Ratio (SNR) >100dB


Award Winning Technology

This amplifier builds on technology that was voted by Industry leaders as one of the most innovative car audio products released at CES in 2013 and now incorporates new innovative features.


Low Profile & Light Weight


Total amplifier thickness is under one inch (25mm) making it the most technically advanced and compact amplifier available on the market. Key features include:

·  Amplifier dimensions: 356mm x 256mm x 25mm (14" x 10" x 1")

·  Electrolytic capacitor free design reduces the amplifier’s profile and increases longevity

·  Thermal and system management

·  Highest power density in the car automotive industry


Configure and stream with your Bluetooth enabled Smart Phone

Using our powerful GUI via your PC, tablet or smartphone, tune your system to your preference and acoustic environment. Key features include:

·  1024 point FFT channel filter control

·  Adjustable time delay, master equalizer and gain, independent channel gain and phase inversion

·  CAN and Bluetooth interface

·  Bluetooth audio streaming and hands free phone calls

·  Coax/Optical digital interface (S/PDIF or MOST optional)

 

Which amplifier is right for my car?

The following table will help you select the right Rare Audio amplifier for your car.

Product Description

1000W RMS Digital Amp, 4.2 Ch, Bluetooth MOST Input

1000W RMS Digital Amp, 4.2 Ch, Bluetooth Digital Input

1000W RMS Digital Amp, 4.2 Ch, Bluetooth Analog Input

Model number

RA-1-2-1000-4.2-MB

RA-1-2-1000-4.2-DB

RA-1-2-1000-4.2-AB

Number audio channels

4 audio + 2 subwoofers

4 audio + 2 subwoofers 

4 audio + 2 subwoofers 

Power supply rating

 1000W RMS

 1000W RMS 

 1000W RMS 

Bluetooth

Hands free, Audio streaming + configuration app

Hands free, Audio streaming + configuration app

Hands free, Audio streaming + configuration app

Analog audio input

 NO

 NO

YES

Digital audio S/PDIF or COAX input

 NO

 YES

NO

MOST audio (Media Oriented Systems Transport)

YES

NO

NO

Recommended vehicles

Current vehicles including: BMW, AUDI, PORSCHE, MERCEDES BENZ, LAND ROVER, ASTON MARTIN and more

Cars with aftermarket digital head units

All other vehicles or analog after market head units

Smartphone and PC Application

  • Android and iPhone compatible (Bluetooth interface)
  • PC compatible (USB interface)
  • 1024 point FFT channel filter control via GUI interface.
  • Channel by channel adjustable time delay, master equalizer and gain, independent channel gain and phase inversion.


Technical Specifications

Individual Channel filters

1024 point FFT channel filter control via GUI interface

Number of Audio Channels

4 Audio channels, 2 subwoofer channels

Individual channel power rating

RMS WATTS @ 4 OHM = 125W
RMS WATTS @ 2 OHM = 250W
RMS WATTS @ 1 OHM = 500W

Input signal range (Analog inputs)

0V - 2.5V RMS

Individual Amplifier channel bandwidth

0.5Hz to 100KHz

 Standard features

CAN interface for in-vehicle control 
USB interface for PC app control
Channel summing (ie multiple subwoofers)

Optional Interfaces (Dependent on model selected, see table above)

4 channel differential analog inputs
CAN and Bluetooth
Digital interface via Coax/Optical (S/PDIF)
MOST audio connectivity
USB slave (PC application interface)

Signal to Noise Ratio (SNR)

>100dB

Total Harmonic Distortion (THD)

<0.06%

System efficiency

>90%

Input voltage range

10VDC - 30VDC

Transient voltage protection

YES

Input current consumption

Up to 90A RMS

How did the amplifier come about?

The Rare Audio amplifier has gone through extensive development and testing to get it ready for production and sale. The key stages of developing this product include:

Development of each module in the Rare Amplifier:

600W RMS Audio Amplifier module (up to 6 in every amp)

600W RMS Power supply module (up to 2 in every amp)

Digital signal processing board with audio interfaces and Bluetooth connectivity

CES innovation award in January 2013 for a 2 channel version of the amplifier which inspired the 4.2 channel amplifier

Amplifier Concept development including mechanical design and simulation

Integration testing of the entire system

Pre-production release of the complete amplifier for in-vehicle testing

What will the money raised be used for?

Campaign funds will enable us to ramp up production of the amplifiers and reach critical mass for purchase of key components and materials. Our core costs for production ramp up include:

·  Material purchasing for minimum quantities

·  Production tooling

·  Production test equipment

·  Quality assurance checks and logistics

·  Intellectual property protection

·  Global marketing and production promotion at key events

Risks and challenges

Risks exist for all new technology products; however these are effectively mitigated through the skills and experience of the Rare Audio team. Our team includes world class electronics, software, DSP and manufacturing engineers who have extensive experience delivering successful automotive products to market. For more details on the technology behind the Rare Audio amplifier please visit:

http://www.mobridge.us/content/company

http://indicetech.com/about-indice-ecotech/

How the product will get manufactured?

The product will be manufactured by quality contract manufacturers in Asia who are certified to meet TS16949 which is the benchmark for automotive electronics. Final assembly and testing will be completed in Australia to ensure the best experience for our customers.

When should you expect delivery?

Production ramp up takes time, this process includes sourcing of components with lead times of up to 12 weeks and production tooling and test equipment procurement. We anticipate that the Rare Audio amplifiers will ship in May 2014.

We would love your feedback!

Have a question about the Rare Audio project? Discuss Rare Audio at Crowdfundingforum.com!

Tell us your experience with the Rare Audio amplifier, things we are looking for feedback on include: 

a. Installation process

b. Audio experience

c. Configuration app

Please email us with your comments and feedback and we will use this to craft the next generation of products. Please sign up for our news letter so we can keep you updated with the latest news from Rare Audio.
story_txt:
Who says
you can’t have power and fidelity in a car audio amplifier? 
Rare Audio amplifiers are the result of collaboration between mObridge (www.mobridge.us) and Indice (www.indicetech.com) to develop
a completely new class of digital amplifiers built from the ground up. We
haven’t heard anything quite like it – and that’s why we’ve called it the Rare
Audio Amplifier.
Did you
know you can hear the Rare Audio Amplifier for yourself?
Rare Audio is exhibiting at CES along with mObridge and Indice from
the  7 – 10 January 2014 in Las Vegas.
Visit us at Booth 80000 in the Gold Pavilion LVCC to experience the power and
precision of this amplifier.
Review on the technology behind Rare Audio's amplifiers:http://www.caraudio.com.au/content/world-first-amplifier-technology-from-mobridge-indice/Download the product brochure now!Who is
behind Rare Audio?
Rare Audio was founded by the team behind mObridge (www.mobridge.us) who have extensive
experience developing high quality automotive products. mObridge developed the
digital signal processing technology inside the Rare Amplifier that provides seamless
integration into MOST enabled vehicles and smartphone connectivity. Powering
the Rare amplifier is Indice (www.indicetech.com),
a leader in innovative power control solutions. Indice’s amplifier and power
supply technology provides high fidelity audio with uncompromising performance,
ultra low harmonic and intermod distortion and regenerative power supplies that
return excess speaker energy back to the vehicle’s battery.We are
very passionate about our technology and Rare Audio’s mission is to reset the
benchmark of high fidelity and performance car audio with its range of new
amplifiers. Key performance includes:· Incredibly low Total Harmonic Distortion (THD) of <0.06%;· Incredibly low Signal to Noise Ratio (SNR) >100dB
Award Winning Technology
This amplifier builds on technology that was voted by Industry leaders as one of the most innovative car audio
products released at CES in 2013 and now incorporates new innovative features.
Low
Profile & Light Weight

Total amplifier thickness is under one inch (25mm) making it the
most technically advanced and compact amplifier available on the market. Key
features include:
· 
Amplifier
dimensions: 356mm x 256mm x 25mm (14" x 10" x 1")
· 
Electrolytic
capacitor free design reduces the amplifier’s profile and increases longevity
· 
Thermal
and system management
· 
Highest
power density in the car automotive industry
Configure and stream with your Bluetooth enabled Smart Phone

Using our powerful GUI
via your PC, tablet or smartphone, tune your system to your preference and acoustic
environment. Key features include:
· 
1024
point FFT channel filter control
· 
Adjustable
time delay, master equalizer and gain, independent channel gain and phase
inversion
· 
CAN
and Bluetooth interface·  Bluetooth audio streaming and hands free phone calls
· 
Coax/Optical
digital interface (S/PDIF or MOST optional)

amplifier is right for my car?

amplifier for your car.

story:
Your favourite Android device lacks a memory expansion slot? I faced the same problem and got to find a solution. I wanted it to be compact ‘cause typical OTG adapters are really unhandy. And after some time of laborious work I managed to get exactly what I wanted, and now I want to share this with you.


What does it look like?

«Boomerang» - is a universal flash drive. The same one you use every day, but having an extra microUSB port. This means that it can be connected to any android based devices (supporting OTG function). You can copy the files from a computer to it and view them on the tablet or phone and vice verse. It can be quickly and easy done at any time and any place. You do not need any access to the Internet (as in the case of cloud storage), or any additional adapters.


Will it work on my device?

«Boomerang» is compatible with android devices that support USB Host or USB-OTG (On-The-Go).

Until now it has been tested on the following devices:

     • Samsung Galaxy S2, S3, S4,Mega, Note 2, Note 3, Galaxy Tab 10.1 3;

     • Sony Xperia Z, Z1, S, P, Acro S;

     • Motorola RAZR M, RAZR HD, Razr Maxx HD;

     • HTC One, HTC One X +, DROID;

     • Samsung Galaxy Nexus, Google Nexus,Nexus 7 and 10;

     • Nook Colour, Kindle Fire;

     • LG G2, G Optimus Pro

This USB flash drive must work with most of the other devices that support USB-OTG, provided that the manufacturer does not intentionally disable this function. Its technical characteristics have been tested on most mobile processors (System-On-Chip): Qualcomm Snapdragon, Samsung Exynos 3, 4 and 5, NvidiaTegra 2 and 3, as well as RockChipand AllWinner chips.


Design and specifications

A lot of time was spent to find the optimal form factor. I called it «Boomerang».

The bends on its housing (case) allow to easily extract USB flash drive from the computer as well as from any other android device. The microUSB header is positioned in such a way that the drive isn’t big (protrudes minimally) which makes it comfortable to use.

The length dimension is 29 mm, making «Boomerang» neat and compact.

Many people use a protective cover for their tablets / phones. This drive is designed in such a way that it can be used with covers up to 1 mm thick.

Two versions are used by now: the first version having 16 gb of memory in white colour and the other version having 32 gb in deep red colour.

Speed ​​Test of USB 2.0 Drive is 32 GB (made ​​in CrystalDiskMark):


Action plan

It's expensive to make all the necessary tools and buy components in sufficient quantities in order to implement the drive into a real of product. That’s why I appeal to the Indiegogo community to engineer a «Boomerang» for your benefit. If you see an interest in the device, I will gladly and gratefully accept your support.

In the case of successful financing of this project the following plan of action will be held:

     • Design and fabrication of steel mould to make the plastic part of the housing;

     • Production of metal case-connector having an individual form;

     • Purchase of a memory module and other components;

     • Mounting (assembly) of an experimental batch, its testing and inspection;

     • The production cycle and packaging;

     • Express shipping of the cargo in the USA and Indiegogo supporters!

When the work in Indiegogo is completed, components supply and the assembly  will take place with the distribution date expected approximately in the end of May.


Risks and challenges

In each project there are some risks. And I will do everything possible to avoid all of them.

In contrast to USB on PC, the work of USB on a mobile device is controlled by an individual manufacturer. It is likely that the manufacturer may disable the USB host in their future devices, or software updates. Therefore, it is possible that this drive works on your device today, but cannot work in the future.

If the manufacturer has big orders, there may be some delay in the inclusion in the order of their launch schedule for production. I will try to avoid any delay in the schedule.

Quality assurance is always important for electronic products, even for small ones like this drive. The construction of the device is designed to ensure the reliability and to minimize the possible damage during use. For the production high-quality components and materials will be used to make sure that this will be a quality product.

I appreciate the support of everyone, and I want to thank everyone for the help! Please share the link to my project with your friends, family, and anyone you knowso they would be able to get «Boomerang»!

story:
What does Thermoco do?  

Thermoco is a coin size smart gadget, it measures and records room, fridge, cooler, camping tent, body temperature and much more.

You can use your phone/pod/pad talk to it in real time. See current temperature, history temperature. Works on iOS, Android platforms.

Why Thermoco?  

1. Miniature size and versatile.

2. Smart wireless with your cell phone.

3. Record temperature for the past days.

How it works?

1. Put Thermoco where you want to measure and record temperature.

2. Run free Thermoco app from your iPhone / iPod, Android phone / Pad.

3. Read temperature in digits, charts.

 Additional Notes

Your feedback will help us and your support will enable us to reach our goals. Please support our campaign and spread the word!

If you’d like to know more about Thermoco, please feel free to reach out anytime at support@ksolution.org.
