story:
Hi, I am Josh Entner and I am excited to share the story of AvaTwist with you!!!  I am extremely outgoing and will talk, comment, or share on any topic-- no matter how taboo.  I often share my professional experiences and other stories about my life, however, when it comes to my personal information and family, I am VERY private.  Like most people, I use the web all the time for both work and fun.  One day I was looking for some sports stuff and noticed the advertisements were following me everywhere.

I thought to myself: no big deal it is advertising, but when they started recommending places in my town and surrounding towns I began to wonder  “how do they know that”,  not even knowing for sure who “THEY” are...LOL

After talking with a few people who understand the web and technology, I realized that it was actually something that I had NO control over.  I was not happy for being such a fool and completely in the dark about how the internet operates. 

Bottom line, I decided that I disagreed with this and wanted to figure out what to do to protect my privacy.  I had no idea where to begin, but I knew that if I was this upset, others would be too when they realize how vulnerable their personal information and privacy is in their daily web use.  I asked around and quickly realized that many others share my concerns about our information being saved FOREVER on a server somewhere, with a connection back to us and all of our personal information.

 

I used my contacts and other resources to arrange a few lunches to present to them and about 500 additional people the concept and logic behind AvaTwist; the response was amazing, and as a matter of fact, many of them including several law and accounting firms are working for almost nothing to help get this off the ground.  I figured that is a great start, and proceeded to ask a few talented people whom I am connected with to join me on this venture, and that is how AvaTwist began!  I have pretty good contacts with a vast array of skills, and have been able to accomplish quite a bit with my own money and their expertise.   

I had this really cool idea for a name; AvaTwist. This means Avatar with a twist-- Avatar meaning your alter ego, and Twist meaning changing your IP address. I had lawyers trademark three things to help us maintain our tag lines and company name. We trademarked “AvaTwist”, our marketing slogan: “Who do U want to be today", and our pitch phrase which includes our new word “ForNEVER” (meaning it never happened).

This all happened before the summer, and I was afraid to tell anyone that I didn't know about my idea because I thought someone might steal it. Finally, in August after we built the first version of our website, I realized I have no reason to be afraid. I just need to put it out there. I am a big believer in the power of intention. Anyone not familiar with it; the basic premise is you put yourself out there openly and the things you need will come to you. That is exactly what has happened. I connected with a few people who joined the team and they have given me incredible insight into the technology and a much better understanding of the Internet.

We were in the process of getting the website and desktop version of AvaTwist built when we had a discussion about how the world is going wireless and mobile. We determined that in order to cover all our bases we needed to have a mobile App available as soon as possible after our desktop version. That brings us to where we are today. I had known about Indiegogo but again was afraid of telling too many people, but I quickly realized it is a perfect fit for my project, building the App for AvaTwist. I do not mind competition because it just validates our concept even more. Additionally, we are working on other ideas for the future that should keep us ahead of any potential competitors.

The end result of this tracking is that now I have lost some of my personal freedoms, because now the advertisers bombard me with the information that they think I am interested in. I get the feeling sometimes that my internet surfing becomes one big infomercial for some product a marketer thinks I want. I figured out how to answer my question of “How can I prevent them from knowing who I am AND where I am”. Once I found that answer I came up with the idea for AvaTwist.

Ok so that is how I started AvaTwist . Now let us talk about what AvaTwist is all about. The Internet used to be a one way communication where we would go to a site and get information, but things have changed big time. Now the sites we visit are now connecting to us and building a profile and SAVING EVERYTHING!!!  To me, being tracked is not something I want or think is very ethical. The two things that I really do not like are when my PERSONAL INFORMATION is sold, and that EVERYTHING IS SAVED FOREVER!! Even if you think you deleted something, it is saved somewhere on the web and tied back to U!! Think of what it will be like in 20 years if we continue giving away all of our information online and our whole life story is there for the WORLD to see.

 

So here are some general things I have learned about the Internet: I learned every Internet connection has a specific IP address that allows your Internet Service Provider (ISP) and anyone else with the right software to know your exact location. They then cross check this information with other records to find out the names of the individuals in the house or the name of the business. There are many other ways we are being tracked on the internet, anytime you put in your email address, every time you click on the “I agree” button or answer a question about your hair color, eye color, street address etc. With this information your service provider or any marketer now knows you and where you surf; and they keep track of it. If that isn't bad enough, here is where it gets scarier, the number of entities that are tracking you by the time you have gone to 4 or 5 different websites is now somewhere between 100 and 150. Then they take all the information that they have gathered from your searching habits and turn around and sell it to anyone who is interested in buying it. Worse, there are companies that combine the information from many marketers to get a better picture of you, which is then sold for more money. This is all LEGAL; never mind the companies and people that are illegally stealing your personal information!!

We have patent pending technology that combines two things we believe no one else has ever done before. We “twist” you, changing your IP address (where you are physically) and then mask the real U using Avatars. This also makes it fun because you can be someone else, and deep down we all want to be someone or something we are not.

 You can have as many Avatars as you want.  In early beta testing my friend Brittni uses three Avatars; one for her friends and family to connect with her to share pictures and other things she doesn't want to share with the rest of the WORLD as Brittni.   The second one is for her to be whomever she wants to be and NO ONE knows who she is.   The third one is an Avatar of herself…. Brittni, so she can use Social Media and other types of Online services to stay connected with her business contacts and to reconnect with people from her past. 

 The big key to our success is ease of use. Our user interface is simple and easy to use, if it was complex like our back-end software, then no one would use it. We have developed a simple two step process to get “Twisted” and choose your “Avatar”. To me, this will be a big difference in how successful we are. We really think there is a need for our product but if it is hard to use people will just continue business as usual.

 If you have read this far then I recommend watching our really cool video for more on AvaTwist, or checking out our website www.avatwist.com .  I am really enthusiastic about this project and am willing to talk with anyone who has any questions or wants to learn more. I can be reached via email or by phone Here.   I hope you consider participating in our project and look forward to seeing what you think of AVATWIST!!

Reasons someone would use AvaTwist:

1) Tracking Prevention: 

It is a fact that everywhere you go on the internet is being tracked, saved and sold!!!!   Are you sick of it? I know we are!!!!

2) Private Surfing: 

We have all visited websites privately that we don’t want to share with others; Avatwist makes sure it stays private.

3) Identity Protection: 

When you want to protect your identity from predators and identity thieves.

4) On-Line Dating: 

You want to try out on-line dating, but you are a little nervous about it, no worries here, visit the sites you want and they won’t know it’s you.

5) Job Search: 

Searching for a new job when you are currently employed. What would your boss do if he/she found out you were searching for a new job on your lunch hour?

6) Personal Issues:

To investigate items of an extremely personal nature that you do not wish to share with others.

7) Famous People: 

Are you a Celebrity? A Politician? Or a Professional Athlete? Either way you have a following!!   You just want to access the internet in private without worrying that someone is watching every site you visit and every product you look at.

8) Personal Beliefs:

 Do you want to express your political or religious beliefs to the world without offending your close family ties? Use your Avatar and have at it, no one will know it is you!

9) Business Applications:

 You want to price shop the competition, without the competition knowing it’s you!

10) Competitive Analysis:

 When you are in business you want to make sure you are always at the top of your game. You can do that by comparing many things about your organization with the information you can find out about your competitors on their websites. You just want to do it privately.

11) Anonymous Browsing:

You went shopping for a new car, bicycle, or a motorcycle (insert product here), and now every site you visit has a Pop Up ad for new cars, bicycles, and motorcycles (or whatever products you were looking at). We can fix that!!!!

12) Enjoyment:

Because I want to and it’s fun!!!

13) Gaming: 

Have your gaming Avatar coincide with your AvaTwist Avatar and be the Goblin of the virtual and online worlds!!!

14) Good Parenting: 

We all want to protect our child’s online identity and location from would be predators.

15) Secret Shopping:

 Have you ever visited sites that you don’t want others to know you visited (shopping for a surprise birthday present for a loved one)?

16) Anonymous Window Shopping: 

17) Freedom to be You:

 When you don’t want your usage characteristics sold to other companies.

18) Speak Your Mind: 

There are many things going on in the world today that you want to blog about, but you want to do it anonymously. We can help with that.
story_txt:
Hi, I am Josh Entner and I am excited to share the story of AvaTwist with you!!!  I am extremely outgoing and will talk, comment, or share on any topic-- no matter how taboo.  I often share my professional experiences and other stories about my life, however, when it comes to my personal information and family, I am VERY private.  Like most people, I use the web all the time for both work and fun.  One day I was looking for some sports stuff and noticed the advertisements were following me everywhere.


I thought to myself: no big deal it is advertising, but when they started recommending places in my town and surrounding towns I began to wonder  “how do they know that”,  not even knowing for sure who “THEY” are...LOL

After talking with a few people who understand the web and technology, I realized that it was actually something that I had NO control over.  I was not happy for being such a fool and completely in the dark about how the internet operates. 
Bottom line, I decided that I disagreed with this and wanted to figure out what to do to protect my privacy.  I had no idea where to begin, but I knew that if I was this upset, others would be too when they realize how vulnerable their personal information and privacy is in their daily web use.  I asked around and quickly realized that many others share my concerns about our information being saved FOREVER on a server somewhere, with a connection back to us and all of our personal information.
 
I used my contacts and other resources to arrange a few lunches to present to them and about 500 additional people the concept and logic behind AvaTwist; the response was amazing, and as a matter of fact, many of them including several law and accounting firms are working for almost nothing to help get this off the ground.  I figured that is a great start, and proceeded to ask a few talented people whom I am connected with to join me on this venture, and that is how AvaTwist began!  I have pretty good contacts with a vast array of skills, and have been able to accomplish quite a bit with my own money and their expertise.   

I had this really cool idea for a name; AvaTwist. This means Avatar with a twist-- Avatar meaning your alter ego, and Twist meaning changing your IP address. I had lawyers trademark three things to help us maintain our tag lines and company name. We trademarked “AvaTwist”, our marketing slogan: “Who do U want to be today", and our pitch phrase which includes our new word “ForNEVER” (meaning it never happened).

This all happened before the summer, and I was afraid to tell anyone that I didn't know about my idea because I thought someone might steal it. Finally, in August after we built the first version of our website, I realized I have no reason to be afraid. I just need to put it out there. I am a big believer in the power of intention. Anyone not familiar with it; the basic premise is you put yourself out there openly and the things you need will come to you. That is exactly what has happened. I connected with a few people who joined the team and they have given me incredible insight into the technology and a much better understanding of the Internet.

We were in the process of getting the website and desktop version of AvaTwist built when we had a discussion about how the world is going wireless and mobile. We determined that in order to cover all our bases we needed to have a mobile App available as soon as possible after our desktop version. That brings us to where we are today. I had known about Indiegogo but again was afraid of telling too many people, but I quickly realized it is a perfect fit for my project, building the App for AvaTwist. I do not mind competition because it just validates our concept even more. Additionally, we are working on other ideas for the future that should keep us ahead of any potential competitors.

The end result of this tracking is that now I have lost some of my personal freedoms, because now the advertisers bombard me with the information that they think I am interested in. I get the feeling sometimes that my internet surfing becomes one big infomercial for some product a marketer thinks I want. I figured out how to answer my question of “How can I prevent them from knowing who I am AND where I am”. Once I found that answer I came up with the idea for AvaTwist.

Ok so that is how I started AvaTwist . Now let us talk about what AvaTwist is all about. The Internet used to be a one way communication where we would go to a site and get information, but things have changed big time. Now the sites we visit are now connecting to us and building a profile and SAVING EVERYTHING!!!  To me, being tracked is not something I want or think is very ethical. The two things that I really do not like are when my PERSONAL INFORMATION is sold, and that EVERYTHING IS SAVED FOREVER!! Even if you think you deleted something, it is saved somewhere on the web and tied back to U!! Think of what it will be like in 20 years if we continue giving away all of our information online and our whole life story is there for the WORLD to see.
 
So here are some general things I have learned about the Internet: I learned every Internet connection has a specific IP address that allows your Internet Service Provider (ISP) and anyone else with the right software to know your exact location. They then cross check this information with other records to find out the names of the individuals in the house or the name of the business. There are many other ways we are being tracked on the internet, anytime you put in your email address, every time you click on the “I agree” button or answer a question about your hair color, eye color, street address etc. With this information your service provider or any marketer now knows you and where you surf; and they keep track of it. If that isn't bad enough, here is where it gets scarier, the number of entities that are tracking you by the time you have gone to 4 or 5 different websites is now somewhere between 100 and 150. Then they take all the information that they have gathered from your searching habits and turn around and sell it to anyone who is interested in buying it. Worse, there are companies that combine the information from many marketers to get a better picture of you, which is then sold for more money. This is all LEGAL; never mind the companies and people that are illegally stealing your personal information!!
We have patent pending technology that combines two things we believe no one else has ever done before. We “twist” you, changing your IP address (where you are physically) and then mask the real U using Avatars. This also makes it fun because you can be someone else, and deep down we all want to be someone or something we are not.

 You can have as many Avatars as you want.  In early beta testing my friend Brittni uses three Avatars; one for her friends and family to connect with her to share pictures and other things she doesn't want to share with the rest of the WORLD as Brittni.   The second one is for her to be whomever she wants to be and NO ONE knows who she is.   The third one is an Avatar of herself…. Brittni, so she can use Social Media and other types of Online services to stay connected with her business contacts and to reconnect with people from her past. 

 The big key to our success is ease of use. Our user interface is simple and easy to use, if it was complex like our back-end software, then no one would use it. We have developed a simple two step process to get “Twisted” and choose your “Avatar”. To me, this will be a big difference in how successful we are. We really think there is a need for our product but if it is hard to use people will just continue business as usual.

 If you have read this far then I recommend watching our really cool video for more on AvaTwist, or checking out our website www.avatwist.com .  I am really enthusiastic about this project and am willing to talk with anyone who has any questions or wants to learn more. I can be reached via email or by phone Here.   I hope you consider participating in our project and look forward to seeing what you think of AVATWIST!!
Reasons someone would use AvaTwist:
1) Tracking Prevention: 
It is a fact that everywhere you go on the internet is being tracked, saved and sold!!!!   Are you sick of it? I know we are!!!!
2) Private Surfing: 
We have all visited websites privately that we don’t want to share with others; Avatwist makes sure it stays private.
3) Identity Protection: 
When you want to protect your identity from predators and identity thieves.
4) On-Line Dating: 
You want to try out on-line dating, but you are a little nervous about it, no worries here, visit the sites you want and they won’t know it’s you.
5) Job Search: 
Searching for a new job when you are currently employed. What would your boss do if he/she found out you were searching for a new job on your lunch hour?
6) Personal Issues:
To investigate items of an extremely personal nature that you do not wish to share with others.
7) Famous People: 
Are you a Celebrity? A Politician? Or a Professional Athlete? Either way you have a following!!   You just want to access the internet in private without worrying that someone is watching every site you visit and every product you look at.
8) Personal Beliefs:
 Do you want to express your political or religious beliefs to the world without offending your close family ties? Use your Avatar and have at it, no one will know it is you!
9) Business Applications:
 You want to price shop the competition, without the competition knowing it’s you!
10) Competitive Analysis:
 When you are in business you want to make sure you are always at the top of your game. You can do that by comparing many things about your organization with the information you can find out about your competitors on their websites. You just want to do it privately.
11) Anonymous Browsing:
You went shopping for a new car, bicycle, or a motorcycle (insert product here), and now every site you visit has a Pop Up ad for new cars, bicycles, and motorcycles (or whatever products you were looking at). We can fix that!!!!
12) Enjoyment:
Because I want to and it’s fun!!!
13) Gaming: 
Have your gaming Avatar coincide with your AvaTwist Avatar and be the Goblin of the virtual and online worlds!!!
14) Good Parenting: 
We all want to protect our child’s online identity and location from would be predators.
15) Secret Shopping:
 Have you ever visited sites that you don’t want others to know you visited (shopping for a surprise birthday present for a loved one)?
16) Anonymous Window Shopping: 
17) Freedom to be You:
 When you don’t want your usage characteristics sold to other companies.
18) Speak Your Mind: 
There are many things going on in the world today that you want to blog about, but you want to do it anonymously. We can help with that.

story:
Stylish LED Lamp,Universal Charging Dock for Lightning/iPhone, USB-C and Micro USB Smart Phones 

Unique and different from any other lamp on the market with our exclusive universal cell phone charging dock, LumiCharge II (patent pending) introduces Qi wireless fast-charging pad and optional smartwatch charging attachment.

Most Multi Functional Desk Lamp : Home, Bedtime Reading, Office, Homework, Home Decor

Packed with cool practical features whether you're working at your desk, reading at bedtime, or in the kitchen - illuminate your decor with the best multi functional desk lamp on the planet!

Turn the dial and charge any Phone on the Universal Dock !!!

Built-in universal charging dock works with Lightning, USB-C, Micro USB - covering every major phone on the planet!  Simple, clever, intuitive design.LED display shows time, date, day of the week, and temperature, so you’re prepared for your day.  Built-in alarm clock means you’re always ready for your next meeting or appointment. 

"Swiss Army Knife" of Desk Lamps : LumiCharge II

 

Media Mentions

First Look of LumiCharge II at CES 2019 !!!

We all know how cool CES is with techies, investors, media and consumer tech enthusiasts from all over the world gathering to witness all the great products.

We had a blast at CES 2019 Eureka Park in Las Vegas, showcasing LumiCharge II to the world for a first look. Overwhelming response and recognition of LumiCharge II at CES validated that we are on the right track and taking the right steps.

 

 

Testimonials from our GEN 1 customers

​LumiCharge II -- Your All-in-One LED Desk Lamp For Home and Office

Compatible with all mobile phones, the LumiCharge II strikes the right balance between form and function.  Thanks to its modern and sleek design it's the perfect addition to any household or office.

 

Timeline Info for LumiCharge II

Journey of LumiCharge II

Two years ago we launched our successful first campaign on Indiegogo and have been humbled by all the support and positive feedback from our backers.

In early 2018 we launched our e-commerce store and since that time we have shipped several thousand first generation LumiCharge across the world.

Continually striving for excellence, we listened to our customers' feedback for product improvements and incorporated them into LumiCharge II.

At the January 2019 Consumer Electronics Show (CES) Eureka Park in Las Vegas, the LumiCharge II team received extraordinary recognition and support at our booth.

All tooling is complete and third party certifications are complete.  We're on track and ready to start production immediately.

CE, FCC and Qi (WPC) testing completed for LumiCharge II

We already have certification for CE, FCC and Qi, and are right on target to fulfill orders.

Meet the Team behind LumiCharge II

The LumiCharge team has over three decades of experience with Engineering Design and Manufacturing in the US and Asia.

Our team has been perfecting the LumiCharge for nearly a year and a half and we can't wait to bring an excellent product to the market.

Balaji Raghunathan
Product creator with close to 20 years experience in electronics and telecommunication product manufacturing.  Avid tennis player and family man, he probably gets more exercise running after his 2 kids than on the courts!

Francois Lindsay
Engineering Manager, Mechanical Design Team USA.  Francois has 3 decades of engineering & tool design experience.  Oversees the mechanical design team for LumiCharge and other products in the pipeline.

Chin Hs
Project and Product Management Asia. Chin has vast experience in managing production and project management. Has been General Manager for factory with 500+ employees and has taken several product designs to market.

Sam Ong
Technical Sales team in Asia.  Sam brings with him extensive sales experience & knowledge.

Andy H

Shipping and Logistics Manager with a decade of experience in Global shipping. Works closely with all freight carriers and logistics aspects to ensure smooth fulfillment to our backers.

Learn More About the LumiCharge II

Youtube, Twitter, Instagram,Pinterest,Facebook and more...!!!

story:
Introducing Pixlplay.  Turn your old or current smartphone into a fun kids' camera!

It’s easy – simply place your Apple or Android device into Pixlplay to take photos and create fun effects with the included activities and app. Pixlplay protects your device and encourages active and creativity play through photography!

    What's in the box?

    • Pixlplay Camera
    • Wrist Strap
    • Sticker Sheet
    • 2 x Activity Sheets

    Includes an iOS app featuring:

    • Simple design to explore, play and create through photography
    • Edit your photos with stickers including hats, mustache, glasses, ears, wigs and more! 
    • Add silly faces and frames to your photos including mustache, hats, wigs and more!  
    • Light bulb photo activity generator
    • No advertising!
    • Requires iOS 8 and up.

    ❤️ Note for Android & Windows users: Pixlplay is compatible with all Android & Windows camera apps

    App mock-up

     

    Plug in the 3.5mm Headphone Jack to Operate the Shutter Button

    Pixlplay works with most standard size smartphones including:

    • iPhone 7, 6s, 6, 5, SE, 5s, 5c, 4, 4s and iPod Touch
    • Most Android phones including Samsung S7, S6, S5, Google Pixel (See FAQs for full list)
    • Comparable sized smartphones with a maximum dimensions of 5.59 x 2.91 x 0.374 inches (142 x 74 x 9.5 mm)

    Note: iPhone 7 requires the Lightning to 3.5mm Headphone Jack Adapter included with your device to work the shutter button (optional). Some Android phones require setting up the camera shutter to be controlled by the volume button.  Also works with Windows mobile devices.


    Let's make use of all those smartphones!

    At this point, most families have an old smartphone (or two!) sitting in a junk drawer somewhere. Let’s get those smartphones into the hands of kids in a way that encourages photography and active play.

    Smartphones have made photography a normal part of our daily life. Smartphones have become the gateway into photography for very young kids as well. Kids are eager to shoot their own photos and play with images. Pixlplay teaches photography while safely containing your phone.

     

    Why Pixlplay? 

    • EASY to use! Almost no learning curve since kids and parents already know how to use the smartphone camera! 
    • Helps PROTECT your phone. It is durable, dirtproof and features rubber grips for those little hands. Protective screen allows you to still access the smartphone screen as you normally would (including slots for the home button and rear camera - for most phone sizes). 
    • Encourages ACTIVE play. Kids immediately want to take photos in the real world when they play with the Pixlplay camera.
    • Encourages CREATIVE play and TEACHES PHOTOGRAPHY with included activities.
    • QUALITY images and LED screen on your smartphone will take substantially better photographs than digital toy cameras on the market!
    • Includes companion iOS app.  Also works with your existing camera app and any photography app available in the App or Google Play store.  If our stretch goals are successfully funded, Pixlplay will include activity cards, a sticker sheet and an Android app!

     

    It's ideal for…

    • Toddlers.  Pixlplay will be tested for kids ages 3+. Pixlplay helps protect your phone from your youngest of kids and the rubber handle helps improve dexterity and fine motor skills.
    • Ages 3-5. The working shutter button and knobs with clicking sound teach cause-effect connection and the included activities teach cognitive skills and creative expression.
    • Ages 6+. Photography is very popular among kids ages 6-9 and the Pixlplay™ activities teach kids about the fundamentals of photography.
    • Even adults! The classic 35mm camera design appeals to everyone! 

     

     

    Includes a Sticker Sheet

    Each Pixlplay camera will include a sticker sheet like the one pictured below so kids can decorate and personalize their camera.  

     

    Our Journey

    Our first design looked very much like a kids' toy. After several focus groups, we realized kids -- and parents -- want their toys to look more like the real thing! What resulted was a design that is both sophisticated and fun. It gives a nod back to the past with a classic 35mm look including film advance knobs while having a playful look to appeal to kids.

    Exterior Dimensions (at furthest points): 7 x 4.5 x 2.68 inches (179 x 115 x 68 mm) 

    Interior Dimensions (maximum outside phone dimensions): 

    • Largest = 5.59 x 2.91 x 0.374 inches (142 x 74 x 9.5 mm). 
    • Smallest = 4.54 x 2.31 x 0.26 inches (115.2 x 58.6 x 6.5 mm) 

     

     

     

     

    Our mission 

    Pixl Toys is on a mission to make toys that make use of the smartphone while encouraging creative and active play.  This is not about one toy. Our vision is to build a range of products that embrace the power of technology to inspire real-world play, teach problem solving and encourage creativity.  We are enthusiastic partners of your child’s learning journey and are keen to see them build a strong foundation in these important early years.  Our goal is to create a line of toys and companion apps that foster unique experiences for children.

     

    Help share the word! 

     

    Please support us and claim a perk!

    Please join us by supporting Pixlplay or sharing this page with your friends and family.
    With support from someone like you - who appreciates big ideas with a lot of heart, we can make use of all those old phones and get them into the hands of kids to actively explore the world.Any help will be appreciated forever! Thank YOU!

    Pixl Toys

    Risks and challenges

    We have self financed all the development to date and have been working hard to perfect Pixlplay. Design, packaging, prototyping and app UI/ UX is done and we are eager to proceed to manufacturing, which is why we need your help. We have a reputed manufacturer with over 35 years experience in the toy industry and have scheduled the manufacturing. With your help we can finish tooling, safety certification and manufacturing.

    While we do not anticipate any major issues, the major challenges that lie ahead are related to manufacturing, logistics and app development if we meet our stretch goals.

    There may be slight variations in the shape and colors based on our transition from the prototypes used in the photos and video to the final manufactured product. 
    There may be changes to the final dimensions or specifications of some of the parts as we optimize the design for production and / or adhere to standards. 
    There is the possibility that the delivery of the product to our contributors may be delayed due to unforeseen product changes that require additional development or addition to the scope of our manufacturing timeline. 
    There is the possibility that the delivery of the product to our contributors may be delayed due to unforeseen circumstances in international shipping and logistics. 
    Shipments may be subject to import duties and other local taxes.

    If there are any changes to Pixlplay, we will communicate these changes to our contributors in a timely manner.

    Pixlplay logo TM & © 2017 Pixl Toys, Inc. All rights reserved. Patent Pending.

With your help we can finish tooling, safety certification and manufacturing.While we do not anticipate any major issues, the major challenges that lie ahead are related to manufacturing, logistics and app development if we meet our stretch goals.There may be slight variations in the shape and colors based on our transition from the prototypes used in the photos and video to the final manufactured product. There may be changes to the final dimensions or specifications of some of the parts as we optimize the design for production and / or adhere to standards. There is the possibility that the delivery of the product to our contributors may be delayed due to unforeseen product changes that require additional development or addition to the scope of our manufacturing timeline. There is the possibility that the delivery of the product to our contributors may be delayed due to unforeseen circumstances in international shipping and logistics. Shipments may be subject to import duties and other local taxes.If there are any changes to Pixlplay, we will communicate these changes to our contributors in a timely manner.Pixlplay logo TM & © 2017 Pixl Toys, Inc. All rights reserved. Patent Pending.

story:
Stylish Storage & Wireless Charging

 

GAZE TRAY is the world’s first multi-device wireless charger incorporated into a stylish storage tray. With three lustrous finishes and multiple colors to choose from, it looks great sitting on your desk. You’ll stay powered up and connected with simultaneous charging of up to 5 separate devices.

 

In our modern smart lifestyle, convenience and neatness are the name of the game. Yet the more useful devices we collect, the messier our work and living spaces become.

 

With GAZE TRAY, your space stays smart and neat

 

GAZE TRAY : multi-device wireless charger + storage + aesthetics
 

 

5 Charging Options in 1 Tray

  • Phone charging platform (Qi standard)
  • Apple Watch charger (Magnetic charger)
  • AirPod charger (Qi standard)
  • Free AirPod charging case (For AirPod 1)
  • 2 USB ports (For your wired devices)

 

 

Peace of Mind, Wire-Free

Know at a glance whether your smartphone is charging properly or not. 3 LED status indicators are adopted to indicate smartphone charging status only. It is also color-coded to let you know if your smartphone needs to be repositioned.

  • Blue light : Standby   
  • Green light : Charging 
  • Red light : Misplaced   

 

 

 

Made & Designed For Apple Products

 

GAZE TRAY was made especially with Apple devices in mind. The Apple Watch and AirPod wireless chargers have contours sized to perfectly cradle each one. We even supply a free AirPod charging case, for your 1st Gen AirPods.

The phone platform easily fits an iPhone XS Max, but will also wirelessly charge any Qi-certified device. And we carefully chose the tray colors to look great with the most popular Apple phone cases.

 

 

Beautiful and Practical Catchall Storage

 

It’s not all about the chargers. Keep any accessories organized in a 264 cm² storage tray, alongside your treasured devices. Perfect for your sunglasses, car key, wallet and more! And GAZE TRAY is smaller than a sheet of paper, making it easy to take with you and go.

 

 

9 Elegant Finish & Color Combinations

GAZE TRAY Classic (Artificial Leather)

  • Black
  • Midnight Blue
  • Gray
  • Brown

GAZE TRAY Standard (Matte Rubber-Coated)

  • Pure White
  • Pale Pink
  • Forest Green
  • Midnight Blue

GAZE TRAY Gold (Chrome-Coated)

  • Gold Chrome

 

 

Pack and carry GAZE TRAY with ease, 

It weighs only 450g

 

 

 

The best partner anywhere you go

 

 

 

Specification

 

 

 

Rewards

 

You can order the following perk / color combinations:

 

GAZE TRAY Rewards

 

GAZE TRAY LIGHT Rewards

 

 

* GAZE TRAY Gold is not available for the Duo Pack rewards.

* If you don't use airpods, you can use airpods charging area as storage section. We just added a special perk - GAZE TRAY ONLY - which doesn't include additional airpods wireless charging case for that case.

* Android phone users also can use GAZE TRAY as above.

* Airpods2 with Apple's official Wireless charging case is also compatible with GAZE TRAY.

 

 

Our Story

 

In 2016, Gaze Lab launched the Gaze Desk, the smartest standing desk ever. The ingenious combination of premium hardwoods, ergonomic design and smart IFTTT-enabled technology, propelled the project to raise over $150,000 on Kickstarter. This makes it one of the top four sit-stand desks in Kickstarter history and the company continues to sell the Gaze Desk at its Gaze Store outlets in Korea and internationally on the IndieGogo Marketplace. In 2018, Gaze Lab returned with the GiiroMat and Giiro Posturebot, two posturetech products designed to make it safer and more enjoyable to spend the day standing at a desk.


Now, Gaze Lab is launching the GAZE TRAY, the world’s first wireless charging storage solution that can charge up to five devices at the same time. And it looks phenomenal.

 

 

Rock-Solid Track Record 

 

 

 

Gaze Lab CEO Juyoun Lee has 13 years of experience in the tech field, including 8 years at Samsung. The 30-person strong Gaze Lab team has launched two successful Kickstarter campaigns, is currently selling three products on the Indiegogo Marketplace, and sells multiple products on Amazon and in Korean retail outlets - GAZESHOP.

We have tons of experience manufacturing and delivering great products. Back now, risk-free.

Meet The Team

 

 

Now, we are shipping

 

GAZE TRAY classic version started shipping from first week of June. GAZE TRAY basic version will be started shipping from first week of July. Thank you for your patient support. 

 

Follow, Like & Share 

Whether you’re already a backer or just interested, we’d love to hear from you. And don’t forget to spread the word on social media. Every mention helps!

 

Hashtags:

#GazeTray

#GazeLab

#WirelessCharger
 

Share a snapshot with your Apple fan friends!

Let your friends and family know what gift you’d love to receive!

 

Are you a journalist or a blogger? Feel free to use any of the materials from our press kit.

http://bit.ly/gazetray_media


If you’d like to ask us a question, please email us at igg@gaze-lab.com

story:
Got swimming pool? 

Turn on the pool lights and heat the water up from the comfort of your couch.

Going on a holiday? 

Make sure everyone will think you are at home, turn lights on and off whenever you want.

Feeding your fish?

Setup the feeding, oxygenation and cleaning of your aquarium anytime you want..

Visiting your cottage?

Make sure its warm enough before you arrive, turn the heater on from your home.

Christmas lights lover?

Become the boss of your neighborhood and create amazing lights display.



What is VixPlug?

VixPlug combines a double or quadruple power strip with an easy-to-use mobile app to fully automate all your home appliances - including lights, security systems and kitchen appliances - from your tablet or smartphone .

Never come home to a dark house again!

Imagine coming home to a brightly-lit house, at the perfect temperature, with your favorite music playing and wonderful aroma of dinner cooking in the oven! When you plug your appliance into the VixPlug, you can use your tablet or smartphone to wirelessly control that appliance from within the house, or even remotely over the internet from anywhere.You can turn on your security lighting, thermostat, music system and oven before you leave the office so dinner can be ready when you get home!

Design your own interface!

The VixPlug interface is fully customizable, allowing you to design your level of control; from a simple photo of the appliance that anyone can use, right up to complex designs for the more technologically-minded.

 What makes VixPlug so great?
  • You can control any appliance wirelessly, via the Internet any time you are connected.
  • You can create your own interface very easily. Take a picture of an appliance on your tablet or smartphone camera, select any object in that picture and set up the interface to control it. There are no limits to your creativity.
  • User friendly controls. Anyone can use our product, whether young, old, gadget geeks or technophobes - you decide the level of complexity.
  • Control each plug individually. Basic commercial power strips are controlled as a whole unit. With VixPlug, you can turn each one on and off separately.
  • Set a different timer for each plug, so you can program your oven to switch on for dinner and your coffee machine to switch on in the morning.
  • Reduce the cost of your gas and electricity bills by setting all non-necessary appliances to turn off during the night.
  • You can choose EU or US standard outlet power strips.

Where do you come in?

At the moment, we have a completed and working VixPlug power strip prototype, and we've also got a first draft of the VixPlug product design ready to go - you can see our renders of this sleek design in this campaign.

Now the VixPlug is ready to move to production, and that's where we need your support to get this product into the marketplace. With your help, we can polish our prototype, optimize our production costs and start making some VixPlugs. 

If you can't contribute, you can still help us by:

  • Referring other people to our Indiegogo campaign using the link under the video above
  • Sharing our campaign on social media using the Indiegogo sharing tools
  • Visiting our social media pages - Facebook, Twitter, and Google+
  • Checking out the VixPlug website

Share our campaign with your family and friends! Send them your unique referral link just under our video. Everyone who clicks your link counts as a referral from you. Whoever refers the most people to our Indiegogo campaign wins a copy of the new Splinter Cell: Blacklist game.


And what will you get for each perk level? Here's a handy chart that tells you:

How it works

Create and customize your own interface

Take a photo or upload a picture into our free mobile app. Create interactive objects and buttons on this picture to control the appliances you've selected. Build up the level of complexity you're comfortable with, from beginner to expert.

Connect with your VixPlugs wirelessly

Plug any home appliances you want into the two- or four-outlet VixPlugs and then connect to those appliances via wi-fi to take full control of your home from the sofa, the office - anywhere! Each VixPlug has got its own internet connection, enabling you to control it from anywhere.

Control everything  

With wi-fi enabled VixPlugs you really can control anything you want from your unique interface. Plug in your devices and you're ready to go. Each VixPlug has got its own internet connection, enabling you to control it from anywhere.

VixPlug - the hardware

VixPlug is basically a power strip with the ability to connect to your router. More plugs allows you to connect multiple devices and create a network of controlled home appliances. Turn them on or off whenever you want, and wherever you are, from your iPad. With VixPlug you can even setup a timer for turning the device on and off, which gives you total control over your household electronics. Each VixPlug has got its own internet connection, enabling you to control it from anywhere.

Mobile app - the interface

With VixPlug, you can easily control your home devices through an interface that you design.

Create your own interface - you choose what graphics, buttons and controls you have - with no developer skills. All you need is MS PowerPoint, the mobile app and VixPlug. The interface is created as standard MS PowerPoint presentation, with selected objects as control buttons.

Control everything

Do you want to become a master of your home appliances? Then VixPlug is the product for you! With the simplest set-up, you can have your home appliances do whatever you want to do, to the amazement of friends and family! Here are just a few examples of what you can do:

 

Uses of the VixPlug

Interior and exterior lights
When you're going on holiday, use the timer function or VixPlug to turn on and off your lights and make it look like you're at home - or even control them from abroad via the Internet.

Pool
Turn on the pool lights and heat the water up from the comfort of your couch.

Garden parties
Amaze friends and neighbors by controlling the garden lights from your tablet or smartphone.

Presentations
For that big presentation to your team - imagine how impressed they'll be when you control the projector, lights or screen remotely.

Aquarium
Fish lover? Setup the feeding, oxygenation and cleaning of your aquarium anytime you want, from anywhere in the world.

Coffee machine
To get the best cup of morning joe, your coffeemaker needs to be preheated. Do it from the comfort of your bed and have great coffee ready when you get up.

Heater
Going to your holiday home for the winter? Turn your heater on with VixPlug to ensure a warm welcome.

Christmas decorations
Christmas is coming! Become the boss of your neighborhood and create the kind of amazing light displays you see on YouTube using the VixPlug.

Children
Kids and electricity don't mix. Ensure your appliances are safely switched off when not in use.

Mosquitoes
Power up your electric repellents to repel those pesky mosquitoes from your home before you get there to prevent itchy bites.

These are just some of the ways you can use your VixPlug. We can't wait to hear the creative ways you use yours!

 Technical specifications

  • Max. switching current (per plug):
    • 10A/250V AC
    • 10A/125V AC
  • Max. power consumption:
    • 3W
  • Wireless: 
    • Supported standards: 802.11b/g/n
    • Chipset: Atheros AR9331

What's next for us?

Our initial goal is to offer you an easy-to-use and affordable solution to controlling your home devices.

If you help us achieve this goal, we want to add more features to the mobile app to give you the ultimate tool for custom interface creation.

Another thing we'd like to do is set up an interface marketplace for users and creators of VixPlug interface. Too busy to create your own? Find one there. Created a cool one you want to share? Post your work on the marketplace and find your customers.

Do you want to use VixPlug with your custom applications? For developers, we provide API documentation and libraries for all the most popular platforms. With these libraries, you can easily implement the functionality to control your VixPlug from your application.

Project timeline

About us

ViXperience has recently set up offices in Delaware, USA. VixPerience is a subsidiary of the Matsuko company, which as a head office in Bratislava, Slovakia.

Matsuko is an international game and software development company. The company was founded in 2004 and provides a full range of IT and programming services, from computer game programming to mobile application development. You can learn more about our head company at the Matsuko website here.

Our team has more than twenty years of experience in designing and coding innovative IT solutions for large and smaller companies such as Ubisoft and Vivendi. Our experience in the computer games industry has taught us that clear, straightforward user interfaces are vital to engage customers in our products, and we've brought all of this user-centred thinking to the VixPlug. 

Special thanks

First of all, thank you! We are excited and hopefully you are too. We hope you will back our project and help us to make our dream come true.

Special thanks to a number of people that have been an enormous help:

- the whole VixPerience and Matsuko team - good job everyone!

- our patient product designer, Martin 

- our filmmaker and cameraman Peter for his great work

- our partners and friends for their feedback and help

- our families and closest ones for their love and understanding

But most of all thank you, our backers, for donating and making our dream come true!

Frequently asked questions

1. HOW MANY POWER STRIPS DO I NEED?

It really depends on your home and your needs. The more appliances you want to connect, the more power strips you need. VixPlug is made as two- or four-outlet power strips so you have more options.

2. DOES IT REPLACE MY CURRENT POWER STRIPS?

Not necessarily, but yes, you can have it always turned on and use it as a standard power strip.

3. CAN ANYONE SET UP VIXPLUG?

Absolutely. Plug it in, connect your wi-fi router and create your interface with mobile app and you're ready to go.

4. WHAT ARE THE SHIPPING COSTS?

If you're in the US, add an additional $5 to every perk level. If you're outside the US, add an additional $10 to every perk level. Shipping includes customs fees and any additional fees with your country. 

5. WHEN CAN I HAVE MY VIXPLUG?

The estimated delivery time for VixPlug is April 2014. Our goal is to ship our products earlier than that.

6. WHAT TYPE OF SMARTPHONE OR TABLET DO I NEED?

We already have a working iPad version of our mobile app, and when we reach our goal, we will make a mobile version for iOS and Android as well as a tablet version for Android. We're also looking into creating a Windows Phone version, but it depends on reaching our Indiegogo goal and customer demand.

7. HOW DO I CREATE MY OWN INTERFACE?

We've built a simple to use mobile app for customizing your interface. You just add objects and select each plug or all of them. You choose which object controls which plug.

8. DO I NEED WI-FI AND AN INTERNET CONNECTION?

Yes, you'll need an Internet connection to upload your interface to your mobile device. You'll also need wi-fi to connect your VixPlug power strip with the mobile app.

If you have any more questions, please do send them through to us - we're really excited about the VixPlug and want you to share our excitement!

Thanks for your support!

-- The ViXperience team

Not necessarily, but yes, you can have it always turned on and use it as a standard power strip.
3. CAN ANYONE SET UP VIXPLUG?
Absolutely. Plug it in, connect your wi-fi router and create your interface with mobile app and you're ready to go.
4. WHAT ARE THE SHIPPING COSTS?
If you're in the US, add an additional $5 to every perk level. If you're outside the US, add an additional $10 to every perk level. Shipping includes customs fees and any additional fees with your country. 
5. WHEN CAN I HAVE MY VIXPLUG?
The estimated delivery time for VixPlug is April 2014. Our goal is to ship our products earlier than that.
6. WHAT TYPE OF SMARTPHONE OR TABLET DO I NEED?
We already have a working iPad version of our mobile app, and when we reach our goal, we will make a mobile version for iOS and Android as well as a tablet version for Android. We're also looking into creating a Windows Phone version, but it depends on reaching our Indiegogo goal and customer demand.
7. HOW DO I CREATE MY OWN INTERFACE?
We've built a simple to use mobile app for customizing your interface. You just add objects and select each plug or all of them. You choose which object controls which plug.
8. DO I NEED WI-FI AND AN INTERNET CONNECTION?
Yes, you'll need an Internet connection to upload your interface to your mobile device. You'll also need wi-fi to connect your VixPlug power strip with the mobile app.
If you have any more questions, please do send them through to us - we're really excited about the VixPlug and want you to share our excitement!
Thanks for your support!
-- The ViXperience team

story:
Spanish

English

Sincrocam becomes available in IndieGoGo InDemand for a few days, by popular demand, for you arrived late and to help us improve the product and expand into new markets.

Take the opportunity to make your Sincrocam advantageously! It will not be for long!

Are already sending the first series and do not stop working to implement new features in the app through updates.

News:

Now Come the first pieces ready for anodizing!


Update:

How to Photograph 360º with Sincrocam:


Sample 360º: http://sincrocam.kietacam.com/360E/360E.html


What is Sincrocam?

Sincrocam is a very easy to use robotized slider, which will allow you to make video and Time-lapse panoramic camera movements of more than 360º simple and intuitive way.

Its compact design and cutting edge technology will enable you to film professional sequences and give a special touch to your multimedia creations.

It is easily assembled and disassembled in less than one minute. Place your camera and shoot!

Weighs just over 3kg (about 6,50 lb), it can be carried in a backpack and it is extremely versatile. Carry it anywhere you like and film what nobody has ever shot before


                               58cm x 11cm x 7 cm ( 22,85in x 4,33in x 2,75in )

Sincrocam is controlled via Bluetooth through an application for Android mobile devices (tablet or smartphone), which can be updated from Google Play for free. 


The graphic interface we have designed for this application is simple, intuitive and efficient, so that anybody can use it.



It can be used with digital  DSLR cameras, smartphones, mini-cameras, and  with some professional camcorders several kg in weight.




Sincrocam has been developed by Kietacam, a company from Barcelona with more than five years of experience in the audiovisual sector and pioneer in the development of low-cost professional video accessories.

It has been designed based on the experience of other high standard robot-assisted sliders like the XliderCAM-M.

All the creativity and innovation used in the Sincrocam design is aimed for providing solutions to the suggestions on this type of accessory given by a lot of professional and amateur video and Time-lapse users. We want it to be a really functional tool, both for video and Time-lapse work, useful, versatile, powerful, portable, easy to use, and also affordable for all professional and non-professional users.

Nowadays any audiovisual work, professional or not, requires travelling, panoramic movements, special effects, and more and more, Time-lapse to offer added value to your videos.

                          110cm x 11cm x 7cm ( 43,34in x 4,33in x 2,75in )

Sincrocam offers you the following possibilities for your audiovisual work:
  • Travelling movements with panoramic rotations of over 360 degrees.
  • Time-lapse with panoramic movements of over 360 degrees.
  • And many more features via software upgrade.

All of the above in the simplest way you can imagine and with the possibility of adding more features through the Sincrocam Android application updates, which you can download for free from Google Play.

What do we need and what can we offer you for your help?


Sincrocam has already been designed and tested, it is functional and we can manufacture it. However, we need your collaboration to finance the startup of the mass production, gathering a higher number of units in the first batches.

The first version of the software for Android is in its alpha phase, but we need resources to continue the development of the application, to add important features and to create a strong and secure code.

With your help we will achieve that any professional or non-professional has access to a tool of this level regardless of their purchasing power.

Our request is based on flexible funding, so, despite not getting our predicted funding target, we can produce all the required units and deliver them thanks to our manufacturing means available in Barcelona.


Specifications

  • Innovative traction system (Patent pending).
  • Two synchronized axes with panoramic rotation over 360 degrees.
  • Anodized aluminium and steel manufactured.
  • Collapsible for higher portability.
  • Size unfolded: 110cm x 11 cm x 7 cm. (43.34in x 4.33in x 2.75in)
  • Size folded: 58cm x 11 cm x 7cm. (22.85in x 4.33in x 2.75in)
  • Weight without legs: 3 Kg (6.50lb) approximately 
  • Functional for video.
  • Functional for Time-lapse with minimum speed of hundreds of hours/m.
  • Three anchorage points for tripod, one at each end and one in the center.
  • It can be used with a tripod in the center o with two tripods at the ends.
  • Auto-adjustable legs for uneven surfaces.
  • It can work invertedly, horizontally, vertically and in other angles.
  • The bed is provided with a thread for a standard video to install a ball-and-socket joint.
  • Shot control for Time-lapse controlled by Sincrocam.
  • Standard shot control cable for Sincrocam included (a specific manual shot control cable is required for each model of camera to add to the shot control cable supplied).
  • Programming by using wireless touch screen. Possibility of using other compatible devices such as smartphones or tablets.
  • Electric connection by supplied AC power cord 110V-240V, 50/60 Hz
  • Estimated average consumption 500mA/h.
  • Autonomous power by Sincrocam battery (optional) 4,600mA.
  • Hot battery replacement without stopping the Sincrocam.
  • Dimensions and weight in its carrying bag with accessories: 63x23x14 cm ( 24.80x9.06x5.51 in ) and 5,90Kg (12,90 lb) approx.

FAQ

1- Do you need any accessory to be able to use Sincrocam?

Sincrocam is supplied together with an AC power source inside a carrying bag, keeping it completely protected.
To be able to work with Sincrocam, you will need a ball-and-socket joint with a standard thread for video, and an optional battery with charger in case you want to feed it autonomously, also available here.
Of course, you will need your camera and, for Time-lapse, you will need a simple manual shot control cable for your specific model of camera (Similar to these http://www.cablematic.es/Cables-de-sincronizaci... )This one, together with the one we provide with Sincrocam, will let you use the shot controlled by the slider.

2- Can I carry accessories inside the Sincrocam bag?

Inside the supplied hard case there is enough room f, battery 4,600mA (optional),and its charger (optional). Everything fits tightly so that it is easy to carry.

3- Can I place Sincrocam on one or several tripods?

Of course, Sincrocam has practical legs to be supported directly on even or uneven surfaces. However, if you want to place it on tripods, there are two standard threads (3/8”) for video tripod, mechanical at the ends to fix two tripods, and another one on the central base supplied, to be used with one tripod only.
It is extremely practical to fix fast anchoring shoes Manfrotto 577 type (optional) or similar to facilitate the assembling and dismantling of the tripods.

4- Is it necessary to keep the touch screen connected to make a Time-lapse movement?

No, the tablet or Android smartphone is necessary to program movements in the electronics of Sincrocam, and once used, the touch screen can be disconnected, for example during a long Time-lapse. The built-in electronics in the Sincrocam controls it autonomously.


5- When making a Time-lapse, does the Sincrocam control the camera shot?

Yes, the Sincrocam slider controls the camera shot though a specific shot control cable for the model of camera used (not supplied; only the part connected to Sincrocam is supplied).


6- Can I feed Sincrocam with different types of batteries?

Sincrocam recommended specific battery packs we offer to ensure maximum performance of the team. As for security reasons.

Click here for a new question.



Spanish

English


Sincrocam vuelve a estar disponible en IndieGoGo InDemand durante unos días, a petición popular, para los que llegásteis tarde y para ayudarnos a mejorar el producto y expandir Sincrocam a nuevos mercados.

Aprovecha la ocasión para hacerte con tu Sincrocam de forma ventajosa! No será por mucho tiempo!

Ya se están enviando las primeras series y no paramos de trabajar para implementar nuevas funcionalidades en la app mediante actualizaciones.


Actualización 1:

Como hacer fotografías de 360º con Sincrocam:


Ejemplo de fotografía 360º: http://sincrocam.kietacam.com/360E/360E.html


Qué es Sincrocam?

Sincrocam es un slider robotizado muy fácil de usar que te permitirá realizar movimientos de cámara panorámicos de más de 360º para vídeo y Timelapse de forma sencilla e intuitiva.

Combina un diseño compacto con una tecnología vanguardista que te permitirá grabar secuencias profesionales y dar un toque especial a tus creaciones multimedia.

Se monta y desmonta fácilmente en menos de un minuto, colocas tu cámara y a grabar!

Pesa poco más de 3kg (6,50 lb)(aprox.), se puede transportar en una mochila y es extremadamente versátil. Llévalo donde quieras y graba lo que nadie ha grabado nunca.


  58cm x 11cm x 7 cm ( 22,85in x 4,33in x 2,75in )

Sincrocam se controla vía Bluetooth a través de una aplicación para dispositivos móviles Android (tablet o smartphone), actualizable desde Google Play y de forma gratuita. 

La interfaz gráfica que hemos diseñado para la aplicación es simple, intuitiva y eficiente para que cualquier persona pueda usarlo.


Puede usarse con cámaras digitales DSLR, smartphones, mini-cámaras y con algunas cámaras de vídeo profesionales de varios kilos de peso.




Sincrocam ha sido desarrollado por Kietacam, una empresa de Barcelona, con más de cinco años de experiencia en el sector audiovisual y pionera en el desarrollo de accesorios de vídeo profesionales, a bajo coste.

Diseñado en base a la experiencia de otros sliders motorizados de alto nivel cómo el XliderCAM-M.

Toda la creatividad e innovación empleada en el diseño de Sincrocam, tiene la finalidad de ofrecer solución a las sugerencias sobre este tipo de accesorio por parte de  multitud de profesionales y aficionados al vídeo y el Time-lapse: Que sea una herramienta realmente funcional, tanto para trabajos de vídeo cómo de Time-lapse, útil, versátil, potente, portable, fácil de usar y además, al alcance de todos los usuarios profesionales y no profesionales.

Hoy en día cualquier trabajo audiovisual profesional o no, requiere de trávelings, movimientos panorámicos, efectos especiales y cada vez más, de Time-lapse para dar valor añadido a tus vídeos.

                        110cm x 11cm x 7cm ( 43,34in x 4,33in x 2,75in )

Sincrocam te ofrece éstas posibilidades para tus trabajos audiovisuales:
  • Podrás realizar movimientos de traveling con giro panorámico de más de 360 grados.
  • Time-lapse con movimientos panorámicos de más de 360 grados.
  • Y otras funcionalidades especificas.

De la manera más sencilla que puedas imaginar y con la ventaja de poder añadir más prestaciones mediante las actualizaciones de la aplicación android de Sincrocam que puedes descargar tu mismo desde Google Play.

¿Qué necesitamos y qué te ofrecemos por tu ayuda?


Sincrocam ya está totalmente diseñado, testado, es funcional y podemos fabricarlo, sin embargo necesitamos de tu colaboración para poder financiar la puesta en marcha de la producción en serie, agrupando un mayor número de unidades en los primeros lotes de fabricación.
La primera versión del software para Android está en fase Alfa pero necesitamos recursos para seguir desarrollando la aplicación, añadir funcionalidades importantes y hacer un código seguro y robusto.

Con tu ayuda podemos conseguir que cualquier profesional o no profesional tenga acceso a una herramienta de éste nivel, independientemente de su poder adquisitivo.

Nuestra solicitud se basa en financiación flexible, por lo que aunque no alcancemos la meta de financiación prevista, podemos fabricar todas las unidades solicitadas y entregarlas gracias a los medios productivos de que ya disponemos en Barcelona.


Características técnicas

  • Innovador sistema de tracción (Patend pending).
  • Dos ejes sincronizados, con giro panoramico de más de 360 grados.
  • Fabricado en aluminio anodizado y acero.
  • Plegable para una total portabilidad.
  • Dimensiones del cuerpo sin plegar 110cm x 11 cm x 7 cm. (43,34in x 4,33in x 2,75in)
  • Dimensiones del cuerpo plegado 58cm x 11 cm x 7cm. (22,85in x 4,33in x 2,75in)
  • Peso del cuerpo sin patas, 3 Kg (6,50lb) aproximadamente.
  • Funcional para vídeo.
  • Funcional para timelapse con velocidad mínima de cientos de horas/m.
  • Dispone de tres puntos de anclaje para trípode, dos en los extremos y uno en el centro.
  • Puede utilizarse con un trípode en el centro o con dos tripodes en los extremos.
  • Dispone de patas autoajustables para situarlo en superficies irregulares.
  • Puede trabajar incluso invertido, en horizontal, vertical y otros ángulos.
  • La bancada dispone de rosca de video standard para instalar una rótula (no incluida).
  • Control de disparo para Time-lapse controlado por el Sincrocam.
  • Cable disparador standard para Sincrocam incluido (se requiere de un cable disparador manual específico para cada modelo de cámara para completar el cable de disparo suministrado).
  • Programación y uso mediante pantalla táctil inalámbrica. Posibilidad de utilizar otros dispositivos como smartphones o táblets compatibles.
  • Conexión eléctrica mediante alimentador suministrado 110Vac a 240 Vac 50/60 Hz
  • Consumo medio aproximado de 500 mA/h
  • Alimentación autónoma mediante batería Sincrocam (opcional) de 4.600 mA
  • Cambio de batería en caliente sin detener el Sincrocam.
  • Dimensiones y peso embalado en su bolsa con accesorios aprox: 63x23x14 cm ( 24,80x9,06x5,51 in ) y aprox. 5,90Kg (12,90 lb)

FAQ

1- ¿Se necesita de algún accesorio para poder usar Sincrocam?

Sincrocam se suministra junto con una fuente de alimentación para la red y dentro de una bolsa para su transporte, donde queda perfectamente protegido.

Para trabajar con Sincrocam, necesitarás una rótula con rosca standard de vídeo, y si necesitas alimentarlo de forma autónoma, una batería opcional con su cargador que tambien puedes adquirir aquí.

Por supuesto necesitarás tu cámara, y para Time-lapse, necesitarás un cable disparador especifico de tu cámara (similares a estos: http://www.cablematic.es/Cables-de-sincronizaci... ), con tu cable compatible unido al que suministramos con Sincrocam, podrás usar el disparo controlado por el slider.

2- ¿Puedo llevar accesorios en la propia bolsa de Sincrocam?

En el interior de la bolsa suministrada se dispone de espacio para colocar una bateria (opcional) , y su cargador (opcional). Todo queda muy ajustado para que la bolsa sea muy portable.

3- ¿Puedo colocar sincrocam sobre uno o varios trípodes?

Por supuesto, Sincrocam dispone de unas cómodas patas para apoyarlo directamente sobre superficies planas o irregulares, no obstante, si deseamos colocarlo sobre trípodes, disponemos de dos roscas standar (3/8") de trípode de vídeo mecanizadas en los extremos para fijar dos trípodes y una en el soporte central suministrado, para usarlo con un solo trípode.

Resulta muy práctico instalar unas zapatas de anclaje rápido tipo Manfrotto 577 (opcionales) o similar para facilitar el montaje y desmontaje de los trípodes.

4- ¿Es necesario tener conectado la pantalla táctil inalámbrica permanentemente para hacer un movimiento de timelapse?

No, la pantalla táctil inalámbrica es necesaria para programar el movimiento en el Sincrocam y una vez programado, la pantalla táctil puede desconectarse, por ejemplo, durante un Time-lapse de larga duración. El Sincrocam se encarga del control de forma autónoma.

5- ¿Para realizar un Time-lapse, el Sincrocam controla el disparo de la cámara?

Si, el slider Sincrocam controla el disparo de la cámara a traves de un cable de disparo especifico para el modelo de cámara usado (no suministrado, sólo se suministra la parte conectada a Sincrocam).

6- ¿Puedo alimentar SincroCAM con baterias de diferentes tipos?

Sincrocam recomienda utilizar los packs de baterías específicos que te ofrecemos para garantizar las máximas prestaciones del equipo. Así como por motivos de seguridad.

Haznos una nueva pregunta clicando aquí

Google Play.¿Qué necesitamos y qué te ofrecemos por tu ayuda?Sincrocam ya está totalmente diseñado, testado, es funcional y podemos 
fabricarlo, sin embargo necesitamos de tu colaboración para poder 
financiar la puesta en marcha de la producción en serie, agrupando un 
mayor número de unidades en los primeros lotes de fabricación. La 
primera versión del software para Android está en fase Alfa pero 
necesitamos recursos para seguir desarrollando la aplicación, añadir 
funcionalidades importantes y hacer un código seguro y robusto.Con
 tu ayuda podemos conseguir que cualquier profesional o no profesional 
tenga acceso a una herramienta de éste nivel, independientemente de su 
poder adquisitivo.Nuestra solicitud se basa en financiación 
flexible, por lo que aunque no alcancemos la meta de financiación 
prevista, podemos fabricar todas las unidades solicitadas y entregarlas 
gracias a los medios productivos de que ya disponemos en Barcelona.Características técnicas
Innovador sistema de tracción (Patend pending).
Dos ejes sincronizados, con giro panoramico de más de 360 grados.
Fabricado en aluminio anodizado y acero.
Plegable para una total portabilidad.
Dimensiones del cuerpo sin plegar 110cm x 11 cm x 7 cm. (43,34in x 4,33in x 2,75in)
Dimensiones del cuerpo plegado 58cm x 11 cm x 7cm. (22,85in x 4,33in x 2,75in)
Peso del cuerpo sin patas, 3 Kg (6,50lb) aproximadamente.
Funcional para vídeo.

Funcional para timelapse con velocidad mínima de cientos de horas/m.
Dispone de tres puntos de anclaje para trípode, dos en los extremos y uno en el centro.
Puede utilizarse con un trípode en el centro o con dos tripodes en los extremos.
Dispone de patas autoajustables para situarlo en superficies irregulares.
Puede trabajar incluso invertido, en horizontal, vertical y otros ángulos.
La bancada dispone de rosca de video standard para instalar una rótula (no incluida).
Control de disparo para Time-lapse controlado por el Sincrocam.
Cable
 disparador standard para Sincrocam incluido (se requiere de un cable 
disparador manual específico para cada modelo de cámara para completar 
el cable de disparo suministrado).
Programación y uso mediante pantalla táctil inalámbrica. Posibilidad de utilizar otros dispositivos como smartphones o táblets compatibles.

Conexión eléctrica mediante alimentador suministrado 110Vac a 240 Vac 50/60 Hz
Consumo medio aproximado de 500 mA/h
Alimentación autónoma mediante batería Sincrocam (opcional) de 4.600 mA 

Cambio de batería en caliente sin detener el Sincrocam.

Dimensiones y peso embalado en su bolsa con accesorios aprox: 63x23x14 cm ( 24,80x9,06x5,51 in ) y aprox. 5,90Kg (12,90 lb)

FAQ1- ¿Se necesita de algún accesorio para poder usar Sincrocam?Sincrocam
se suministra junto con una fuente de alimentación para la red y
dentro de una bolsa para su transporte, donde queda perfectamente
protegido.
Para
trabajar con Sincrocam, necesitarás una rótula con rosca standard
de vídeo, y si necesitas
alimentarlo de forma autónoma, una batería opcional con su
cargador que tambien puedes adquirir aquí.
Por
supuesto necesitarás tu cámara, y para Time-lapse, necesitarás un
cable disparador especifico de tu
cámara (similares a estos: http://www.cablematic.es/Cables-de-sincronizaci... ), con tu cable compatible unido al que suministramos con Sincrocam,
podrás usar el disparo controlado por el slider.
2- ¿Puedo llevar accesorios en la propia bolsa de Sincrocam?En
el interior de la bolsa suministrada se dispone de espacio para
colocar una bateria (opcional) , y su cargador (opcional). Todo queda muy
ajustado para que la bolsa sea muy portable.
3- ¿Puedo colocar sincrocam sobre uno o varios trípodes?Por
supuesto,  Sincrocam dispone de unas cómodas patas para apoyarlo
directamente sobre superficies planas o irregulares, no obstante, si deseamos colocarlo
sobre trípodes, disponemos de dos roscas standar (3/8") de trípode de
vídeo  mecanizadas en los extremos para fijar dos trípodes y una en
el soporte central suministrado, para usarlo con un solo trípode.
Resulta
muy práctico instalar unas zapatas de anclaje rápido tipo
Manfrotto 577 (opcionales) o similar para facilitar el montaje y
desmontaje de los trípodes.
4- ¿Es
necesario tener conectado la pantalla táctil inalámbrica permanentemente para
hacer un movimiento de timelapse?
No, la pantalla táctil inalámbrica es necesaria para programar el
movimiento en el Sincrocam y una vez programado, la pantalla táctil puede desconectarse, por ejemplo, durante un 
Time-lapse de larga duración. El Sincrocam
 se encarga del control de forma autónoma.
5- ¿Para
realizar un Time-lapse, el Sincrocam controla el disparo de la cámara?
Si,
el slider Sincrocam controla el disparo de la cámara a traves de un
cable de disparo especifico para el modelo de cámara usado (no
suministrado, sólo se suministra la parte conectada a Sincrocam).
6- ¿Puedo
alimentar SincroCAM con baterias de diferentes tipos?
Sincrocam recomienda utilizar los packs de baterías específicos que te ofrecemos para garantizar las 
máximas prestaciones del equipo. Así como por motivos de seguridad. Haznos una nueva pregunta clicando aquí

story:
“It's such a simple solution, and we all know that simple solutions are usually the best.” – Addy Dugdale, DVICE  

“…a very clever way to help you keep your phone charged with minimal hassle…"     –  Brad Reed, BGR

“The final thing that really pushed this over the top as a superb offering, is the price.” – Stormy Beach, AndroidSPIN


The System | Compare Value | The Products | Get Perks | Earn Freebies | Our Philosophy | FAQ | Team

The System | Compare Value | The Products | Get Perks | Earn Freebies | Our Philosophy | FAQ | Team

PRODUCT QUESTIONS

Will the magnets in Zolo products harm my devices?

We have extensively tested each Zolo product to make sure that our magnets don’t harm your devices.

When do I select my phone case model and color?

You will receive an email after our campaign is over asking you to make your selection.

How many times will Zolo Batteries charge my phone?

There are lots of technical things that influence this...but most users will get about one charge per from the 1x battery, two charges from the 2x and 4 charges from the 4x.

When will your website + mobile app be launched? Which OS will your mobile app be compatible with?

We’re still building our full website and apps for iOS and Android. If we’re not delayed, we should launch around the time our products ship out.

I don’t have a device that you make a case for. When will you make a case for my device?

We currently only support iPhone 4, 5s/5, 6 and Galaxy S4, S5. If you want us to make a case for your device, vote for your case and get your friends to vote too. As soon as 500 people tell us they want a particular case, we make it.

How are you able to offer such low prices? How long will this last — is this “too good to be true”?

Our pricing is incredibly low, so we need your help to keep it that way. Share our story and help us get the word out so we can reach scale quickly and maintain our rock-bottom prices.


SHIPPING AND DELIVERY

When will you be shipping my stuff to me?

We’re shooting for August, but it could be September.

Where do you ship to?

Anywhere — our perk prices already include shipping to wherever you reside.

I entered the wrong address, what should I do?

We’ll send you a message before we ship to confirm your shipping address — just let us know then.

Even more questions? Please contact support@hellozolo.com. 

The System | Compare Value | The Products | Get Perks | Earn Freebies | Our Philosophy | FAQ | Team
