story:
What is iRing?  

iRing is an attachable accessory to your smart device that gives you comfort and natural grip of your device. It also can be used as a portable stand for the device.

Inspiration for iRing.

We all have dropped our phones at some point. New devices like iPhone break quite easily since they are made with tempered glass. We have solved this problem with iRing, which is a safety grip that can be simply attached to the device.

 

Comfortable grip and prevent damage due to falling

iRing allows you to handle your device safely without fully grabbing it when in use. 
 

iRing makes it easier to take pictures with your phone.

 iRing’s natural grip allows you to hold your device in any position so you can take pictures in any angle. You no longer have to worry about dropping your phone when in use.

Horizontal / vertical stand

 

iRing also can be a portable stand. The hinge turns 360 degrees and it also can be fixed at 90 degrees. 

The 90 degree structure is solid enough to resist heavier devices like iPad or other tablet PCs. 

 

 

 

Patent Pending technology!  It is Minimal & effective design. 

Free attachment & removal

iRing can be removable at any time. Since special type of adhesive called Pressure Sensitive Adhesive is used, it not only firmly attaches, but also comes off whenever you’d like without laving any residue. 
You can re-apply it over and over again. All you have to do is wiping out the surface with water when it’s contaminated. 

Variety of colors 

 iRing currently comes in 5 different colors, pearl white, matte white, glossy black, pink, mint etc.

 

 

Package Design for Retail (Price will be $19.99 + shipping)

 

we have just finished retail packaging. It is sleek and luxurious. 

Best choice as a promotional item and Gift for your group, company, church, orgnization etc.

 

 

 

iRing draws attention! Turn everyone's cell phone into your ad board! iRings with your company logo will be a great advertisement tool for your company. Also It will be available luxurious gift box. We will update soon.  

 

Need More Option?

Send a message and let us know what you need!  We will make a special perk for you! 

 

 

Production Plan

We have successfully completed the first round of production for testing the market. With our current infra-structure(assembly, jigs, injection mold, die casting mold etc), we are capable of producing 100,000 units per month. However, additional funding is critical to proceed with the second round, and for this we are on Indiegogo.  

The unit appeared in this presentation is a real product of the first round of production for testing the market. After prototyping, we made adjustments on the plate size and improved the hinge structure and physical reliability.

Please join the growing group of supporters by backing the project. And please help us spread the word! If you have any question? Feel free to contact us! 

- Please visit our website - www.aauxx.com 
- We're also on Facebook page - www.facebook.com/aauxx  

About me

My name is Joshua. To briefly introduce myself, I am an inventor and a product designer born in South Korea. My educational background includes design, and performance at Berklee College of Music in Boston, MA. I've always been interested in science, novelty products, invention, design and so on. When I was exposed to the people who made their fortune with their own inventions in the US, I decided to become one just like that. I established an entity called Paratuss, and have introduced many different products that can maximize efficacy of human behavior.   

You can also view other products I have designed and developed by clicking the link below. 

www.paratuss.com


iRing is protected by one or more patents or patent pending in United States and other countries. Copyright 2012 AAUXX Inc. all rights reserved. The AAUXX logo and other marks are owned by AAUXX Inc. and may be registered.

story:
What is Pixicle? 

Pixicle is a photo sharing ecosystem that makes it easy to print, view and share your smartphone photos with the people close to you.

Imagine if you could print your smartphone photos at your local photo lab with a click of a button. Or view all your photos on a 40", 50" or even a 60" TV! How about sharing photo albums or several photos with people on your contact list at a touch of a button? Anything you want to do with your photos is a click away with Pixicle!

What does it do? 

Print - Open up Pixicle on your iOS or Android smartphone and select the photos you want to print. Your phone's GPS will locate the closest photo lab partner, send them the photos you want to print and your photos will be ready to pick up within an hour. The photos sent to them will be in the same resolution as you took them. Pixicle will also have photo editing tools built right in to enhance your photos. No need to switch apps to add effects or remove red eye!

We are already working on getting your photos developed at over 10,000 photo lab locations across the US and Canada. 

View - Pixicle is a small device that you plug into your TV's HDMI input at the back of your television, which connects to your iPhone or Android smartphone via the free app. Once you plug in the device and enter in your wifi password, start the app on your phone and start viewing your pictures on the big screen.

If someone else wants to start showing their photos, that’s easy too. Simply stop the app on your phone and they can start showing their photos from their phone in the same way. It becomes a photo sharing experience for everyone.

Pixicle is compatible with any television that has an HDMI input. It doesn't matter if you have an iPhone or an Android device, because the free Pixicle app is available for both. Just connect through your wifi and you can start sharing your photos instantly! 

Share - Pixicle makes photo sharing made easy. Open up the Pixicle app on your phone and select the photos you want to share. Pick one, two, ten, or how ever many you want. Once you have chosen the photos, select the person from your contact list and hit send. The other person will get a notification that you have shared photos with them and, when they open up their Pixicle app on their phone, your shared photos will be waiting for them.

About us

We are a small team in Vancouver, BC dedicated to making interesting and innovative applications that will enhance our user’s daily lives. Having already spent 18 years in the development of enterprise level custom applications, we bring years of experience to the table and aim to create the best possible products for other people like us. 

Our three co-founders, Norm, Brandon and Steev, are all fathers who have a plethora of pictures of their children and were looking for a better way to share them. Pixicle was developed to fill that need, and we hope that soon we can bring it to you.

 

FAQ

Can I really print any photos that are on my smartphone?

Yes you can. Pixicle accesses all your phones photo albums. This includes albums that you have imported yourself, your cameras photo albums, and even your Instagram, whatsapp, and any other photo imaging apps that create albums on your phone.

Where can I print my photos?

Your phone's GPS will automatically locate the closest photo labs we work with. This will include national big box chain stores located in the United States and Canada.

Who can I share my photos with?

You can share you photos with anyone who is on your contact list as long as they have the Pixicle app installed on their phone.

Will it work with my phone?

Pixicle will work with any Android phone with version 3.0 and up installed. It will also work with the latest iPhone iOS. 

Can I use it with my tablet?

Yes, the app will work on your tablet. With your help, we hope to release an even better, tablet-specific version in phase 2. 

How do I know if it will work with my TV?

Pixicle will work with any television that has an HDMI input. 

Does Pixicle store my photos?

There are no photos stored on the device. All photos are kept safely on your phone and securely backed up on the cloud.

Are my photos as clear on Pixicle as they are on my phone?

Yes, your photos will be as clear as your photos on your phone.

Can other people show their photos on my Pixicle?

Yes. All they have to do is download the free app and be connected to your wifi. Only one person (smartphone) can show their photos at a time.

Doesn't Apple already do something like this?

Apple TV does give you a way to set up the TV to stream photos from your phone on your TV, so long as you have both an Apple TV and an iPhone. 

Pixicle will work with both iPhone and Android devices and any television with an HDMI input, regardless of the brand, and with minimal set up.

Where are we now? 

We have been working on Pixicle since late last year and we now have a working prototype for both iOS and Android.

Our lead developer has nearly completed the Android features and will be working on the iOS features soon after. We are constantly working on improving the image quality as well as functions of Pixicle.

We have planned the release of Pixicle in two phases. The Indiegogo campaign is to help us complete phase 1 and bring the Pixicle app to you. The funds will also go towards developing Pixicle for phase 2. 

Phase 1

  • Printing from Pixicle to a photo lab partner
  • Sharing photos with other Pixicle users
  • Auto backup of your photos onto Pixicle Cloud
  • Tablet version for iOS and Android
  • Slide show option
  • Interface design

Phase 2

  • Product design development
  • Securing suppliers and manufacturers
  • Finalizing hardware specifications
  • Optimizing image quality and speed


     

    Why we need you. 

    All proceeds from the campaign go towards completing phase 1 of development on Pixicle.

    We will also be using the funds to complete the ecosystem and put Pixicle into production so that you can get your hands on it. A large portion will go towards making the ecosystem a reality and creating the first run of the physical product. 

    Risks and Challenges. 

    There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any electronics product at scale. Mass manufacturing isn't the same as prototype development with 3D printers; we have to make sure they are secure and reliable, and also most importantly that they can be manufactured efficiently at mass volumes.

    Thank you!

    Whether or not you can donate, we thank you for your support. Please be sure to spread the word about our campaign through Twitter, Facebook and anywhere else you can think of! We appreciate all the help we can get and every little bit counts.

Pixicle will work with both iPhone and Android devices and any television with an HDMI input, regardless of the brand, and with minimal set up.

We have been working on Pixicle since late last year and we now have a working prototype for both iOS and Android.
Our lead developer has nearly completed the Android features and will be working on the iOS features soon after. We are constantly working on improving the image quality as well as functions of Pixicle.
We have planned the release of Pixicle in two phases. The Indiegogo campaign is to help us complete phase 1 and bring the Pixicle app to you. The funds will also go towards developing Pixicle for phase 2. 
Phase 1

Printing from Pixicle to a photo lab partner
Sharing photos with other Pixicle users
Auto backup of your photos onto Pixicle Cloud
Tablet version for iOS and Android
Slide show option
Interface design

Phase 2

Product design development
Securing suppliers and manufacturers
Finalizing hardware specifications
Optimizing image quality and speed




 
Why we need you. 
All proceeds from the campaign go towards completing phase 1 of development on Pixicle.
We will also be using the funds to complete the ecosystem and put Pixicle into production so that you can get your hands on it. A large portion will go towards making the ecosystem a reality and creating the first run of the physical product. 
Risks and Challenges. 
There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any electronics product at scale. Mass manufacturing isn't the same as prototype development with 3D printers; we have to make sure they are secure and reliable, and also most importantly that they can be manufactured efficiently at mass volumes.
Thank you!
Whether or not you can donate, we thank you for your support. Please be sure to spread the word about our campaign through Twitter, Facebook and anywhere else you can think of! We appreciate all the help we can get and every little bit counts.

story:
Short Summary

My name's Pete Hottelet. I've made a number of things from television and movies you've probably heard about. The soap from Fight Club, Sex Panther Cologne from Anchorman, Stay Puft Marshmallows from Ghostbusters, and the Eau My fragrance with George Takei, to name a few.  

This project is an oven mitt. I originally made a few of these for myself (back in ye olde 2012), but everyone seems to want one. So here's your chance to get one. 

(actual photos)

The molds and tooling are already made and ready to go, so this is a $39 preorder.  If enough people want one of these (450 people, to be exact), I'll place the order. If the minimum number isn't reached, you won't be charged.  

Production will take about 2 months, shipping via sea to the Port of Los Angeles will take another 8-10 weeks, at which point the product will be delivered to a warehouse for fulfillment and delivery to your house. Shipping is included within the continental United States. 

The glove is molded from heat-resistant silicone rubber, so it's one-size-fits most, designed for the right hand.  If your palm is about 4.0" wide, it should fit your hands with no issues.  (If the campaign goes over 1,000 units, I'll have another mold made for people with larger hands -- if it goes over 1,500 units, I'll make a left-handed version).

That's really all there is to it. I don't plan to make a million of these things, so if you want one, this is your chance to get one. 

cc: PowerMitt.com

story:
Old good times when phones had buttons now returns, and you can help realize it! 


Features:
- You can make and receive calls from "buttons" side 3-5 day longer than from "touch screen" side
- You can very fast make call from "buttons" side (numeric button and call-button, last calls, missed calls, access to the contact book, etc.)
- You can make calls from any side of the phone, as you wish
- Of course, all features of the "touch screen" side will remain


All advantages of the touch screen phone and the phone with buttons in one device.

Why we need your support? Because we must to do some expensive steps:

- building working prototype

- finalizing the engineering schematics for the final product

- getting product certifications

- production

story:
Featured in

Navio+ now available!


SHOP


All tutorials are made available on our website, as well as source code for drivers. 

Features

The idea

For the past three years we have been professionally working on a commercial microcontroller based autopilot. Development tools were bulky and debugging was complicated. At the same time the ease of use and development for Raspberry Pi was phenomenal, so the idea to create Raspberry Pi autopilot came naturally.

Raspberry Pi is a more advanced and flexible platform than a microcontroller:

  • Runs fully featured operating system

  • Easy to extend - just plug in camera, Wi-Fi dongle, LTE modem, etc.

  • Support for virtually any programming language

  • Multiple available libraries for computer vision and video processing

  • Great community support

But autopilot is more than just a computer - it needs ways to sense the world, determine it's position and control actuators. We created Navio to give Raspberry Pi all these capabilities.

What's included

If you pledge for a Navio board:

  • Navio board

  • Active GPS\GLONASS patch antenna

  • Pack of wires with DF13 connectors

  • SD card image of modified Raspbian with real-time kernel.

  • A set of open-source drivers for all sensors and controllers.

  • Example applications and tutorials.

There are several autopilot software projects, based on different technologies, that could be used with Navio. For example ArduPilot team has already made a large effort to make a Linux port. Even though at the moment of shipment there may not be a fully functional autopilot code, we will work on making our drivers compliant with open source projects. Navio will help autopilot developers streamline the delivery of code for Linux to the UAV enthusiasts.

Help us by sharing

For an open source project building a community is the key. We are constantly getting feedback from developers all around the world. But many still do not know about the possibilities that Navio brings, please help us spread the word about project by clicking on share buttons. Together we can create the next generation of autopilot platforms.

Frequently asked questions

What is the difference between Navio and Navio Raw?

Navio has u-blox NEO-7M multi-GNSS receiver and preferred for navigation. 

Navio Raw has u-blox NEO-6T which is GPS only, but provides raw data that can be used for real-time kinematics (RTK) processing. RTK requires second static GPS receiver with raw data or a source of RTCM corrections from a reference station. A proper antenna is required to achieve good results.

Choose Navio Raw if you want GPS processing, otherwise choose Navio.

Is Raspberry suitable for real-time tasks?

Yes! Default Raspbian kernel provides soft real-time. For more demanding applications it is possible to use Linux kernel with RT-Preempt patch or Xenomai - a real-time development framework cooperating with the Linux kernel that provides hard real-time. Also, it is possible to run other operating systems on Raspberry, for example - ChibiOS RTOS.

What Raspberry Pi model Navio is compatible with?

Navio shield is compatible with both model A and model B. Connection to B+ is also possible, but due to the different position of display connector the board is not fully plugged leaving 1-2mm.

Can Navio be used with other boards?

While we primarily target Raspberry Pi there are a couple of boards that duplicate it's form-factor and are pin-to-pin compatible with it - these boards are Banana Pi and HummingBoard and they are quite powerful. Navio can be connected to them, but may require some small modifications to these boards and different mount.

story:
This campaign has ended.

Lumenator is available here.

Special thanks to all our funders! We couldn't do it without you.


Last Time on IndieGoGo!!

Power Panel & Power Panel Plus+

Thin. LED.

Light. Bright.

Go. Anywhere.

This is a follow up for our two highly successful power panel campaigns on Indiegogo. Thank you all so much for all of your support!

The Power Panel now comes in 3 flavors:

Power Panel (PP) - Standard Power Panel with battery and no AC power or other accessories.

Power Panel (PP) PRO - Power Panel with AC power and many accessories.

Power Panel (PP) Plus+ - Upgraded Power Panel with Barn Doors, Stackability and many accessories.

Power Panel is also available at a special bundle price as multi-light and multi-accessory kits (2x, 3x, etc.).

Please make your perk choice on the right.


Note to International Customers: We will supply you with the correct plug for your respective region when ordering. We carry plugs for US, UK, EU and AU.

 

The Go Anywhere, Do Anything LED light at a price you won't believe!

Thanks for checking out our Power Panel project! Here at ColorRight, we've been making awesome white balance tools and flash diffusers for over 5 years. We've even won awards for our ColorRight PRO line of color balance tools. 

Now, we want to introduce you to the Power Panel. Recently, we raised almost $60K for our first Power Panel campaign and over $40K on our second Power Panel campaign. This is the last time we plan to offer Power Panel on IndieGoGo. 

So far, we have made 3 working prototypes of this revolutionary type of LED panel light that works for both photo and Video. The Power Panel light is an ultra thin LED panel (.6 inches) that has gobs of power (approximately 6000 lumens, 500 Watt Light Bulb). Power Panel is also the very first rectangular LED panel to use LEDNatural technology for ultra soft light without the hassle of a softbox. At just over 2 pounds this panel is your Go Anywhere, Do Anything lighting solution. 

The Power Panel is amazing, but we need your help to make it a reality. We are leveraging a lot of the technology and knowledge we gained from our Lumenator project in the Power Panel, so we don't need to raise as much money to make the Power Panel a reality, but we still need lots of help! We are still a small family run company. We believe these LEDNatural LED products are the best we have ever made.

Your Impact & Our Future Plans

We think Power Panel and Lumenator are the future of photo & video lighting. By contributing you are making a difference in the lives of photographers and videographers everywhere. The Power Panel and Lumenator projects have the potential to totally up-end all our pre-conceived notions about what LED lighting can do, and where it can go. With the success of Power Panel and Lumenator we plan to introduce additional products utilizing our LEDNatural technology.

We believe the Power Panel and Lumenator represent the first products in a true 2nd wave of LED lighting technology. We can't wait to see where you take the Power Panel or what you do with it once you get there.

We can't get there without you. Please help us get the word out, by telling your family and friends and through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc. This site has convenient links for most social sites right here on this page.

Thank you so much for supporting the future of photo and video lighting with your contribution!

Please choose your perk using the links to the right.


Power Panel vs. LED lights


Power Panel Plus+

story:
Styko AntiVirus

Here at Styko Company, we are devoloping what we see as a great piece of Software - Styko AntiVirus. 

Features

  • Faster Scanning

We are striving to get our AntiVirus running faster than any available AntiVirus on the market today.

  • Compact

Our solution is the most compact AntiVirus available, the whole project is around 30MB.

  • Low Requirements

Styko AntiVirus does not need a fast machine to be able to run without bogging down performance.

  • Simplicity

Our goal is to make Styko AntiVirus simple on the outside, but complex on the inside. Every end-user will not have to worry about tweaking advanced settings, because most of the advanced settings are automatically chosen based on your hardware and software setup.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our Project is written in C++, Java, and C.

Here are some screenshots of our project:

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=========================================================

The money you donate will be used for:

  • Buying and Maintaining Servers.
  • Paying our developers for their time and effort to help them support their families.
  • Devlopment based Taxes.

Thank you everyone for your help and support!

story:
QLYX is smart magnetic phone mount.

  • You can mount QLYX either on the air-vent with a clip. Or on any flat surface using an adhesive pad.
  • QLYX has built-in Bluetooth Low Energy module to connect to the phone.
  • On the phone, QLYX holder interacts with QLYX application. It is available for iOS and Android.
  • QLYX app: (1) auto-launches desired application, (2) collects driving statistics, (3) drops parking pin.
  • It also has a dashboard with handy widgets: traffic data, driving statistics, weather forecast.

 

 

Its main purpose is to make your life simpler and more comfortable by taking away the necessity of launching an application before a regular action, like driving. 

The mount is elegant and is accompanied by an application that does all the magic and has a dashboard with handy widgets for a driver.

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

The market is stuffed with mounts looking cheap and limited in colors. We are aiming at offering mount frames in a variety of colors to emphasize your style.  With your help, there will be an option to order QLYX in premium materials: e.g. aluminum, wood, leather or even gold.

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

That’s how QLYX is easily paired with the smartphone for the first time.

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

QLYX will change your driving experience. While plastic holders are bulky and require time for phone installation and app launching, QLYX is elegant and minimizes the time of routine phone setting for the ride, saving it for you. 

So even if you own a phone holder and are perfectly satisfied with it, you literally don't know what you're missing...

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Customizable frames

Frames are customizable. One of our goals is to add different colors and materials of frames. 

We already working on five bright frame colors:
- Green mint 
- Sunny yellow
- Sky blue 
- Juicy orange 
- Red wine 

 

More mounting options

We are planning to add more mounting options. 

Besides already existing air vent clip and adhesive pad, we are working on desktop mount and laptop mount. 

As well as we are planning to make new generation of adhesive pad (with adjustable angle).

 

QLYX app updates

QLYX app will be constantly upgraded via AppStore and Play Market: 

- Landscape mode, 
- More handy widgets, 
- More useful notifications, 
- Better driving statistics,
- More apps to choose from.

 

New design patterns of Q-Plates

We are planning to make even more diverse Q-plates.
Right now, every QLYX comes with: 
- Pearl White Q-plate
- Space Gray Q-plate
- Rose Gold Q-plate
- Gold Q-plate
- Matte Black Q-plate

More colors and premium materials are coming.

 

 

 

 

We call ourselves Innovation Development Agency, or simply IDA. Although it is our first crowdfunding project, we have great experience creating innovative, useful and ergonomic products. Check out our the website for more information about the team.
story_txt:
QLYX is smart magnetic phone mount.

You can mount QLYX either on the air-vent with a clip. Or on any flat surface using an adhesive pad.
QLYX has built-in Bluetooth Low Energy module to connect to the phone.
On the phone, QLYX holder interacts with QLYX application. It is available for iOS and Android.
QLYX app: (1) auto-launches desired application, (2) collects driving statistics, (3) drops parking pin.
It also has a dashboard with handy widgets: traffic data, driving statistics, weather forecast.

 

 
 
QLYX – is a SMART mount.
Not because it's trendy to use “smart” today, but because it truly has a chip that interacts with your phone. 
Its main purpose is to make your life simpler and more comfortable by taking away the necessity of launching an application before a regular action, like driving. 
The mount is elegant and is accompanied by an application that does all the magic and has a dashboard with handy widgets for a driver.
 

 

 

 
 
A combination of smart mount and application is designed to auto-launch the desired app: navigation, streaming services, or parking place memory.
 
  

Currently the mount auto-launches Waze, Spotify, Uber, Apple Maps and Google Maps, and we are constantly working on increasing the number of applications and widgets to choose from.
 
 

Once parked. QLYX pins your car on the map, so you always know where you've left it.
 

3D touch provides quick access to the Drive Statistics, navigation points and other.
 

With QLYX you will be distracted no more: the mount keeps the smartphone within your field of view, while the application - your hands on the wheel.
 

 
The market is stuffed with mounts looking cheap and limited in colors. We are aiming at offering mount frames in a variety of colors to emphasize your style.  With your help, there will be an option to order QLYX in premium materials: e.g. aluminum, wood, leather or even gold.
 

Our designers have been carefully choosing and experimenting to reach the ideal.
 

0.5 mm thin electrical steel, NFC compatible Q-Plates in 5 colors.
 

Thanks to the unique form, our Q-plates can be attached to the phone any way you want.
 

  
 

 
Every QLYX comes with air vent clip and adhesive pad to provide a perfect grip. Both of them were tested under multiple conditions.
 

 
The adhesive pad can be attached to any smooth surface at any angle with 3M VHB; while air vent clip is made from reinforced steel with a silicone coating to grip any air vent.
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 
That’s how QLYX is easily paired with the smartphone for the first time.
 

That’s how QLYX auto launches Waze App without a single touch.
 
 
 
That’s how QLYX opens Spotify App via push notification.
 
 
 
That’s how QLYX gets directions to homework using 3D touch function.
  

 
  
Skeleton view
 
 
 

 
 
 

 

 
 

 
QLYX will change your driving experience. While plastic holders are bulky and require time for phone installation and app launching, QLYX is elegant and minimizes the time of routine phone setting for the ride, saving it for you. 
So even if you own a phone holder and are perfectly satisfied with it, you literally don't know what you're missing...
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 

 
 

 

Customizable frames
Frames are customizable. One of our goals is to add different colors and materials of frames. We already working on five bright frame colors:- Green mint - Sunny yellow- Sky blue - Juicy orange - Red wine 
 

More mounting options
We are planning to add more mounting options. Besides already existing air vent clip and adhesive pad, we are working on desktop mount and laptop mount. As well as we are planning to make new generation of adhesive pad (with adjustable angle).
 

QLYX app updates
QLYX app will be constantly upgraded via AppStore and Play Market: - Landscape mode, - More handy widgets, - More useful notifications, - Better driving statistics,- More apps to choose from.
 

New design patterns of Q-Plates
We are planning to make even more diverse Q-plates.Right now, every QLYX comes with: - Pearl White Q-plate- Space Gray Q-plate- Rose Gold Q-plate- Gold Q-plate- Matte Black Q-plateMore colors and premium materials are coming.
 

 

 
 We call ourselves Innovation Development Agency, or simply IDA. Although it is our first crowdfunding project, we have great experience creating innovative, useful and ergonomic products. Check out our the website for more information about the team.

story:
Celtrix is an innovative multifunctional device and easy to carry gadget to date. It’s the perfect gift for any gadget lover and easily fits in bag or pocket of any size. The design of the gadget consists of high-end materials and various smart features.

Celtrix is the ultimate solution of what you always missed as a gadget lover: Powerful Speakers, SIM Slot, SD Card Slot, Power Bank, and Storage Device.

So, if you’re still thinking why here are few reasons: 

 

  • It's the ‘must have’ gadget of 2018 -19. If you're a gadget geek, you must have Celtrix!
  • It's an ideal device which acts as a backup for every other device. It's so small you can keep in your bag, pocket or glove compartment.
  • You don’t have to carry an additional speaker, power bank, hard disk or any other storage device.
  • It's so damn cute and perfect novelty gift.
  • Use it when you need to travel light - the device is perfect for joggers, runners, walkers, cyclists and those who take part in extreme sports because it's so compact it can go in any size pocket.
  • Overseas travel - the Celtrix device is so small that you can easily carry it anywhere. 

 

 

While enjoying a vacation, and sitting near to the beach, the last thing you want to worry about is storage. It is little insane to rely on other devices to store all the vital information like photographs or soft copies of your document.

So, it is better to have a trusted companion which is none other than Celtrix. Transfer all your photographs, files and other important documents at one go.

 

Thinking to buy a new SIM? But your device doesn't have a spare SIM Slot.

This type of situation is common but don’t worry, Celtrix is the solution to all your problems.

With Celtrix, use both the SIMs simultaneously in your phone.

Insert the SIM inside the Celtrix SIM tray and connect it with your phone with the help of Celtrix app. Make all the calls, send important messages from your phone using the Celtrix app.

Now, it is possible for you to have more than one number active at the same time. You can use both the numbers in your one and only phone.

 

Enjoy the peace of mind of never seeing “Low Battery” on your phone ever again. Celtrix is the world’s smallest, portable and fastest charging power bank.

Offering you 6200mAh capacity to keep your devices charged. Made to be both - fast charging station as well as a portable power bank. It is the perfect solution for all your battery needs.

Built-in powerbank charges your smartphone on the go. Celtrix is a tested solution for large power banks, ugly battery cases, tangled wires, the search for outlets and all other hassles to charge your phone.

Celtrix provides convenient energy to keep your mobile devices charged day and night.

 

 

We all love to hear loud music but carrying large speakers could be painful. Due to which Celtrix came into existence, as we felt there was a need for this product.  

We desired an outdoor portable speaker that was small and audible outdoors. And, we failed to find such product that could fill an outdoor space with big, powerful sound.

So, we created the smallest portable Wi-Fi speaker - Celtrix. With Celtrix you can tune to your music anywhere and anytime.

Celtrix has high-quality sound for outdoor environments and it is small in size.

 

 
 

Celtrix is small in size which makes it portable. Each aspect of the hardware design is designed to improve the user experience.

The hardware features an “easy to carry, slim, and lightweight” concept. Celtrix is a hardware device and an app. Celtrix performs multiple functions like data transfer, phone charging, making calls and etc.

Compared to other devices like a speaker, charger, and storage device which have limited functions, the Celtrix is multifunctional.

 
 

 

Our users are enthusiastic, smart and globetrotter. They like to carry a single device which is multi-functional with smaller in size. Celtrix comes with an app which has rich UI and amazing features to help you manage your digital world easily.

With Celtrix app save data, make calls, access and manage all the functions with the Celtrix app. 

The app is compatible with Android and IOS phones. Celtrix is the next generation of the multi-functional device.

 
 

 


 

 

Package contains: 1 Celtrix device, 1 USB cable and 1 user manual.

 

 

 

 

We’d love it if you guys could tell your friends, family, and the rest of the world about Celtrix.

To show our gratitude to anyone who does, we’ve teamed up with Kickbooster. For every backer you refer to this Indiegogo project, we’ll give you 20% of their pledge amount.

Sign up now on Kickbooster. Once you’ve signed up you’ll get a personal link to share through social media, email, or any other platform you like.

 

 

 

How can we connect the device with a phone?

The phone can be connected to the device via Celtrix app.

What is the range of connectivity?

The device can be easily connected up to 10 Meters

How can we make the calls with the sim?

Once you connect your phone with the sim, then all the functions such as call or messages can be performed by using the app.

What is the frequency of the Speaker?

The frequency range of the Celtrix is 80Hz-18KHz

Can I order more than one Celtrix device?

Yes. There is no limitation to the quantity you want to order.

Can I switch off the device when it is not in use?

Yes, you can switch off the device when it is not being used.

How long does it take to charge the Phone?

It takes approximately 120 minutes to fully charge a phone depending on a model.

What’s the dimension of the device?

The dimensions of the wallets are as follows:

Height - 3.41 Inches

Width - 1.96 Inches

Depth - 0.78 Inches

Where can I download the Celtrix mobile app?

You can download the Celtrix mobile app from App Store or Google Play. The app will be fully available before Celtrix’s shipping date (February 2019).

Is the app compatible with iOS?

Yes, the app is compatible with iOS and as well as Android.

How many ports are present in the device?

Total 1 port is available in the device which performs all the functions

How can we switch off the device?

The device has a switch off button which can be pressed to switch it off.

How can we connect the device with a phone?

Install app available for IOS and Android and pair with the device using WiFi.

What is the capacity of the storage device?

128 GB internal storage and external storage expandable up to 1TB.

What is the transfer speed?

60 MB /s read speed and 30 MB /s write speed.

When will you collect shipping address?

You will get a survey to your mail id on November 30th to get your shipping and desired Celtrix Device color details.

When will it be shipped?

We plan to start shipping this batch of production on February of 2019.  We have partnered with Easyship to fulfill the rewards to our backers on time without any delay. Celtrix will be delivered from our warehouse in US.                                               

Join the conversation on our social media channels to stay up-to-date on our product and exciting new offers.

story:
"Swipe" Touch Headphone 

  

Bluetooth Touch feature, by Section 8, is cool, and easy to use. With a “smooth swipe” on your new Pro Series Bluetooth Touch headphone - easily skip tracks and adjust volume. Please note that Touch & Swipe feature only works on the Bluetooth Power Button side of headphone.

 

Adjusting Volume: Press and Hold Ear Piece. Slide on the Panel vertically in an ‘up direction’ to raise volume. Slide on the Panel vertically in a ‘down direction’ to lower volume.

Change Music Tracks: Press and Hold Ear Piece. Slide on the Panel horizontally to skip music. Slide ‘right direction’ to move forward track. Slide ‘left direction’ to rewind track.Some more information: • Keep Bluetooth compatibility fully charged by connecting USB wire (enclosed) to Headphone and USB port One Hour charge gives you 10 hours of play time. If White Power Button blinks Red, charge device. • Bluetooth (wireless compatibility) & Touch Feature range and distance depending on area connectivity connection; from 10-50 feet from device, to even more than 100 feet. • Bluetooth White Power Button –Click button to pause music /re-start music. • If a phone call comes in while you are listening to music, the music will stop. Press White Power Button to pick up phone call. Press White Power Button to end phone call. Double click White Power Button to call your last outgoing call. • Headphone can also be used with 3.5 Wire (enclosed), even while Bluetooth is not charged. Touch feature will not work when wired in 3.5 to Headphone & Audio.

‘PAIRING’ WITH BLUETOOTH:
In Settings, turn Bluetooth to
‘On’ your audio device (i.e.
iPhone/Smartphone)
Press and hold the Bluetooth
White Power Button on
headphone for 5 seconds, or
until ‘Pairing’ occurs. ‘Pairing’
occurs when White Button is
Flashing Blue.
Look for Section8 (in Settings,
under Bluetooth) to ‘Pair’ Pro
Series Bluetooth headphone to
your device.

 

TOUCH & SWIPE FEATURE

Bluetooth Touch feature, by
Section 8, is cool, and easy to
use. With a “smooth swipe” on
your new Pro Series Bluetooth
Touch headphone - easily
skip tracks and adjust volume.
Please note that Touch & Swipe
feature only works on the
Bluetooth White Power Button
side of headphone.
ADJUSTING VOLUME:
Press and Hold Ear Piece.
Slide on the Panel vertically
in an ‘up direction’ to raise
volume.
Slide on the Panel vertically
in a ‘down direction’ to lower
volume.

 

CHANGE MUSIC TRACKS:
Press and Hold Ear Piece.
Slide on the Panel horizontally
to skip music.
Slide ‘right direction’ to move
forward track.
Slide ‘left direction’ to rewind
track.

Update:

See what people are saying about our SWiPE HEADHPONE.

The Section 8 - developers of a new set of headphones with touch and Bluetooth technology can’t think of even one reason why not. And why should they? They have a revolutionary product. And that revolutionary product is coming directly to crowdfunding donors worldwide in a project recently launched to support their efforts to bring the Pro Series Bluetooth Touch Headphone to the marketplace. “Consumers are looking for this kind of convenience - this kind of technology. And we’re here to bring it to them.” said Adam Gemal, CEO of The Section 8.

The Touch Headphone crowdfunding project is slated to bring the product to the forefront. With the finger’s pressure to the earpiece and a vertical swipe up, the unit will turn up the volume in the headphones. Dually, one vertical swipe back down and the volume goes down. The headphones will easily skip music tracks with a horizontal swipe to the right direction to move the track forward. To rewind a track the headphone user would merely slide their finger to the left direction on the earpiece.

The Bluetooth compatibility is fully-charged by connecting a USB wire that is enclosed with the product. A one-hour charge will result in ten hours of play time. Bluetooth, otherwise known as wireless compatibility, and touch features can be used from anywhere between ten to fifty feet from the device and in some instances one hundred feet. With one click of the power button the headphones will pause and re-start music.

“One of the most convenient features is the fact that a user can take a phone call while using the headphones.” added Gemal. “The music will stop and the user can press the power button to pick up the call.” To phone the last outgoing call users can double click the button.

Some of the perks for the project include a pair of headphones in one of the three colors available - black, white or red, a limited edition silver model, and a set with a built in microphone.

 

UPDATE: CHECK OUT OUR NEWEST WEBSITE:

https://adam-gemal-klc8.squarespace.com/home

Lets us know what you think.

 

We need help with funding this fantastic patent pending product. We need to raise enough money to launch our technology with small improvements & and bring it to our customers with the following ways. 

       1. Manufacturing minimums (10k dollars)

       2. Plastic mold injection(10k dollars)

       3. Packaging and shipping (5k dollars)

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Contribute. Your financial help goes a long way! Every bit counts.

Share. Spread the message. While you're at it, tell a friend about our campaign the old fashioned way – over your favorite cocktail or beer.

Join. Be part of our community.

story:
Updates

Available upgrades:

I am offering several upgrades to the devices. That can either be requested by pledging for the additional perks. Or for new backers - simply add the amount to your pledge (per device) and include in the note - what you added in addition.

  • Temperature / Humidity Sensor (SI7021 industrial precision sensor) - 7 EUR
  • Temp / Hum / Pressure (BME 280) - 11 EUR
  • 433 / 315 Mhz communication - 7 EUR

Short Summary

Monitoring CO2 is a trending topic, yet there are few things the current devices lack, so i opted to change this:

  1. Calibration - Most existing CO2 Monitors need to see fresh air each few days to do some internal calibration. With a Dual Beam NDIR sensor this is no longer necessary. The sensor can be operated also in places that seldom see fresh air, so that the real CO2 value is always correct.
  2. Connectivity - The device can be easily integrated with any existing Home Automation System over HTTP or MQTT. Also native connectivity to some online services like Thingspeak, Ubidots, IFTTT is available
  3. Price - By optimizing the device for price, you will get a sleek 3D Printed enclosure, no paper box to throw away and no lost money due to marketing campaigns.

What We Need & What You Get

To keep the price down i will need to order in bulk (e.g. minimum 50 sensors). There are also one-time PCB-production costs. As well as time spent in designing the hardware and software.

This is why i need you!

Even if the campaign is not successfully funded, i am going to produce the minimum quantity of devices as I am already deep in the topic and want to use those sensors! 

More Details

Some additional details about the device:
  • Connectivity: Wifi (using EPS8266 module)
  • Indication: RGB LED used to display device status
  • Sensor Type: NDIR (Dual Beam)
  • Range: 400-2000 ppm
  • Resolution: 10 ppm
  • Accuracy: +/- (40ppm +2%) readings
  • Response time T90: 30s
  • Repeatability: <2%
  • Sampling Method: Diffusion
  • Working temperature: 0 - 50 degrees Celsius
  • Lifespan: >10 years
  • Power: Micro USB

Risks & Challenges

I've been working on this topic since 1 year. This isn't my first crowdfunding campaign (here is my previous one: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1426779659/simple-co2-monitor). So i believe i have worked out most of the things:

  1. PCB Design, Software and Firmware are reused from my other projects and are already quite mature
  2. The sensor i use is a mature product that is maintenance-free
  3. After 3D printing more than 10 kg plastic i am quite confident that there will not be surprises
So from technology point of view everything is set

Other Ways You Can Help

Spreading the word is sometimes as valuable for Crowdfunding campaigns as baking, if not - even more valuable. If you know people that could find this project interesting, please let them know, share the idea

story:
Introducing the Tactalis Origin

A revolutionary computer that lets you feel what you touch

Origin is the first tactile computer interface platform that gives people without sight the ability to explore, create, edit and share interactive digital media from a single accessible device.


Our groundbreaking platform embeds an array of switchable magnets beneath any LCD panel to instantly create tangible reproductions of images that are normally displayed only as pixels of light. In terms of both use and form factor, the Origin interface is not unlike many tablet computers. To achieve what has not been done before, users who explore content on our touchscreen while holding a metal stylus or wearing a metallic ring on their fingertip, are able to feel the force of the embedded magnetic fields emitted from the display wherever a feature of interest is located.


THE GOAL

With this technology we have created an opportunity to transform Braille publications and hardcopy tactile graphics in the same way that Apple and Amazon have transformed music and books:

We will digitize twentieth century content formats, democratize access to all users, and distribute information better than ever before.

The current best methods for displaying graphical content to blind and visually impaired users are braille and raised line thermoforms. These materials are expensive, static and difficult to produce.








AWARD WINNING TECHNOLOGY

2014
Award
Donor
ASTECH Innovation Award Finalist Alberta Science and Technology Foundation
Alberta's Top 25 Most Innovative Companies Alberta Venture Magazine
VenturePrize Fast Growth Finalist TecEdmonton
Top 25 Up and Coming Canadian ICT Companies* The Branham Group
TechRev Innovator Innovate Calgary
 
2013 Biggest Social Impact Startup* Startup Calgary Launch Party
Best Information Technology First Look Presentation* Banff Venture Forum
Perfect Pitch Prize Winner* Innovate Calgary Tech Showcase
 
2012 Best Geo-Technology Startup* Startup Calgary Launch Party
Hochhausen Access Technology Research Award* Canadian National Institute for the Blind
 
* As Invici Technologies Inc.










Revolutionary Hardware


The Origin is an all in one computer running Windows 8.1, meaning you can use all of your existing apps and accessories with it.







TACTALIS FORWARD DEVELOPMENT SCHEDULE

Funds raised from Indiegogo will be used for the first production run of Origin hardware. We expect to complete final design and hardware preparations by December 2014. Production will start in 2015 and we're estimating initial production will take 8 weeks. Those units will be tested for quality assurance and then shipped to customers.



PERKS


TACTALIS IN THE PRESS


OUR SUPPORTERS & ALLIES

To achieve what has not been done before, users who explore content on our touchscreen while holding a metal stylus or wearing a metallic ring on their fingertip, are able to feel the force of the embedded magnetic fields emitted from the display wherever a feature of interest is located.




THE GOAL


With this technology we have created an opportunity to transform Braille publications and hardcopy tactile graphics in the same way that Apple and Amazon have transformed music and books:


We will digitize twentieth century content formats, democratize access to all users, and distribute information better than ever before.


The current best methods for displaying graphical content to blind and visually impaired users are braille and raised line thermoforms. These materials are expensive, static and difficult to produce.






AWARD WINNING TECHNOLOGY



2014
Award
Donor


ASTECH Innovation Award Finalist
Alberta Science and Technology Foundation


Alberta's Top 25 Most Innovative Companies
Alberta Venture Magazine


VenturePrize Fast Growth Finalist
TecEdmonton


Top 25 Up and Coming Canadian ICT Companies* 
The Branham Group


TechRev Innovator
Innovate Calgary


 


2013
Biggest Social Impact Startup*
Startup Calgary Launch Party


Best Information Technology First Look Presentation*
Banff Venture Forum


Perfect Pitch Prize Winner*
Innovate Calgary Tech Showcase


 


2012
Best Geo-Technology Startup*
Startup Calgary Launch Party


Hochhausen Access Technology Research Award*
Canadian National Institute for the Blind


 


* As Invici Technologies Inc.








Revolutionary Hardware

The Origin is an all in one computer running Windows 8.1, meaning you can use all of your existing apps and accessories with it.






TACTALIS FORWARD DEVELOPMENT SCHEDULE

Funds raised from Indiegogo
will be used for the first production run of Origin hardware. We expect to
complete final design and hardware preparations by December 2014. Production
will start in 2015 and we're estimating initial production will take 8 weeks.
Those units will be tested for quality assurance and then shipped to customers.




PERKS













TACTALIS IN THE PRESS













OUR SUPPORTERS & ALLIES

story:
All units have been shipped except where contributors did not confirm their shipping address and have not responded to emails. If this is you, please contact hackrfblue@gmail.com immediately. After November 1st 2015 all remaining boards will be donated to hackerspaces.
Missed out on the Indiegogo campaign and want a HackRF Blue? We have very limited numbers available.
The goal of this campaign is to provide underprivileged hackerspaces with free HackRF(s). Instead of asking for donations, we have created a lower-cost build of Michael Ossmann's open source HackRF and we will be providing these as perks for a contribution.

You can use the HackRF Blue in any way that you would use the HackRF One - the same software, the same firmware, and the same antennas. 

Why is the HackRF Blue This Cheap?

  • The components used in our boards come out of the same factories that supply RS components, Mouser, and Digikey but we go straight to the source. None of our components are 'no-name';
  • Our team is based in a major manufacturing hub - the exact same place the original boards are made;
  • We have strong connections with the PCB and component manufacturing community, and every member of our team speaks Chinese which also goes a very long way towards getting things done efficiently;
  • Instead of organizing manufacturing from afar, we're on the ground on the factory floor. This also has the added benefit of preventing the manufacturer from switching components behind our backs, something that is commonplace and happened to Michael Ossmann himself during prototyping, and we suspect during production too (on at least some boards, resulting in performance issues);
  • We've spent 6 months finding and testing components, as well as negotiating favorable terms with manufacturers;
  • We don't need to make a profit, we just need to cover our costs when giving out free boards; and
  • We've left out the clock-in and clock-out headers as well as interface/expansion headers on the base version, many have not been using these and want a cheaper option.

What is the Current Status of the Project? 

We currently have working prototypes, but some minor things on the final version will change. These items  include changes to the acrylic case, as well as using a smaller heatsink (yes, we have included a heatsink on the Blue). 

Here's one of our initial builds to feast your eyes on:

Performance, Compatibility and Reliability

  • RF performance is basically the same as the HackRF One through the whole spectrum from 6GHz down to 125kHz. We were able to listen to shortwave radio on 4.9MHz and get data from low-frequency RFID at 125kHz (this is not an improvement, the HackRF One can also do this);
  • The device is 100% compatible with the HackRF One. All software and firmware for the HackRF One will work on the HackRF Blue in exactly the same way;
  • Each individual device will of course be thoroughly tested before shipping.
Features/specifications
  • ~5 MHz to 6 GHz operating frequency
  • half-duplex transceiver
  • up to 20 million samples per second
  • 8-bit quadrature samples (8-bit I and 8-bit Q)
  • compatible with GNU Radio, SDR#, and more
  • software-configurable RX and TX gain and baseband filter
  • software-controlled antenna port power (50 mA at 3.3 V)

    • About the Perks

    HackRF Blue ($200) 

    Comes with a USB cable. Interface headers as well as the clock-in/clock-out headers can be added at any time with basic soldering skills.

    Acrylic Case Kit ($9)

    A clear acrylic case to protect your HackRF. Comes with risers and screws. The final version will use smaller risers, lowering the height of the top acrylic layer, we didn't have any when taking these pictures but it should look something like this (below).

    Telescopic Antenna ($19)

    The antenna covers 33MHz to ~1GHz. It is extends from 20-110cm in length. It is very sturdy and has a double-elbow joint for convenience along with a removable 'base'. It's matched to the HackRF Blue and is a great antenna to get started with.

    Antenna + Acrylic Case Combo ($26)

    If you need the antenna as well as the acrylic case, get this combo for a discount.
    Expansion Header Pack ($13)


    Clock-in/clock-out SMA headers + clock cable, the original headers, and some extra headers, as well as some interface cables. We will use female headers for the key headers on the final version instead of the male headers pictured, this is to maintain compatibility with add-on shields etc. All required soldering is done by us.

    Mega Combo Pack ($34)


    Acrylic case kit, clock-in/clock-out SMA headers + clock cable, the original and extra interface headers, a set of interface cables, and the telescopic antenna. All required soldering is done by us.

    Mega Combo with RF Shielding ($40)

    Acrylic case kit, clock-in/clock-out SMA headers + clock cable, the original and extra interface headers, a set of interface cables, the telescopic antenna, and RF shielding. If you don't know whether you need the RF shielding or not, you probably don't need it, just get the cheaper combo instead. All required soldering is done by us.

    Shipping and Delivery

    Shipping is $8 to $14 depending on your location (see table here). Shipping for additional boards is $3-$5 each. Registered express airmail is used for shipping, and delivery times range from 5-14 days. Packages will be marked as computer peripheral trade samples with a minimum value, feel free to let us know if you want something different. Any taxes or duties imposed by the recipient's country are of course the responsibility of the recipient. 

    We expect to ship sometime in March, however we may be able to ship in late January and will do our absolute best to make that happen. If shipping does not occur in January there's a total shutdown in China during February (the whole month) when everything gets put on hold. Watch the updates on this campaign to see what's happening with manufacturing etc, we will be posting regular updates.

    Shipping of perks will occur in the same order that contributions are received.

    Hackerspaces to Receive a free HackRF

    SDR is the spark that will ignite the next generation of RF communications technology. SDR does to the RF spectrum what sound cards did to the audio spectrum, and we got MP3 etc out of that, which is the only reason we now have YouTube, podcasts, iTunes, etc. Who knows what people will think of for the RF spectrum, anything could happen and it's very exciting. People in disadvantaged regions of the world have just as much to contribute in terms of innovation and technological development but have less access to technology. If they aren't able to work with software defined radio, it won't only be them who miss out, but everyone who stands to benefit from the development of radio communication technology. In order to increase access to SDR technology, a number of hackerspaces will receive one free HackRF (or more) at the end of the Indiegogo campaign. We have a list of 26 (and counting) hackerspaces based on how many members they have, how cheap the fees are, and how needy the community is.

    We will most likely need to increase this list (assuming we sell all the perks), so please see the background information and requirements here and suggest a hackerspace that you are a member of, or that you know about, we need your help.

    Here's a cool stop-motion map showing which hackerspaces we are targeting so far.


    No Sweatshop Conditions Allowed

    All members of our team have spent plenty of time in Chinese factories and are acutely aware of the conditions faced by factory staff. There's not a lot of point in helping out one community if it comes at the cost of slave labor in another. We are using factories and suppliers that treat their staff well. All staff involved in the production of the HackRF Blue and accessories earn a proper living wage and do not work extended or fatiguing hours. We will be there on the factory floor every step of the way to make sure. 

    FAQ

    Q: I want the $200 hackrf blue – BUT I also want the $40 combo. Do I need to contribute twice? Or can I somehow do this in a single order?
    A: You can add the $40 to your contribution for the HackRF Blue perk, or you can contribute twice, both are acceptable.

    Q: What happens if I forget to add the shipping fee to my perk?
    A: You can add this later as an additional contribution (please use the same email address as your perk) or pay it directly through Paypal (contact us).

    Q: I’m signed up for the HackRFBlue + mega combo pack + shipping. However, I’d like to change to get the mega combo with shielding… Is there a way that I can do this?
    A: Simply add the price difference between the perks you initially requested, and the perks you want, then email hackrfblue@gmail.com with the details of what you have done, along with your shipping address.

    Q: When is shipping? I can't find any information on the campaign page.
    A: Scroll back up, and read again. Pay extra special attention to the section titled "Shipping and Delivery" ;-)

story: Hello
story_txt: Hello

story:
New Site now live at https://anonabox.com ! Come check it out

What is the anonabox?

The anonabox is an embedded linux device that routes all Internet traffic over the Tor network. This provides the security, anonymity and censorship-bypassing power of the Tor network without having to download or configure software. This is the first commercially available router to do this where all the software is Open Source.  

You could call the anonabox a cloaking device. It not only hides your location and online activity, but also allows uncensored access to the web in places where Internet sites are blocked or monitored. 

Normally to use Tor someone would download software called the Vidalia browser bundle and run it on their computer. Although this allows them access to the Tor network, it only encrypts Internet traffic within that browser, allowing other Internet traffic to leak through from other programs and potentially reveal the persons private information, Internet use and location.

How Hard is it to Use?

Pretty easy, first you plug in the usb power cable to power up the device a blue LED will come on letting you know its on. Then you plug in a cable to the side labled WAN and connect it to your router. Then with your wireless device (laptops, cell phones, tablets, etc) connect to it wirelessly. That it! If you want to connect by direct cable you plug in another cable to the side labled LAN.

The anonabox is a physical device a person can plug into that ensures ALL traffic coming out of their computer no matter what is all routed into the Tor network, closing that potential security problem.

Who is making this?

The lead developer for this device is August Germar, an IT security professional with over a decade of enterprise level security experience as CTO of 2interactive; a conglomeration of Internet Service providers. While there he was responsible for security of a datacenter of corporate servers as well as dedicated and co-located servers for clients and spent countless hours defending them from a wide range of security threats. He now does consulting for business clients ranging from legal firms to hospitals. He also volunteers for the Tor support forum the Tor Stack Exchange, and is an admin for the official Tor project discussion page on LinkedIn. 

Is this the same device I saw on another crowd funding site?

We first made a Kickstarter project for this. Our primary goal was to attract attention from developers who wanted to polish the code and bring a device like this to people who needed it, and maybe even have some fun along the way. We had never done a crowd funding project before, but thought the visibility of the site would help draw attention to the project from the developer community. 

Turns out, most of the people who saw it just wanted the device, but we got a lot of input from developers and the Open Source community as well. 

We never dreamed there would so much interest in this idea! We are happy we were wrong because now the attention and feedback we received was enough to make the device better than ever. The Open Source community rose to the occasion, and concerns were raised about the code for the operating system and configuration. 

Whereas the version posted was a plain vanilla proof of concept for developers like us to work on all the feedback allowed us to make the software better than ever too, and now we have an extremely secure updated version of the software and configs based on an updated version of the Open Source project called P.O.R.T.A.L, which is audited and maintained by one of the most respected members of the security community known as the grugq. We are also incorporating many ideas implemented by Jacob Applebaums work on the Debian branch of the Tor hardware router project to make sure it is as secure as possible. 

Our initial plan was to find people who wanted to work with us on a project to develop these devices, we asked for $7,500 and received 80 times that amount. With this money came an overwhelming influx of support and assistance, as well as scrutiny and criticism, all of which have been helpful in reshaping this new launch of a finalized, polished version of the product.

Now that we know so many others share our interest in this device we are more excited than ever to get these into the hands of the people who want it. The interest in we saw was inconceivable before it was posted originally, but now that we know the scale of interest we are better prepared than ever to meet that demand.

What made it better?

After the feedback we got from the first crowdfunding campaign we went back to the drawing board and totally started over from scratch. The new version we are calling gen 5 will have:

  • -All new totally custom circuit board avalable nowhere else in the world
  • -Redesigned outer case and smaller form factor (images of the new case will be posted in the updates!)
  • -Hardened version of OpenWrt the Open Source Operating system,
  •  -Latest version of Tor software and more secure configuration.
  • -Automatic updates of Tor software (no need to configure!)

What We Need & What You Get

In order to bring this device to the next level we need your help:

  • -Adding features and customization's from the feedback from the first (developer focused) campaign costs more.
  • -Part of creating this to meet demand requires FCC certification.
  • -The funds from our backers will go to paying for production costs, and a portion will also be donated to the Official Tor Project and the Electronic Frontier foundation.
  • -Some funds will also be used to bring online new exit nodes to increase the speed and resiliency of the Tor network overall. 

The Impact

Why does the world need a device like this?

  • Censorship at the national level is increasing every day in many countries around the world.
  • Anonymous Internet access is becoming increasingly rare and difficult to attain for the average non-technical person.
  • This will be the first Open Source commercially available device of its kind!

Risks & Challenges

People value transparency. All sourcecode for this device will be released under the GPL licence and audited by some of the most respected security professionals in the world.

The anonabox can't help you if you don't know how to use it. Instructions for proper use in detail will be available online at the time of shipment.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help!

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this cause!

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Not everyone can afford to purchase a device like this, so we will be posting detailed instructions and resources for building one yourself with hardware you might have already, it will just require your time and some technical expertise. 

Thank you again everyone who has show your support with both pledges and feedback, especially the developers.

FAQ

Is this illegal?

-No there is nothing illegal about using Tor.

Can the software be updated by the enduser if a new version is released?

-The device will update itself to the latest most secure version of Tor automatically over an encrypted connection.

Will you ship to China?

-Yes, we will ship anywhere in the world.

Can I put it in between my modem and router?

-Yes, you can use it that way and it will work but your network will be noticably slower, thats the tradeoff for using Tor.

Will the anonabox effect latency on my gaming rig?

-Yes, this is not meant to be used to play video games and you will have a lot of latency. You'd be better off using your LAN

Can I use the wifi and RJ45 ethernet LAN connections at the same time?

-Yes you can use both the hardwired and wireless connections at the same time.

Will I be able to access Tor when I connect to the device wirelessly and not to my router. Meaning I will have 2 routers and 2 access wireless points, 1 which is my own router being torless, and the second being the device to access Tor solely?

-Yes, this is the typical way you would use it.

How will I know its working?

-You can check that the device is working at anytime by going to https://check.torproject.org

Does the anonobox connect to an external server for its VPN service?

-No, Tor is not a VPN service, but it will connect to other Tor servers spread out all over the world.

Where in the World are the Tor network servers located?

-All over! Here is a map: http://anonabox.com/about/exitnodes.php

Can you exclude some traffic from going over Tor? Like Netflix or crashplan?

-Not with this device. The way it is designed, everything no matter what you use is going to be routed over Tor.

Will it slow down my connection to the Internet?

-Yes, you will have a noticably slower connection. That is the tradeoff for having the power of Tor.

I've read that some Tor dev have (or will have) a look at your device, is it true ? Are you working with them?

-We are in contact with the official Tor project staff and they have agreed to audit the code before any devices ship out.

Will I need to install the tor web browser or can I use any regular browser?

-You can use any browser you like including the Tor browser bundle. You should know however that using the TBB will make the connection slower.

Is the grugq a member of the anonabox team?

No, but it would be wrong to not acknowledge the innovative work he has put in creating and auditing the PORTAL software, which is part of what makes this version so much better than before.  

Can you show some images of the new case design?

-Sure, here are a few

The interest in we saw was inconceivable before it was posted originally, but now that we know the scale of interest we are better prepared than ever to meet that demand.What made it better?After the feedback we got from the first crowdfunding campaign we went back to the drawing board and totally started over from scratch. The new version we are calling gen 5 will have:

-All new totally custom circuit board avalable nowhere else in the world


-Redesigned outer case and smaller form factor (images of the new case will be posted in the updates!)


-Hardened version of OpenWrt the Open Source Operating system,


 -Latest version of Tor software and more secure configuration.


-Automatic updates of Tor software (no need to configure!)

What We Need & What You GetIn order to bring this device to the next level we need your help:

-Adding features and customization's from the feedback from the first (developer focused) campaign costs more.


-Part of creating this to meet demand requires FCC certification.


-The funds from our backers will go to paying for production costs, and a portion will also be donated to the Official Tor Project and the Electronic Frontier foundation.


-Some funds will also be used to bring online new exit nodes to increase the speed and resiliency of the Tor network overall. 

The ImpactWhy does the world need a device like this?

Censorship at the national level is increasing every day in many countries around the world.


Anonymous Internet access is becoming increasingly rare and difficult to attain for the average non-technical person.


This will be the first Open Source commercially available device of its kind!

Risks & ChallengesPeople value transparency. All sourcecode for this device will be released under the GPL licence and audited by some of the most respected security professionals in the world.The anonabox can't help you if you don't know how to use it. Instructions for proper use in detail will be available online at the time of shipment.Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help!Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this cause!Use the Indiegogo share tools!Not everyone can afford to purchase a device like this, so we will be posting detailed instructions and resources for building one yourself with hardware you might have already, it will just require your time and some technical expertise. Thank you again everyone who has show your support with both pledges and feedback, especially the developers.FAQIs this illegal?-No there is nothing illegal about using Tor.Can the software be updated by the enduser if a new version is released?-The device will update itself to the latest most secure version of Tor automatically over an encrypted connection.Will you ship to China?-Yes, we will ship anywhere in the world.Can I put it in between my modem and router?-Yes, you can use it that way and it will work but your network will be noticably slower, thats the tradeoff for using Tor.Will the anonabox effect latency on my gaming rig?-Yes, this is not meant to be used to play video games and you will have a lot of latency. You'd be better off using your LANCan I use the wifi and RJ45 ethernet LAN connections at the same time?-Yes you can use both the hardwired and wireless connections at the same time.Will I be able to access Tor when I connect to the device wirelessly and not to my router. Meaning I will have 2 routers and 2 access wireless points, 1 which is my own router being torless, and the second being the device to access Tor solely?-Yes, this is the typical way you would use it.How will I know its working?-You can check that the device is working at anytime by going to https://check.torproject.orgDoes the anonobox connect to an external server for its VPN service?-No, Tor is not a VPN service, but it will connect to other Tor servers spread out all over the world.Where in the World are the Tor network servers located?-All over! Here is a map: http://anonabox.com/about/exitnodes.phpCan you exclude some traffic from going over Tor? Like Netflix or crashplan?-Not with this device. The way it is designed, everything no matter what you use is going to be routed over Tor.Will it slow down my connection to the Internet?-Yes, you will have a noticably slower connection. That is the tradeoff for having the power of Tor.I've read that some Tor dev have (or will have) a look at your device, is it true ? Are you working with them?-We are in contact with the official Tor project staff and they have agreed to audit the code before any devices ship out.Will I need to install the tor web browser or can I use any regular browser?-You can use any browser you like including the Tor browser bundle. You should know however that using the TBB will make the connection slower.Is the grugq a member of the anonabox team?No, but it would be wrong to not acknowledge the innovative work he has put in creating and auditing the PORTAL software, which is part of what makes this version so much better than before.  Can you show some images of the new case design?-Sure, here are a few

story:
Asheville Edge Lacrosse is committed to offering the best quality education and instruction in the game of lacrosse.  Our dedicated coaches are passionate about the game and have extensive knowledge developed over years of experience.  Every event we offer is designed to sharpen skills, build focus and enhance play.  We believe in building character, self-confidence and bringing each player’s game to the next level.  Our focus is to teach girls to be strong workers both on and off the field.  Lacrosse is so much more than just a game and we cannot wait to show you what we are made of!

Get the knowledge.  Get the confidence.  Get the Edge.



We are a girls lacrosse club in Western North Carolina and we need your help!

Our focus is educating girls in the game of lacrosse while building strong character, positive self-esteem and healthy habits.

Edge Lacrosse will never turn any girl away and wants to provide scholarships based on financial need- with your help.


Our Directors and Coaches have all been strongly impacted by the game of lacrosse and also have a deep passion for helping out the community.  We love what we do and want to pay it forward!!


Your contributions are directly supporting:

  • Building a secure website for online registration/information
  • Financial scholarships
  • Free community clinics


We need YOUR HELP!!  Every dollar you donate goes a LONG way! We aim to impact these girls in a positive way and give them tools that can last a lifetime.


Love and gratitude,

Rachel Hillhouse, Melissa Ciocian, Amanda Graves
