story:
New to IndieGoGo? Take a quick tour of the website to learn how it works.

We started VUDE to make a Virtual Reality (VR) Headset that is:

  • Affordable
  • High Quality
  • Fun to Use
  • Well-Designed

We were two college students who wanted to experience high quality virtual reality, but could not afford it.  We were stuck either selling our blood plasma for months on end in hopes of affording a high quality head set, or settling for a low quality experience by taping cardboard to our faces.

Neither of these options worked for us. So instead of waiting around for a better solution, we created it.  

Now almost anyone with a smartphone can experience games, videos, and interactive apps with a high quality and affordable VUDE Headset.  No more cardboard.  No more selling blood plasma.  No more waiting.

The VUDE VR headset is designed to be stylish, comfortable, and functional. 

Style: Wearing your VUDE Headset with its crisp curves and a polished finish will have onlookers wondering which year in the future you're from.

Comfort: The VUDE Headset sports a padded viewing apparatus in the front complete with an adjustable head mount strap that will make you forget you are even wearing the headset. 

Functionality: The VUDE Headset features two high-quality aspherical lenses and adjustment knobs on the top and sides to change the focal and lens distances, in order to keep your field of vision as crisp as possible. In the front, there is an easy-open magnetized door where you can load content on your iOS or Android smartphone, insert to enjoy. The adjustable interior accommodates most smartphones with a 3.5-5.5" screen size (Yes, it will fit your iPhone 6 Plus!). Additional technical specifications are below:

  • Headset dimensions: 7.48"x5.31"x3.93"
  • Premium ABS plastic material
  • Ultra high-quality aspherical lenses 
  • Focal distance adjustment knobs (sides) 
  • Lens width adjustment knob (top) 
  • Comfortable padded viewing area 
  • Adjustable padded head mounting straps 
  • Front smartphone mount (accommodates most smartphones with 3.5"-5.5" screen) 
  • Easy-open magnetized front
  • Removable, magnetic face plate for utilizing smartphone cameras for augmented reality apps 
  • Side openings for headphone jack/ smartphone charger access 
  • Design naturally cools enclosed smartphone
  • Bluetooth remote syncs with smartphone for wireless controls on many apps and games

Each VUDE VR Headset also comes with an easy-to-use, bluetooth remote. Whether you are playing games or navigating VR apps, this remote will do the job in a simple and elegant fashion, and doesn't distract from the experience. This can't be said about most other headsets whose controls are built onto the headset and don't always work across different smartphone devices.


Step 1: Get a VUDE Headset

Step 2: Start your favorite VR app on your smartphone

Step 3: Place your smartphone into your VUDE Headset

Step 4: Put on your VUDE Headset 

Step 5: Enjoy!

If you love playing games, then you'll love VUDE. There are currently HUNDREDS of Virtual Reality (VR) games and simulations for both iOS and Android devices that allow you to play in a 360-degree life-like experience. VUDE Headsets support all Google cardboard and most other VR smartphone apps. With new VR content being released everyday, you'll never run out of things to do on your VUDE Headset.


YouTube, GoPro, and other major video companies have announced the capability to record and playback videos in 360-Degrees. YouTube 360 and other services allow you to use your VR Headset to easily see videos in 360-Degrees in the most immersive way possible. And, if you prefer to just watch 3D videos and movies or simply want to watch traditional movies and video up close, it can do that too.


Use your VUDE VR Headset for much more than entertainment. The removable face plate makes it easy to utilize your smartphone's camera for using augmented reality apps that help you interact with your surroundings. Additionally, many people are finding uses for virtual reality for education, health care, real estate, and more. VUDE Headsets help you to truly achieve reality without limits.

VUDE gets funded, you get VUDE.  

  • The pieces are in place.  
  • The engine has been primed.
  • The "T"s have been crossed.  
  • The "i"s have been dotted.  
  • The stars are aligned.  

The last step is funding.  If you want to be a part of the movement that makes virtual reality high quality, affordable, and fun then like, share, tweet and PLEDGE !

The more you give, the more you get!

More stretch goals coming soon...

Risks and challenges

The biggest risk is VUDE not getting funded. Without VUDE, everyone will be left with overpriced or low quality alternatives. 

Other than that, the main risk at this point is manufacturer lead time. Although we have scheduled for possible manufacturer delays in the estimated delivery of our rewards, more delays could arise. Should this happen, we will clearly and quickly communicate to you, our backers, and work with the manufacturer to move the project along as quickly as possible.

We've already done 95% of the legwork with the manufacturer. All that's needed at this point is the funding so that we can officially place the order!

story:
Guy Haham proudly presents Spinphone
The latest smart phone gadget with a unique twist…

Spinphone is a new product, designed for making your time with the smart phone much
better!

With metal plate attached to your smart phone, and small magnet on the spinphone

you will discover a whole new world.

You can hold the Spinphone and easily spin the phone smoothly.

Or you can open the Spinphone into a standing position on a solid surface, and let the
phone spin.

Or just look at movies....

But this is not the only use for the Spinphone.
It is also designed to open beer bottles, which makes it a real party member.

In conclusion:
The Spinphone easily connects to your smart phone by a strong magnet,
which provides stability while spinning the phone smoothly 360 degrees, when holding the
device in your hand, or change its mode to standing position, placed on a solid surface.
Having a beer bottle opener included, makes it even more fun.



Spinphone
Upgrade your free time.

story:
Buying a computer is always a compromise between power, mobility and price. we created the LapTab powerful enough to deal with 99.5% of the daily tasks, light enough to carry around and, most important, at a very low price. 

What is LapTab?

LapTab is not only a tablet, it's a tablet that can be turned into a laptop in a few seconds. It comes with a stylish bluetooth Keyboard Case which allows you to do this.

What Operating System does LapTab have?

Windows 10 and Android 5.1. Yes, both of them. And you can switch anytime between them

For how long does the battery hold?

The battery holds for about 8 hours of continous using, 6 hours in video mode

How much RAM does it have?

It comes with 2GB of RAM

What's the storage of LapTab?

It has 32GB internal storage and has an additional MicroSD card slot up to 128GB.

How much does it cost?

For our first Indigogo backers it costs only 99$ (keyboard case included) for the 8" model and 159$(keyboard case with touchpad included) for the 10" model


 


Is it powerful enough?

For the LapTab power is not a compromise. It comes with a fresh Intel Z7300 Cherry Trail processor, build with 14nm technology, Quad-Core, 1.84GHz frequency and Gen8 HD graphics

What about the Keyboard?

For the 8" model it's a full keyboard case without touchpad, the 10" model has a touchpad too. The case is made of leather


Is the screen using IPS techology?

Yes. The screen is using IPS techology with 178 degrees viewing angle.

How much is the shipping cost?

The Shipping is FREE. Worldwide. It will take around 2 weeks for the US and Europe and up to 4 weeks for the other countries and regions

When will it be available? How much days will the shipping take?

The LapTab will get into production as soon as the Indigogo campain finishes, we estimate that till the end of June every backer will get it's LapTap.

Risks & Challenges

No risks. The LapTab is ready for production and it's quality is excellent. All the shippings will be insured and will have a tracking number, If you don't receive it we can resend or refund

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our campain to your friends and you will become our friend ;)

PS. Because some of you requested more images od our prototype we add them here..




And we also got a second version of our Keyboard...

story:
UPDATES,DESIGN,PERKS,STRETCH GOALS,FREE LITHIUMCARD,HOW TO ORDER

UPDATES & ANNOUNCEMENTS:

---

LithiumCard appears on Mashable, folks! Mashable!

---

Kuwaitiful has been a great supporter of our campaign and we had asked them if they'd be interested in doing a prototype review. And here it is! 

---

LithiumCard gets a coverage on TheNextWeb. Nice!

---

"Make a pledge and help LithiumCard become a reality", says Geeky Gadget!

---

LithiumCard received another awesome review and it's by GeekBeat.tv!! 

---

Thank you, Eli the Computer Guy, for the great review on LithiumCard!
(We fixed the links on the LinearFlux website. Thanks for that heads up!)

---

We've also updated our Stretch Goals. Check it out! »

----

----

Ahead of Schedule:

Great news we are ahead of our manufacturing schedule!! Tooling is almost complete and we will start pre-production soon…our dream is becoming a reality that will shortly be in everyone’s hands soon!

Please don’t forget the referral program so you can earn free LithiumCard(s) while you help spread the word! Keep visiting us on our Indiegogo site, facebook, and website for more updates!

Read more updates and announcements here »



DESIGN & FEATURES:

Presenting the first and only lithium HyperCharger. It has all the cables you need, generates the power of a wall charger, and at only 5 credit cards thick it will fit in most wallets. In order to revolutionize the way people charge, the LithiumCard had to meet all these goals. 



The exclusive HyperFET drive technology delivers up to 2 Amps of fast and safe energy back into your smartphone or electronic device. Many power hungry smartphones in the market today will have trouble turning back on if not supplied over 1 Amp of current.  Real-time monitoring maximizes the amount of charging, saving you time between charges. The HyperFET circuitry will charge your smartphone's internal battery up to an astonishing 1% per minute. 

For example, if the LithiumCard is plugged into your smartphone for 15 minutes, your smartphone will have a charge of up to 15%. In addition, the LithiumCard will automatically optimize the device's charging process so there's less time waiting. 


HyperFET circuitry will charge your smartphone's internal battery up to an astonishing 1% increase per minute. For example, if the LithiumCard is plugged into your smartphone for 15 minutes, then your smartphone will have a charge of up to 15% more capacity. 

With the fit and precision of a Swiss army knife, the LithiumCard has a flip-out USB for charging itself. And a pull-out micro-USB, or Apple Lightning connector for charging other devices. All LithiumCard's connectors can be hidden from view when not in use. 


LithiumCard is available in two versions: LithiumCard with a micro-USB connector which works with most Android devices, the Samsung Galaxy S4, HTC One, Nokia, Blackberry and many more. There's also the version with an Apple Lightning connector which works with all Apple iOS devices such as the iPhone 5/5S, iPad 4, iPad Air, iPod Gen 6+. 

*Please note the LithiumCard with the lightning connector is an additional $5.



Scrutiny to detail is only one part of the puzzle when we designed the LithiumCard. During R&D we extensively tested the reliability and strength to meet real world conditions.


If both your phone and the LithiumCard is out of charge, we have a unique bypass charging system, which allows you to simultaneously charge a smartphone and the LithiumCard’s internal battery. 



LithiumCard charges most popular smartphones and electronic devices today, such as Beats Studio Wireless headphone or Jawbone Jambox Mini. It has an Apple Lightning connector for your iPhone 5/5S, or a micro-USB connector for your Samsung Galaxy S4.


Step 1: Recharge it
When running low, flip-out the USB plug and charge it with any USB equipped charger, laptop, or cigarette lighter adapter.

Step 2: Plug it
Pop out the micro-USB or Apple Lightning connector and connect it to your device.

Step 3: Power it
Start the charging process by pushing the power button, once the light starts blinking.


Without using adhesives, NanoStik technology keeps the LithiumCard virtually stuck to your device. Over time, the NanoStik can get dirty, simply rinse with water to keep it at maximum "stickyness". 


Pressing the power button also indicates LithiumCard's power level. The precision nano-refraction lens display will say it all. 

White: Over 90% charged
Blue: Over 30% charged
Red: Less than 10% charged.


The LithiumCard is the future of HyperCharging that's available now. It's worth the hype, especially when you have it in 18K Gold!


UPDATES,DESIGN,PERKS,STRETCH GOALS,FREE LITHIUMCARD,HOW TO ORDER

THE PERKS:


UPDATES,DESIGN,PERKS,STRETCH GOALS,FREE LITHIUMCARD,HOW TO ORDER

STRETCH GOALS:


UPDATES,DESIGN,PERKS,STRETCH GOALS,FREE LITHIUMCARD,HOW TO ORDER

EARN A FREE LITHIUMCARD:

We believe in how LithiumCard will change the way you charge devices today and we know you feel the same too! To show our appreciation, when you refer the LithiumCard among your circle of family, friends and network, you have the opportunity to earn extra LithiumCard(s) by helping spreading the word!

Receive one LithiumCard for every $250 USD of additional funds generated by your unique referral link.

Click here for more info on the referral program.

In addition, the LithiumCard will automatically optimize the device's charging process so there's less time waiting. 
HyperFET circuitry will charge your smartphone's internal battery up to an astonishing 1% increase per minute. For example, if the LithiumCard is plugged into your smartphone for 15 minutes, then your smartphone will have a charge of up to 15% more capacity. 
With the fit and precision of a Swiss army knife, the LithiumCard has a flip-out USB for charging itself. And a pull-out micro-USB, or Apple Lightning connector for charging other devices. All LithiumCard's connectors can be hidden from view when not in use. 
LithiumCard is available in two versions: LithiumCard with a micro-USB connector which works with most Android devices, the Samsung Galaxy S4, HTC One, Nokia, Blackberry and many more. There's also the version with an Apple Lightning connector which works with all Apple iOS devices such as the iPhone 5/5S, iPad 4, iPad Air, iPod Gen 6+. *Please note the LithiumCard with the lightning connector is an additional $5.
Scrutiny to detail is only one part of the puzzle when we designed the LithiumCard. During R&D we extensively tested the reliability and strength to meet real world conditions.
If both your phone and the LithiumCard is out of charge, we have a unique bypass charging system, which allows you to simultaneously charge a smartphone and the LithiumCard’s internal battery. 
LithiumCard charges most popular smartphones and electronic devices today, such as Beats Studio Wireless headphone or Jawbone Jambox Mini. It has an Apple Lightning connector for your iPhone 5/5S, or a micro-USB connector for your Samsung Galaxy S4.Step 1: Recharge itWhen running low, flip-out the USB plug and charge it with any USB equipped charger, laptop, or cigarette lighter adapter.Step 2: Plug itPop out the micro-USB or Apple Lightning connector and connect it to your device.Step 3: Power itStart the charging process by pushing the power button, once the light starts blinking.


Without using adhesives, NanoStik technology keeps the LithiumCard virtually stuck to your device. Over time, the NanoStik can get dirty, simply rinse with water to keep it at maximum "stickyness". 
Pressing the power button also indicates LithiumCard's power level. The precision nano-refraction lens display will say it all. White: Over 90% chargedBlue: Over 30% chargedRed: Less than 10% charged.
The LithiumCard is the future of HyperCharging that's available now. It's worth the hype, especially when you have it in 18K Gold!

story:
Soccer4 Launch Campaign

Soccer4 is a natural extension of the spirit and community created through the 100%

volunteer efforts of Sparkes, da Luz, and all the coaches at My Yute Soccer (MYS), a

local non-profit organization providing free soccer camps in Oakland since 2008.  

Given the growing popularity, demand, and quality programs offered through MYS,  

Sparkes & da Luz decided to create a revenue generating stream of income to help

make MYS sustainable.  Your pledges will support our initial product launch and

help get Soccer4 started!   

Soccer4 is currently working with three artists/designers, including Founder & COO, R. Sparkes.  A sample set of soccer fashion is in production (see current samples in our gallery page) and a sample set of uniforms for both adults and children are in the final stages of design phase.  

Current Oakland love includes

  • Keith "Kdubb" Williams
  • CLP Screen Printing & Embroidery
  • Apparel Source

See our Gallery page for more information regarding these Oakland collaborators.

Who are Soccer4 owners?  

Co-owners, Rovel S. Sparkes & Joanne C. da Luz, are avid soccer fans and players, with respective histories and traditions that led them to share in the beautiful game.  They aspire to provide Soccer4 clients with a unique and artistic shopping experience.  

da Luz is a current Mills MBA student and former high school math teacher of 17 years.  She is also an NCAA Women’s Soccer Champion and has coached and trained youth in the sport. 

Sparkes is currently directing the My Yute Soccer Camp, curating the design of Soccer4, managing the tasting room at Linden Street Brewery, and continues to play soccer in the East Bay Men’s Senior Soccer League.  

Where will your pledges go?  

Your funding will go toward design, production, distribution, purchasing, and infrastructure needed to launch the entire inaugural product line. As founders of My Yute Soccer, Sparkes & da Luz have designated 15% of Soccer4 profits to My Yute Soccer. 

The campaign rewards reflect your pledges- Soccer4 t-shirts, hats- hoodies will all be yours, including the camaraderie and joy we share in the beautiful game!  

Footballers and Fanatics!  You can enjoy an EPL Game during a

Sunday at Soccer4.  See Perk Descriptions for Manager's Special

and Team Captain!  (see Gallery Page for a video of Real vs.

Barcelona at Soccer4)

Other ways you can support Soccer4?

Soccer4 also hosts the MYS Headquarters!  We will always have a selection of "previously enjoyed" soccer shoes for little footballers that can be purchased for $10 or traded for comparable cleats.  Has your child or cousin or niece grown out of theirs or just have too many to count?  Send us an email with subject title "little shoes for little footballers" and we'll respond asap. 

What's the history of My Yute Soccer?

My Yute Soccer, created in 2008, is the brainchild of Rovel Sparkes, who played soccer as a kid in the streets of Kingston, Jamaica. On a long flight back to California after  watching the 2006 World Cup in Germany, he decided to do it. Sparkes noted that fees for participation in local soccer clubs is prohibitive for many families and access to experienced coaches is limited.  He went to his fellow players at the Africari soccer club and asked them to help him set up a free soccer camp for East Bay youth from diversesocio-economic backgrounds. He quickly got a group behind the idea, and they began raising money, through t-shirt and hat sales. The first soccer camp took place in summer 2008, MYS became a registered 501(c)3 in November 2008 and has since earned an East Bay Express Best of the Bay award in 2012 and Oakland Innovator’s Award in 2011 from Oaklandish.

Sparkes has fond memories of soccer in his neighborhood as not only an opportunity to share his skills and talents as a player but also as a vehicle for building community.  As reported in "One Man Works to Create Unity on the Field," by Jill Repogle, “I had such a beautiful childhood, said Sparkes, who’s now 46 years old, tall and athletic. I wanted to create the samething here.”

story:
Summary

TruthSeeker has been delivering alternative media news and views to users since 2010 with our non-profit Android and iOS apps and we need to upgrade the user experience. 

To date 100,000+ downloaders across the World have been glued to our app and the truth behind the news that corporate media just doesn't deliver. With regular programmes from The Corbett Report, Alex Jones, The Unexplained, Democracy Now, Scott Horton, The Conspiracy Show, Red Ice Radio, Max Keiser, Conspiracy Queries and more.

The trouble is everyone has been using the same old app for four years now and although it works well enough, it could be so much more. More video, more news, more interactivity, more variety, so much more. 

What We Need 

We're asking you today if you can chip in. If just 1% of our audience contributes $1, we can hit our target and will be able to release a new iOS version within weeks and improve the way we deliver the truth to thousands. 

So we're asking you; the freethinkers, the libertarians, those TruthSeeker downloaders who have been entertained and enlightened by our apps to help us either by dropping a dollar our way or promoting this campaign to those friends of yours that might. 

Risks & Challenges

We don't see any particular problems if we get the backing (apart from being bumped off by 'the agency').

The budgets are set, we need to do this now and we're ready for anything!

story:
Trafalgar Solution's principal product, iGotem® will be used by organizations, municipalities and individuals to improve relationship and communication between the community and law enforcement worldwide.

 

iGotem will empower citizens and reduce crime and allow users to combat crime within their communities by uploading a recorded incident to the nearest law enforcement office. The application will notify law enforcement of the date, time, and location of the crime in progress. The combination of this information along with the general images taken by users will allow accurate reporting while protecting the identity of the user. We need funds to further develop the application in these areas:

 

 

  • Requirements

  • Video recording

  • Voice recording

  • Google GPS Full License

  • GEO-Location API

  • Walkie-talkie

  • Wanted ticker

  • Strategic Marketing

  • Product Branding

  • Graphics

 

How will my contribution be spent?

We will spent your contribution money towards the production cost and design/updates of the iOS, Android and Blackberry apps. (minus the ~10% that will go towards backer perks/shipping and the 4-9% that IndieGoGo deducts, depending on whether we meet our goal). 

 

Wouldn't be awesome if criminals we afraid of us? The people who carry smartphones virtually have a pocket surveillance camera on them and can report crime each time they see it. This surely would make a criminal think twice. Join me in combating crime and making this paradigm shift happen. Use #igotemapp

 

 

We need your help to make this app one of the most important apps you will ever download. If only we had app like this when Sandy Hook community, Boston, Chicago and all the other terrible deaths happened. We could help law enforcement more than ever using technology.

If you're not able to help with donating money you can help by telling your friends and family members  "Let's fight crime together one download at a time!"

 

 

You're with me 100% but financially you can't contribution. How can I help?

 

Sharing our campaign with your family,friends and colleagues on social media like Facebook and Twitter is really appreciated, its a great contribution in helping us reach our goal!!!  The more people we can reach with our campaign, the better our chances of making this become a reality and jump starting  iGot'em all over the world!

This is how we can make it easier for you!

Want to share our campaign but lost for words? not sure what to post? Copy and paste one of these posts with our campaign link to your social media connections (Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Google+...) to let people know about your support for our project and to help combat crime together. Or you can tell them the story about how I was inspired to create iGotem and why you'd like to see this project take off. 

For Facebook, Google+

 

I've joined Team iGot'em because I want to be a part of fighting crime and making criminals think twice before committing a crime. If you do, too, check out this link! http://www.igotemapp.com

"It Takes an App to catch a Thief" I'm making a difference in combating crime on Team iGot'em. Join us!   http://www.igotemapp.com 

"Make the criminals afraid of us" We carry smartphones! Join me on Team http://www,igotemapp.com 

 For Twitter:

 

 I've joined Team iGot'em because I want to be a part of combating crime! http://goo.gl/odBMM  

"Use iGot'em let's combat crime together." I'm starting here, on Team iGot'em. Join us! http://goo.gl/odBMM

"Pardigm Shift, Make the criminals afriad of us. Use iGot'em!" Join me on Team iGot'em http://goo.gl/odBMM

 

Check out my Team and we are growing!

Krisn Ramcharitar Software Engineer

www.linkedin.com/pub/krisn-ramcharitar/22/a61/616/

Jon Maki: IP Attorney

www.linkedin.com/pub/jon-maki/1/2b7/345/

Ronald Fitzpatrick: Chief Fianancal Officer

www.linkedin.com/pub/ronald-fitzpatrick/5/a7b/57a/

story:
Hello everyone, my name is Nicholas King and I am 15 years of age and I attend ElDorado high school I will be a sophomore this upcoming semester. I have been participating in track and field for the past 3 years and have accumulated a large number of first place medals. My events are Long Jump, 400m, 4x100, and 4x400. For the new school year I will be participating as a varsity in the following events, Triple jump and 200m, I continue to tell myself that I will get better and faster if I am competing against faster and better athletes.

The 4th of July weekend I will be participating in Regional’s in Phoenix, Arizona I have no drought in my mind that I will advance to the next level in Greensboro, NC JR Olympics

Small or large Contributions are very much welcome which will pay for my airfare, my hotel and food expenses, airfare tickets continue to climb as each day goes by, my coach have reserve rooms at the hotel for $63.00 a night and that price will remained the same. I thank you for the opportunity to bring home the gold and to make all American in all my events.    

 

The Funds are for my Airfare, Hotel and food expenses for the 5 days in Greensboro, NC, big or small will be a great help, the price for the airfare gets going up and down as each day go by.

To stand on the podium and become an all American for my track team, Technical Precision Athletics, would be a great accomplishment for now and my future. I will ensure that on each video that I put on you tube I will mention you as a contributor to my campaign at the beginning of each video

 

 I have been participating in track and field for 3 years and have accumulated a large number of first place medals. My events are Long Jump personnel best is 21”9’, in the 400m I have set a time of 52.7 sec, the 4x100 my split time is 11.5 and in the 4x400 my split is 51.39.

The photo with the medals I accomplished this year as a freshman for El Dorado high school track and field, 14 Gold, 2 Sliver and 1 Bronze.

 

Note: I will repost ASAP, seen that the deadline is incorrect, the meet kick off 23 July thru 27, filght arrangements will be made in the near future, so as to get the best airfare

story:
Dear Friends,

I have been given the chance to be apart of a six week International Sports Ministry Internship in Stellenbosch, South Africa. This six-week experience is designed to train the next generation of sports ministry leaders to impact the world for Jesus Christ. ... God has really blessed me with this opportunity to be equipped and to do international sports ministry as well as build leadership skills abroad.

As an intern I would stay in Stellenbosch, South Africa, hosted by local ministry, Sports For Christ Action South Africa (SCAS) for the entirety of the internship. Training will incorporate classroom teaching, team and individual challenges and local ministry experiences. I will have the opportunity to receive training from experienced sports missionaries and teachers. Topics to be covered include: Biblical Basis for Sports Ministry, Cultural Sensitivity, Evangelism, Sports Ministry Models and Teambuilding. Interns will also engage in practical local sports ministry, including outreaches and camps.

I write to ask you to support me in any way that you are able. Prayer is what I need the most, I would ask that you pray for the safety of the group during the time we will be gone, and that God will use us and our talents to show Christâ€™s love to those who have never seen it. I also ask if you are able, for a financial contribution. Any amount that you feel led to give will be of huge assistance. The cost of the program is $1800 and the round-trip flight to South Africa will probably be around $2,000.

I have never been anywhere like South Africa before and feel like this season of my life would be the perfect time to go. I am graduating from UNC in May of this year and will be going to South Africa right after graduation. Instead of graduation gifts this year, I would much rather support for this trip.

I am extremely grateful for any type of support that you feel led to give. Please let me know if you have any questions about this internship and what it entails.

Thank you again, for your consideration to assist me as I embark this God-given opportunity.

In Christ,

Elizabeth Huegel
919-815-8229
ehuegel.huegel@gmail.com
201Howell St. Apartments, 100B
Chapel Hill, NC 27514

 God has really blessed me with this opportunity to be equipped and to 
do international sports ministry as well as build leadership skills 
abroad.  As an intern I would stay in Stellenbosch, South 
Africa, hosted by local ministry, Sports For Christ Action South Africa 
(SCAS) for the entirety of the internship. Training will incorporate 
classroom teaching, team and individual challenges and local ministry 
experiences. I will have the opportunity to receive training from 
experienced sports missionaries and teachers. Topics to be covered 
include: Biblical Basis for Sports Ministry, Cultural Sensitivity, 
Evangelism, Sports Ministry Models and Teambuilding. Interns will also 
engage in practical local sports ministry, including outreaches and 
camps. I write to ask you to support me in any way that you are
 able.  Prayer is what I need the most, I would ask that you pray for 
the safety of the group during the time we will be gone, and that God 
will use us and our talents to show Christâ€™s love to those who have 
never seen it.  I also ask if you are able, for a financial 
contribution.  Any amount that you feel led to give will be of huge 
assistance.  The cost of the program is $1800 and the round-trip flight 
to South Africa will probably be around $2,000.  I have never 
been anywhere like South Africa before and feel like this season of my 
life would be the perfect time to go.  I am graduating from UNC in May 
of this year and will be going to South Africa right after graduation.  
Instead of graduation gifts this year, I would much rather support for 
this trip.   I am extremely grateful for any type of support 
that you feel led to give. Please let me know if you have any questions 
about this internship and what it entails.   Thank you again, for your consideration to assist me as I embark this God-given opportunity. In Christ,  Elizabeth Huegel 919-815-8229 ehuegel.huegel@gmail.com 201Howell St. Apartments, 100B Chapel Hill, NC 27514

story:
Short Summary

I compete at the national level in the motorsport commonly known as tractor pulling. Recently, tractor pulling organizations have begun changing rules to allow electric powered garden tractors to pull against ICE (Internal Combustion Engine) powered tractors. One such organization is the National Quarter Scale ciruit, which now allows electric powered tractors to run in one of their classes.

One of the more demanding things you can do with electric powered vehicles is attach them to a nearly immovable object, which is exactly what happens to the vehicles involved in tractor pulling. I recognized this challenge and welcomed it, eventually using knowledge gained on previous electric conversion projects to build a garden tractor puller that is entirely electric. 

I have been active in tractor pulling since I was young, and have used my electric tractor in competition for the last three years. However, my tractor has not yet tapped the full potential of electric and is continually outperformed by its fossil-fueled competitors.  With a battery pack upgrade, I am now ready to change that. 

 

Campaign Details

The purpose of this campaign is to raise money to buy large cell lithium batteries and the required charging circuitry for them. Any additional funds will go to other upgrades -- for example, an even larger battery pack or an AC motor with the required controller/inverter. If possible, I would even like to be able to give it a cosmetic upgrade with body work to help it resemble its forerunners, i.e. GE Elec-Trak electric mowers produced in the early 70s.



Conclusion

I hope to make electric vehicles and what they can do more visible to the public. With your help we can try and show the true potential of an alternatie way of tractor pulling.

 

Thanks!

Julian Stahl Jr.

story:
Glass Apps for the Fire Service

 

Google Glass could be tremendously useful as a way to get mission critical information quickly and hands free for firefighters.  I am 1 out of 8000 that have been selected for by Google for the opportunity to buy an early verions of "Google Glass" and I need your help!

My name is Patrick Jackson and I've been a career firefighter for 7 years and currently a Fire Engineer.  I am also a mobile/web app developer.  

Google Glass could be a very useful tool for the fire service by providing timely and mission critical information directly to firefighters and command staff.  This can directly implact public and firefighter safety.

 

 

 

WHY $2000?

The price of the Google Glass unit is $1500 + tax and travel to NYC to pick it up.  This comes to right around $2000.  I have 14 days to purchase the unit - after this my invitation is expired.  If my goal of $2000 is not reached by July 15 then it is game over.  If you contribute and my goal is not reached then you will receive a refund.

In return for donations of $100 and over, I will give a demonstration of Google Glass and the app I create.  This is limited to 100 miles of Raleigh, NC.  I will travel further if travel expenses are paid.

Also the app will be publicly available once Google glass goes public.

The Impact

Contributing will help develop the next generation of mobile applications for the fire service.  These apps can improve safety of citizens and firefighters.  The app will be widely available to fire departments once the Google Glass  become available to the public(rumored to cost much less than $1500).  

I have experience developing applications for mobile and web platforms and am fully confident in the technologies involved.  For a more technical dive read this blog post. 

Even a small contribution will help.

If you can't contribute you can help by sharing this page with your contacts on Facebook, Twitter, or Google+.  There are buttons to share easily right from this page.

story:
mySkiva Home Cloud Router is now available from Amazon at a discounted price of $49.99. Please go to:

 http://www.amazon.com/Skiva-802-11n-Storage-mySkiva-RT001/dp/B00FXQUR86/ 

to order yours today.







Create Your Own Private Cloud

The mySkiva Cloud Router turns any USB hard drive into your own personal cloud server. mySkiva’s accompanying cloud app provides the ability to access your cloud network from smartphones, tablets, and computers.


    Why You Need a mySkiva Cloud

    Simplicity: The mySkiva Cloud app allows users to setup the mySkiva router in only 30 seconds. Unlike other cloud arrangements, there are nocomplex plans, subscriptions, or extra devices to carry around.

    Always Accessible: The mySkiva Cloud Router allows you to access your data from anywhere in the world at anytime.

    Private: The mySkiva Cloud Router creates a personal cloud that you own, no more renting from third-party services. Only you and those who you have entrusted with a password have access.

    No Fees: There are no monthly fees or signup for rented cloud space. Purchase the mySkiva Cloud Router once and enjoy your private cloud for years to come.

    Fast: The mySkiva Cloud Router is fast and allows you quick and easy access to your data files from your personal cloud in seconds. It is even great for in-home HD video streaming!

    Expandable: Using a USB hub and additional hard drives, you can harness unlimited expansion of your cloud storage. No more mobile device storage limitations!

    Energy Efficient: The mySkiva Cloud Router uses only 6W of power. That’s one tenth of a standard light bulb's power!


    Get Started Today

    Choose a donation option, and you will receive:

    1. The mySkiva Cloud Router with built-in cloud server management software;
    2. Downloadable cloud apps;
    3. All future updates to the mySkiva Cloud Router app software or router firmware at no cost.


    Setup your private cloud in 3 easy steps:

    1. Download the app on your smartphone or tablet.
    2. Plug in the mySkiva Cloud Router and personal hard drive.
    3. Setup the mySkiva Cloud Router using the app on your Smartphone or tablet.


    The Nuts and Bolts (or Technical Outline)

    mySkiva Cloud Router

    In addition to transforming your hard drive into cloud storage, the mySkiva Cloud Router:

    1. Can work as add-on: You can add this router to your network without removing your existing router.
    2. Is Fast. 300 Mbps 802.11n, fast enough to stream HD movies over your local network!
    3. Has a Warranty. mySkiva Cloud Router comes with a 12-month replacement warranty.
    4. Allows for Expansion. The mySkiva Cloud Router communicates with multiple hard drives when hooked up to a USB hub.

    mySkiva Cloud Access iPhone/iPad App

    The mySkiva Cloud Router app allows you to access files on your personal cloud from anywhere in the world.

    Possibilities include:

    1. You can watch your videos.
    2. You can forget about overloading with smaller hard drive capacities in your mobile devices and store your information on your private cloud.
    3. You can backup your smartphone, tablet and computer files, videos, and photos.
    4. You can create a centralized backup for your whole family’s data. Each member’s data can even be saved in a separate folder.
    5. You can share files, video, and photos with trusted friends and family.
    6. You can select songs from your entire music library while “on the go” (no need to pick and choose what music to load onto your devices).
    7. You can download files from your hard drive onto your device for offline access.
    8. You can view the status of your router and how many people are accessing your hard drive.
    9. You can change your router settings anywhere. If your friends and family have the mySkiva Cloud Router you can help them manage their routers across the globe.
    10. You can save money! You can easily arrange for 2,000 GB of cloud storage by using the mySkiva wifi router and purchasing a $100.00 drive! That same amount would cost you $795.00 per year using Dropbox storage!

    Watch the following video for a detailed demonstration of this app.

    Laptop Access

    Laptop users can access their cloud from anywhere using the following methods:

    On-Demand Connection: No need to install an app … just setup your computer to login to your cloud using your operating system file browser. Once setup, your computer will be able to access your hard drive on-demand with a click of a button!


    Internet Browser Access: Access your files through any web browser. This connection allows you to access your hard drive on any computer without creating a permanent connection. This temporary access is perfect for linking to your hard drive on a hotel, work, or friend’s computer!

    LAN Access: When plugged into the mySkiva Cloud Router, your hard drive will be visible on your local network to all of the computers in your house. Simply allow your computers to access the drive! 

    SmartTV and Console: You can also access and play files from your hard drive using your smart TV or game console (like the PS3).


    Want more technical details? Check out the infographic below:

    Project Progress

    We have been testing our routers for more than six months now and have passed through all the necessary regulatory approvals including FCC, CE, and ROHS. The MySkiva Cloud Router is ready for deployment at homes and businesses now.

    We have produced a small batch of 1800 MySkiva Cloud Routers for our Indiegogo backers, and now we need support for mass production! We have organized a strong support team to assist you, in the unlikely case that you encounter a problem after receiving your MySkiva Cloud Router.

    All Skiva apps have been subject to multiple cycles of development, testing, and improvements. In an unlikely event if you face any issue with the apps, our engineering team will respond quickly with a solution.


    How You Can Help

    We’ve made a tremendous product, but we have even greater plans! Now we need your support to:

    • Run a cost efficient mass production so that we can offer the mySkiva at an affordable price;
    • Finish our implementation of Android apps.

    Don’t forget, all improvements/updates for the mySkiva app software or router firmware will be offered to our backers free of charge forever!


    With your help, we can reach our stretch goals. This will allow our team to develop improvements that expand your cloud access beyond your USB hard drive!


    The Remote Desktop Option will allow you to access any computer on your home network from anywhere in the world.


    The Home Network Share Option will allow you to open any shared folders and files on your home network from anywhere in the world. This feature would be available as part of the cloud app. No computer necessary!


    The Remote Media Streaming Option will allow you to stream video and music remotely from your phone! Currently, you will be able to stream video and music from your local network, but if you are outside of your personal wifi network, you will download the file before viewing.


    The Remote Access IP Cameras Option will allow you to view live feed from your IP cameras at home!


    Frequently Asked Questions

    Is there a limit to the number of devices accessing the cloud at one time?

    No. Multiple users can access the drive at once. However, your cloud is only available to those who you have shared the access information with.

    What are the mySkiva warranty terms?

    You can review the mySkiva warranty terms here.

    What if I need multiple routers, will you have trouble supplying my need?

    No. We have partnered with a strong manufacturer and should be able to deliver bulk orders on time.

    Why is privacy such an important issue for cloud services?

    The information stored in a third-party server provider’s cloud is not as private as you may think. The following information reveals only a few of the hidden dangers in using a third party Cloud network rather than your own private Cloud made possible through mySkiva.

    1.  Multiple copies of the information submitted into an online Cloud are created and stored as backups in several locations that may be outside of the Cloud network you signed up for.

    2.  Privacy policies you sign to gain access to an online Cloud service make your “private” Cloud space not so private –- many policies allow the server provider to use your stored information. You technically don’t own the rights to information you’ve stored into the Could after you’ve submitted it.

    3.  When you push “delete,” you may think the files have disappeared. However, if you use an online Cloud, you’re files are still floating around and might be accessible to others even after you think you’ve deleted them.

    4.  Your media is on a provider’s server with an online Cloud but where are the servers exactly? Since many services have multiple networks interconnected in other states and countries, it’s impossible to know exactly where your files are being stored.

    5.  You’re not the only one signing privacy policies and terms of use. Your server provider also signs certain privacy policies with other companies when they use other services, which can complicate things a bit. With all of these policies granting access to files flying around it’s hard to know who’s actually looking at your stored information.

story:
It is a new start, not end!

Our campaign has ended, but you can place an order at www.DisplayModule.com .


About US

DisplayModule started in 2013, in Ningbo, China and are dedicated to provide you with easy-to-use TFT-modules with competitive pricing.

Our goal is to provide you with the best display modules and accessories, provide superior documentation as well as source code for all popular hardware platforms. This will get you started within minutes and let you focus on innovation.

Ningbo is a well-known import/export city with the second-largest port in the world, this lets us take advantage of competitive pricing and fast deliveries.


What Is RaspiVision?

Ever since we saw the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, we have been working on a unique integrated display solution. 

RaspiVision is a 7” integration display module for the Raspberry Pi Compute Module. It's essentially a same kind product as the Compute Module IO Board or development kit . 


Main Features

  • Based On Raspberry Pi Compute Module
  • Support 7” IPS TFT LCD (HDMI-to-LVDS convert) 
  • Support HiFiBerry High Quality Audio
  • 1 USB Host Port and 4 USB Slave ports
  • 10/100 Ethernet 
  • 26-pin Header Expansion Like Raspberry Pi and CSI , DSI Expansion


System Overview


Why RaspiVision？

  • To kick start your Compute Module development
  • Education Platform, for your children or in school
  • Information Panel
  • Interactive Painting
  • Play HiFi grade music


Why Indiegogo？

This is a product which we really believe in. We have a fully functional prototype and now we need your help to finalize the product and do the first batch production run.

So please, make a pledge and help making RaspiVision a reality.

Here is a dedicated PCB Ruler in the peak of "10$ PCB Ruler":



Progress And Timeline

Right now we have finished the 2nd Version of PCB. All functions are well tested. A laser acrylic cut case is coming now.


Aug. 2014: Get this idea, finalize the function specification

Sep.2014: Sourcing  components; Test key functions on breadboards;

Oct. 2014: Design PCB V1.0

Nov. 2014: Debug PCB V1.0; SW development;

Dec. 2014: Design & Debug PCB V1.1; Design the acrylic case;

Jan. 2015: <======== Now:  Start Indiegogo Campaign  ==========>

Feb. 2015: Update this campaign; 

Mar. 2015: Analyse the feedback of you; Preparing the stock;

Apr. 2015: Start batch Production

May. 2015: Test & Shipment


Risks & Challenges

Before launching this Campaign, we made sure to get our prototypes worked out. Please refer to  the blog for more detail. 

Risk 1: Compute Module may be out of stock in some countries. It is depend on Raspberrypi.org

Risk 2: The biggest component is the 7" IPS TFT LCD, its price and lead time are  different depend on the quantity. 

Risk 3: Resistive TouchScreen is not satisfied on 7" IPS TFT LCD. We'd like to change to Capacitive TouchScreen. It also depends on the pledged goal we reached.

However, like with any Hardware project, delays or minor mishaps are always a possibility. We'll try to keep them at a minimum and, if anything does pop up, we'll be sure to keep every one of you updated.


FAQ

  • 1. Will you flash the eMMC before shipping? With Raspbian?
-> Yes, if you choose "$199USD - Full RaspiVision Kit", we will flash the eMMC before shipping with Raspbian, both for testing and user convenience.

  • 2. Why is it 199$?

-> RASPBERRY PI COMPUTE MODULE KIT is 199$. While RaspiVision is also 199$, which has  7 Inch IPS HD LCD and more extra features.

 RaspiVision System Overview

Why RaspiVision？

To kick start your Compute Module development
Education Platform, for your children or in school
Information Panel
Interactive Painting
Play HiFi grade music


Why Indiegogo？
This is a product which we really believe in. We have a fully functional prototype and now we need your help to finalize the product and do the first batch production run.
So please, make a pledge and help making RaspiVision a reality.
Here is a dedicated PCB Ruler in the peak of "10$ PCB Ruler":




Progress And Timeline
Right now we have finished the 2nd Version of PCB. All functions are well tested. A laser acrylic cut case is coming now.






Aug. 2014: Get this idea, finalize the function specification
Sep.2014: Sourcing  components; Test key functions on breadboards;
Oct. 2014: Design PCB V1.0
Nov. 2014: Debug PCB V1.0; SW development;
Dec. 2014: Design & Debug PCB V1.1; Design the acrylic case;
Jan. 2015: <======== Now:  Start Indiegogo Campaign  ==========>
Feb. 2015: Update this campaign; 
Mar. 2015: Analyse the feedback of you; Preparing the stock;
Apr. 2015: Start batch Production
May. 2015: Test & Shipment

Risks & ChallengesBefore launching this Campaign, we made sure to get our prototypes worked out. Please refer to  the blog for more detail. Risk 1: Compute Module may be out of stock in some countries. It is depend on Raspberrypi.orgRisk 2: The biggest component is the 7" IPS TFT LCD, its price and lead time are  different depend on the quantity. Risk 3: Resistive TouchScreen is not satisfied on 7" IPS TFT LCD. We'd like to change to Capacitive TouchScreen. It also depends on the pledged goal we reached.However, like with any Hardware project, delays or minor mishaps are always a possibility. We'll try to keep them at a minimum and, if anything does pop up, we'll be sure to keep every one of you updated.FAQ1. Will you flash the eMMC before shipping? With Raspbian?-> Yes, if you choose "$199USD - Full RaspiVision Kit", we will flash the eMMC before shipping with Raspbian, both for testing and user convenience.
2. Why is it 199$?
-> RASPBERRY PI COMPUTE MODULE KIT is 199$. While RaspiVision is also 199$, which has  7 Inch IPS HD LCD and more extra features.

story:
The 5100 Custom Installer Edition

Beyond Your Usual Crowdfunding Campaign

Founded by Paul Darbee and Larry Pace, DarbeeVision is a small intellectual property company that licenses its high definition video processing technology and develops innovative new image enhancement products.

DarbeeVision has developed a proprietary, patented technology that brings a revolutionary, never-before-seen level of depth and realism to any image.  By integrating Darbee Visual Presence into existing digital image media devices, pictures become better than what even the most advanced cameras and displays can achieve. 

The resulting improvements go far beyond what fidelity improvements alone can do for image realism. Because the results are embedded in the pixels of an image, the process can be applied any time during the life of the image. 

In the next year DarbeeVision has the opportunity to significantly improve the products of two major industries that impact people's everyday lives.

1. Safety and Security

Our new Reveal technology will help clarify low-quality images from surveillance cameras to improve the analysis of video footage.  Because Reveal creates a profound level of image clarity, details that were previously obscured are enhanced.  Fog, haze and poor light conditions are automatically compensated for. Imagine how much more quickly criminals could be identified and apprehended with high resolution imagery.

Demo of Darbee Reveal Technology for security video:

2. Medical Imaging 

Our new Probe technology will greatly assist doctors and medical technicians in the diagnosis and treatment of all types of maladies by enhancing images to produce added realism, depth and clarity.  Probe will improve ultra-sound, X-ray and MRI imagery.

Probe will create video and images that are easier for clinicians to see and understand.  Your health and well being rely upon medical professionals being able to make good decisions about the details they see in the images of your body.  Probe dramatically helps them do that.

This is an example comparison image of Darbee ProbeTechnology for X-ray imaging:

DarbeeVision is seeking your help to bring both of these important technologies to market. 

Our Goal and the Offer

We are seeking $100,000 in contributions.  Your contributions will help cover the costs of product development and design, marketing research, engineering, tooling and other non-recurring start-up expenses.  In a nutshell, you will help us bring these two new significant technologies to the world.

To thank you for your help with our campaign, we are offering a range of Perks that will connect you with our team and our Visual Presence Technology.  If you are interested in seeing what our technology can do, we are offering attractive discounts on the Darblet and the brand new DVP5100CIE, which features phaseHD technology for perfected HDMI to 30 meters and beyond, USB for field re-programming, a new case with rear facing ports.   Or be one of the select few who will own the new DVP5100CIE Signature Edition model, bearing the iconic signature of DarbeeVision founder and inventor Paul Darbee.

You can select a Perk that fits your interest, or budget.  By supporting our campaign, you will become a part of this historic technological breakthrough that is quickly becoming the new standard for image quality and realism. 


The World Loves DarbeeVision Technology! 

The Darblet, which uses Visual Presence Technology to enhance home theater products, was introduced in 2012, and the response has been - ACCOLADES!


     


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, you can still help us by:

1.  Tell a Friend.  Get the word out about our campaign via email, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc. 

2.  Using the easy Indiegogo share tools.  You can win a Darblet by entering our weekly Referral Competition.  It's easy -- just set up an account on Indiegogo.com and share our Campaign Page using any one of the social media buttons located underneath the video.  You must be logged into Indiegogo when you share our page because this is how we track who is referring us.

story:
What is GetCharitable? 

GetCharitable is a tech startup that sustainably funds non-profit charities through the power of mobile apps.  We don't think anybody has to single handedly change the world if we can all chip in and make a difference.  How can we convince everyone to chip in?  Easy!  By downloading a free app called GetCharitable anyone can help non-profits work around the world.  

We don't want non-profits to have to ask for donations and we don't think people should have to give out of pocket when GetCharitable can do the work and use advertising dollars to help non-profits.  

 

Why are we raising money? 

This isn’t a just a donation.  This is an investment in the future, so GetCharitable never has to ask for donations down the road.  

GetCharitable needs to raise money to continue the development of the app to grow and help others around the world.  Without this development, GetCharitable might never reach its potential and we don't want to let that happen!  

Not only do we need to continue to develop and update the app, but we are trying to get the word out about GetCharitable.  We are raising money for marketing to tell everyone about how they can do good with a free app.  Your contributions will be directly helping spread the word of the project you believe in!  

Many tech startups in our shoes seek private equity investment from people that expect quick returns on their money at any cost.  GetCharitable doesn't fit this mold, because we want to help others first and foremost.  That's why we are raising money from like minded supporters like you, whose first goal isn't to see a quick profit.  

 

Why are we on Indiegogo? Because we believe in crowdfunding! 

Crowdfunding n. & v. /kroud/ - /fendiNG/   The pooling of small contributions of funds from a group of people for the purpose of making something larger happen. 

GetCharitable is a tool for people to crowdfund non-profits through the use of their mobile devices, without having to give any money!  The GetCharitable app can only make a big difference through the help of many pooling together.  That’s why we think crowdfunding is the perfect way to fund GetCharitable – because we use the same philosophy! 

 

Why contribute to help GetCharitable?

Your contribution is about more than just the perks you see on the right side of the screen.  It's an investment in a new way to think about helping non-profits!  Think about it this way – not only are you contributing, but you’re kicking off the contributions of thousands of others around the world! 

 

How do I know GetCharitable can really help? 

GetCharitable is proud to have been nominated for the Social Impact Mobility Award at the 2013 Consumer Electronics Show (2013 CES) in Las Vegas.  Not only was being recognized at CES an extremely exciting opportunity, but the Mobile Trax Mobility Awards are very prestigous within the mobile tech industry with votes coming from executives at companies like AT&T, Samsung and journalists alike.  

 

 

GetCharitable has been covered in the press and on such websites as Gizmodo (http://bit.ly/143Iui2), The Chonicle of Philanthropy (Philanthropy.com -http://bit.ly/WuaRgM), Network World (http://bit.ly/T94u3b) and Crowdsourcing.org (http://bit.ly/15ivj91). 

We're also proud to have been covered in a segment on the nationally syndicated tv show Right This Minute (http://bit.ly/ZVo3OM).  

Don't take our word for it, see what are users are saying!

 

 

What's different about the GetCharitable campaign?

What’s special about our campaign is that 100% of every dollar we raise past our $50000 goal will be donated to charity: water and Hunger Relief International!  So let’s go above and beyond our $50000 goal and start to help right now! 

 

charity: water is one of our favorite non-profits around and a group that we want to support with GetCharitable.  charity: water is a non-profit organization bringing clean, safe drinking water to people in developing countries. 100% of all public donations directly fund water projects.

Be sure to check out http://www.charitywater.org/ to learn more.

 

GetCharitable has been working with Hunger Relief International, a non-profit organization dedicated to sustainably helping villages around the world.  HRI has worked in Guatamala and Haiti to help hundreds of people get food, clean water, sanitation, education, and health care.

Learn more about Hunger Relief International here: http://www.hungerreliefinternational.org/

 

How else can you help? 

Don't worry if you can't contribute to the campaign right now, there are plenty of ways to help:

  • Download GetCharitable for FREE on Google Play or share the app or this campaign with friends. 
  • Share GetCharitable with friends.
  • Tell everyone you know about GetCharitable's Indiegogo campaign!

How else can you help?

story:
About Embed Stuido

Embed Studio is a team specializing in open-source system design, hardware and software customization, and technical support and services, focusing on Linux and Android solutions. The members of Embed Studio have years of experience and deep understanding of open-source software, and they are experts in microprocessor architecture, related software optimization methods, and hardware design.  Within Embed Studio we believe that the power of open-source  systems will change the world.  We are working hard to become the leading company providing professional solutions for custom open-source software and hardware.  More details about Embed Studio can be found on our website at www.embedstudio.com(available now, still under construction for more contents)  For now you can send e-mail to info@embedstudio.com and embedstudio@qq.com to contact us.  We encourage everyone interested in the Lemon Pi to join our forum to meet other open-source software and hardware enthusiasts, receive news, and obtain updated information about the Lemon Pi and associated software.



What is the Lemon Pi?


The Lemon Pi is a very low-cost open source single-board computer (SBC) equipped with a powerful  ARM quad-core Cortex A9 microprocessor integrated with an Imagination PowerVR SGX544 GPU.


The Lemon Pi currently runs Android 5.0 and Ubuntu 12.04 and the board is the same size as and has hardware interfaces compatible with the famous Raspberry Pi SBC that inspired us to build our system. 


The Actions S500 System on a Chip (SoC) that powers the Lemon Pi is from the ActDuino open-source  chipset series.  The Lemon Pi provides HDMI, 100BaseT Ethernet, one USB 3.0 plus two USB 2.0 ports, a micro-SD/TF card interface, MIPI Display Serial Interface (DSI) and Camera Serial Interface (CSI) ports without extra circuitry, all on a very precisely laid-out compact printed circuit board (PC).  Because the Lemon Pi has 40pin General Purpose (GPIO) interface compatible with that on the Raspberry Pi, hundreds of existing I/O expansion boards for the Raspberry Pi can be used with the Lemon Pi directly and conveniently.


Regarding software, we will offer a full open-source software development kit (SDK) for the S500 SoC provided by Actions, except for the NAND-flash driver and multimedia codec driver.  However, Imagination will provide complete open-source support for its PowerVR SGX544 GPU driver and graphics acceleration on Linux.

In order to ensure the quality of the Lemon Pi, one of the top-rated manufacturers in Taiwan will manufacture its motherboard.  We are using only electronics components of the highest pedigree, so we are completely confident about the stability and quality of our boards.



Who is the Lemon Pi for?



What can I do with the Lemon Pi?

With a quad-core Cortex-A9 ARM microprocessor manufactured using a 28nm process and the Imagination PowerVR SGX544 GPU on the Lemon Pi, 1080p@60fps HD decoding capability, and abundant, easy-to-use, expansion interfaces, users can create innovative Android and Linux based products and software via the Lemon Pi development platform.



Technical Specifications

It's widely known that the SoC on an SBC greatly influences the performance, cost, expansion interfaces available, and peripherals that can be accommodated.  In most cases, it’s very difficult to achieve a balance between performance, functionality, and price.  We were delighted to discover the Actions S500 SoC from the ActDuino open-source  chipset series, which satisfies these requirements much better than other SoCs.

The S500 is an open-platform, quad-core, 32-bit SoC featuring a highly integrated design, high-performance computing, low-power consumption, low cost, and robust peripheral support.  The S500 SoC integrates a quad-core ARM Cortex-A9R4 microprocessor with a NEON SIMD co-processor and Imagination PowerVR SGX544 GPU.  This SoC provides powerful performance, can support a 2K @ 60fps (1920 × 1200) LCD plus 1080p HDMI dual-screen output.  In order to serve the various needs of the open-source market, the S500 SoC has rich peripheral interfaces that provide users with convenient expansion, and it's integrated with multiple-speed USB ports, I²C, SPI, UART, I²S, PCM, SPDIF, MIPI DSI / CSI, HDMI,  100BaseT Ethernet and other ports on the Lemon Pi.

Lemon Pi provides all of the standard video format 1080p@60fps decoding playback capabilities. For H.264 format, up to 4K*2K can be supported. Particularly, most of H.265@1080P video can be supported. The Lemon Pi also supports open-source home theater software like XBMC (Kodi) so that you can enjoy rich multimedia using the Lemon Pi.



The following is the S500 functional diagram


Here are the S500 peripheral connections and PMU ATC2603


                  Lemon Pi Specifications

Note:

1. 2GB of DDR3 RAM is supported

2. EMMC is optional

If you have a large volume order, we can arrange a particular board for you, but not this board on this campaign. Please contact us directly at info@embedstudio.com or embedstudio@qq.com




                                                             Four sides of LEMON PI

40-pin GPIO interfaces that are compatible with the Raspberry Pi



Timeline 

We launched the project in November 2014, and you can get the information about the Lemon Pi's birth process from the following table.


In memory of the first version of the Lemon Pi (the green board), you can see some jumper wires on the board.

Team member

      Stewar

I have a Master's Degree in Computer Science, with a lot of experience in software and hardware systems in brand-name IT companies.  I love using all kinds of development boards (especially the Raspberry Pi) for the development of open-source projects.  I hope more makers can enjoy using the low-cost, high-performance Lemon Pi development board for various projects.


      Pino

I research machine learning and computer vision, having received my PhD from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) at the University of South Carolina (SC).  My favorite research topics include deep learning, human action recognition, facial expression recognition, and so on.  In my spare time, I am also interested in embedding various computer vision algorithms into open-source platforms in order to apply computer vision to a variety of applications.  I believe the performance  of the Lemon PI satisfies demanding computing needs at a reasonable performance/cost ratio.



Saying thanks

It takes more than the Embed Studio team to make the Lemon Pi possible as there are many amazing people at Actions Semiconductor who have helped along the way.  We want to express many thanks to the entire Actions team based in Taipei, Zhuhai, and Shenzhen.  We could not launch the Lemon Pi as quickly and smoothly as we have without their incredible help.



"Lemon Pi, Amazing computation power in such a little package!“

                                                         David Li, founder of XinCheJian and Maker Collider

Many thanks to Daivd Li for his support of the Lemon Pi.  David is the founder of XinCheJian and Maker Collider , which is the first and the best-known Chinese-born Hackerspace.  XinCheJian is an open society of hardware specialists, electronic artists, designers, DIY lovers, and people who are interested in making things.  David has 20 years of experience in the networking and software industries and has actively participated in the open-source movement going back decades.


Media reports

 Lemon Pi introduction on 优酷


Risks and challenges

The black board you see above is the second generation of the Lemon Pi, which is the mass production version you will receive.  The first generation is the green board with some bugs to be fixed.  The first version produced has been working excellently, and we have fixed some hardware and software issues to create the second-generation black board.  We believe the principal risk of not being able to deliver on our promises is very almost none.

As the production cycle of the board is typically one month. the Lemon Pi is expected to be delivered in August, 2015, about one month after the end of the campaign in July, 2015.  We will keep progress updated among all of our backers.

Some may worry about Flexible Funding and wonder why we chose it for this campaign.  The following are our reasons:

First, our team believes we will succeed in our campaign with the help of everyone who pays attention to and supports us, like you.   We also want to thank anyone who doesn't provide a financial contribution but helps promote our vision of delivering a high-performance SBC at low cost.

Secondly, even If we can’t achieve the $10,000 USD campaign goal we set originally, we will still send out a Lemon Pi board to every contributor in order to become friends with every one of our backers and will reply to every e-mail sent to us.  All funds we receive are very highly valued toward our dream coming true, although it's a tough way to achieve a low price via mass production.

We will keep our promises to every contributor to this campaign, whom we want to treat like our first investors.  We will not break the heart of anyone who helps us, even though that would result in financial losses in our business, or even make us go bankrupt at startup.  We will send a Lemon Pi to every contributor at the promised price as your perk.  We believe it's worth the effort to make you completely satisfied with our product.


Remember to select a shipping choice

Because the price of the Lemon Pi board does not include the shipping cost, you will need to add that cost to your pledge, $5.00 USD for Hong Kong Post, or $30.00 USD for DHL Express Shipping.

You can fill $5 or $30 in customer dollars blank in Additional Gift as shipping cost.

If you forget adding $5 or $30 extra shipping cost when selecting your perk at beginning. You can come back to select another perk for shipping. For example, when you select "$35 standard LEMON PI" perk, and only contribute $35 not including shipping cost. You need to select  another "$5 Hong Kong post or $30 DHL" perk on this campaign.


Why we need your help? 

And other Ways You Can Help us

Only when we place an order for a large quantity to the manufacturer can we obtain the low price for everyone who wants to buy a Lemon Pi.  However, we're a startup team with limited funding to support ourselves.  So, we're launching this crowdfunding effort to encourage you to help us make our dreams reality.

Of course, your financial contribution will be very much appreciated, and we also look forward to receiving your feedback and suggestions in any respect regarding the Lemon Pi.

We will further develop the Lemon Pi on a continuing basis to meet the demands and wishes of everyone registered as potential customers.  If you can't make a financial contribution, please don't hesitate to let us know that you're closely following the development of the Lemon Pi.  Any suggestions and comments are highly appreciated, and please send them to info@embedstudio.com and embedstudio@qq.com

We sincerely encourage contribution to our project and help spread the Lemon Pi sharing spirit of open-source, hand-making, and education.  

You are welcome to become one of the volunteer partners within our team at Embed Studio. Please contact us by Email immediately! Lemon Pi community expects your joining in us wherever you are.

Many thanks in advance!
