The Lemon Pi currently runs Android 5.0 and Ubuntu 12.04 and the board is the same size as and has hardware interfaces compatible with the famous Raspberry Pi SBC that inspired us to build our system. 



The Actions S500 System on a Chip (SoC) that powers the Lemon Pi is from the ActDuino open-source  chipset series.  The Lemon Pi provides HDMI, 100BaseT Ethernet, one USB 3.0 plus two USB 2.0 ports, a micro-SD/TF card interface, MIPI Display Serial Interface (DSI) and Camera Serial Interface (CSI) ports without extra circuitry, all on a very precisely laid-out compact printed circuit board (PC).  Because the Lemon Pi has 40pin General Purpose (GPIO) interface compatible with that on the Raspberry Pi, hundreds of existing I/O expansion boards for the Raspberry Pi can be used with the Lemon Pi directly and conveniently.





Regarding software, we will offer a full open-source software development kit (SDK) for the S500 SoC provided by Actions, except for the NAND-flash driver and multimedia codec driver.  However, Imagination will provide complete open-source support for its PowerVR SGX544 GPU driver and graphics acceleration on Linux.
In order to ensure the quality of the Lemon Pi, one of the top-rated manufacturers in Taiwan will manufacture its motherboard.  We are using only electronics components of the highest pedigree, so we are completely confident about the stability and quality of our boards.



Who is the Lemon Pi for?






What can I do with the Lemon Pi?
With a quad-core Cortex-A9 ARM microprocessor manufactured using a 28nm process and the Imagination PowerVR SGX544 GPU on the Lemon Pi, 1080p@60fps HD decoding capability, and abundant, easy-to-use, expansion interfaces, users can create innovative Android and Linux based products and software via the Lemon Pi development platform.







Technical Specifications
It's widely known that the SoC on an SBC greatly influences the performance, cost, expansion interfaces available, and peripherals that can be accommodated.  In most cases, it’s very difficult to achieve a balance between performance, functionality, and price.  We were delighted to discover the Actions S500 SoC from the ActDuino open-source  chipset series, which satisfies these requirements much better than other SoCs.

The S500 is an open-platform, quad-core, 32-bit SoC featuring a highly integrated design, high-performance computing, low-power consumption, low cost, and robust peripheral support.  The S500 SoC integrates a quad-core ARM Cortex-A9R4 microprocessor with a NEON SIMD co-processor and Imagination PowerVR SGX544 GPU.  This SoC provides powerful performance, can support a 2K @ 60fps (1920 × 1200) LCD plus 1080p HDMI dual-screen output.  In order to serve the various needs of the open-source market, the S500 SoC has rich peripheral interfaces that provide users with convenient expansion, and it's integrated with multiple-speed USB ports, I²C, SPI, UART, I²S, PCM, SPDIF, MIPI DSI / CSI, HDMI,  100BaseT Ethernet and other ports on the Lemon Pi.
Lemon Pi provides all of the standard video format 1080p@60fps decoding playback capabilities. For H.264 format, up to 4K*2K can be supported. Particularly, most of H.265@1080P video can be supported. The Lemon Pi also supports open-source home theater software like XBMC (Kodi) so that you can enjoy rich multimedia using the Lemon Pi.




The following is the S500 functional diagram


Here are the S500 peripheral connections and PMU ATC2603






                  Lemon Pi Specifications


Note:

1. 2GB of DDR3 RAM is supported
2. EMMC is optional
If you have a large volume order, we can arrange a particular board for you, but not this board on this campaign. Please contact us directly at info@embedstudio.com or embedstudio@qq.com








                                                             Four sides of LEMON PI

40-pin GPIO interfaces that are compatible with the Raspberry Pi




Timeline 

We launched the project in November 2014, and you can get the information about the Lemon Pi's birth process from the following table.





In memory of the
first version of the Lemon Pi (the green board), you can see some jumper wires
on the board.




Team member

      Stewar
I have a Master's
Degree in Computer Science, with a lot of experience in software and hardware
systems in brand-name IT companies.  I love using all kinds of development
boards (especially the Raspberry Pi) for the development of open-source projects. 
I hope more makers can enjoy using the low-cost, high-performance Lemon Pi
development board for various projects.

      Pino


I research
machine learning and computer vision, having received my PhD from the
Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) at the University of South
Carolina (SC).  My favorite research topics include deep learning, human
action recognition, facial expression recognition, and so on.  In my spare
time, I am also interested in embedding various computer vision algorithms into
open-source platforms in order to apply computer vision to a variety of
applications.  I believe the performance  of the Lemon PI satisfies
demanding computing needs at a reasonable performance/cost ratio.

Saying thanks


It takes more than the Embed Studio team to make the Lemon Pi possible as there are many amazing people at Actions Semiconductor who have helped along the way.  We want to express many thanks to the entire Actions team based in Taipei, Zhuhai, and Shenzhen.  We could not launch the Lemon Pi as quickly and smoothly as we have without their incredible help.




"Lemon Pi, Amazing computation power in such a little package!“
                                                         David Li, founder of XinCheJian and Maker Collider

Many thanks to Daivd Li for his support of the Lemon Pi.  David is the founder of XinCheJian and Maker Collider , which is the first and the best-known Chinese-born Hackerspace.  XinCheJian is an open society of hardware specialists, electronic artists, designers, DIY lovers, and people who are interested in making things.  David has 20 years of experience in the networking and software industries and has actively participated in the open-source movement going back decades.


Media reports





 Lemon Pi introduction on 优酷


Risks and challenges



The black board you see above is the second generation of the Lemon Pi, which is the mass production version you will receive.  The first generation is the green board with some bugs to be fixed.  The first version produced has been working excellently, and we have fixed some hardware and software issues to create the second-generation black board.  We believe the principal risk of not being able to deliver on our promises is very almost none.

As the production cycle of the board is typically one month. the Lemon Pi is expected to be delivered in August, 2015, about one month after the end of the campaign in July, 2015.  We will keep progress updated among all of our backers.
Some may worry about Flexible Funding and wonder why we chose it for this campaign.  The following are our reasons:
First, our team believes we will succeed in our campaign with the help of everyone who pays attention to and supports us, like you.   We also want to thank anyone who doesn't provide a financial contribution but helps promote our vision of delivering a high-performance SBC at low cost.
Secondly, even If we can’t achieve the $10,000 USD campaign goal we set originally, we will still send out a Lemon Pi board to every contributor in order to become friends with every one of our backers and will reply to every e-mail sent to us.  All funds we receive are very highly valued toward our dream coming true, although it's a tough way to achieve a low price via mass production.
We will keep our promises to every contributor to this campaign, whom we want to treat like our first investors.  We will not break the heart of anyone who helps us, even though that would result in financial losses in our business, or even make us go bankrupt at startup.  We will send a Lemon Pi to every contributor at the promised price as your perk.  We believe it's worth the effort to make you completely satisfied with our product.


Remember to select a shipping choice
Because the price of the Lemon Pi board does not include the shipping cost, you will need to add that cost to your pledge, $5.00 USD for Hong Kong Post, or $30.00 USD for DHL Express Shipping.
You can fill $5 or $30 in customer dollars blank in Additional Gift as shipping cost.


If you forget adding $5 or $30 extra shipping cost when selecting your perk at beginning. You can come back to select another perk for shipping. For example, when you select "$35 standard LEMON PI" perk, and only contribute $35 not including shipping cost. You need to select  another "$5 Hong Kong post or $30 DHL" perk on this campaign.

Why we need your help? 
And other Ways You Can Help us
Only when we place an order for a large quantity to the manufacturer can we obtain the low price for everyone who wants to buy a Lemon Pi.  However, we're a startup team with limited funding to support ourselves.  So, we're launching this crowdfunding effort to encourage you to help us make our dreams reality.

Of course, your financial contribution will be very much appreciated, and we also look forward to receiving your feedback and suggestions in any respect regarding the Lemon Pi.
We will further develop the Lemon Pi on a continuing basis to meet the demands and wishes of everyone registered as potential customers.  If you can't make a financial contribution, please don't hesitate to let us know that you're closely following the development of the Lemon Pi.  Any suggestions and comments are highly appreciated, and please send them to info@embedstudio.com and embedstudio@qq.com
We sincerely encourage contribution to our project and help spread the Lemon Pi sharing spirit of open-source, hand-making, and education.  
You are welcome to become one of the volunteer partners within our team at Embed Studio. Please contact us by Email immediately! Lemon Pi community expects your joining in us wherever you are.
Many thanks in advance!

story:
SAVE THE ANIMALS, SAVE THE FOREST, SAVE THE PLANET

 

SEE COLORADO'S OWN CHANNEL 2 NEWS VIDEO ON FIRESTOP: http://wp.me/p1ZRmT-1wGe

FireStop – Eco-Conscious Wildfire
Prevention and Beyond

Hello, my name is Tim Haag; environmentally conscious individual and
retired Fire Marshall after 34 years of service. A few years ago, I met a
brilliant inventor, Dennis Cortese, at a live burn demonstration in the state
of Colorado. Through this chance meeting, I discovered FireStop, a product
designed to protect homes from the ravages of wildfires. This is an
eco-friendly, reasonably priced system that can be self-installed or installed
with the help of a contractor.


Featured in Two Major CO Media Outlets


Colorado’s Best TV Interview on KWGN


http://coloradosbest.tv/2012/09/21/new-product-...

The Denver Post


Article, The Denver Post: Northern Colorado Men Find New Way to
Protect Homes from Fire: A new foam designed from Tim Haag and Dennis Cortese is an added protection. By Pamela Dickman: Reporter-Herald Staff Writerhttp://www.denverpost.com/headlines/ci_21230203/northe...


How It Works

Imagine a story you have surely seen on your local evening news station
(multiple times over). A wildfire approaches and the owners are ordered to
evacuate. They gather their family, a few precious items and run. As the fire
starts to burn the structure, a fire sensor mounted on the roof of the home
detects the fire and activates the system. The roof and walls of the home begin to be covered automatically with FireStop foam. In seconds, this foam totally encapsulates the home in a thick white foam that will last up to 72 hours.
After the danger has passed and the home owners and their family are allowed
back, they find their home is safe. They wash off the remaining foam and the
clean up is done. That’s right — homes do not need to be destroyed from wildfires!
But, without this protection, once a wildfire starts attacking a home it is too
late.



FireStop is the world’s only fully automated fire prevention device to spray
fire retardant foam on homes and other valuable structures. The foam is
formulated to be COMPETELY SAFE FOR THE ENVIRONMENT. The formula is top secret and, unfortunately, can not be revealed. Imagine, also, the implications of water conservation for the planet.

Vast Potential


This foam is not limited to homes alone, the potential is vast. Uses can be
found for any instance of fire including: vehicles, ships, aircrafts, tanker
trucks, oil rigs etc…



After years of successful research, development and field-testing, FireStop
is ready to implement; we just need your help. All that is needed to save
thousands of lives and homes taken unnecessarily by the devastation of a
wildfire is funds to produce, market and distribute FireStop to big box retailers nationwide. Fires can be dealt with in a more eco-friendly, effective and efficient manner with a technology such as ours.

Future of Firestop

FireStop will be established as a solely non-profit organization dedicated
to saving lives and the planet.

Supporting Evidence


Please read this article for predictions about the future impact of
wildfires on the West. Though published in 2012, it still is valid regarding
current affairs:



Science Daily Online, Article: Sobering Future of Wildfire Dangers in U.S.
West, Researchers Predict. Source: University of Oregon. Summary: The American West has seen a recent increase in large wildfires due to droughts, the build-up of combustible fuel, or biomass, in forests, a spread of fire-prone
species and increased tree mortality from insects and heat. A research team
warns that these conditions may be "a perfect storm" for more fires…

http://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2012/02/12...

Giving Back


With a donation of only $25, FireStop will donate 10% of the total proceeds
back to victims displaced by wildfires in Colorado in 2014. Help us help them,
and prevent others from going through what they have had to endure.


Money will be given personally to each family with a letter telling how
this donation came to be. A list of all those who helped us get this project
off the ground will be included on our website (currently being developed).



Main Image Courtesy of www.wikipedia.comThumbnail
Image Courtesy of http://multivu.prnewswire.com/mnr/adcouncil/50581/

Help Us Meet Our Goal of Becoming a Not-for Profit Organization

story:
Most people think phone cases are just about protecting your phone and looking good. We think they can be more, much more, MMORE.

I founded MMORE in 2015 because I wanted to make something different and unique. Function and even style were simply not enough anymore. In 2018. we unveiled our Organika collection, the worlds first experience and scent of nature on a phone case and now we are presenting a way to own a piece of world renown history.

 

Venice is facing a crisis! Because the city is standing on water it's future is uncertain because of climate change and rising sea levels. The city is completely flooded numerous times a year and only increasing in number.

An opportunity came by that we could use the material from the ancient discarded oak stakes used for foundations in Venice because they were not suitable anymore.  Over time the ancient oak stakes that were exposed above sea level began to rot because microorganisms need oxygen to multiply. Instead of being thrown away we found a new way to use them. Over five centuries of sea water made their structure like no other and it is truly a sight to behold once held in hend. 

It was perfect, it was sustainable, it was a chance to find new purpose for a piece of history and bring it to the world.

With its rich history, unique setting and romantic atmosphere it’s no wonder Venice is one of the most visited and magical destinations in the world.

By making veneer from the unusable ancient oak stakes we can prepare it for precision laser cutting and engraving to be applied on a protective TPU frame to fully protect your phone against any accidents in style and grace. With a hand-oiled finish, the wood comes alive glowing with days past, because salt water and time made its structure like no other wood.

We need your help through crowdfunding to make the Venice case a reality. By pledging down below you will enable us to harvest the oak stakes, prepare them to be properly processed to make beautiful veneer sheets out of them and hand finish them to perfection to be immortalized as a phone case. Of course, the number of pledges we can take is limited since we do not have an infinite amount of material available.

Your pledge will get you:

- The Limited edition Venice case made from Ancient oak from Venice foundations

- FREE worldwide trackable shipment

- Support a sustainability-oriented endeavor and become a part of the community

- Support a small business concept

You can choose between 2 designs:

Minimalist lettering on Ancient oak wood

The Lion of St. Marco with the lettering on Ancient oak wood

History is such a big part of each and every one of us and we want to make sure that you can own a piece of history and be a part of the world heritage while taking care of the environment.

Famous Russian writer, Alexander Herzen said: “To build a city where it is impossible to build a city is madness in itself, but to build there one of the most elegant and grandest of cities is the madness of genius.”

 

Sustainability is at the core of MMORE so we will offer either a Ø-plastic packing option or a retail gift packing option from kraft paper and hemp rope.

What about the plastic frame? No worries, it is made from a certified non-toxic production and we also have a recycling program set up, so everything we make we can also recycle responsibly to lower our footprint. The details of our recycling program are published here on our website:https://www.mmore.net/pages/mmore-recycling-program

PS: You will also receive all the info with your case, no worries ;)

 

1.) First we harvest the Ancient oak stakes that are planned for replacement.

2.) Top quality veneer is made out of the log-shaped stakes.

3.) The veneer has to be sanded and properly prepared for cutting and engraving on a CNC laser

4.) The cut veneer is hand oiled 3 times for the beautiful silky look and protection against water

5.) Then it is applied to the case frame and packed (also with a small gift for all supporters)

PLEASE SPECIFY YOUR EXACT PHONE MODEL WHEN YOU PLEDGE SINCE WE CANNOT LIST ALL DUE TO TECHNICAL LIMITATIONS!

We have been developing and perfecting the process of using the Venice wood for more than a year now and to be completely honest the only limitation is the availability of the material. We perfected all other production processes and every other aspect now it comes down to your support for us to be able to harvest the stakes. We cannot put an exact number to it how many we have available, but we will make sure that we deliver all pledges in a timely manner with SHIPPING STARTING BEGINNING OF AUGUST!

  • Production is planned for mid-July

We will use trackable post for shipping your beautiful cases.

EU: 1-5 days

US: 4-8 days

Rest of the world:  2-4 weeks, depending on the region.

Share our campaign and help us get across that there are good sustainable ideas with a story for everyday use and style out there. That it doesn't have to be the next flashy thing that makes our car lights blink while we sleep :) It's to remind us of what's really important, it's our legacy through time and beauty of nature combined.

  • Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mmore_cases/
  • Message us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mmoreworld/

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mmore_cases/

story:
FusionLens is a dual lens optical system for mobile photographers to capture stunning wide-angle videos and photos. We believe there are unlimited possibilities to capture a precious moment.

This little piece of clip-on fulfills all the wishes a photographer would dream for, from anamorphic, 8mm wide-angle to 360° shooting.

 

FusionLens - The most versatile lens for smartphones. 

Engineered for mobile photographers, FusionLens is a clip-on lens system for your smartphone. It is unlike any lenses. It is incredibly wide, engineered with 30mm lens module. It enables an iPhone camera to have over 180-degree field of view each camera, enabling ultra-wide field of view to allow you to capture anamorphic super-wide angle, just like a filmmaker does.

Shoot amazing super-wide anamorphic video in 23:9. Capture the unexpected movies right on your iPhone. 

 

 

 

 

FusionLens is the most powerful capture kit for iPhone photography, it brings a groundbreaking optical reforming technology ever on an iPhone.

 

 

 

 

FusionLens evolved. Simply upgrades the app, powerful photography camera kit is in your hand.

 

App Demo of different capture mode

 

 

 

 

 

The next generation cinematic lens. Extend the vision in iPhone. 

 

 

 

Check out the technical demo of FusionLens 2.0

 

With this little piece of clip-on, capture stunning cinematic effects:

23:9 anamorphic 8mm wide angle 210° fisheye 180° wide selfie. Capture the unexpected movies right on your iPhone.

Adjustable lens holder :

The intelligent product design allows you to adjust the lens holder to suit different iPhone models from X/XS to XS Max, giving you the most flexibility in user experience ever.

 

 

Since 2014, our team has been fully engaged in developing 360° photography technology. We are a team strong at computer vision, especially in 360° image processing. Before FusionLens, we’ve launched Spincle app at TechCrunch Disrupt Startup Battlefield SF 2016. Spincle is the first mobile app to shoot 360° mini videos without additional hardware.

Over 500,000 contents have been created by our technology. At FusionLens we have one vision: Get everyone involved in 360° photography. It should be as easy as shooting a selfie. We envision one day that everyone can experience the joy of immersive photography. Capture every important life moment.

 

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at hello@fusionlens360.com

 

Press

 

Press Kit

 

If you are interested in writing a story about FusionLens, feel free to contact us at hello@fusionlens360.com and we would be happy to send along our media kit as well answer any questions you may have.

Adjustable lens holder :
The intelligent product design allows you to adjust the lens holder to suit different iPhone models from X/XS to XS Max, giving you the most flexibility in user experience ever.

 

 

Since 2014, our team has been fully engaged in developing 360° photography technology. We are a team strong at computer vision, especially in 360° image processing. Before FusionLens, we’ve launched Spincle app at TechCrunch Disrupt Startup Battlefield SF 2016. Spincle is the first mobile app to shoot 360° mini videos without additional hardware.
Over 500,000 contents have been created by our technology. At FusionLens we have one vision: Get everyone involved in 360° photography. It should be as easy as shooting a selfie. We envision one day that everyone can experience the joy of immersive photography. Capture every important life moment.



 
Need help? We're here for you.
If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at hello@fusionlens360.com




 
Press
 
Press Kit
 
If you are interested in writing a story about FusionLens, feel free to contact us at hello@fusionlens360.com and we would be happy to send along our media kit as well answer any questions you may have.

story:
The world’s only medically-approved, anti-blue light screen protector, created by clinicians. Now with self-cleaning technology, it’s the Swiss-Army knife of screen protectors.

Ocushield’s new iPhone 12 screen protector is specially formulated to self clean your phone screen, so you can keep swiping safely,

Its technology breaks down viral structures - the same way hand gel works.

 

Since lockdown measures began, we now spend 200% more time than normal looking at screens. This means more blue light exposure and more protection needed.

Some negative effects of blue light include:

Dhruvin Patel, a qualified optometrist and the creator of Ocushield, researched this problem back at university in 2015 and developed Ocushield’s original products. This range filters out harmful blue light while maintaining a crystal clear image - unlike software solutions such as night mode. 

Blue light blocking software is simply not effective. Plus, it turns your screen orange! 

With Ocushield products, you notice the difference. Your eyes feel refreshed and less strained - even when you spend the whole day looking at screens.

Did you know that time on screens can also affect your body’s ability to produce melatonin, the chemical that helps you fall asleep?

Spending time on screens late at night can trick your body into thinking it’s still daytime! Luckily, with Ocushield’s blue light filtering technology, you can still spend time on your phone or in front of the TV late at night, without disrupting your sleep.

Unlike competitors, Ocushield products are created by Optometrists and are actually proven to filter out harmful blue light. They’ve been registered as a class 1 medical device by the Medicines and Healthcare Products Regulatory Agency (MHRA), an executive agency of the Department of Health and Social Care in the UK.

Built to protect your phone first, Ocushield is as tough as nails, made from strong, tempered aluminosilicate glass.

 

Ocushield screen protectors bring you extra protection! Protect your screen from chips, scuffs and scratches - and keep your phone in top condition.

Ocushield has an oleophobic coating. This is an oil repellent coating that reduces smudges from greasy hands. It keeps your screen clear and clean, so you can love using your phone again.

Modern work doesn’t work without screens. But, the negative effects of all that blue light can impact productivity. With Ocushield, you can spend time on screens without getting headaches or dry eyes - as well as getting a better night's sleep. This can boost productivity, so you get more done. 

Ocushield products are used by employees at major companies throughout the world such as Google, Facebook, JP Morgan, The NHS and more.

There’s no denying that technology plays a vital part in all our lives, especially for our kids. Whether it’s studying, playing or spending quality time with the family - let’s be honest, there’s often a screen involved.

Children are at greater risk from blue light, as the damaging effects of blue light can be worse for their developing eyes. Time on tech can also affect their sleeping patterns - making bedtime routines rather difficult. That’s where Ocushield’s products come in.

We all spend a lot of time on our phones, whether it’s watching Netflix, reading the news or scrolling Instagram. With Ocushield, you can spend as much time as you want on screens, without all of the nasty things that come with it.

 

4 layers for extra protection…

 

 

  • 1 X Ocushield Screen Protector
  • Easy Installation Applicator
  • Cloth & Dust Removers

 

 

Ocushield products filter harmful blue light, so you can spend time on screens without all of the bad stuff that comes with it. 

 

Ocushield has been around since 2015, with over 81,920 customers worldwide. Here are some of the great things people have had to say about their products.

 

 

 

 

It all started with a dissertation… which led to a research project… which led to the products we sell today.

Since then, Dhruvin has qualified as an optometrist and won over 81,920 customers. That’s 163,840 healthier, happier, better-sleeping eyes.

story:
SUMMARY

ARED (African Renewable Energy Distributor) offers a means to bridge the gap between the haves and have-nots of electricity in East Africa. It all started when I took a trip to Burundi. It became almost impossible to find a reliable way to charge my cell phone, but after a few days I was back home and the minor inconvenience had passed. It dawned on me a week later that, while I had the luxury of returning home to a stable electrical grid, SOME of the people of Burundi lived each and every day without that service. What presented an inconvenience for me presented an insurmountable roadblock to consistent communication outside of Burundian’s neighborhood.

As a man whose family hails from Rwanda, just north of Burundi, this struck home. After weeks of research I could find nothing that offered solutions for reliable, low-cost energy for anything more than an individual. While a household solar panel sounds nice on paper, it’s naïve to think that someone living on $2/day could afford that. So I decided to build my own solution.


In 2009 I paired up with a designer to fill that vital gap in energy availability. Together we came up with a blueprint that would offer the operator mobility, dependability, simplicity, and—most importantly—a low-cost means for him or her to generate an income. In 2010 I found an engineer to help me bring this idea to life. And so the Mobile Charging Kiosk (MCK) was born.


Mobile Charging Kiosk (MCK) Prototype Features:

·  Two adjustable 40 watt solar panels (collapsible for storage)

·  Charging space for 16 phones for all major phone brands

·  Display tray that folds vertically to secure charging phones

·  Powerful battery to store energy collected throughout the day

·  Manual crank to charge battery at night or on cloudy days

·  Two mountain bike tires to transport over rough dirt roads

·  AC power outlets to charge other appliances

I moved back to my home country, Rwanda, to get the project off the ground, investing all of my money, my time, and, effectively, my life into this project. I’m happy to say that, at the moment, we can’t keep up with demand. I’m even happier to see the same faces coming back day after day to our MCK. What seemed like a simple solution for people like myself to
“top off” their batteries had grown to something entirely different. As more and more people came to charge their batteries from 0-100%, I realized that the MCK was their only source of electricity. My customers would come in at first light, head to work, run back to us to retrieve their charged phone, and run straight back to work. The infrastructure in Rwanda simply does not provide reliable electricity to everyone's homes, meaning their uncharged mobile phones are useless, meaning they remain out of contact with friends, family, coworkers, and business.

We produced five units of the prototype in the past six months, and our operators have already helped us work out the kinks. These five will remain in operation, serving both rural and urban markets, but the time has already come to cut the fat and streamline our product.

Meet the new and improved MCK:


We trimmed down the body to give it a sleek, eye-catching chassis to attract customers. By swapping the two thin wheels with a thicker, sturdier, all-terrain tire we’ve allowed better control when hauling the MCK with a bike. This also enabled us to train the wheel directly to the kinetic charging element: now the battery will charge while the operator transports the machine each day. With a simplified panel system, the operator can more logically organize charging phones and our secondary products (airtime credit, mobile phones, etc) on shelves.

Unfortunately, designers and engineers don’t work for free. We’ve set our franchise fees as low as we can to support our franchisees, but we need help to do the following:

1.  Finish the design: We’ve improved the MCK with the new specs above, but it’s not 100% complete yet. We want to expand our fleet sooner rather than later, but not at the expense of a quality product.

2.  Expand!: ARED’s goal is to provide reliable energy to rural areas, but to do that we need more MCKs. Our model also requires scale in order to achieve profitability. The more machines we have, the closer we are to breaking even. This campaign will send 20 machines to franchisees living in rural areas.

3.  Make this more affordable: As stated above, we’ve done all we can right now to make this an affordable business venture for low-income entrepreneurs, but the fee we charge to keep ourselves afloat still prevents many would-be franchisees from joining. You donation will make the difference in allowing new entrepreneurs to employ themselves through ARED.


What We Need

We need $30,000 to start Phase II of our project. Phase I designed, implemented, and tested the prototype model, and the lessons we learned from that will be applied to Phase II. 

Here’s what that money does:

·  $10,000 will cover our fees to designers and engineers that are breaking their backs to maximize the efficiency of the MCK design.

·  $20,000 will purchase the next 20 MCKs in ARED’s fleet. Each device costs $1,000 to produce. ARED will pay the taxes and shipping if you can help us provide those rural areas with MCKs.

By supporting this campaign you have a number of amazing perks to choose from including your name on the device, a certificate and photo of the device you help purchase, and even a trip to visit us.

If we don’t reach our entire goal with this campaign, we will still use all of this money for the project and your impact will still have the same effect.


The Impact

According to the National Institute of Statistics of Rwanda, the percentage of families in the country that owned at least one mobile phone jumped from 6.2 to 45.2 (an increase of 39%) in only five years (2006-2011). While the market of mobile users is rapidly expanding, the number of households with access to Rwanda's electrical grid is not. The country aims to expand electrical grid access from 16% to 50% of the population by 2017 but, for the time-being, around 40% of households in Rwanda have a mobile phone but no steady electricity to charge it. Current expansion rates suggest that mobile penetration will continue to outgrow electrical penetration, and the number of mobile users without electricity in their homes will increase accordingly.

Our vision for ARED is simple: create an environmentally sustainable product of our own design, engineering, and production. Producing a product for Africans in Africa will greatly reduce the lag time we currently face in delivering our machines and, more importantly, it will create jobs for Africans. MCKs will be produced by African employees and delivered to African franchisees, fighting local unemployment and promoting entrepreneurship in the areas that need it most.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not every person can finance a whole MCK on their own, so we ask that you support ARED’s mission in any way you can—even if that means just spreading the word and making some noise about our campaign! Tell your friends, tell your family: we’re looking for franchisees in East Africa and for investors worldwide!

story:
Professional affordable 3D printer only 

$499 WITH WORLD SHIPMENT INCLUDED


Most of great 3D printer With a big printing size and high quality printing have the same problem....... IS TOO EXPANSIVE , (Like MakerBot $2499 ) SO we introduce the new BIG SIZE printer with 5 time cheaper than Most great quality printer on the market  

The impotance of size

 If you intend to make more practical prints think twice before purchasing a tiny sized 3D printer. WTP has a super printing size (250x250x300 mm, approx. 12x9x9 in). WPT is one of biggest 3D printer in its class.


Print without computer (Standalone printing)

Our printer has a 3X8cm LCD display control panel , you can transfer stl file direct to the printer than WPT can print without needing a computer . you can also control everything of printer in the control panel like temperature speed ........


Heatable build platform ,no bending or warping 

one of the most 3D printer problems is that your printing object get warp or bending, with the heatable build platform , the object will never have the bending or warping problem


Removable platform

 a removable build platform can solve the problem of damaging 3D printer when removing the printed object 



Technical specifications

  • Printer Dimensions: Width: 43cm (16.9”), Length: 43cm (16.9”), Height: 34cm (13.4”)
  • Max object dimensions: Width: 250mm (~9”), Length: 250mm (~9”), Height: 300mm (~12”)
  • Printing material (filament): PLA, ABS, Nylon
  • Filament size: Standard 1.75mm from any source.
  • Nozzle diameter: 0.4mm
  • Min layer height: 45 microns
  • Filament type: non-proprietary ($29/kg)
  • Total weight: 17kg
  • It can also be used with any Windows, Mac, or Linux based system.
  • USB-Compatible connection.
  • Standalone printing from USB flash drive.
  • Heatable and removable build platform.
  • Replaceable nozzle.
  • Best use between 100 and 300 micron layer resolution.
  • 15 micron X and Y positioning accuracy.
  • White interior LEDs.

story:
I have recently moved to Aberdeen, Scotland from Cork in Ireland.

While I love Aberdeen, and my bar job, I am finding it hard to get the funding to go to the Q-School this year.

I have played darts for over 10 years and won countless team and individual trophies, I think it is time for me to take the next step in my career.

I went to Q-School two years ago and it was fantastic. I got to see exactly what it was like and what I was trying to achieve. From that experience I learned a lot about what it would take to become a professional darts player. I have stepped up my practice routine and I am seeing the results. My averages and checkouts are the best they have ever been and I have even started to threaten that all elusive 9 darter. As for actual numbers and stats, I am consistently throwing an average of 90-95 3 dart average over 3 sets, favourite  ton+ finishes are 124 and 126, generally on the bull. Doubles of choice are both 16 and 10 which leaves me open to a wide range of finishes. 

For anybody who is not familiar with Q-school, it is a 4 day tournament, made up of 4 separate 1 day tournaments. On each day the 4 semi finalists are guaranteed a tour card with a number of further cards handed out on an order of merit system at the conclusion of the tournament. This makes it a great system as one bad performance cannot ruin your chances. 

I can't make it home for Christmas, so if you were going to buy me a pint, how about you help me get the best Christmas present ever, instead!

If you know me, you probably know that being a Professional Darts Player would be my dream job! (And you can help me get there).

All I am asking for is something small from family, friends, or sponsors if they are up for it!!!

story:
Our Story

Isanyoneup.com is one of the fastest growing communities on the web. We feature people who have taken pictures of themselves and people comment. Our new goal is to expand from being just a site to being an app too. We want to create apps for Android and iPhones, iPads, iPods & Black Berry users.

The Impact

We want to make it as easy as possible for people to view the pics on our site and comment on them. Instead of needing to use your browser you  could now go straight to the app to see pics form the site.

What We Need & What You Get

100% of the money going to the campaign will go straight to the cause. It will go to building the app and paying for any prizes we distribute. It will not go into Hunter's pockets! The site needs to grow and we want to make it happen. If there are any extra funds that get donated it will go into improving the site.


Other Ways You Can Help

PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD FOR THIS! Tweet it, post it on Facebook, your Tumblr and your blog. We need your help in this first step in making the site better for you and appreciate any help in spreading the word.
story_txt:
Our StoryIsanyoneup.com is one of the fastest growing communities on the web. We 
feature people who have taken pictures of themselves and people comment.
 Our new goal is to expand from being just a site to being an app too. 
We want to create apps for Android and iPhones, iPads, iPods & Black Berry users.

The ImpactWe want to make it as easy as possible for people to view the pics on
 our site and comment on them. Instead of needing to use your browser 
you  could now go straight to the app to see pics form the site.
What We Need & What You Get
100% of the money going to the campaign will go straight to the cause.
 It will go to building the app and paying for any prizes we distribute.
 It will not go into Hunter's pockets! The site needs to grow and we 
want to make it happen. If there are any extra funds that get donated it
 will go into improving the site. 


Other Ways You Can Help
PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD FOR THIS! Tweet it, post it on Facebook, your 
Tumblr and your blog. We need your help in this first step in making the
 site better for you and appreciate any help in spreading the word.

story:
The Infinity Cable makes it infinite

 

One cable that works for all

Both side iphone (Lightning)

Both Side Micro USB
 
You have waited for years for a Micro-USB cable that works both ways, and here it is! 
This Micro-USB to USB Cable plugs into any USB 2.0 port, so you can use it virtually anywhere. Connect to your laptop to charge and sync, use your own wall charger to charge from the wall, or plug into a car charger and charge on the road. Great as a replacement cable or if you simply need an extra.
 
 
 
Most of the Micro-USB cables on the market either only charge iPhone devices or Android devices. (=Total chaos)
Those 2-in-1 Micro-USB cables with Lightning connectors need adaptors, which is also not very neat. (=Headache)
 
 
The Infinity Cable now offers the best solution to solve all these problems! This amazing USB cable can charge Apple iPhone devices and Andriod devices (Type-A and Type-B), and it's REVERSIBLE! Hit four birds with one stone! (=Now you can chill and enjoy)
 
 
With 4 sets of high quality copper wiring, data is delivered 40% faster and battery charges are 40% fast!
The cable itself is made of aluminium alloy and braided Nylon. These strong materials make the Infinity Cable extremely sturdy and durable. It can hold up to 50kg of weight!
 
 

One cable is enough for iPhone, Android and powerbank.
Make your life easier.

 

 
FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all perks!

 

We are Perry and Alan. We are a small team and we have years of experience in product design and development. Some products worked, some didn't, but we simply enjoyed every step they lead us to. We really like The Infinity Cable and we hope you too! 

 

1) Does The Infinity Cable allow data transferring as well or just for charging?
    A:Both!

2) Do we get to choose colours?
    A:  20cm -Black, 100cm- Silver, 150cm - Silver

3) How long is this cord?
   A: You can choose between 20cm, 100cm or 150cm. If you go for the package that offers more than one cord, you can mix and match!

4) What is your warranty policy if I receive a defective set?
We value our users, and we believe in our products. If you receive faulty products. which were caused by manufacturing defects, we will replace your Infinity Cable.

 

Thank you for supporting us!

story:
To order, please visit aeris.one

 

We will contact you via email once the project is funded so you may select your case of choice.  We currently offer cases for iPhone 6S/7/8, 6S/7/8 Plus, XS, X, XR, XS Max, 11, 11 Pro Max, SE 2020, Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G, S20+ 5G, S20 5G, Note 10+ 5G, Note 10, S10, S10+, S9, and S9+.

The Germ-Resistant Phone Case

Meet the first phone case designed for a global pandemic.

Created by college students and manufactured in the USA, the Copper Case has a copper alloy surface, which is proven by the EPA to provide long-lasting antibacterial activity and inhibit the buildup of disease-causing bacteria.* Your backing will help us scale fast enough to get antimicrobial cases to as many people as possible. In order to make sure our heroes are protected, we are donating one case for every case sold to frontline healthcare workers who will benefit most from the proximity of copper surfaces.

*Please note: We view Aeris as just one tool in our arsenal against this pandemic, and we are not making any specific claims that the case will diagnose, cure, treat, or prevent coronavirus, COVID-19, or any other illness. We are sharing existing government-backed research and academic studies about the nature of copper. This case is in no way intended to substitute for precautions or other guidelines suggested by the CDC, such as social distancing and hand washing — all of those precautions should still be observed.

 

Image 1: One of our prototypes. 

 

Background

The pandemic has introduced countless new challenges and continues to inflict lasting damage, worst of all the deaths of thousands worldwide. While the virus is out of our control, we each have a small part to play in the collective response to the outbreak. We started to ask: what could we have done differently? What can we still do differently?

We found our answer in a crucially underutilized element: copper. Copper and its alloys are naturally, powerfully antimicrobial. "Metallic copper surfaces kill microbes on contact, decimating their populations... they do so literally in minutes by causing massive membrane damage after one minute of exposure," according to this paper from the American Society for Microbiology.

For more information on the science behind copper alloy, click here.

Our next challenge was determining how we could best put this to use. Germs can be found nearly anywhere, so where do we start to fight back? After hours spent scrolling on our phones during quarantine, we realized the answer was in our hands the whole time. 

The average smartphone user touches their phone about 3-6 times per minute. With over 25,000 bacteria per square inch, many phones are dirtier than the average toilet flush handle.

Phones are classified as fomites, a technical term for an object that is known to be a culprit in disease transmission. Dangerous particles can live on your phone for days and require constant attention. The Copper Case starts continuously killing harmful microbes on contact, including those on your hands. A copper phone case is not a cure, nor a fail-proof preventative measure for coronavirus. Still, germs cannot survive on the surface.

We hope to make copper a staple of personal products, homes, and businesses, in an attempt to mitigate the future spread of germs that cause, for example, sudden acute respiratory syndrome (SARS). Along the way, we will donate one case for every case sold to medical workers, our heroes battling this crisis on the front lines.

For more information on our mission, check out our blog.

 

Story

We're college seniors who knew we wanted to make a difference in fighting the pandemic. With few resources besides time, we began researching every angle that might lead to a solution. When we discovered the largely unknown antimicrobial properties of copper, we knew we were onto something. More research revealed that by putting copper in everyone's pocket, we hoped we could intercept and destroy SARS-CoV-2 particles before they had the chance to infect others. It soon became clear that the best way to do this was by attaching it to the one thing everyone always has with them — their phone. And so we came up with Aeris.

Aeris, the latin word for "copper," is a nod to the material that makes this phone case possible. By backing this Indiegogo campaign, you're backing our commitment to reducing disease transmission now and for the future. Like all great endeavors, we started out in a garage. Our first model was designed on an iPad, and we are 3D printing the first prototypes ourselves. 

 

The Case

We wanted the Copper Case to fit seamlessly into everyday life, and with that in mind we designed it to physically protect your phone just as well as it kills microbes.  Our 2-layer design features a soft-touch, impact-absorbing liner with a hard copper exterior, able to withstand tough drops and impacts. 

The case will be available in a variety of colors, starting with black and white. We will reach out with options to confirm your preference before shipping a case.

Our Alloy

While pure copper is effective at disinfecting surfaces and killing microbes, it is not practical to use in a cell phone case.  However, our research has shown that alloys with as low as 70% copper as just as effective for disinfection as pure copper. Our alloy retains the disinfecting properties of copper but with increased strength, durability, and practicality.

Will this stain my skin/clothes?

Metals with high amounts of copper, often found in jewelry, are known to have a staining effect on human skin. There are a few ways we have been able to address this. First, our copper alloy is blended in order to limit skin staining without compromising on protection. Second, staining is accelerated by buildup of moisture and oils on the metal surface. Regular cleaning with a cloth will reduce staining and keep your case in good shape.

Won’t copper interfere with my phone reception?

Conductive surfaces like copper are known to interfere with phone signals.  This was one of our major design challenges, and a major concern for our prospective customers.  We addressed this problem in two ways. First of all, our Copper alloy is significantly less conductive than pure copper, which reduces the shielding effect.  Secondly, and most importantly our case design leaves key areas uncovered, allowing signals to move freely while disinfecting the areas of your phone that need it most.  We have been testing the case ourselves without any negative effects since we created our first prototype.

Aren't there already antimicrobial phone cases?

While other cases may allege to have antimicrobial properties, these are often extremely limited to the point of being nonexistent. Their formulas are kept secret, and they do little to back up their claims. Even when they do, they can take up to 24 hours to work, rendering them essentially useless. Copper and its alloys are EPA registered, and scientifically verified to start killing viruses, bacteria, and other microbes on contact, which is why we have made every effort to showcase the science behind our case.

Case Options

Phones come in all shapes and sizes. We’re working hard to offer as many options as possible, so no one is prevented from taking advantage of our products — especially doctors and nurses.  Our current offerings include most iPhone and Samsung Galaxy models.

 

The Team

Aeris was founded in 2020 by three soon-to-be graduates of Vanderbilt University with Majors in Engineering, Economics and Public Health. Two of us were personally infected by the virus, and during our recovery and subsequent quarantine, we had a lot of time on our hands to think about how we could prevent others from suffering our fate. After spending far too much money on cleaning products and disinfectants, we discovered the seemingly miraculous properties of copper and its alloys, and decided to put them to use. It took only a few hours of scrolling through our phones looking for product ideas that we realized the inspiration we needed was right in front of us the whole time. We hope you'll help us start our journey, and we look forward to helping you.

 

To learn more, visit our website.

story:
WHAT IS THE PROBLEM?

Global digital content creation and sharing is growing exponentially empowered by mobile technologies and social media, yet for the Americans who continue to buy 7 billion greeting cards every year, there is an opportunity to augment printed greetings with digital content. The expansion of on-line shopping also created a need for better and more personalized greetings that can’t get lost from their gift. We also observe many treasured cards being stored in boxes inside closets that seldom have a chance to be revisit or shared. Further, the 2.65 billion cards sold in the U.S. during Christmas can fill a football field 10 stories high of waste. There might be a better way to show that we care for people while preserving the environment that sustains life.

What if we can REDUCE the amount of waste,  AUGMENT greeting cards with digital content and INNOVATE in its delivery?

-  Greetings Cards Management: How can I store, share and display my memorable greetings? 

-  Digital Content Augmentation: What if they can hear me saying “I love you” instead of a written message?

-  Keeping Gifts and Messages Together: Who sent me this Amazon gift?

-  Sustainability is to Show that You Care:  Reduce waste to preserve the environment that sustains life

THE OPPORTUNITY


A mobile/cloud app that allows personalized digital content to be created and retrieved through a printed or concealed identification artifact, such as QR Code, that can also be delivered digitally, and an intelligent greeting content management library that makes content available anytime, anywhere and easy to share. Such code can be embedded in formal printed media, products and labels therefore making gifts and greetings inseparable. Applicable to B2C and B2B market needs. PATENT PENDING





MARKET SIZE

  7 billion printed greeting cards are sold annually in the US only accounting for sales of $7.5 billion. The second largest market is the UK.  Women account for 80% of purchases. By 2015 users worldwide we have created and shared  8 zettabytes of digital content.


UNIQUE VALUE PROPOSITION

ZIPPYeCard

“Simply creating and delivering unforgettable, inseparable and sustainable personalized greetings. Available anytime and anywhere.”


CROWD FUNDING GOAL

Our objective is to raise $50K in seed investment to fund product development, in its first phase the Minimum Viable Product (MVP).  We plan to launch first release  in 3 months of development. A experienced mobile development team is being contracted to work on this project.

Another objective of this campaign is to validate ZIPPYeCard market demand. The more people I can gather support from, in any amount,   will help makes this campaign successful.  Please consider contributing any amount and sharing about the campaign with your network of friends.

All funds raised in this appeal are managed by Zetta Enterprises, a Limited Liability Company registered in the state of Georgia, for use exclusively in the ZIPPYeCard venture. A financial statement prepared by a certified accountant will be available at the end of the year to donors who request it and provide an e-mail address.


ABOUT THE FOUNDER


Angelica is a mother, inventor, consultant and entrepreneur with background in Music Education, Computer Engineering, Computer Science and MBA from the Executive Program of Goizueta Business School. She is the 2010 class entrepreneurship award recipient.  Angelica left her country to come to US to learn English in order to obtain an MBA and start her own business. She was awarded her first patent acting as her own patent lawyer and has several pending patents with USPTO.  Angelica is personable, creative and resourceful; a problem is an opportunity for innovation in Angelica’s perspective.  She is also very involved volunteering to her community and other organizations.

More about the founder: https://www.linkedin.com/in/angelicafwhite


MANAGEMENT TEAM

 ZIPPYeCard seed stage uses a lean management team with most of the development work being outsourced.  I have a business advisory team with seasoned professionals and a product advisory group to validate mobile app functions and design, mostly composed of women.  As we grow, I am looking forward bringing on board  some of the wonderful and qualified women from my professional network .


PERKS

ZIPPYeCard office will have on display its gratitude tree just to say how much we appreciate you!  

We are honored to list the name of all our donors in the ZIPPYeCard Gratitude Tree.

THE POWER OF ONE  Donations $1

“When men (women) can be made to hope, then they can be made to win.”
― Bryce Courtenay, The Power of One

  Don't ever think this is too little...  I just need 50,000 of you to reach my goal, which is a tiny fraction of the 2.92 billion worldwide Internet users.

  You will receive 1 ZIPPYeCard special edition digital label when you open an account and will be mentioned as THE POWER OF ONE donor in the ZIPPYeCard website Gratitude Tree.

NANO SEED  Donations $20

"Size matter at the nano scale as small amounts of initial funding can take you a very long way" - MIT micro-nano fabrication research

  Your faith in my business at the seed stage makes you a visionary. There is much potential hidden at the nano scale.

  You will receive 3 ZIPPYeCard special edition digital labels when you open an account and will be mentioned as a NANO SEED donor in the ZIPPYeCard  Gratitude Tree.


BRAVERY FOR PEACE   Donations $30  - NEW 

We should not get used to hearing that women and children are been abducted by terrorists. In fact these is a shame to world leaders in the 21th century. We too  have a role in promoting justice and peace because "injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere" MLK.   ZIPPYeCard founder is committed to promote peace and human rights for children and women.
Please note shipping cost is not included


MICRO SEED  Donations $50

"Though I do not believe that a plant will spring up where no seed has been, I have great faith in a seed. Convince me that you have a seed there and I am prepared to expect wonders" - Thoreau

  Your faith in my business at the seed stage makes you a visionary. There is much potential hidden at the micro scale.

  You will receive 5 ZIPPYeCard special edition digital labels when you open an account and will be mentioned as a MICRO SEED donor in the ZIPPYeCard  Gratitude Tree.

MUSTARD SEED  Donations $150

"To invest in a seed is to believe in a better future"

  Your faith in my business at the seed stage makes you a visionary. Who can tell the size of a mustard tree by looking at its seed?  
  You will receive 5 ZIPPYeCard digital labels when you open an account and will be mentioned as a MUSTARD SEED donor in the ZIPPYeCard website Gratitude Tree.


THANKFUL  Donations $250

"As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them"  – John F. Kennedy

  In my lifetime there were many wonderful people that came along side and gave me their support and endorsement, so I am a byproduct of many wonderful people - just like you. THANK YOU!

  You will receive 10 ZIPPYeCard digital labels when you open an account and will be mentioned as a THANKFUL donor in the ZIPPYeCard website Gratitude Tree.


UNFORGETTABLE  Donations  $500

  "No matter what people tell you WORDS and IDEAS can change the world." – Robin Williams

    Unforgettable people is like that, their legacy continue to impact generations to  come.  Your are unforgettable because  through your generosity I am empowered to positively impact the life of others through jobs creation and community service.   As our special gratitude, we offer to convert your legacy greetings cards into your ZIPPYeCard account up to 15 standard greeting cards.  You will also be mentioned as an Unforgettable Donor in the ZIPPYeCard Gratitude Tree.

Shipping cost not included.

INSEPARABLE  - Donations  $1,000

  "Cognitive and character skills work together as dynamic complements; they are inseparable. Skills beget skills. More motivated children learn more. Those who are more informed usually make wiser decisions." – James Heckman

  Your investment will always be an inseparable memory of what ZIPPYeCard is able to achieve through your generosity - THANK YOU!   As our special gratitude, we offer to convert your legacy greetings cards into your  ZIPPYeCard account up to 30 standard greeting cards.  You will be mentioned as an Inseparable Donor in the ZIPPYeCard Gratitude Tree.

Shipping cost not included.

SUSTAINABLE - Donations  $1,500

  "If you aren’t making a difference in other people’s lives, you shouldn’t be in business -- it’s that simple. Companies have a responsibility to make a difference in the world: They owe this to their community, their staff, their customers, everyone. The amazing part is that doing good is also good for business -- what are you waiting for?" – Richard Branson

  Your investment has a sustainable impact to the people and communities I will  serve and create jobs in this new capacity.  As our special gratitude, we offer to convert your legacy greetings cards into your  ZIPPYeCard account up to 50 standard greeting cards.  You will be mentioned as a Sustainable Donor in the ZIPPYeCard Gratitude Tree.

Shipping cost not included.

Legacy conversion  offer can be exchanged for  ZIPPY eCard Label credit.

RISK AND CHALLENGES

I have no doubt in my ability to accomplish this work with excellence.  I have a sound advisory board, relevant professional experience and excellent business education.  I am creative, strategic and determined. In the last five years I have invested in innovative products and business ideas, mostly related to education that are waiting for investment.

My greatest challenge is that I can't do it without you.

Perhaps that is the beauty of entrepreneurship, that no one can say "I did it all by myself".  This  propels successful entrepreneurs to continue to pay forward so that others may succeed.  As I learned, It takes money to make money, create jobs and a vibrant economy. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Because one of the goals of this campaign is to validate ZIPPYeCard product demand, you can help me by sharing this link with your endorsement to all your friends in your social media channels.

Your referral together with a contribution of  any amount it is all that takes to make this campaign a success -  THANK YOU!

 ZIPPYeCard
 “Simply creating and delivering
unforgettable, inseparable and sustainable personalized greetings. Available anytime and anywhere.”



CROWD FUNDING GOAL

Our
objective is to raise $50K in seed investment to fund product development, in its first phase the Minimum Viable
Product (MVP).  We plan to
launch first release  in 3 months of development. A experienced mobile development team is being contracted to work on this project.Another objective of this campaign is to validate ZIPPYeCard market demand. The more people I can gather support from, in any amount,   will help makes this campaign successful.  Please consider contributing any amount and sharing about the campaign with your network of friends.All funds raised in this appeal are managed by Zetta Enterprises, a 
Limited Liability Company registered in the state of Georgia, for use 
exclusively in the ZIPPYeCard venture. A financial statement prepared by
 a certified accountant will be available at the end of the year to 
donors who request it and provide an e-mail address.


ABOUT THE FOUNDER



Angelica is a mother, inventor, consultant and
entrepreneur with background in Music Education, Computer Engineering, Computer
Science and MBA from the Executive Program of Goizueta Business School. She is
the 2010 class entrepreneurship award recipient.  Angelica left her country to come to US to
learn English in order to obtain an MBA and start her own business. She was
awarded her first patent acting as her own patent lawyer and has several
pending patents with USPTO.  Angelica is personable,
creative and resourceful; a problem is an opportunity for innovation in
Angelica’s perspective.  She is also very
involved volunteering to her community and other organizations. 

More about the
founder: https://www.linkedin.com/in/angelicafwhite



MANAGEMENT TEAM
 ZIPPYeCard seed stage uses a lean management team with most of the development work being outsourced.  I have a business advisory team with seasoned professionals and a product advisory group to validate mobile app functions and design, mostly composed of women.  As we grow, I am looking forward bringing on board  some of the wonderful and qualified women from my professional network .

PERKS 


ZIPPYeCard office will have on display its gratitude tree just to say how much we appreciate you!   
We are honored to list the name of all our donors in the ZIPPYeCard Gratitude Tree.


THE POWER OF ONE  Donations $1
“When men (women) can be made to hope, then they can be made to win.”― Bryce Courtenay, The Power of One   Don't ever think this is too little...  I just need 50,000 of you to reach my goal, which is a tiny fraction of the 2.92 billion worldwide Internet users.   You will receive 1 ZIPPYeCard special edition digital label when you open an account and will be mentioned as THE POWER OF ONE donor in the ZIPPYeCard website Gratitude Tree.
NANO SEED  Donations $20
"Size matter at the nano scale as small amounts of initial funding can take you a very long way" - MIT micro-nano fabrication research  Your faith in my business at the seed stage makes you a visionary. There is much potential hidden at the nano scale. 
 You will receive 3 ZIPPYeCard special edition digital labels when you 
open an account and will be mentioned as a NANO SEED donor in the 
ZIPPYeCard  Gratitude Tree.

BRAVERY FOR PEACE   Donations $30  - NEW 
We should not get used to hearing that women and children are been abducted by terrorists. In fact these is a shame to world leaders in the 21th century. We too  have a role in promoting justice and peace because "injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere" MLK.   ZIPPYeCard founder is committed to promote peace and human rights for children and women.Please note shipping cost is not included

MICRO SEED  Donations $50
"Though I do not believe that a plant will spring up where no seed has been, I have great faith in a seed. Convince me that you have a seed there and I am prepared to expect wonders" - Thoreau  Your faith in my business at the seed stage makes you a visionary. There is much potential hidden at the micro scale.  You will receive 5 ZIPPYeCard special edition digital labels when you open an account and will be mentioned as a MICRO SEED donor in the ZIPPYeCard  Gratitude Tree.
MUSTARD SEED  Donations $150
"To invest in a seed is to believe in a better future"  Your faith in my business at the seed stage makes you a visionary. Who can tell the size of a mustard tree by looking at its seed?    You will receive 5 ZIPPYeCard digital labels when you open an account and will be mentioned as a MUSTARD SEED donor in the ZIPPYeCard website Gratitude Tree.



THANKFUL  Donations $250
"As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them"  – John F. Kennedy   In my lifetime there were many wonderful people that came along side and gave me their support and endorsement, so I am a byproduct of many wonderful people - just like you. THANK YOU!  You will receive 10 ZIPPYeCard digital labels when you open an account and will be mentioned as a THANKFUL donor in the ZIPPYeCard website Gratitude Tree.

UNFORGETTABLE  Donations  $500





  "No matter what people tell you WORDS and IDEAS can change the world." – Robin Williams 
    Unforgettable people is like that, their legacy continue to impact generations to  come.  Your are unforgettable because  through your generosity I am empowered to positively impact the life of others through jobs creation and community service.   As our special 
gratitude, we offer to convert 
your legacy greetings cards into your ZIPPYeCard account up to 15 
standard greeting cards.  You will also be mentioned as an Unforgettable Donor 
in 
the ZIPPYeCard Gratitude Tree.
Shipping cost not included.


INSEPARABLE  - Donations  $1,000


  "Cognitive and character skills work together as dynamic complements; 
they are inseparable. Skills beget skills. More motivated children learn
 more. Those who are more informed usually make wiser decisions." – James Heckman 
  Your investment will always be an inseparable memory of what ZIPPYeCard is able to achieve through your generosity - THANK YOU!   As our special gratitude, we offer to convert 
your legacy greetings cards into your  ZIPPYeCard account up to 30 
standard greeting cards.  You will be mentioned as an Inseparable Donor in 
the ZIPPYeCard Gratitude Tree.
Shipping cost not included.
SUSTAINABLE - Donations  $1,500 



  "If you aren’t making a difference in other people’s lives, you 
shouldn’t be in business -- it’s that simple. Companies have a 
responsibility to make a difference in the world: They owe this to their
 community, their staff, their customers, everyone. The amazing part is 
that doing good is also good for business -- what are you waiting for?" – Richard Branson
  Your investment has a sustainable impact to the people and communities I will  serve and create jobs in this new capacity.  As our special gratitude, we offer to convert your legacy greetings cards into your  ZIPPYeCard account up to 50 standard greeting cards.  You will be mentioned as a Sustainable Donor in the ZIPPYeCard Gratitude Tree.
Shipping cost not included.
Legacy conversion  offer can be exchanged for  ZIPPY eCard Label credit. 


 
RISK AND CHALLENGES  I have no doubt in my ability to accomplish this work with excellence.  I have a sound advisory board, relevant professional experience and excellent business education.  I am creative, strategic and determined. In the last five years I have invested in innovative products and business ideas, mostly related to education that are waiting for investment. 
 My greatest challenge is that I can't do it without you.
 Perhaps that is the beauty of entrepreneurship, that no one can say "I did it all by myself".  This  propels successful entrepreneurs to continue to pay forward so that others may succeed.  As I learned, It takes money to make money, create jobs and a vibrant economy.  
  Other Ways You Can Help Because one of the goals of this campaign is to validate ZIPPYeCard product demand, you can help me by sharing this link with your endorsement to all your friends in your social media channels. 
 Your referral together with a contribution of  any amount it is all that takes to make this campaign a success -  THANK YOU!

story:
Welcome to our Campaign

Our Goal is to get "The Morphit” into production we have done all the design, testing sourcing of materials, market trials, needs analysis and upfront hard work including patented all the technology and with your help we can bring "The Morphit” to market. Hopefully by this Christmas .

I am Len the innovator and the patent holder of "The Morphit”. Together with my partner Marama and daughter Tyler we live in the beautiful city of Cairns, Queensland, Australia. The Ladies are both Kiwi’s and I myself am a Yankee living Down Under originally From Ashland, Ohio but hail from the great city of Las Vegas, Nevada.

It’s truly a Multipurpose universal case designed for any cell phone, (Iphone, Ubuntu Edge, Samsung, Blackberry, Motorola, to name a few or ANY computer tablet or Other hand held electronic device. Its main purpose is to provide better Viewing and flexibility for the user. Every part of "The Morphit" is made to the Highest Quality - We need everyone that sees you with "The Morphit" to want one as well. Its thin light weight design with genuine leather gives true elegance to "The Morphit" case. 

Some of the most unique Features include a pliable aluminum body for optimal flexibility and cooling With built in tabs serving as a universal device holder that can hold any size or Type of mobile phone or handheld electronic device without interfering with it's Outlets or buttons. Because the Morphits' core rests securely against your device it Provides a unique heat distribution point when your phone or other device is Expelling heat during excessive use or charging.  

Plus the flexibility Allows it to stand hands free almost anywhere securely.                    Be it a dashboard when You want to use the GPS or just on your desk for a quick glance to see who is Calling. The Morphit really does stand up to its name in it’s morphing Abilities.

Along with it’s Built in yet removable and adjustable magnifier for better viewing there is no longer A need to fumble for your reading glasses to read that text message or email. It is also Great for enlarging the screen size when playing your favorite game or Watching a video on your phone or iPod. So leave your reading glasses at home when you're out it does fine for reading menus.

With your help we will use the money to set up manufacturing facilities here in Australia and the USA to market it to the world. Because we will not compromise Quality for Pricing  our production is now limited to sub-contracting so if for some Reason we do not reach our goal every early bird supporter will still get their Morphit. Currently they are available in standard size which accommodating most phones on the market today a large is for an over-sized phone. Tablets come in 8" & 10"  without lens. You pick your size no extra costs.  

The High Quality interchangeable Morphit viewing lens comes standard with a 2x optical magnifier. For those that get in early, if we reach our Goal you will get an extra 3x Bonus lens absolutely free. That's a $15.00 value.  A 3x optical lens is like turning your phone into a tablet without the weight or bulk.                                                           

"The Morphit” is Truly unique and fun to use. Since I have had my first prototype I cannot Imagine having a phone without it. To me it’s just that awesome!

Finally… I can read my text Messages and even reply – all without my glasses!

We have put some thought into setting our goal low enough to be able to move forward at just $15,000. This will enable us to move away from subcontracting and allows us to get a manufacturer to make the first run. If we can earn more then more options and color choices will be available to enhance your Morphit.  To be posted at themorphit.com  We have some great designed extra features to add to your case planned ahead. 

THANK YOU!

We would like to thank every supporter for any contribution and any Assistance in the realization of our project. Share the Morphit with your Friends & Family on Facebook and like us on YouTube. We hope you can tell everyone so we can bring the Morphit to the World.

If you have any questions or just want to say hello, please be sure to contact us at info@themorphit.com
