story:
Project Update:

[5 Feb. 2014]

The first working sample on new version of PCB is ready now.

All the basic test are completed and right now I moving forward on the new software fitting on it.

This new PCBA can reduce the voltage drop less than 0.18V at 1700mA max. current flow. Also I upgraded both input and output USB socket to USB3.0 for higher current capacity.

[28 Dec. 2013]

Here I have the new update on the plastic casing of Auto Unpluger.

The new PCB will fit on this plastic case without tooling cost.

The LED will simply to 2pcs. (Green for Operate / Orange for Current level)

The control button will simply to 1pcs. (Toggle Start / Stop)

[26 Dec. 2013]

Merry X'mas and Happy New Year!!

Here I have the 2nd test video of Auto Unpluger about the cutoff test.

The video show how the Auto Unpluger detect and unplug (cutoff) the power source when the Pad charged up.

Remark: The 0.058A (58mA) current level is the operating current of Auto Unpluger


[22 Dec. 2013]

First test video - Start and Stop test of Auto Unpluger

The video show the Auto Unpluger can stop the current flow by Start and Stop buttons manually.



[16 Dec. 2013]

Please let me explain more about the background of Auto Unpluger and the reason why I need to build this thing:

According my measurement most of the phone and pad with keep taking power (around 100mA depends) after 100% battery charged. Since the phone software designed to keep the 100% figure, the phone only can draw power from adapter and operate the phone as long as you unplug the power source manually.

In my point of view this is not a good feature because I really no need to keep the battery 100% all the time by wasting the adapter powers. For the same reason, I designed the Auto Unpluger to eliminate this "phantom power".

The down side of using Auto Unpluger is you may not get 100% battery level when you wake up since the adapter already cut few hours ago. Also, it will ate some power for operating the MCU inside and energy loss by the extra internal resistance on both input and output connectors.

So, if you have same consideration, Auto Unpluger will fit what you need.

Thanks a lot.


[14 Dec. 2013]

Testing with New iPad and original 2A adapter and USB cable

Charging data (around 1.4A)

Testing with New iPad and general 1.5A adapter and USB cable

Charging data (around 1.5A)

Testing with Sony Z ultra and iPad original 2A adapter

Charging data (around 1.1A)

[13 Dec. 2013]

I just got 1st and 2nd perks from my friends, thank you very much!!

Sorry that I forget to tell you the completion date of Auto Unpluger development on the perk description. The best delivery schedule should be ON OR BEFORE MARCH 2014 since most of the component vendor and OEM factory will be close during End of Jan. 2014 for Chinese New Year holidays. I will try my best to keep on this target.

For all perker, please remember to include the shipment cost (USD10-) on your perk since I cannot effort to do free shipments.

Thanks a lot.


What is Auto Unpluger?

It is a crazy ideas start from a one cold night when I painfully wake up and try to unplug the adapter.
You know the result always mass up when you try to catch your phone on the dark...

I think the main point on it just unplug the wire but it may not always need human to do.
I believe I can design a little device to detect the current and isolate both 5V and Ground wire with a Relay when my phone charge up.

Since Relay can physically disconnect the contact of 2 wires, the result just like unplug the wire by hand but in elegant way.

Sounds good on this and I build a prototype to test my idea!
It works and I can plug and forget my phone and have a good sleep~

Some people never thought plugging the phone over night is a problem, but I am quite worry about to leave the charger overnight with some Lithium battery over my head...

Recently some news in Hong Kong report a serious fire cause by over-heated adapter at night time and claims life. It really get my attention to figure out the better way to take care on my charging act everyday.


What Auto Unpluger can do?

  • Charge up your phone / pad by most of 5V power source supply up to 500mA

  • Monitoring the charging current and disconnect both 5V and Ground line after charge up

  • Isolate your phone to power source physically to reduce risk of electric shock

  • Maximum charge timer cutoff even your phone not stop charging

  • Rough level display on the charging current via LEDs

  • Auto detect the phone type and match the charging scheme (Iphone, Samsung, Blackberry...)

  • Extra protection on surge voltage from power sources (lighting, unstable power line...)

  • Block for data stealing by isolate the input D+/D- pins 

  • Detail current, charge time and charge capacity report from serial port output



What Auto Unpluger cannot do?

  • Cannot detect the actual battery voltage inside your phone
  • Cannot start charging without press the "START" button
  • Cannot speed up the charging time
  • Cannot withstand over 25VDC input but fuse protected


Project Milestones

  1. Complete this page and wait 1st perks  (Success!!)
  2. Improve the circuit design and make smaller PCB layout (Completed)
  3. Improve the accuracy of detection (Voltage / Current) (On going...)
  4. Improve the software on USB charging scheme settings (On going...)
  5. Working on better package methods
  6. TBC....


Why I need you help?

The first hardware prototype of Auto Unpluger is completed.

Right now I working on the circuit improvement and software development.
Still have some minor technical issue on the accuracy of current detection and USB charging scheme; anyway just matter of time.

Also, I would like to seeking on your help to define some software features. I will post some ideas and please leave comment to me what you prefer.
The most preferred idea will be the final software, I think this is the best way to make everyone happy~

If you like my idea, please support my project and select the perks you like!


If I got 1 perks

I will carry on the development on the hardware and firmware improvement. 2 handmade samples (1 for you and 1 for me) will be build to play around.

Thanks your support !!


If I got 100 perks

I will have enough fund to build another PCB for final circuitry and handmade all 100pcs.
It may take a moment because it won't have enough fund to go for the OEM factory.

It is not easy to make 100 peoples in the world agree on you, I really enjoy on this.

Many Thank you !!


If I got 400 perks

I am consider it is a totally success if I reach this point.

I will have enough fund and quantity to go for the OEM factory and build them all.
The unit will have better SMD quality and reliability.

I will find a designer to make the 3D drawings on the plastic casing if
the fund still enough to do so.

I really hope this little idea can change your life in better way.

Thousand Thank you !!


If I got 1000 perks

It really a awesome results on this project!
 
I will have enough fund to make the toolings!

When it finish, every Auto unpluger will receive a simple and nice plastic case.
Also I need to work out the timeline to match both PCBA and plastic case assembly.
It is a huge challenge on me but I will try my best to make everyone happy.

Superb Thank you !!!


Shipment

We can ship it for worldwide major city and I never make money from shipment.

Most of the case I can do it for flat rate shipment but on some remote site I may have special handling on the shipment fee.


More Technical stuff of Auto Unpluger


I am quite sure you have interest on my idea if you still reading on this line.
Let me share more technical information about my project:

  • Maximum withstand input voltage (without breakdown): 25VDC
  • Maximum operation charging current allow: 1.5A DC at 5.2V Input
  • Maximum voltage isolation between Relay open contacts: 1000VAC at 1 min.
  • Over / Under voltage input auto shutdown
  • Over current auto shutdown
  • TVS diodes protection Input
  • Fuse protection if everything not working right
  • Reverse polarity Input protection on load side
  • Automatic D+ / D- input detection (Float, 2.7V, Short)
  • Automatic D+ / D- output emulation schemes (Float, 2.7V, 2.0V, 1.2V, Short)


Risk on Auto Unpluger


The intention of this idea is make the phone charging act more safely but not more danger. However, this is just a experimental "product" and some situation may be the design not covered.

I cannot guarantee no risk of using Auto Unpluger but I can say I will try my best to make it better and safely. So, please use Auto Unpluger as your own risk.

Thank you for your understanding!!


Bottom Line

I really want to get more feedback on my idea so please email me or leave comment about what you thinking.

I will try my best to read the email everyday and give you feedback as soon as I can.

My email is : sat.lab.hk@gmail.com

My facebook page

Thank you!!

Working on better package methods
TBC....

Why I need you help?The first hardware prototype of Auto Unpluger is completed.Right now I working on the circuit improvement and software development.Still have some minor technical issue on the accuracy of current detection and USB charging scheme; anyway just matter of time.Also, I would like to seeking on your help to define some software features. I will post some ideas and please leave comment to me what you prefer.The most preferred idea will be the final software, I think this is the best way to make everyone happy~If you like my idea, please support my project and select the perks you like!If I got 1 perksI will carry on the development on the hardware and firmware improvement. 2 handmade samples (1 for you and 1 for me) will be build to play around. Thanks your support !!If I got 100 perksI will have enough fund to build another PCB for final circuitry and handmade all 100pcs.It may take a moment because it won't have enough fund to go for the OEM factory.It is not easy to make 100 peoples in the world agree on you, I really enjoy on this.Many Thank you !!
If I got 400 perksI am consider it is a totally success if I reach this point.I will have enough fund and quantity to go for the OEM factory and build them all. The unit will have better SMD quality and reliability. I will find a designer to make the 3D drawings on the plastic casing ifthe fund still enough to do so.I really hope this little idea can change your life in better way.Thousand Thank you !!
If I got 1000 perksIt really a awesome results on this project! I will have enough fund to make the toolings!When it finish, every Auto unpluger will receive a simple and nice plastic case.Also I need to work out the timeline to match both PCBA and plastic case assembly.It is a huge challenge on me but I will try my best to make everyone happy.Superb Thank you !!! 
Shipment
We can ship it for worldwide major city and I never make money from shipment.Most of the case I can do it for flat rate shipment but on some remote site I may have special handling on the shipment fee.More Technical stuff of Auto UnplugerI am quite sure you have interest on my idea if you still reading on this line.Let me share more technical information about my project:
Maximum withstand input voltage (without breakdown): 25VDC
Maximum operation charging current allow: 1.5A DC at 5.2V Input
Maximum voltage isolation between Relay open contacts: 1000VAC at 1 min.
Over / Under voltage input auto shutdown
Over current auto shutdown
TVS diodes protection Input
Fuse protection if everything not working right

Reverse polarity Input protection on load side
Automatic D+ / D- input detection (Float, 2.7V, Short)
Automatic D+ / D- output emulation schemes (Float, 2.7V, 2.0V, 1.2V, Short)
Risk on Auto UnplugerThe intention of this idea is make the phone charging act more safely but not more danger. However, this is just a experimental "product" and some situation may be the design not covered. I cannot guarantee no risk of using Auto Unpluger but I can say I will try my best to make it better and safely. So, please use Auto Unpluger as your own risk.Thank you for your understanding!!Bottom LineI really want to get more feedback on my idea so please email me or leave comment about what you thinking.I will try my best to read the email everyday and give you feedback as soon as I can.My email is : sat.lab.hk@gmail.comMy facebook pageThank you!!

story:
We raised $61,454 through Indiegogo! Thank you for your support! Pre-order your own peacekeeper mini now at http://tigerlight.net/peacekeeper-mini.



The Peacekeeper Mini (light/spray portion 4 inches long, with cover 4.95 inches long) is a non-lethal self-defense device that combines the utility of a flashlight with the stopping power of a concentrated, military strength pepper spray, more than double the strength of the spray used by the US marines. It's effectiveness is significantly enhanced by a stealth delivery method. It also will have the added safety of the new Bluetooth "crowd alert" technology, recently added as a FREE upgrade for campaign funders. Estimated retail Price $79.95.

What is Bluetooth/GPS "Crowd Alert" technology?


It is a Bluetooth chip in the Peacekeeper that, upon activation, sends a signal via bluetooth through the person's phone to other phones who have elected to receive the alerts.  This app will be given free to all campaign participants if we reach our stretch goal of $150,000. 

We are working together with a brilliant app development team to create a very sophisticated app that goes far beyond the basic functionality. It employs many underlying multi-tiered failsafe measures to ensure maximum efficiency and dependability. 

Unlike other blue tooth "alert" products, the Peacekeeper Mini has the added ability to STOP THE ATTACKER!

                         


Over the past several years, we have created some of the world’s best non-lethal devices, namely the TigerLight® Gold Series I, II, III, and the T100. We have one simple goal at TigerLight: to keep you safe from those who want to cause you harm. It was with this goal in mind that we created a product that safely stops bad situations from getting worse. Meet the Peacekeeper Mini. 

"The light is amazing, but the stopping power is simply unbelievable!"
                                                            Officer Mike Stradley, SWAT


See many more testimonials from non-paid celebrities, top ranking police and military personnel and expert self-defense instructors below and in the gallery (Tab above).


There are countless self-defense products available to civilians these days. Unfortunately, most of those self-defense products have limitations. See how we compare.

Stun guns and tasers often times require the user to be close to their intended target. In addition to proximity issues, heavy clothing, poor aim, and multiple attackers contribute to these device’s limitations. Since attacks are not always broadcasted, the stun guns short incapacitation time allows little time to get to safety, especially in isolated areas. 

Pepper sprays are all too often unreliable. Recently, the University of Utah conducted a test of various sprays. Their study showed that the potency claims made by the manufacturers are often times misstated with some sprays being 1/100th of the potency claimed on their label. In addition to the low potency, it is uncommon for people to carry pepper spray in their hands which makes it less accessible if an attack happens.

Though we support the right to carry firearms, and know that firearms can save lives, firearms are impractical in a majority of situations where civilian-on-civilian attacks occur. Ending someone’s life is the last thing that you want to do, which is why we created the Peacekeeper Mini. It allows you to stop an attack before it starts.

"If you are looking for the best personal protection device, this is it, at ANY price!"
Director Lance Powers, SWAT TEAM LEADER, SRT Instructor, Master Trainer


The Peacekeeper Mini offers peace of mind to an unsafe world. Here are 7 REASONS the Peacemaker Mini is the #1 choice to keep you out of harm’s way: 

  1. You are more likely to have a Peacekeeper Mini in-hand compared to other self-defense products because of its dual purposes (flashlight+pepper spray).

  2. The Peacekeeper Mini spray delivery method, based on previous TigerLights, have shown documented stop rates of 96% because of its concentrated powerful formula, the spray pattern and most of all, the element of surprise. This results in a far greater and more immediate effect on the respiratory system resulting in a more potent incapacitating effect, particularly on drug impaired individuals. 

  3. The Peacekeeper Mini mimics and assimilates your natural response to an act of aggression, which is key in a high stress situation.

  4. The Peacekeeper Mini can be used on multiple attackers as opposed to other self-defense products.

  5. The Peacekeeper Mini’s effect lasts 30-45 minutes, giving you enough time to get away.

  6. With the hand strap, a person is less likely to be one of the 90% who drop their weapon or self-defense device during a physical attack.

  7. The Peacekeeper Mini is inexpensive.
"Our approach has always been to produce products that work in practice, not only in theory.  That is why TigerLights not only have the highest documented "stop rate" of any non-lethal device, but create such passion from users that, in one case, a police officer drove over 1,000 miles only to get a new $12.00 light bulb for his TigerLight® so he would not have to go to work as a police officer that night without it."  Michael H. Teig

Violent crimes are becoming more and more prevalent throughout the United States. To help illustrate our point, here are a few facts. 

  • More than 22 million women in the United States have been raped in their lifetime.

  • 18.3% of women in the United States have survived a completed or attempted rape.

  • Every two minutes, somewhere in America, someone is sexually assaulted.

  • 15% of sexual assault and rape victims are under age 12; 29% are age 12-17; 44% are under age 18; 80% are under age 30; ages 12-34 are the highest risk years.

  • Girls ages 16-19 are 4 times more likely than the general population to be victims of rape, attempted rape, or sexual assault. 

"90% of people drop their weapon when physically attacked."

Below is a computer generated 3D image of the hand strap, in a variety of colors, that will come with your Peacekeeper Mini.  It will be a soft, pliable material that will stretch over your hand and secure the light to your hand comfortably allowing you to actually use your fingers while the light is in hand.

Unfortunately, attackers do not broadcast or announce their intent to attack.  The victim often does not realize he or she is being attacked until physical contact has been made. Given that 90% of people will drop their weapon in a sudden, physical attack, the hand strap becomes critically important.

For additional resources, check out these links:

http://www.feminist.com/antiviolence/facts.html
http://www.oneinfourusa.org/statistics.php
http://www.now.org/issues/violence/stats.html
http://tigerlight.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/TigerLight-Use-of-Force-Study-v1.pdf


Meet The Peacekeeper Project Team

Michael Teig - President/CEO/Chairman/Co Founder 

David Wiener - Chief Designer – DWV

John Gardiner - Industrial Design Engineer

Lonnie Adams - Electrical Engineer 

Chris Knapp - Mechanical Design Engineer 

Rod Sheffield - President Zygo Digital 

Quinn Besinger - Industrial Designer

We started the Peacekeeper Mini Project in early 2013 and have moved steadily forward ever since. We know the self-defense industry and after thorough research, we know that this product is what’s missing. Through hard work, we are ready to bring the newest TigerLight® product to the public with a new and improved design.

Speaking of designs, they are done. As you can see, we have completed that part of the process and we are ready to move forward to the manufacturing stages. This is where we need your support. We have proven ourselves as a mainstay in the industry and we are ready to introduce the Peacekeeper Mini to you. 

We started the Peacekeeper Mini Project in early 2013 and have moved steadily forward ever since. Through hard work, we are ready to bring the newest TigerLight® product to the public with a new and improved design.

Speaking of design, “We went after the best and got them.” said TigerLight CEO Michael Teig.  I wanted a team of not only extremely talented designers and engineers, but also ones who understand the technology, the market and exactly what we are trying to accomplish.  We knew it had to be high performance and visually appealing or it would not be in hand when needed. And, it has to remain in hand during an attack. 

When it comes to high performance and beauty, Ferrari comes to mind and David Wiener has designed many incredibly beautiful, high performance products for Ferrari and is, himself, an avid sportsman, even designing a world-record-breaking bicycle ridden by Olympian Eric Heiden.

Everything has been taken into account from the positioning of the light switch and spray, the contour, width and length of the light and the materials, while accommodating people’s natural mental and physical response to an attack.

“We looked at a hundred designs before bringing David on board and David’s design garnered, by far, the most passionate, positive response from a variety of potential customers.  With one finish, it can take on the appearance of a piece of jewelry or a diamond. With another finish, it can look military tough...and it will be tough!” says Teig.  “There are more advantages to the size, weight and design than I have room to explain, but people will experience it, especially when they really need it!”

David has worked with a team of extremely talented engineers including electrical engineer Lonnie Adams, industrial designer John Gardiner and systems engineer Rod Sheffield. Mechanical designer, Chris Knapp and industrial designer Quinn Besinger also made significant contributions in the early stages of development.    

We are ready to move forward to the manufacturing stages. This is where we need your support. We have proven ourselves as a mainstay in the industry and we are ready to introduce the Peacekeeper Mini to you.

We developed this product because we want everyone to feel safe, regardless of their situation. With your help, we can save lives and bring increased safety and peace of mind to millions. Your support will allow us to create not only a high quality and proven self-defense product, but one that’s affordable for everyone. You can protect your loved ones by giving them the Peacekeeper Mini. 

Help us make a difference.

We have been supplying military-grade products to policemen for the past 13 years, but our goal is to get the same quality of product into your home for a fraction of the price.

In order for us to do this, we have to order the components and machinery needed to begin manufacturing in bulk so we can drive the cost per Peacekeeper Mini down. The bottom line is this: if we can manufacture for less, we can sell it for less.  The more successful the campaign, the lower the retail price.  Help us make it possible for everyone to afford one.

We ask you to think of those you love and fund a cause that has the potential to save the lives of millions. 

www.tigerlight.net


A January 24, 2014 New York Times article states: “Mr. Obama gave his task force 90 days to recommend best practices for colleges to prevent or respond to assaults.”

A subsequent report from The White House Council On Women and Girls titled Rape and Sexual Assault: A Renewed Call To Action dated January 14, 2014 detailed, among others, the following solution:

Launched the 1 is 2 Many Campaign to focus on teen and young-adult sexual violence. Among a number of other initiatives, the Campaign inspired the creation of the “Circle of 6” app- which puts a group of friends instantly in touch with each other, so someone in trouble can send a “come and get me” message, complete with GPS location map.

TigerLight has responded and surpassed this initiative with a tiny, pocket-size device that is like having multiple personal bodyguards with backup teams on call. 

Why do we need it?  One reason is that 1 out every 5 girls on college campuses are raped and its getting worse, not better.  

Imagine a young coed walking to her car from the library, a small flashlight in hand. She is confronted by a rapist. In a blink of an eye two things happen; a “crowd alert” with her photo and GPS location appears on the screens of 200 other student's cell phones in the vicinity, including the campus security, and they all run immediately to her rescue only to find the would-be rapist writhing on the ground, incapacitated, but not injured.  This is the Peacekeeper Mini, a proprietary, patented self-defense device, affordable to students and based on street proven technology, tried and proven by our military and police.

Help us make sure that White House is aware that the solution can be found in the Peacekeeper Mini project on Indiegogo.

O.U.R. Rescue

Self Defense For Everyone:  Every teacher and administrator in our schools, every student 18 or older, every jogger, hiker, walker and everyone else old enough to use one. Think about what this could mean!

Our NEW partnership with Operation Underground Railroad (O.U.R.) is to help spread the word about this amazing new product. Although this campaign's purpose is to fund the production of the Peacekeeper Mini and reward YOU for helping do that, TigerLight has participated in many charitable causes and we do not know of any cause more important than O.U.R., so we are working together to promote the Peacekeeper Mini campaign while also donating 20% to rescue children, right now. If you do not want part of your contribution to support O.U.R. you can select a PERK that does not include O.U.R.

Message from Tim Ballard, Founder and CEO of Operation Underground Railroad (O.U.R.) and Jump Team Commander for rescue operations. 

"We are thrilled to partner with Michael Teig, TigerLight, and those of you who will help us rescue these children from unfathomable misery. When you contribute to the new Peacekeeper Mini campaign, TigerLight will donate 20% of that contribution to Operation Underground Railroad (O.U.R) and 100% will go to fund the direct costs of the rescue missions.' 

'Each mission costs between $15,000 - $25,000. You cannot begin to comprehend the difference you will make in these kids' lives.  There are approximately 2,000,000 of these children being subjected to the worst possible kind of slavery.  I have shed many tears. If you saw what I have seen, you would probably give everything you have to free just one of these children!"


                  


What happens if the campaign does not reach the minimum campaign goal?

ANSWER: The money is all returned to the contributors.

Will the spray still work if the battery goes dead?

ANSWER: Yes.

Is the money deducted out of our account the moment we pay?

ANSWER: Yes, is it held by Indiegogo until the end of the campaign and then disbursed to TigerLight if the campaign reaches a minimum of $50,000 and returned to the donors if it does not.  That is supposed to take place within 15 days after the end of the campaign.

How is the light turned on?  I do not see the light button on the side like the other TigerLights.

ANSWER: The light and the spray are both operated with the thumb.  It is a new patent pending design.  Both approaches work extremely well but we are excited about this design.  We had been getting lots of requests from the professional industry, here in the US and in Europe, to have the switch under the thumb like many of the new, small tactical lights.  

The problem was that it would not work unless the light and components were very small.  In the Peacekeeper Mini, it works PERFECTLY.  If you have your thumb on the light button, the spray button is behind and above, so you will not accidentally push the spray button.  You have to raise your thumb up a little and push it back slightly to get over the spray button to push it down.  The really cool part is that you can also rest the thumb over the spray button, resting on an interior side ledge.  This is the position one would want to be in if exposed to potential attack.  In this position the thumb is slightly cocked at an angle with the thumb knuckle right over the light button.  Without moving your thumb position, all you have to do is "un-cock" or straighten your thumb and operate the light with the underside of your thumb knuckle.  It is very intuitive.  We have tried it with rapid prototypes and men and woman with small and large hands can operate it very comfortably and easily.

Will the Peacekeeper Mini have a holster?

ANSWER: We plan to make carry options for every situation, for the arm, wrist, waist, ankle, purse, bike.  We emphasize the great importance that the Peacekeeper Mini be in your hand when things go bad, and retention is also very important.  However, we realize it is not going to be in your hand in every situation and every environment, so we want to make it convenient, comfortable and quickly accessible at all times, whether at the beach or the prom, work or play.  Our goal is that it is with you whenever your cell phone is and we know that is nearly 24/7. 

What if I do not have a PayPal account.  Can I still purchase (donate)?

ANSWER: You can contribute to our campaign via PayPal, even if you do not have a PayPal account. Use your credit card to "Pay as a Guest" without signing in to PayPal with a password: 

When you get to the PayPal screen, you'll see up top "Choose a Way to Pay"

Select the second option: "Pay with a debit or credit card"

Complete the form - PayPal accepts Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and American Express

Deselect the checkbox that says: "Save this information with a PayPal account"

Click "Review and Continue" to continue with a payment using a credit card

Note: Residents of Utah may be subject to sales tax.

Is there a temperature range the product works most effectively in?

ANSWER: Every canister manufacturer recommends that it not be stored above 120 degreed F.  Our canister in our other lights were tested for the military by Eastern Laboratories in ten degree increments for an hour and only one canister failed after 55 minutes at 212 degrees fahrenheit. I have sprayed canisters after leaving them out in the snow all night in temperatures of about 5 degrees fahrenheit.  They sprayed fine.  Although a minimum temperature is not mentioned, some say it can be as low as -5 degrees F.  I suspect that our sprays from Sabre Red and Guardian PD, given that they are not water based and are non-flammable, and are both used by the military and police, may have very low freezing points.  Also, given the fact that the canister is contained in the flashlight and not exposed to direct sunlight, it is likely to withstand both higher and lower temperatures.

Does the Peacekeeper Mini have a strobe mode?

I received a private comment suggesting that we have a strobe light mode on the Peacekeeper Mini. In fact, we have what we call a passive “panic” mode. The light assumes that when you push the “On” button, you are under attack and immediately goes to a bright strobe for 3 seconds and then to constant high mode. If you do not want it to go to the panic mode, you “tap” the button twice and it goes directly to high mode. It also has a low mode and an SOS mode. Everything is designed to increase safety.


READ IMPORTANT INFORMATION BEFORE PLACING YOUR ORDER!

TigerLight® consumers are responsible for understanding the local and state laws concerning the purchase and use of TigerLight, Inc.'s products. The consumer agrees that TigerLight, Inc.'s products are not intended for illegal use. TigerLight, Inc. is not responsible for misrepresentation by the consumer, nor the illegal use of our products. By submitting an order to www.tigerlight.net or Indiegogo, the consumer states that they are at least 18 years old, understand the local and state laws concerning the purchase and use of TigerLight, Inc.'s products and agrees to all terms and conditions of this purchase. No warranties implied or expressed.

Alaska
TigerLight cannot ship products to consumers in Alaska. Please check with your local sporting goods provider about purchasing the Peacekeeper Mini, and other TigerLight products.  The exception is if the consumer is willing to pay the additional Hazmat charge for air shipment.

District of Columbia
TigerLight cannot ship products to consumers in the District of Columbia. Please check with your local sporting goods provider about purchasing the Peacekeeper Mini, and other TigerLight products.

Massachusetts
TigerLight cannot ship products to consumers in Massachusetts. Peacekeeper Minis and other TigerLight products must be purchased from a licensed gun dealer.

New York
TigerLight cannot ship products to consumers in New York. Peacekeeper Minis  and other TigerLight products must be purchased from a licensed gun dealer or pharmacy.


READ IMPORTANT INFORMATION BEFORE PLACING YOUR ORDER FROM FOREIGN COUNTRIES (COUNTRIES OTHER THAN THE UNITED STATES).

Shipment to foreign countries.  

According to the best of our knowledge, it is legal to purchase and carry pepper spray products like that contained in the Peacekeeper Mini in the countries listed below.  However, consumers are responsible for understanding the laws in their local area and country concerning the online purchase and use of TigerLight, Inc.'s products, including the Peacekeeper Mini. 

The consumer agrees that TigerLight, Inc.'s products are not intended for illegal use. TigerLight, Inc. is not responsible for misrepresentation by the consumer, nor the illegal purchase or use of our products and does not represent that the information it has regarding the purchase and use of pepper spray products in the countries listed below is correct. By submitting an order via the Indiegogo campaign, the consumer states that they are at least 18 years old, understand their local, state, provincial, country or other applicable laws concerning the online purchase and use of TigerLight, Inc.'s products, including the Peacekeeper Mini and agrees to all terms and conditions of this purchase. No warranties implied or expressed.  

Consumer assumes all liability and responsibility and agrees to pay the actual cost of shipping, including any charges for taxes, duties, customs, hazardous material or other third party charges incurred to transport the product to the consumer.  Consumers in the following countries, subject to the above conditions, may participate in the campaign but assume all responsibility for insuring that the product is legal for them to purchase and own.  

Philippines

Mongolia

Thailand

Taiwan

Malaysia

Saudi Arabia

South Korea

Japan

Israel

Czech Republic

Italy

Latvia

Poland

Russia

Switzerland (Must show proof of registration as a user)

South Africa

Spain

Columbia

Check your local laws to see if it is legal in your area.

We know the self-defense industry and after thorough research, we know that this product is
what’s missing. Through hard work, we are ready to bring the newest TigerLight® product to
the public with a new and improved design.

Speaking of designs, they are done. As you can see, we have completed that part of the process and we are ready to move forward to the manufacturing stages. This is where we need
your support. We have proven ourselves as a mainstay in the industry and we are ready to
introduce the Peacekeeper Mini to you. 



We started the Peacekeeper Mini Project in early 2013 and have moved steadily forward ever since. Through hard work, we are ready to bring the newest TigerLight® product to the public with a new and improved design.

Speaking of design, “We went after the best and got them.” said TigerLight CEO Michael Teig.  I wanted a team of not only extremely talented designers and engineers, but also ones who understand the technology, the market and exactly what we are trying to accomplish.  We knew it had to be high performance and visually appealing or it would not be in hand when needed. And, it has to remain in hand during an attack. 
When it comes to high performance and beauty, Ferrari comes to mind and David Wiener has designed many incredibly beautiful, high performance products for Ferrari and is, himself, an avid sportsman, even designing a world-record-breaking bicycle ridden by Olympian Eric Heiden.
Everything has been taken into account from the positioning of the light switch and spray, the contour, width and length of the light and the materials, while accommodating people’s natural mental and physical response to an attack.

“We looked at a hundred designs before bringing David on board and David’s design garnered, by far, the most passionate, positive response from a variety of potential customers.  With one finish, it can take on the appearance of a piece of jewelry or a diamond. With another finish, it can look military tough...and it will be tough!” says Teig.  “There are more advantages to the size, weight and design than I have room to explain, but people will experience it, especially when they really need it!”
David has worked with a team of extremely talented engineers including electrical engineer Lonnie Adams, industrial designer John Gardiner and systems engineer Rod Sheffield. Mechanical designer, Chris Knapp and industrial designer Quinn Besinger also made significant contributions in the early stages of development.    
We are ready to move forward to the manufacturing stages. This is where we need your support. We have proven ourselves as a mainstay in the industry and we are ready to introduce the Peacekeeper Mini to you.










We developed this product because we want everyone to feel safe, regardless of their situation.
With your help, we can save lives and bring increased safety and peace of mind to millions. Your
support will allow us to create not only a high quality and proven self-defense product, but one
that’s affordable for everyone. You can protect your loved ones by giving them the Peacekeeper
Mini. 
Help us make a difference.

We have been supplying military-grade products to policemen for the past 13 years, but our
goal is to get the same quality of product into your home for a fraction of the price.

In order for us to do this, we have to order the components and machinery needed to begin
manufacturing in bulk so we can drive the cost per Peacekeeper Mini down. The bottom line is this:
if we can manufacture for less, we can sell it for less.  The more successful the campaign, the lower the retail price.  Help us make it possible for everyone to afford one.
We ask you to think of those you love and fund a cause that has the potential to save the lives
of millions. 



www.tigerlight.net




A January 24, 2014 New York Times article states: “Mr. Obama gave his task force 90 days to recommend best practices for colleges to prevent or respond to assaults.”


A subsequent report from The White House Council On Women and Girls titled Rape and Sexual Assault: A Renewed Call To Action dated January 14, 2014 detailed, among others, the following solution:




Launched the 1 is 2 Many Campaign to focus on teen and young-adult sexual violence. Among a number of other initiatives, the Campaign inspired the creation of the “Circle of 6” app- which puts a group of friends instantly in touch with each other, so someone in trouble can send a “come and get me” message, complete with GPS location map.


TigerLight has responded and surpassed this initiative with a tiny, pocket-size device that is like having multiple personal bodyguards with backup teams on call. 

Why do we need it?  One reason is that 1 out every 5 girls on college campuses are raped and its getting worse, not better.  


Imagine a young coed walking to her car from the library, a small flashlight in hand. She is confronted by a rapist. In a blink of an eye two things happen; a “crowd alert” with her photo and GPS location appears on the screens of 200 other student's cell phones in the vicinity, including the campus security, and they all run immediately to her rescue only to find the would-be rapist writhing on the ground, incapacitated, but not injured.  This is the Peacekeeper Mini, a proprietary, patented self-defense device, affordable to students and based on street proven technology, tried and proven by our military and police.


Help us make sure that White House is aware that the solution can be found in the Peacekeeper Mini project on Indiegogo.
O.U.R. Rescue

Self Defense For Everyone:  Every teacher and administrator in our schools, every student 18 or older, every jogger, hiker, walker and everyone else old enough to use one. Think about what this could mean!
Our NEW partnership with Operation Underground Railroad (O.U.R.) is to help spread the word about this amazing new product. Although this campaign's purpose is to fund the production of the Peacekeeper Mini and reward YOU for helping do that, TigerLight has participated in many charitable causes and we do not know of any cause more important than O.U.R., so we are working together to promote the Peacekeeper Mini campaign while also donating 20% to rescue children, right now. If you do not want part of your contribution to support O.U.R. you can select a PERK that does not include O.U.R.


Message from Tim Ballard, Founder and CEO of Operation Underground Railroad (O.U.R.) and Jump Team Commander for rescue operations. 
"We are thrilled to partner with Michael Teig, TigerLight, and those of you who will help us rescue these children from unfathomable misery. When you contribute to the new Peacekeeper Mini campaign, TigerLight will donate 20% of that contribution to Operation Underground Railroad (O.U.R) and 100% will go to fund the direct costs of the rescue missions.' 
'Each mission costs between $15,000 - $25,000. You cannot begin to comprehend the difference you will make in these kids' lives.  There are approximately 2,000,000 of these children being subjected to the worst possible kind of slavery.  I have shed many tears. If you saw what I have seen, you would probably give everything you have to free just one of these children!"










                  
What happens if the campaign does not reach the minimum campaign goal?
ANSWER: The money is all returned to the contributors.
Will the spray still work if the battery goes dead?
ANSWER: Yes.


Is the money deducted out of our account the moment we pay?
ANSWER: Yes, is it held by Indiegogo until the end of the campaign and then disbursed to TigerLight if the campaign reaches a minimum of $50,000 and returned to the donors if it does not.  That is supposed to take place within 15 days after the end of the campaign.


How is the light turned on?  I do not see the light button on the side like the other TigerLights.
ANSWER: The light and the spray are both operated with the thumb.  It is a new patent pending design.  Both approaches work extremely well but we are excited about this design.  We had been getting lots of requests from the professional industry, here in the US and in Europe, to have the switch under the thumb like many of the new, small tactical lights.  


The problem was that it would not work unless the light and components were very small.  In the Peacekeeper Mini, it works PERFECTLY.  If you have your thumb on the light button, the spray button is behind and above, so you will not accidentally push the spray button.  You have to raise your thumb up a little and push it back slightly to get over the spray button to push it down.  The really cool part is that you can also rest the thumb over the spray button, resting on an interior side ledge.  This is the position one would want to be in if exposed to potential attack.  In this position the thumb is slightly cocked at an angle with the thumb knuckle right over the light button.  Without moving your thumb position, all you have to do is "un-cock" or straighten your thumb and operate the light with the underside of your thumb knuckle.  It is very intuitive.  We have tried it with rapid prototypes and men and woman with small and large hands can operate it very comfortably and easily.


Will the Peacekeeper Mini have a holster?
ANSWER: We plan to make carry options for every situation, for the arm, wrist, waist, ankle, purse, bike.  We emphasize the great importance that the Peacekeeper Mini be in your hand when things go bad, and retention is also very important.  However, we realize it is not going to be in your hand in every situation and every environment, so we want to make it convenient, comfortable and quickly accessible at all times, whether at the beach or the prom, work or play.  Our goal is that it is with you whenever your cell phone is and we know that is nearly 24/7. 


What if I do not have a PayPal account.  Can I still purchase (donate)?
ANSWER: You can contribute to our campaign via PayPal, even if you do not have a PayPal account. Use your credit card to "Pay as a Guest" without signing in to PayPal with a password: 


When you get to the PayPal screen, you'll see up top "Choose a Way to Pay"
Select the second option: "Pay with a debit or credit card"
Complete the form - PayPal accepts Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and American Express
Deselect the checkbox that says: "Save this information with a PayPal account"
Click "Review and Continue" to continue with a payment using a credit card

Note: Residents of Utah may be subject to sales tax.
Is there a temperature range the product works most effectively in?
ANSWER: Every canister manufacturer recommends that it not be stored above 120 degreed F.  Our canister in our other lights were tested for the military by Eastern Laboratories in ten degree increments for an hour and only one canister failed after 55 minutes at 212 degrees fahrenheit. I have sprayed canisters after leaving them out in the snow all night in temperatures of about 5 degrees fahrenheit.  They sprayed fine.  Although a minimum temperature is not mentioned, some say it can be as low as -5 degrees F.  I suspect that our sprays from Sabre Red and Guardian PD, given that they are not water based and are non-flammable, and are both used by the military and police, may have very low freezing points.  Also, given the fact that the canister is contained in the flashlight and not exposed to direct sunlight, it is likely to withstand both higher and lower temperatures.
Does the Peacekeeper Mini have a strobe mode?
I received a private comment suggesting that we have a strobe light mode on the Peacekeeper Mini. In fact, we have what we call a passive “panic” mode. The light assumes that when you push the “On” button, you are under attack and immediately goes to a bright strobe for 3 seconds and then to constant high mode. If you do not want it to go to the panic mode, you “tap” the button twice and it goes directly to high mode. It also has a low mode and an SOS mode. Everything is designed to increase safety.

READ IMPORTANT INFORMATION BEFORE PLACING YOUR ORDER!
TigerLight® consumers are responsible for understanding the local and state laws concerning the purchase and use of TigerLight, Inc.'s products. The consumer agrees that TigerLight, Inc.'s products are not intended for illegal use. TigerLight, Inc. is not responsible for misrepresentation by the consumer, nor the illegal use of our products. By submitting an order to www.tigerlight.net or Indiegogo, the consumer states that they are at least 18 years old, understand the local and state laws concerning the purchase and use of TigerLight, Inc.'s products and agrees to all terms and conditions of this purchase. No warranties implied or expressed.
AlaskaTigerLight cannot ship products to consumers in Alaska. Please check with your local sporting goods provider about purchasing the Peacekeeper Mini, and other TigerLight products.  The exception is if the consumer is willing to pay the additional Hazmat charge for air shipment.
District of ColumbiaTigerLight cannot ship products to consumers in the District of Columbia. Please check with your local sporting goods provider about purchasing the Peacekeeper Mini, and other TigerLight products.
MassachusettsTigerLight cannot ship products to consumers in Massachusetts. Peacekeeper Minis and other TigerLight products must be purchased from a licensed gun dealer. 
New YorkTigerLight cannot ship products to consumers in New York. Peacekeeper Minis  and other TigerLight products must be purchased from a licensed gun dealer or pharmacy.
READ IMPORTANT INFORMATION BEFORE PLACING YOUR ORDER FROM FOREIGN COUNTRIES (COUNTRIES OTHER THAN THE UNITED STATES).
Shipment to foreign countries.  
According to the best of our knowledge, it is legal to purchase and carry pepper spray products like that contained in the Peacekeeper Mini in the countries listed below.  However, consumers are responsible for understanding the laws in their local area and country concerning the online purchase and use of TigerLight, Inc.'s products, including the Peacekeeper Mini. 
The consumer agrees that TigerLight, Inc.'s products are not intended for illegal use. TigerLight, Inc. is not responsible for misrepresentation by the consumer, nor the illegal purchase or use of our products and does not represent that the information it has regarding the purchase and use of pepper spray products in the countries listed below is correct. By submitting an order via the Indiegogo campaign, the consumer states that they are at least 18 years old, understand their local, state, provincial, country or other applicable laws concerning the online purchase and use of TigerLight, Inc.'s products, including the Peacekeeper Mini and agrees to all terms and conditions of this purchase. No warranties implied or expressed.  
Consumer assumes all liability and responsibility and agrees to pay the actual cost of shipping, including any charges for taxes, duties, customs, hazardous material or other third party charges incurred to transport the product to the consumer.  Consumers in the following countries, subject to the above conditions, may participate in the campaign but assume all responsibility for insuring that the product is legal for them to purchase and own.  
Philippines
Mongolia
Thailand
Taiwan
Malaysia
Saudi Arabia
South Korea
Japan
Israel
Czech Republic
Italy
Latvia
Poland
Russia
Switzerland (Must show proof of registration as a user)
South Africa
Spain
Columbia
Check your local laws to see if it is legal in your area.

story:
- Sycure Internet Browsing

Thank you for checking out Sycure on Indiegogo! We are very excited about our project and hope that you will be too!

Sycure was founded in 2012 by Justin Benoit.  Justin has over 17-years of experience in the Information Technology industry and spent the last 3 years as the Director of Cyber Security for a multi-billion dollar contractor to the United States government. 

There is a very big difference between the tools and resources available to large businesses and governments to help protect themselves against cyber crime, and the ones available to everybody else.  Sycure was created to eliminate this gap and provide everyone with the opportunity to have the best security while using the Internet and do it affordably.

THE PROBLEM

The Internet is a tremendous resource...the problem is, it is a tremendous resource for the bad guys, too.  The primary issue is Malware.

Malware, short for “malicious software,” is software used or programmed by attackers to disrupt computer operation, gather sensitive information, or gain access to private computer systems. It can appear in the form of code, scripts, active content, and other software (Wikipedia).

Eighty-five percent of Malware is delivered via the web (Sophos), and 90% of that comes in through the browser on your computer (PaloAlto Networks).

McAfee Lab's  Threats Report:  First Quarter 2013 places the number of suspect URLs at 64.3 million URL's across 27.7 million domains – a 12% increase over the prior quarter – with more than 80% of these suspect URLs categorized as “highly” suspect.

If that wasn't bad enough, today Malware can automatically morph to avoid detection.

To make matters worse, it is not just the cyber criminals out to take advantage of you – legitimate businesses are watching and tracking your online activity for financial gain.

Today you need:

  • Anti-Virus
  • Anti-Spyware
  • Anti-Adware
  • Anti-Tracking
  • Firewall
  • Properly configured browser settings

AND...you need to know how to use it all!

IT'S TIME TO CHANGE THE WAY YOU PROTECT YOURSELF

SYCURE IS DIFFERENT

Sycure leverages synergies among multiple independent technologies and integrates them into one cohesive system that is simple to use. 

Aristotle once said, "The whole is greater than the sum of its parts".  Who are we to argue?  Sycure is based on that philosophy.  By integrating different, complementary technologies, Sycure has developed a different way to address online security and personal privacy. Given that it is comprised of independent integrated components, it can easily adapt as technology changes.

We leverage advances in Virtualization, Cloud Computing and Open Source Software to provide a single solution offering the following protections with zero end user configuration and zero end user management:

Sycure Shield - Isolates your browser from your computer. This barrier keeps unwanted software from automatically being installed from the web. If the browser within Sycure Shield gets unwanted software such as toolbars, URL redirectors, tracking snippets, etc., you simply close your browser and reopen it, returning it to a clean, pristine state automatically.  Unlike competing solutions that only protect your installed browser, Sycure is expandable to email, video players, and PDF readers – any application that is an avenue for Malware to infect your computer.

Sycure Cloud - Connects to Sycure Shield with an encrypted tunnel to protect your information from prying eyes, across any Internet connection, all the time. It also removes your location information and scans all incoming traffic for Malware, providing even more protection.

Sycure Cloud is designed to never hold personal information. It is also designed to "refresh" itself every 24 hours. Using the same concept as Sycure Shield on the computer, by refreshing itself, every Sycure server is reset to its original pristine state daily.  This adds protection from possible infection of Sycure and ensures full removal of any cached or logged information.

HOW WE WILL USE OUR FUNDING

We are asking for $15,000 which is the minimum we believe is required to get our first version up and running.  We are working hard to achieve a per month cost to the user of only $2.99.

There are several enhancements and additional features we plan to add with funds that exceed our initial request, including: 

1.) Sycure Email App - 100% SPAM Free & always encrypted for popular computers, tablets and smartphones.

2.) KidsGate - Internet filtering option for parents to turn on for the protection of their kids.

3.) Time Control - Provide flexible time controls to limit usage for kids.

4.) SycureBox - Online cloud storage integrated with the FireFox browser and Sycure Shield.  All files saved and retrieved use the same encrypted tunnel as your other web traffic and your files are always stored encrypted.  iOS and Android applications would be made available for free so you can access your files from your smartphone.

5.) Expand Sycure to include protection for email apps, video players, MP3 players and PDF readers.  Browsers are the most common method for Malware delivery, but they are not the only avenue. Sycure wants to protect everybody from as many attack vectors as possible!

6.) Sycure for Linux desktops.

 

THE IMPACT

You often hear about cyber security issues in the news, yet most people do not take appropriate measures to protect themselves, their families and their children.  We believe that is because properly securing yourself can be difficult, oftentimes slows down your computer, and is hard to keep up with.  By supporting our project, you will help us complete development of our product that is very simple to use and provides multiple layers of protection.  To reach the same level of protection today you would need multiple technologies that are not plug n' play and require an advanced level of technical knowledge. Sycure eliminates the technical complexity for everybody and truly “levels the field” of cyber security!

You can help us tremendously by spreading the word, and we greatly appreciate your support!

story:
Stop wasting your money on weak, gimmicky uncertified cables that don’t last. The VOLTA Charger changes the game with strong, tangle-free military grade protection materials that never breaks! 

The VOLTA Charger also features a reversible magnetic connection, that connects, instantly every single time with ALL your devices!

The VOLTA Charger is x15 stronger than other charging ‎cables out there. The confidence in the strength and durability of The VOLTA Charger is transparent ‎through our LIFETIME guarantee, that comes with every purchase!‎

Research into the strongest and most efficient materials has been done, to ensure the ‎durability of every cable we ship out.

The sturdy, anti-scratch aluminium shielding ensures the ‎lasting, pristine condition of the connectors. PBV braiding and intelligent strain-relief collars ‎on the cable give it astounding agility, strength and flexibility to enable our cables to be ‎strong enough to even lift a cinder block as shown above.


We’ve also designed The VOLTA Charger to provide hassle-free charging for all your devices. Whether ‎you use a Samsung, LG, iPhone or iPad you can now wave good-bye to fumbling around trying to charge ‎your devices.

The VOLTA Charger has passed several strict reliability tests. These tests are done to ensure it will outlast any other cable on the market ‎no matter what you do to it (short of taking an axe to it!).

  • 18K gold-plated copper core plug & 24 AWG copper wires guarantee a lightning-fast charge. 
  • 18K gold-plated needles deliver a faster, more stable current to your device.
  • 3 layers of military grade PVC protection, anti-oxidative & anti-corrosive nickel-plating means your VOLTA Charger will last forever.

Unlike those lame cables you’ve wasted money on in the past, The VOLTA Charger features seamless connection every single time. Two perfectly aligned, N52-grade Neodymium reversible magnets in 360° orientation – at both ends – delivers an immediate, powerful connection INSTANTLY! No more stabbing your device to death trying to connect for a charge! 

VOLTA connects (or disconnects) to your devices instantly, and without effort. This is ‎especially useful at times trying to charge your device in the dark or while driving. 

CHARGE & SYNC at record breaking speed with 24 AWG tightly braided wires. Less time plugged in, more time going out!

Grossed out by all the gunk hanging out in your charging ports? Truth is, it’s slowly killing your devices and reducing their ability to power up. All the wear and tear of constantly shoving in and pulling out chargers it causes to your device. It’s a no-brainer, that avoiding all that is a smart decision. The VOLTA Charger tip stays put in your device's port, which protects the sensitive area from dust and dirt and safeguards it from all that daily abuse. The VOLTA Charger will not only make life easy but extend the life of all of your devices!

The VOLTA Charger is universal, It comes with 3 different tips compatible with any Apple, Android, or USB-C device. It’s the only charging cable you’ll ever need! 

 VOLTA CERTIFICATIONS

Every day at VOLTA, we’ve been working hard to provide the best product for you. Why? Because for every VOLTA cable that is sold, lives are being changed! We have a mission, and that mission  is to help change the lives of those in third world nations. Those who don't have the things we can so easily take for granted at times.

At VOLTA we give 40% OF ALL PROFITS towards our missions that are dedicate to changing lives. We’ve recently had the privilege of building desks and chairs for more than 210 students and pay scholarships for 60 students in a school in Africa! 

For more information on our projects you can go to our YouTube Channel.

Go ahead and get your VOLTA Charger in the following colours: Silver, Rose Pink, Gold, and Black. 

VOLTA is a tech startup based on the Gold Coast of Australia.

We are a new startup made of award-winning engineers, designers, and creatives. We’ve been working tirelessly to create a charging cable that gives people peace of mind. There are more important things in life than wrestling with technology, that should be making your life easier!

 



                 

You can support us and help make a difference in the lives of those less fortunate by purchasing a charger. Also by following and sharing our campaign on social media it will help spread the message of VOLTA! (click to open link)

 

REFUND POLICY

If you have a factory defect, you may apply for your warranty and we will send you a new product, see warranty guidelines below.
 

SHIPPING POLICY

If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't receive the package because you’re not at home, provided the wrong address, or moved without notifying us, and the package is returned to sender, we will not be able to send you another product to replace it.

 

WARRANTY

Our products come with a lifetime warranty which starts on the day of receipt. If you need to return the product, you will need to apply for a return authorisation number (RA) and pay for the shipping to send your product to us. When we have received your product with the associated RA# attached, if the product truly has a defect we will fix or replace your product and refund your shipping.

 

If you have any questions, do not hesitate to drop us an email at care@voltacharger.com‎ ‎we’ll get back to you within 24 hours.

18K gold-plated copper core plug & 24 AWG copper wires guarantee a lightning-fast charge. 

18K gold-plated needles deliver a faster, more stable current to your device.

3 layers of military grade PVC protection, anti-oxidative & anti-corrosive nickel-plating means your VOLTA Charger will last forever.

Unlike those lame cables you’ve wasted money on in the past, The VOLTA Charger features seamless connection every single time. Two perfectly aligned, N52-grade Neodymium reversible magnets in 360° orientation – at both ends – delivers an immediate, powerful connection INSTANTLY! No more stabbing your device to death trying to connect for a charge! VOLTA connects (or disconnects) to your devices instantly, and without effort. This is ‎especially useful at times trying to charge your device in the dark or while driving. CHARGE & SYNC at record breaking speed with 24 AWG tightly braided wires. Less time plugged in, more time going out!Grossed out by all the gunk hanging out in your charging ports? Truth is, it’s slowly killing your devices and reducing their ability to power up. All the wear and tear of constantly shoving in and pulling out chargers it causes to your device. It’s a no-brainer, that avoiding all that is a smart decision. The VOLTA Charger tip stays put in your device's port, which protects the sensitive area from dust and dirt and safeguards it from all that daily abuse. The VOLTA Charger will not only make life easy but extend the life of all of your devices!The VOLTA Charger is universal, It comes with 3 different tips compatible with any Apple, Android, or USB-C device. It’s the only charging cable you’ll ever need!  VOLTA CERTIFICATIONSEvery day at VOLTA, we’ve been working hard to provide the best product for you. Why? Because for every VOLTA cable that is sold, lives are being changed! We have a mission, and that mission  is to help change the lives of those in third world nations. Those who don't have the things we can so easily take for granted at times.At VOLTA we give 40% OF ALL PROFITS towards our missions that are dedicate to changing lives. We’ve recently had the privilege of building desks and chairs for more than 210 students and pay scholarships for 60 students in a school in Africa! For more information on our projects you can go to our YouTube Channel.Go ahead and get your VOLTA Charger in the following colours: Silver, Rose Pink, Gold, and Black. VOLTA is a tech startup based on the Gold Coast of Australia.We are a new startup made of award-winning engineers, designers, and creatives. We’ve been working tirelessly to create a charging cable that gives people peace of mind. There are more important things in life than wrestling with technology, that should be making your life easier!                  You can support us and help make a difference in the lives of those less fortunate by purchasing a charger. Also by following and sharing our campaign on social media it will help spread the message of VOLTA! (click to open link) REFUND POLICYIf you have a factory defect, you may apply for your warranty and we will send you a new product, see warranty guidelines below. SHIPPING POLICYIf our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't receive the package because you’re not at home, provided the wrong address, or moved without notifying us, and the package is returned to sender, we will not be able to send you another product to replace it. WARRANTYOur products come with a lifetime warranty which starts on the day of receipt. If you need to return the product, you will need to apply for a return authorisation number (RA) and pay for the shipping to send your product to us. When we have received your product with the associated RA# attached, if the product truly has a defect we will fix or replace your product and refund your shipping. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to drop us an email at care@voltacharger.com‎ ‎we’ll get back to you within 24 hours.

story:
Awesome!!! I just got this product and could not wait to unbox it. I love this product – well thought out, well designed, performs superbly, delightful packaging. I cannot thank you enough for coming up with this hub – almost delicious enough to eat! :-) Well worth the money. - R D'C

Seriously fast my friends. Arrived today and already hooked up and testing. No issues with USB, where I have even had issues with some devices with Apples own hub. - Stephen DiDonna

My first Chocolate Hub has arrived, and so far so good. A nice, finished product with no obvious bugs, and good smooth power throughput to a 2016 MacBook. - Karl Mitchell

The reason why we redesigned was for the most anticipated news of the year, the new iPhone X & 8! Updated internal engines designed for you.

 

Type-C Chipset V4.0

Higher watts of power beyond 25w. Provides more compatibility and a higher stability solution.

Advanced 2017 USB 3.0

More robust connections which fixes several older undetectable USB hardware.

HDMI 4K UHD Chipset

Stronger seamless stream, audio, and power output.

Wireless Charging Coil

Updated with Apple’s new iPhone Wireless Charging specifications.

 

 

 

 

Qi Wireless Phone Charging

The Chocolate Hub's charging surface uses Qi inductive technology, the industry’s standard for wireless device charging. Place your Qi-enabled device or compatible case on its surface to start charging. With your phone charging wirelessly, it leaves all the other ports available for use.

 

 

Type-C Thru Power and Data Transfer Port

A Type-C thru Power and Data Transfer port has been added and delivers 20 Volt, 3 Amp power. Use it to power your devices or to connect another Type-C device.

 

4K Ready HDMI Port

Adding a second display is simple with a standard, 4K ready HDMI port. 4K & UHD resolutions supported are 4K UHD 3840x2160 @30Hz, 4096x2160 @24Hz & 2560x1440 @60Hz. 

 

SuperSpeed USB 3.0 Ports & SD Card Reader

Also included are 2, backward compatible SuperSpeed USB 3.1 ports and a SD 3.0 Card Reader. The USB Ports are compatible with USB 3.0, USB 2.0, USB 1.1 and USB 1.0. The SD Card Reader supports SDXC 2TB, backward compatible with SD3.0 (UHS-I) cards. Supports Secure Digital v1.0/v1.1/v2.0/v3.0(UHS-I) | SDHC|SDXC Standards. Data transfer rates up to 104M/s.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Below are the most popular phones that are compatible with Qi wireless charging. If your device is not listed below, you can check its compatibility here: http://bit.ly/Qidevicecheck. 

Apple:  iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X

Samsung:  Note 8, S8, S8+, S7, S7 edge, S6, S6 Edge, S6 Edge+, Note 5

Google: Nexus 4, Nexus 5, Nexus 6, Nexus 7

Microsoft (Nokia): Lumia 950 XL, Lumia 950, Lumia 1520, Lumia Icon, Lumia 930, Lumia 928, Lumia 920, Lumia 830, Lumia 735

Kyocera: Torque, Torque G02, Urbano L01, Urbano L03, Hydro Elite

Others: Asus Padfone S, Blackberry Priv, Blackberry Z30, Blackberry Classic, HTC 8x, HTC Droid DNA, HTC Thunderbold, LG Optimus G Pro, LG G4, LG G3, Motorola Droid Max, Motorola Droid Mini, Motorola Droid Turbo, Sony Xperia Z4v, Sony BSP10

 

Dimensions: 5.3 x 3.2 x 0.4 inches 

Weight: 2.7 ounces

Smart Charging Voltage/Current: 20V/3A

Compatible Type-C & Thunderbolt 3 Laptops:  Apple Macbook Pro (2017, 2016), Apple Macbook (12 inches, 2015), Google Pixel Chromebook with Type-C, Samsung Chromebook with Type-C, ASUS Chromebook with Type-C, ACER Chromebook with Type-C, HP Chromebook with Type-C, Lenovo Yoga 900,  ASUS Transformer book T100HA, HP Spectre 13 x360, LG gram-15Z960-A.AA75U1, Dell XPS 13, RAZER BLADE STEALTH Ultrabook, Acer Aspire R 14, Acer Aspire V 15 Nitro VN7-572TG-775T, MSI GT72S 6QE DOMINATOR PRO G series, Dell Precision 15 7000 Series & all other Type-C & Thunderbolt 3 equipped laptops.

 

 

 

23 Devices tech is based out of Fremont, California. Among the team are specialists in the fields of design, electronics, hardware, manufacturing, logistics, marketing & customer care. Our expertise, vision and friendship enable us to create the most innovative devices. Our goal is to continue to bring our customers trusted products that enrich and simplify their workflow. We are also committed to making your experience with us the best it can be and put customer care as our top concern. We promise honest & realistic timelines, to be accessible, provide timely responses, and to always keep you informed. If at any time you need to reach us directly, please contact us by Email or instant message via Google Hangouts at support@23devices.com.

 

Q: What is the warranty?

A: If an event occurs, we will repair or replace items that are defective or were shipped damaged per our 90 day limited warranty. When you decide to back us, we are also asking for your kindness, patience and support. Requests can be made by Email or instant message via Google Hangouts at support@23devices.com.

 

Q: What Type-C laptops are currently supported?

A:  Apple Macbook Pro (2017, 2016), Apple Macbook (12 inches, 2015), Google Pixel Chromebook with Type-C, Samsung Chromebook with USB-C, ASUS Chromebook with Type-C, ACER Chromebook with Type-C, HP Chromebook with Type-C, Lenovo Yoga 900,  ASUS Transformer book T100HA, HP Spectre 13 x360, LG gram-15Z960-A.AA75U1, Dell XPS 13, RAZER BLADE STEALTH Ultrabook, Acer Aspire R 14, Acer Aspire V 15 Nitro VN7-572TG-775T, MSI GT72S 6QE DOMINATOR PRO G series, Dell Precision 15 7000 Series & all other Type-C & Thunderbolt 3 equipped laptops.

 

Q: Do I need to connect my laptop's power supply to use the Chocolate Hub?

A: Not in all situations. Laptop ports only supply enough power for a single SD card, flash drive, external monitor, printer, external 2.5” drive and so on. You’ll also be able to charge your phone with your laptop but phone manufactures say, “The best power source is the charger that came with your phone. Other sources, such as a laptop, may not charge as quickly.”  This is why we made sure to include a Type-C power and data port on the Chocolate Hub 2. By plugging in your laptop's power supply into the Chocolate Hub 2, you’ll have more than enough current to power your laptop, the Qi wireless phone charging pad, the SD card reader, the HDMI port and the 2 USB 3 ports. You will be able to use the Chocolate Hub 2 without your power supply, but only connect 1 or 2 devices at a time and everything will work perfectly.

campaign_city: San Francisco Bay Area, United States

story:
Our Goal

A dirty phone is just like hands that aren't clean. If it isn't sanitized it can transmit diseases and spread harmful bacteria onto the person using the phone. Even worse, this means you can spread viruses to others by simply touching your phone! RayKiller is here to put an end to bacteria-laden phones with a simple and effective solution.

Amidst the COVID-19 pandemic, protecting yourself from harmful bacteria and viruses is more important than ever. That's why we created RayKiller, an innovative device that uses powerful UV-C rays to completely sanitize your phone. It's portable, touchless, durable, and keeps you free from viruses and bacteria that harm your health.

RayKiller is a non-contact mobile UV-C sanitizer that is made for those on the go. It has a rechargeable battery and a USB-C charging connector so you'll always have the power to sanitize your phone. a smartphone inside RayKiller is illuminated by ultra sanitizing UV-C LED lights from all sides. Meanwhile, you can wash your hands and then grab your completely sanitized phone with clean hands.

Two Colors

Strong & Durable

The strong and durable construction uses an aluminium cover with an anodized surface. The milled body not only looks great but also weighs just 490 grams (1,08 pounds)

The wall brackets are available in the same color variant as the selected RayKiller.

 

Germ Killer

RayKiller is equipped with 12 powerful UV-C LEDs for perfect and fast disinfection of the phone. RayKiller has been tested in the laboratory with excellent results. It can destroy up to 99.8% of germs.

Bacteria Eliminating Surface

Your RayKiller will clean itself! It has a  flexible germicidal nanocomposite inlet cover that eliminates 99.99% of bacteria, viruses, and more. This will keep bacteria from multiplying on the outside of the device.

 

Portable Design

RayKiller is designed to be taken with you anywhere. Its small size is perfect for a bag or a purse, so you can sanitize your phone anywhere and anytime.

 

 

Specifications

Who We Are

At our production facility, we've produced high-precision aluminium, titanium, and inconel parts for over 20 years. Working with global airlines like Airbus, Boeing, Embraer, and others made us create products that are held to a very high standard. We used this approach to make RayKiller a durable and effective product with a luxurious design.

Our Team

Other Ways You Can Help

Do you like our project? Share us on social media.

Thank you
